11.title: Naruto Men

"The most hungry ninja alive!"

111.content:
It was the break of dawn in the calm town of Konohagakure. Our hero, Naruto Uzumaki, lay fast asleep in his bed, his black t-shirt lifted slightly and showing off a little bit of his abs. Naruto lazily scratched them in his sleep, groaning as a stream of drool slid down from his lips. It seemed like nothing could stir the young man from his slumber! That is until there was a loud pounding on the door! It was like thunder in his own home, and the resulting sound caused Naruto to jolt from his bed and fall to the floor! His pillow smacked down on top of his head, his leg still half on the bed and covered by the blanket.

"Mmmgh..." Naruto groaned to himself as his sleepy eyes peered open. He gazed about his room briefly, along the floor riddled with scrolls, ramen cups, and a few training weights. He slowly got to his feet for a better look around. "What the heck was that sound...?" Naruto muttered to himself. He then made his way out into the living room. There didn't seem to be anything wrong here either. The kitchen was still in one piece, the couch was fine, not even his table or chair was knocked over. So just what could that sound have been?

Naruto soon made his way over to the door just to make sure the village wasn't under attack. As he opened the door, there was not a soul to be seen. Naruto gazed left then right, before finally looking down. It was there that he saw that he had a box on the ground with a card on it. Naruto rose his eyebrow lazily as he gazed at it briefly, as if it were some foreign object not of this world.

"I don't remember ordering anything..." Naruto mumbled, before taking the box and bringing it inside. After all there was no use leaving it out. Naruto walked over and set the box on his table before taking a seat in his chair. It nearly took a whole three minutes before Naruto realized he would actually have to open the box to find out what was inside! But first of all was the card that lay right over the top, taped to the box. Naruto gently tore it off to keep it in one piece, before opening it up to read it. The card read:

Naruto,

I've really done it this time! My novel to end all novels! This one will go flying off the shelves in no time, I just know it! In fact, I'm so confident about this one that even YOU will like it! I'm sending you the first copy. Don't let anyone else read it!


Jiraiya


Naruto grumbled briefly to himself. "So that's what he woke me up for? Another one of his stupid books...?" Naruto disdainfully opened the box just to see what the book was like. After all, pervy-sage went through all the trouble, he could at least read ONE chapter of it before likely re-gifting it to Kakashi-sensei.

Naruto help up the book that was buried beneath some packing foam within the box. He held it up, the purple hardcover book gleaming in the low light of the kitchen. Naruto grumbled to himself yet again. There was simply a white figure hovered over a book with a pen in his hand.

"Make Out Your Own Ending?" Naruto read the title aloud, "... Geez pervy-sage, how lazy can you get?" Naruto flipped the book open, only to find that it was completely blank! Not a single word to be written on any page! Naruto dutifully flipped through page after page for a word, ANY word, but there was not one to be found! Naruto grumpily slammed it down onto the table, before groaning, "What is this?! It's not even a real book! It's just a buncha blank pages!"

Naruto sat there in his black tanktop and navy blue boxers, arms folded over his chest as he gazed grumpily at the book. In a little fit of anger, he got up to fetch a pen from his room before returning to the book. He sat back down and looked at the pages for a moment before deciding what to write. It took every fiber of his well-being not to slander Jiraiya's name upon the pages, so in the end, Naruto ended up writing little more than a simple sentence.

"I like ramen."

Naruto sat there for a moment, pondering the simplicity of the sentence. He then was shocked as he suddenly saw the words melt into the page! It disappeared without a trace! Naruto immediately picked up the book and turned the page! It didn't melt through, the words were just simply... Gone!

"What the hell...?!" Naruto muttered as he shook the book, half expecting words to fly out and land onto the table. When he finally realized that nothing was happening, he decided to try writing something else. He thought about it briefly before writing down something else.

"I am..."

112.content:
Kiba Inuzuka, covered in sweat and grinning from ear to ear, was walking home from the gym in Konoha, his latest workout a complete success! It was no secret that he was the envy of a lot of the other ninja thanks to his buffed body. He wasn't the biggest guy in Konoha by any stretch of the imagination, but his recent obsession with lifting weights had made him by and far the biggest out of the men in his age group. The ideal ninja had always, traditionally, been sleek and slim, able to move fast and undetected through enemy territory. However, more and more ninja had developed ninjutsu that was powerful enough for a single ninja to walk into enemy territory, decimate it completely, and accomplish their mission in record time. This was considered the advent of "Modern Ninjutsu", a movement where ninja were now focused on building their bodies for pure force rather than on stealth. Everyone in his age group, from Naruto and Kiba to even the tactical fighters like Shikamaru were developing their bodies to fall in line with this new wave of ninja. Of course, thanks to their zeal and stamina, Naruto and Kiba were both far better at it than anyone else. Shikamaru had the advantage of using his superior mind to come up with a work out plan that got him maximum results from minimal work but his slothfulness still kept him from making as big of gains as the dog and fox ninja. Naruto and Kiba had been in direct competition this past week, trying to outdo each other in every muscle group. Kiba had fully trounced Naruto, proving that he was bigger, faster, and stronger than the spiky haired ninja, though Naruto was a close second.

Kiba flexed his bicep, grinning as he saw the 18 inch lump rise up. He could barely remember the old days when he had been merely athletically toned. Those days were far behind him now! His red tank top was plastered to his sweaty body, accentuating his every curve and bulge, his six pack abs visible through the material! It helped that his work out tops were all made from thin, breathable material. His work out shorts were similarly sticky, showing off his bulging thighs while his meaty calves hardened with every step. With a surge of new confidence at his bigger body, Kiba had also become even cockier and less modest, showing off his respectable bulge without a care in the world. Why should he hide the great gifts he got?~

About one hundred yards from his house, he passed an alleyway, a voice suddenly calling out to him. "Hey kid!"

Kiba stopped and looked down the alley, curious who was talking to him. "Yeah? You talking to me?"

"Sure am~" the voice said, a little kid stepping out of the shadows. He was wearing a knit wool cap and a thick winter coat, his pants looking decidedly out of place in this ensemble by being thin and flappy, reaching just between his ankles and shins. Sandals adorned his feet, but they were unlike any Kiba had seen before. They looked like they were made out of leather straps, each one following along the bones on the top of his feet while others wrapped around each toe, a flat piece of rubber serving as the bottom. The cap was pulled down over his eyes, hiding them from view, a big grin plastered across his face. He had his hands deep in his pockets and his hair was buzzed nearly bald, leaving only a thin layer of black hair on his scalp. Not that Kiba could see his scalp.

"What do you want kid?" Kiba asked, shifting his bag further up his arm. He didn't have time to waste talking to weird kids.

"I want to help you of course!" He said, pulling one hand out of his pocket. "I've heard that you're the biggest guy around these parts. That true?"

Kiba smirked and flexed his biceps. "You tell me!"

The kid snickered and said, "Yeah, great, but can you guarantee you'll always be on top?"

"Of course I can!" Kiba said, frowning.

"What about that Naruto? I hear he's got some tricks up his sleeve. Hope he never uses those Shadow Clones of his to start working out!"

Kiba faltered a bit at that sentence. He had never thought of that before. If Naruto created fifty clones and they all worked out at the same time, when he recalled them all, their progress would become his! He could build his muscles up faster than anyone, even him! He didn't like the sound of that at all...

"Don't sweat it~ I can help!" The kid said, holding up a bottle, his index finger resting on top of it while his thumb was situated under it. "Take one of these before every work out session and I guarantee you'll see amazing results!"

"Yeah? What's the catch?" Kiba said, instantly suspicious.

"No catch! Consider it a personal favor." He tossed the bottle to Kiba. "It's up to you whether you use them or not."

Kiba caught the bottle and called out to the kid who was starting to walk away. "How much do you want for it?"

He turned around and waved his hands, still grinning from ear to ear. "Oh, no money thanks! The first taste is always free!"

Kiba scratched his head, looking down at the bottle. It looked like your average medicine bottle. Shaking it, Kiba estimated there was about fifteen or so pills inside. He popped it open and looked inside. They looked kind of like his soldier pills. "Maybe they have a similar base..." Kiba muttered, turning the bottle slightly so he could get a better look at them. He snapped the top back on and shrugged. Couldn't hurt to try it at least once right?

***

The next morning, after a full night's rest, Kiba was running off to the gym, eager to work his body once again and show off just how amazing he was to everyone! The bottle of pills sounded like a maraca in his bag. He had decided to eat just one...just to see if it worked! After changing into his work out clothes he popped a pill into his mouth and took a long drink from the faucet. Wiping his mouth, he rushed out into the gym and headed for his first work out machine!

Not to mention it helped he always seemed to have just "one" more follower than Naruto did! Probably because he was better off below the belt than his blonde counterpart! At least, that's what Sai had told him. Of course, as Kiba thought of this, he just started pumping harder, wanting to really assert his position as the alpha male of the gym!

Being first at the gym meant Kiba had a pick of any machine he wanted. Of course, he always chose the same machine. It was like a mix of three machines, that worked out every inch of your body and helped you bulk up even further! After a little bit of stretching, Kiba sat down and moved tword the end. Putting his legs under the bar, he started pushing them up and began with his leg lifts.

After about half an hour, Kiba laid back on his back and took two handlebars in each hand. They were attached to the weights in the back of the machine, and as Kiba pushed up, it was just like pushing up a barbell on a weight bench. Kiba was already starting to sweat, and he grinned as he was feeling pumped. His legs had a slight burn to them, but it felt so good! He kept pushing upward, wanting to make his arms as big as he possibly could! He let out a loud gruny, pushing himself further than he ever did before! If that weird little kid was telling the truth, then he wanted to get as much as he possibly could out of these pills!

As Kiba finished his last set, he sat up, breathing deeply. A quick survery of the gym showed a few of the other regulars starting to make their appearance. He grinned as he recognized a few of the faces of his admirers. Not one to disappoint, Kiba scooched back, and set his arms up against the two bars. With that, he pressed them together, giving his hard pecs a good squeeze as he did! His arms were a little tired out, but as he noticed a few people trying to hide the fact they were secretly staring at him, he found new strength and pushed onward!

"Gonna... Get... Bigger..." He mumbled to himself. "Stronger... Stonger than Naruto... Biggest... In all of Konoha!" He growled softly. As Kiba kept pushing himself, more people were looking at him, some of them with wide eyes as they looked at the dog boy. Kiba didn't know exactly why they were looking, he just thought it was because he was such a hot piece of ass!

However that wasn't the case today. As Kiba was pushing further, his shorts, which once had much room around his thighs, was quickly vanishing! Kiba's thighs were actually expanding! If it wasn't for all the sweat that made his tanktop stick to his body, no one would have noticed his abs popping up into place, each cutting into deep little canyons that gave them that perfect washboard look. Kiba's biceps, even as they worked, were becoming larger, harder, and heavier! Kiba smirked as all eyes were on him, not even knowing what was going on! His pecs were quickly pushing out of his chest, almost as if they were inflating with air! Every push just seemed to make them a whole size bigger, until they seemed to stop around the size of soccer balls! And speaking of balls, Kiba's manhood was engorged, only growing bigger and longer in his pants, pushing even further against the material than it already was! Finally, his shoulders and traps were quickly catching up, making the straps of his tanktop strain as the tried to contain the beast within, who was only insistant on making himself bigger!

Kiba finally stopped, letting out a loud, deep groan that actually scared a few people off! He looked up at them as his head was tilted down and grinned. He stood back up, and didn't even notice he was practically a half foot taller than he already was! He lifted his arm and flexed his bicep, not even noticing the size, before giving it a quick kiss.

Nearly four hours of non-stop exercise had tired him out! Decided now was as good a time as ever, he got up and made his way to the locker room for a little break.

Kiba grinned, not even noticing the way his pecs shook with every step he took. He didn't even notice his new size. That is, until he went into the bathroom.

Kiba stood at the sink, washing his face off with a splash of cold water. It was refreshing as ever! But not as refreshing as when he looked up! Kiba jumped back for a moment, looking in the mirror!

"Whoa!" He shouted, looking up and down the person in the mirror. "I-Is that... Is that me...?" He asked himself. He lifted an arm and flexed it, watching as his reflection did the same. "Hey! Look at that!" Kiba got a grin on his face as he bent forward and did a crab flex. "Not bad!" He chuckled, "I guess that little kid wasn't joking around! Look at me! I'm a beast!" He laughed as he looked at himself. "This tiny little shirt looks like it was just pained on this magnificent body!" Kiba joked. He turned around and flexed his back, turning to see as the wide muscle only stretched out even further. "Heh, that is one sexy hunk of man!" Kiba said happily to himself.

It was then that...

11212.content:
Kiba kept flexing to himself in the mirror, enjoying the sight of his buffed up bod moving at his every command. He would have gone on enjoying it for quite a bit longer, when he suddenly heard a loud *Smack!* coming from the bathroom stall behind him. He whipped his head around and slowly made his way over there, his feet slapping somewhat ominously in the tiled locker room. He looked down at all the stalls and saw that there appeared to be no one in any of them as no feet were visible. He stayed perfectly still and listened, closing his eyes. He gave a slightly sniff as well. He could definitely detect someone nearby! He made his way over to the offensive stall and pounded on it with his fist. "Hey! Anyone in there?" he asked.

There was no reply. Kiba had initially merely walked over here out of curiosity, but this suspicious behavior was starting to annoy him. With a dark frown he took a few steps back, lifted his right foot up, and slammed it against the stall door, the lock bursting off while the door swung open, revealing a freaked out looking Naruto sitting on the toilet with his legs drawn up. He was clearly not using it. Kiba grinned and said, "I thought I heard someone back here! Looks like a little fox was spying on me!"

Naruto's shocked expression quickly was replaced with a frown of annoyance. "Yeah right! Like I'd waste time watching you!"

Kiba smirked, taking a few steps forward, filling the gap of the stall, effectively blocking Naruto from leaving. "Don't act like I can't see you watching me when I'm working out! I see you looking over at me all the time, watching me lift, watching my muscles grow bigger...you secretly love it don't ya?~"

He winked at Naruto who blushed a little and got up off the toilet. "Shut up Kiba! I gotta get back out there and finish my work out!"

Kiba shrugged and said, "Go ahead~ If you can get past me that is!"

Naruto grinned and said, "Too easy!"

He pressed his palms against Kiba's thick pecs and pushed as hard as he could. His feet slid along the tile, making it difficult to make any head way. Bracing his feet against the toilet, he started pushing again...only to find he couldn't budge Kiba, no matter how hard he pushed or struggled! Kiba bounced his pecs, the meaty orbs dancing under Naruto's hands, and said, "Geez, I guess the gap between the real deal and second best is a lot bigger than I thought! What's wrong Naruto? Can't you even move little old me?~"

Naruto huffed and looked down, doing his best to ignore Kiba's...full...shorts and focus on the gap between his legs. He got down on his hands and knees and tried to force his way between them. Kiba merely chuckled and clamped them together, Naruto barely avoiding getting his head caught between them. "Ah, ah, ah~ Not that way~"

Losing his patience, Naruto got back to his feet and shouted, "You'd better let me out of here Kiba or I'll...I'll...!"

"You'll what?" Kiba said, standing up to his full height, his chest expanding out in front of him, taking up the limited space in the stall. "There's nothing you can do to stop me doing whatever I want to you and you know it! So I suggest you keep me in a good mood!"

He cracked his knuckles and smirked, gripping the door to the stall in one meaty hand. "If I can do this to a metal door, just imagine what I could do to you!" He applied pressure to it, his thick fingers leaving a sizable dent. Naruto gulped and said, "Y-Yeah...Sure thing Kiba."

Kiba ruffled Naruto's hair and said, "Good boy! Now get back out there and keep working! You're my strongest competition! If I don't have you at my heels I'll get soft!"

Naruto batted Kiba's hand away with a chuckle, their usual repartee emerging. "Better watch out! I'm really starting to get some results!"

He flexed his impressive biceps, once just a few inches shy of Kiba's own, now looking puny in comparison. "Not bad, not bad~" Kiba said, gently feeling one with his hand. "Make sure you're fully extending on your curls. You'll lose mobility if you don't follow through."

Naruto nodded and said, "Yeah, I know! I just...forget sometimes!"

"You rush too much!" Kiba said, slowly flexing Naruto's arm fully. "Just do this every night so the motion becomes second nature."

"Oooh, I never thought of that before!" Naruto said excitedly. "Thanks Kiba!" He lifted his hand up for a high five. Kiba grinned and slapped Naruto's hand, using a little more strength than he thought. Naruto winced and shook the hand, the palm stinging.

Kiba watched as Naruto ran off, feeling something strange within him. He and Naruto always got into arguments over their routines and their developments, but he had never experienced a feeling quite like the one he got when he cornered Naruto in that stall. Knowing that there was nothing he could do to stop him, that his body might as well have been an impenetrable brick wall, made him feel unstoppable! And as long as he had those pills, he would keep getting more and more powerful! Not even the body builder sized guys like Asuma would be able to hold a candle to him! The thought made him feel a little twinge in his shorts...But there would be time for that later! He was ready to head back out there and REALLY show those people what a man like him could do!

As Kiba turned around, he saw himself in the mirror one last time. He gave himself a grin, and flexed his arms a little, before moving back over to the lockers. He looked around for a moment, before pouring a few pills into his hand. If one little pill was making him look this good, just imagine what two could do! Kiba popped them in his mouth, before closing the bottle tight and setting it back in his bag. With that taken care of, he turned around and made his way back to the gym, feeling refreshed and re-invigorated!

As Kiba returned, he saw a small crowd not to far away; Naruto's to be precise. He may not have been as big as Kiba, but at least he had a few onlookers. That is, until the beefy dog boy returned. Almost instantly, Naruto lost half his fans, who migrated over to Kiba's side of the gym! Kiba chuckled, a little bit of pink in his cheeks as he suddenly garnered so much attention... Not like he wasn't loving it! Making his way past everyone, Kiba picked up some weights and carried them over to the bench. He was finding them a lot lighter than he did before, a huge fifty pounds feeling more like twenty as he lifted them. Slapping them both on opposite sides of the bar, he added a few smaller ones, making it a whopping 650 pounds he was bench pressing! Without further delay, Kiba laid down on the bench, and gripped the bar.

"Hey! Can I get a couple of spotters?" He asked, flashing a winning smile at the crowd. Immediately, a pair of guys got behind him, both in not bad shape, but they were far from Kiba. Heck, they were even smaller than Naruto! Kiba just chuckled to himself as he thought of this. Immediately after, he lifted the bar up and began to pump iron!

Starting off, it was no sweat! But in due time, Kiba was finding it slightly difficult. Did he bite off more than he could chew? Everyone watched as the brunette was sweating bullets, each little droplet running down his smooth skin, from his pumped, swollen pecs down to his newly enhanced bulge. Kiba's body was started to radiate a phermone that was quickly attracting everyone who was even remotely close to him. Kiba started grunting, pushing even harder than he did before. A few audience members tried turning to the side in attempts to hide their shame. Kiba, on the other hand, was just focused on working even harder.

"I'm done!" Naruto announced over in "his" corner of the gym. As he sat up, he saw that there was only two, maybe three, people watching him! A bit saddening, but it quickly turned to a mild anger as he saw there was a crowd on the other side of the gym! "What the heck is going on over there...?" He asked himself.

"Ungh! B-Bigger...!" Kiba grunted, before he finally stopped, setting the bar back on the bench. He sat back up, chuckling. His pecs were red and swollen, and as he looked down at them, they touched his chin! Kiba smiled giving them a little bounce to please the crowd.

Just then, something happened that not even Kiba himself saw coming! His eyes went wide as he suddenly shot up a good foot or so! His pecs pushed out even further from his chest at an alarming rate, as his shoulers and traps burst out from the tanktop he wore! The straps snapped, revealing Kiba's burly chest, and his erect nipples! His arms slowly grew into large bowling balls, with veins lightly tracing under them just to prove how massive they were! Kiba's abs morphed into an eight-pack, an entirely new layer of muscle emerging as the others bunched up and grew even harder! His thighs, which were on either side of the bench, blew right up like popcorn emerging from it's kernel! His calves were next, each one a softball of pure power as his sandals snapped and fell to pieces at his feet! Finally, to top it all off, there was now an immense pressure in his pants that made everyone blush. It practically left nothing to the imagination!

After all was said and done, Kiba scratched the back of his head, looking out at everyone. "U-Uhm... Heh heh..." He blushed cutely. No one dared questioned what just happened, all they seemed to care about was the end result!

Kiba smiled out at everyone, flexing his thick arms and making them swoon over his astounding new body!

1121222.content:
The admirers who had gathered around Kiba didn't seem to question the massive dog ninja's sudden surge of growth, but there was one pissed off watcher that DID care! It was Naruto of course, who was standing towards the back of the crowd, arms crossed, glaring over at Kiba. Kiba was soaking up all the attention, flexing his biceps for the others to feel, lifting them effortlessly off the ground like they weighed nothing, and overall just showing off. Naruto knew he would be doing the exact same thing if he was in Kiba's place which just pissed him off even more! He should be in Kiba's place! Something very suspicious was going on here.

As soon as Kiba stood up, heading back to the locker room (the gym was going to close in about ten minutes), Naruto ran after him, smacking him on the back which actually made his hand sting a bit. The blonde haired ninja winced as Kiba looked around in surprise, a grin slowly rising to his lips as he saw Naruto standing there, reaching only as tall as his burly pecs, shaking his hand like he had smacked concrete. "Hey Naruto! Came to tell a real man how much you admire him?" He snickered, loving the reaction he got out of Naruto.

"As if! I saw what happened back there! People don't just suddenly grow like that!" Naruto said, following Kiba into the locker room. The dog ninja just scoffed, ignoring Naruto's accusations. "Hey!" Naruto continued. "You can't just ignore me!"

"Oh yeah?" Kiba said, suddenly turning around, Naruto smacking into his chest face first. "Just watch me!"

He shoved his chest forward slightly, knocking Naruto on his ass, the fox ninja's face slightly red from having been buried in so much muscle. He was a little dazed...before jumping up and running after Kiba again...only to be stopped once again as he saw Kiba pulling down his work out shorts and his briefs (both of which were now much too small and tight) revealing his gorgeous ass, firm yet perfectly round with just a slight bounce as Kiba started walking towards the shower. He wasn't even bringing a towel! Naruto gulped and followed after him, standing outside the stall as Kiba turned the water on. "A-Anyway! What the heck is going on here?"

"You still out there?" Kiba said, rolling his eyes as he got his hair wet. "Why do you have to be so suspicious? Maybe I'm just naturally gifted!"

"Yeah right! I don't care how gifted you are, you can't make yourself suddenly grow like that!" Naruto argued, leaning against the wall and crossing his arms.

"Hah! Shows how much you know!" Kiba said with a derisive laugh. "You forget that Choji can do just that whenever he wants?"

Naruto balked, suddenly at a loss for words. Kiba did have a point... "Yeah...but it's not like you can do that!"

"Maybe I learned a new jutsu that has that effect." Kiba argued, lathering up his body, his muscles gleaming in the light as the water rushed down his chiseled body.

Again, Naruto found himself at a loss for words. What Kiba said did make a kind of sense, even though it seemed impossible. Finally, after a few seconds of silence, he came to a decision! "Oh yeah? Then you won't mind if I spend the night! I'm going to watch you like a hawk for the next few days! Don't think you can get away with doing anything weird!"

Kiba turned off the water and moved the curtain back, revealing his wholly nude body to Naruto who gaped at Kiba's audacity. The dog ninja grinned and said, "Heh, you're on! I always love having an audience!"

He walked past Naruto, his big bare feet slapping against the tiles. Naruto gulped and shook his head. Now was not the time! He chased after Kiba and watched him as he got dressed, making sure his eyes stay glued to Kiba's feet the whole time. He didn't want to...see anything again. Soon, Kiba was dressed. He slung his bag over his shoulder and started heading to the door, Naruto right next to him.

On the walk back Kiba made sure to keep his eyes trained forward. His heart was beating just a bit faster. If that guy from the alley came back, Naruto would know something was going on! He didn't think Naruto would go so far as look through his stuff...yet. The guy in the alley was his biggest problem right now!

Naruto refused to look at anything BUT Kiba, not wanting to miss anything the taller teen might do to give himself away. Kiba eventually noticed the staring and smirked at Naruto. "Like what you see?"

Naruto blushed and shouted back, "NO! You know what I'm doing!"

Kiba just chuckled, ruffling Naruto's hair. He loved getting a rise out of him!

Soon, they arrived at Kiba's house. Despite his best efforts, his eyes still darted to the alleyway. Luckily, the kid wasn't there. Kiba quickly looked down at Naruto who was still staring intently at him...though he didn't seem to have noticed that his eyes had flicked over to the alley. Where exactly was Naruto staring? Kiba stopped at the door to his house and said, "We're here. It's going to just be the two of us. Hope that doesn't bother you."

"Nah, makes things a lot easier!" Naruto said with a grin. He ran ahead of Kiba and made his way to the dog ninja's room. Kiba sighed and tossed his dirty clothes into the laundry bin, the bottle of pills kept safe in his pocket. Even if Naruto spotted them, he could easily lie and say they were just soldier pills. It wasn't like Naruto could win in a fight against him anyway. Kiba smirked and flexed his biceps, the sleeves of the shirt he had changed into straining with every flex. The shirt was so tight, absolutely nothing was left to the imagination. It didn't even quite fully cover his abs! Maybe that's what had Naruto's attention before! Kiba snickered and headed to his room.
1121222.title: Naruto's New Mission!

choices: Naruto discovers the bottle while snooping around the house at night!
Kiba recovers the bottle on a little midnight trip to the bathroom!
11212221.content:
As Kiba went upstairs to his room, he could hear some movement beyond his door. Being as quiet as a massive dog beast could, he moved in closer to the door and gave it a listen.

"Where is it... Where is it...?" He could hear Naruto saying. "I know that mutt has to be hiding his secret in here somewhere! Some kind of pill or maybe he has some special weights!" Kiba could feel a little nerve snap as he heard Naruto say "pill." It almost made him all the more suspicious of how much Naruto knew. Kiba ran his hand over his pocket, sighing a little as he was reminded the pills were still in his pocket. As long as they were there, Naruto's efforts would be fruitless.

As Kiba continued to listen, it started to sound like Naruto was making a real mess of the place! Kiba grinned, and gently held his hand on the door. He cleared his throat, and prepared to give Naruto a good scare!

Naruto continued to snoop when suddenly there was a loud slam! The door whipped open, nearly cracking the wall behind it, as an enraged Kiba looked at him.

"What the HELL are you doing!?" Kiba shouted at Naruto. Naruto froze right in his tracks, looking back at Kiba. His skin went a little pale as he did. Kiba, on the other hand, was smiling on the inside. He could see just how frightened Naruto was! There was an awkward silence, which was then broken by something even more awkward.

There was a long squeal. It started off quiet but quickly became loud. Along with it came a foul odor. Naruto blushed a little, as Kiba erupted in laughter. The massive dog man fell on his back, rolling and holding his stomach, laughing at Naruto. Naruto just stomped his foot.

"H-Hey! Stop laughing!" He ordered.

"Y-You farted! You totally did! Better check your pants there!" Kiba said, still howling with laughter. Naruto was blushing, beet red, trying to cover it up with fury. Naruto didn't even seem to notice as a bottle squeezed out of Kiba's pocket and onto the floor.

"Oh yeah? How about this!?" Naruto barked back at Kiba. He waltzed right over to Kiba's bed, and held the mutt's pillow up to his rear. He then let another one rip, which was surprisingly easy. That "fear" must have still been inhabiting him.

Kiba looked up, surprised at first, but he immediately turned his anger into tranquility. He got up, a sly smirk on his face as he did, and walked over to Naruto. He snatched the pillow right out of the fox boy's hands, and then...

"You like that!? Huh!?" Kiba was shoving the pillow right into Naruto's face! Forcing him to smell his own product! "This is for what you did at the Chunin exams!" Kiba laughed, as Naruto could only try to get away from Kiba's massive physique. It was no use! Kiba was going to hold him there until he saw the deed was done. As he let go, Naruto flew back onto his bed trying to fan his nose off. Kiba just started laughing again.

"Ugh... You big bully!" Naruto barked at him.

"Big..." Kiba flexed both of his arms, both of the powerful muscles erputing to their full size. "And don't you for get it!" He grinned. Naruto just rolled his eyes.

----------------------------

Later that night, the two of them were sleeping soundly. Kiba was in his bed, as Naruto slept on the floor. All was peaceful and quiet, until...
11212221.title: Punishing a Snoop

choices: Just then, there's a loud crash outside!
Kiba returns to the gym in hopes of finding the boy! Maybe he has more!
112122211.content:
One of Naruto's blue eyes opened up. As he peered around the room, he could see Kiba laying on the bed, his back turned on the young blonde man. Naruto snickered as he grinned.

"Perfect!" He thought, "Now that the mutt is asleep, I can get back to exploring!" Naruto stood up slowly, the study floor not even making a creak under his size. He started to tip toe around the room, only able to use the moonlight to see around the room. Naruto started to think. "What could have made Kiba so big... A ray gun? No... That's too unreal... Maybe a new jutsu! Yeah! That could be it!" Naruto thought to himself. "He probably hasn't known it for long... Maybe he still has a scroll of it around here!" Naruto made his way to the trash and started to rummage through it. He got a sickened look on his face as he passed a few papers, only to touch something sticky! Naruto just winced. "Please be gum..." He thought to himself.

"HEY!" Kiba suddenly shouted. Naruto froze in his tracks. "How'd you like to... See a real man...?" Kiba said, starting to mumble again as he drifted back into sleep. Naruto just sighed, wiping his forehead. Now that he thought about it, what about Kiba's gym bag!? Naruto didn't remember seeing it on him when he returned to the room... He must have left it in the bathroom! ... Or maybe the front door! Either way, he had to be quiet as he tip toed around the house!

Just as Naruto wandered out the door, he heard a rattle that made him flinch! He held his breath, and looked down. There was something there, so he reached down and picked it up. Feeling over the bottle, felt a cap and a cylinder... It must have been a medicine bottle! Naruto was already suspicious of what this could be doing on the floor... So he quietly made his way to the bathroom to get a little privacy!

Once in the bathroom, he flipped on the lights and looked around. No one was in here! Truthfully, he was half expecting the toilet to be some kind of tree! Either way, that wasn't what he came here for! He held the bottle up and looked inside.

"Soldier pills...?" Naruto said to himself. He popped open the top and looked inside. They didn't smell like soldier pills... Naruto took one and popped it in his mouth. He didn't feel that sudden burst of energy that usually happened when one ate a soldier pill. "Maybe that one was defective..." Naruto mumbled. He took another, just to be sure! "Another dud...?" He said. He decided that maybe just one more wouldn't hurt. After all, it wasn't impossible to get two duds in a row! Alas, it was the same. Naruto didn't feel a thing. He looked at the label on the side. "Muscle... Enhancer!?" Naruto said. He then grit his teeth, growling unhappily. "That cheat! I knew he wasn't getting that huge through hard work!" Naruto said unhappily. "I'll show him... He's REALLY going to get it tomorrow!" Naruto said with a fierce scowl on his face.

Just then, Naruto got a devilish smile. He then took the bottle and held it over his mouth, downing every last pill in there! He crushed it in his grip, as he had an evil grin on his face. "Kiba wants to see what a real man looks like, I'll show him just who's the top dog around here!" Naruto then quickly and quietly made his way out of the house, leaving Kiba none the wiser! A fire in his belly, he was going to work out as much as he could, all night if he had to! The fox boy could already feel his muscles getting pumped up!

The next morning, Kiba awoke, scratching his pec as he yawned. He looked at the floor, only to see Naruto wasn't there! That was already starting to worry him, but what really made his heart stop was when he reached his hand over his pocket and noticed the bottle was missing! Kiba immediately sprang out of bed, looking under the blanket, under the sheets, and anywhere else the bottle could have fallen! He started to tear up his room, before dashing out into the hallway! He did a quick run of the house to search for Naruto, before heading to the one place the family stored pills! Kiba made his way to the bathroom, and opened up the cabinet! He took a quick inventory, but no dice! Just as he was about to dash out of the room, his large foot stomped on something!

"Ow! Dammit!" Kiba immediately held his foot, wincing slightly. He looked down, and his heart skipped a beat. As he reached down and picked up the bottle, he immediately recognized the bottle as the one he was given by that boy. "He... He didn't..." Kiba stammered, unable to believe his eyes.

Kiba immediately left the bathroom, and started heading for the door...
112122211.title: A Snoop's Revenge

choices: Naruto begins to "break" Kiba into servitude!
Someone is watching from the shadows...
1121222111.content:
Just as Kiba's hand closed around the doorknob to the front door, a huge crash was heard in the distance! Kiba froze in place, his heart hammering in his chest. He had no reason to believe that it wasn't just an alley cat knocking over a garbage can but he still felt a distinct feeling of foreboding. He knew that whatever made that crash, it had something to do with Naruto! He stepped away from the door and ran back to his room. If he was going to face Naruto, he was going to need his gear! He pulled open his closet and grabbed a net shirt and one of is usual hoodies. He ripped the sleeves off of them and ripped it down the middle slightly, pulling the shirt on over his head. The hem rested lightly at the top of the waistband of his underwear, his chest bulging out the top of the hoodie while his thick arms were on full display. He pulled on a pair of pants, the hems bursting as soon as he pulled his legs through, leaving him in shredded clothing, giving him a positively savage appearance.

Now fully clothed, Kiba started going through his gear. He stuffed soldier pills into his pockets, strapped a kunai pouch to his leg and strung some shuriken in a secondary pouch on his arm. Some smoke pellets would probably be useful as well and he decided to grab a few paper bombs to complete his arsenal. It wasn't much but he hoped it would be enough! He stood still in the middle of his room, his mind racing as he tried to think of anything he might have missed. In the distance, there was a strange, rhythmic sound, like muffled thunder. He ignored it for a few minutes before he realized that it was slowly coming closer to him, his house beginning to shake slightly.

"No way...no way...no way that's Naruto!" Kiba chanted to himself, under his breath like a mantra. Maybe saying it enough times would make it true...

Suddenly, the sounds stopped and everything was still and silent. Before Kiba could react, there was a horrible screeching, squealing sound, like wood warping and being ripped apart. Kiba looked up in horror as he saw what appeared to be the tips of some thick, pink logs. The sound got louder and louder until the entire roof was raised into the air, revealing the massive face of Naruto grinning down at Kiba. "Well, well, well! Looks like my new doll decided to stay in his house!"

Kiba had been trying to mentally prepare himself for this moment. He hadn't wanted to give Naruto any kind of satisfaction from his reaction. Unfortunately, he couldn't help but feel his eyes widen in amazement as his jaw dropped. Naruto was beyond huge! He stood at least twice as tall as Kiba's two story house. He was bending over slightly, his massive chest stretching wider than the roof of Kiba's house, one of his nipples resting lightly on the wall of Kiba's room, thick and leathery and bigger than Kiba's head! Looking out the window, Kiba could get a hint of Naruto's enormous eight pack, each brick tight and hard. The paper bombs in his pocket suddenly seemed laughably useless. Slowly, Kiba looked back up into Naruto's piercing blue eyes.

"I knew you were cheating you little mutt so I beat you at your own game!" Naruto said, his voice rumbling over Kiba. "LOOK AT ME! Your pathetic little body can't stand up to a REAL MAN!"

He flexed his biceps, the already thick arms suddenly exploding upwards in size, turning into a veritable mountain of power, veins running over the split peaks. Kiba gulped while Naruto laughed, grunting as he forced his arms to flex bigger and harder! "Best part?" Naruto said with a cocky grin. "I've been working out all night and I still feel like I'm full of energy! I don't think I'm done growing yet either! Here, let me see if I can get bigger right now!"

"W-What are you going to do?!" Kiba shouted, finally finding his voice.

Naruto didn't say a word. He grunted, his head dipping out of sight. The whole house began to shake about as Naruto dug his thick fingers under the foundation of Kiba's house, the whole structure lifting into the air! Kiba shouted as his body was pitched all around the room, slamming into the walls and the floor, all of his possessions flying about, striking Kiba on occasion. Naruto laughed, the sound booming across the early morning and still sleepy Leaf Village. Naruto started lifting the building in a curl, his arms and chest bulging as he worked out. Within seconds, the wall of Kiba's house caved in, Naruto's enormous, growing pecs bursting through! Kiba watched in horror as Naruto grew even more! The building began to crumble apart in his grip, chunks of it falling to the ground, breaking even more on Naruto's legs and feet. Soon, Kiba was left in Naruto's palm, his entire house decimated.

"Wow, not even your house is a match for me!" Naruto said with a laugh. Naruto raised Kiba up to his face and said, "You thought you were making it bad for me? Just wait until you see what I do to you!"

Kiba clenched his fists, glaring up at Naruto, nothing but contempt in his expression. If Naruto wanted him to be obedient he was going to have to work hard!
1121222111.title: Payback's a Bitch

choices: Naruto notices his hand feels heavier, but Kiba is big enough to escape for now!
Naruto catches on to what's happening with Kiba! The mysterious boy moves on...
11212221112.content:
"Tsk tsk..." A voice said from far away. It was the boy Kiba had met two days ago, and he watched with a disappointed look on his face. "I gave him a chance, and he got careless..." The boy said to himself. He rubbed the back of his head. "Well... I guess I can give him another chance... It's not going to be easy though..." He mumbled. "And if he fails THIS time... I just might have to find a new candidate..." The boy then thought.

Kiba scowled in disgust as Naruto went on flexing, admiring his own hugeness. "Did you know no clothes could fit a massive man like me?" Naruto said with his usual cocky grin. He rose his arm and flexed as hard as he could to attest to that. The mountainous muscle bulged upward to the sky, actually growing a size bigger as he did! A split peak formed at the top, and not to mention all the veins running along the bottom, pulsing, feeding the muscle and making it bigger! Naruto chuckled to himself, his deep voice vibrating within his chest, before he reached over and give his arm a nice, long lick. "Yeaaaah... This is what a man looks like..." He groaned under his breath. Kiba just rolled his eyes.

As Kiba was held captive in Naruto's open palm, something smacked him in the face! He struggled a little, before working it off and seeing it was just a piece of paper. Kiba just sighed, before looking it over. As he did, he found three mysterious words.

"Open your mouth"


Kiba rose and eyebrow at the strange note, before looking around. It didn't look like it came from anywhere. He looked up at Naruto, who was still too busy admiring his new physique like the gigantic meat head he was. Kiba looked left, then right, before opening his mouth for a brief moment. In that short time, he suddenly felt something the size of a pea shoot into his mouth! Kiba gagged a little, coughing it up in his mouth.

Since whatever it was had already entered his mouth, a taste wouldn't hurt. He rolled the object on his tongue a little, before he immediately realized what it was! It tasted identical to the pills that made him huge! Just to be sure, Kiba swallowed, and looked at his arm. Without raising it, he tensed up the muscle, and just noticed as it bulged just a little bit bigger! Kiba smiled to himself. He didn't know where that pill came from, but he had to have more! Kiba opened his mouth again, and sure enough, another one fired down his throat!

Kiba kept opening his mouth, only to close it once another pill was safely inside. He'd then open his mouth again only to have another shot down his throat. Not to far away, the boy stood in a tree, readying his pea shooter with another pill. With precision accuracy, and a little chakra, he shot another one right at Kiba's open mouth!

Kiba chuckled to himself. Slowly but surely, he was starting to get bigger. His abs were on full display a rock-hard eight pack stretched down his magnificent body. His burly pecs so swollen that they actually drew the collar of the shirt downwards! His biceps were nearly the size of beach balls, and they didn't stop there either! As Kiba sat, his muscled ass bulged outward in his shorts, as his already sizable cock had pushed out the front of his pants, making them increasingly tight! His thighs had already filled out the leg holes, and were now becoming so huge that they formed a tear upside the front! Kiba's huge calves pumped up even bigger, nearing the size of cantelopes! His feet pushed out further as well, expanding to nearly five times the size of a normal man's! Kiba grinned, opening his mouth, and doing small, frequent, unnoticed flexes that were slowly making him bigger and bigger...
11212221112.title: Second Chance

choices: Naruto starts getting more violent in his searching!
Kiba, unable to find the boy, leaves the village to work his body harder to grow
112122211121.content:
Kiba made sure his attention wasn't too divided. It would have been easy to focus entirely on his own growing body, his pecs pushing his shirt to its limits, the collar already tearing while the hem rode up to reveal his splendid rows of abs, while below his thighs and calves made similar work of his shorts. If he did though, he was like to get caught in a trap! Naruto was still too absorbed in his own body and showing off to notice what exactly was happening to Kiba, but that didn't mean he would stay in the dark forever! Naruto had a tendency to be a total dumbass, but even he was bound to notice his growing rival! Kiba crouched down even as his height began to increase, trying to make himself look as small as he could. With a loud *POP* his shorts finally exploded off his body, leaving him in nothing but a tight pair of briefs. His shirt ripped loudly after that as his back flared out and his shoulders broadened. Kiba's tanned body was now almost fully on display, the pouch of his briefs filled to bursting with pure Inuzuka cock. Kiba couldn't help but grin, loving the feeling of his massive body growing even more massive! By normal standards, he was already far taller than any normal ninja in the village, though he was still just an action figure to Naruto. Kiba flexed his arms, grinning even wider as he saw those thick mounds bunch up impressively.

It wasn't until Kiba's height had surpassed Naruto's slightly curved fingers that the meat headed ninja noticed what was happening. For the last few minutes it had felt like his hand was getting heavier but Naruto barely paid it any attention. At his size, what could possibly affect him? He never dreamed that Kiba would find some way to grow beyond just downing the bottle of pills that had been in his room. Naruto had managed to figure out what the catalyst of Kiba's growth was, but not who the provider was. This gave Kiba a slight edge still. Of course, once Kiba grew big enough that his ass was being cupped by Naruto's palm, Naruto whipped his head down and looked at the slowly swelling shinobi in shock! Kiba merely grinned up at him and, faster than Naruto could react, slashed the bigger ninja's arm! His sharp nails managed to slightly draw blood, but the shock of it was enough to send Naruto stumbling backward, dropping Kiba to the ground. The dog ninja landed with an enormous *THUD* the buildings around them shaking wildly as he hit the ground. Without so much as a second thought, Kiba dashed away from Naruto, moving in the direction he thought the pills had been flying from. He needed to get as far away from Naruto as he could AND get some more of those pills!

Naruto, meanwhile, had recovered from Kiba's attack only to find the little sneak was nowhere in sight! Growling in frustration, Naruto quickly began searching for him, every stomp sending a shockwave through the immediate area. Naruto knew Kiba was too big at this point to fit inside a building easily so he set his sights on the alleys and streets. "When I find that little punk I'm going to make him sorry!" Naruto growled to himself.

Between Kiba's and Naruto's constant giant footsteps, it was impossible to think that the other villagers wouldn't notice them, even if it was still early in the morning. It didn't take long for reports to start coming in that there were two giants running around the Leaf Village, causing havoc wherever they went! No action was currently being taken, as there were unconfirmed reports that the giants were actually members of the village and not attacking foreign nations. Until more information could be gathered, now was merely a time to observe. If it looked like the giants were starting to cause too much trouble, action would be taken then.

The strange boy watched as Kiba, crouched down in the streets to remain hidden, all while his body slowly kept pumping up, tried to find his way to him. The boy sighed and pulled a dossier out of his pocket, re-reading Kiba's information. After scanning the document, he replaced it in his pocket, taking another out in its place. This one was for Naruto. His eyebrow rose slightly as he read the information. "Now that that stupid dog got that fox kid mixed up in this, I'm going to have to change my plans a bit. Phase two is going to have to go into effect a few weeks early."

He laid a small suitcase on the ground in front of him and opened it up, revealing several dozen bottles of the pills. "Let's see...I'm going to have to start spreading these out."

He pulled out about four bottles worth of pills and slammed the lid of the suitcase shut, picking it back up and rushing off to his next destination. The Leaf Village was about to have some VERY big problems on its hands!
112122211121.title: Escalation

choices: Saburou finds Kiba working hard in the woods!
Naruto, who gave up on searching, got back to working out!
1121222111212.content:
Kiba ran as fast as he could, passing countless surprised faces gazing upon his sculpted physique, but also a few who had to dash out of the way in the last second so they wouldn't be bulldozed by the large teenager!

"Crap... Naruto's too huge...!" Kiba thougth to himself, "And I have a feeling he's only going to be getting bigger!" Kiba thought as he was rushing for the gates. "Lets see... If they lasted about two horus for me, and he took the whole bottle... Uh... How many was in the bottle again...?" Kiba tried thinking. However, he couldn't even remember how many were in there! The bottle was filled to the top, and Naruto took every last one! Kiba felt a slight shiver down his spine as he thought just how mind-bendingly large that Naruto would end up! Shaking his head from those thoughts, Kiba dashed out of the village, determined to work out and get as big as he possibly could!

----------------------

Back at the Shinobi Gym, where all the boys seemed to gather to pump up their bods, Shikamaru had just finished a set of curls. Being the lazy kid he was, he made his way to the lockers, ready to call it quits for the day. It was such a shame... He really knew how to work a body, and could have been bigger than Kiba and Naruto combined back when they were their normal size, yet willingly chose not to.

As Shikamaru opened the door to his locker, he felt a presence standing directly behind him! As he turned and looked, he didn't see anyone until he gazed down a little.

"Hello there." A young boy replied. He wore a baggy paperboy cap, a blue jacket with a yellow scarf, baggy pants and deep blue shoes. He carried a briefcase, and Shikamaru could tell just by his eyes and the skin around it that he must have been no older than 10!

"Uh... Yeah?" Shikamaru replied. He didn't really see much of a threat from a little boy, but you never knew...

"I wanted to give you these..." The boy said, holding up a bottle of pills up at Shikamaru. "They're special vitamins that'll help you bulk up if you take them before your workout."

Shikamaru gently took the bottle from the boy, looking them over. "Bulk up... You mean gain more muscle mass, right?" Shikamaru asked.

"Exactly!" The boy said, smiling behind his scarf. "My... Dad's company is made these, and he wanted me to help push product..."

"Sounds like a nice man..." Shikamaru said sarcasitcally, rolling his eyes. He just shrugged. He knew what a pain it was to do something you didn't want to, and it was free, after all. He pocketed the bottle, and looked back down at the boy.

"Thank you!" He said with a smile, before walking off. His bright expression changed back to normal as he went back to the workout area. "Someone with potential... Check."


-----------------------

Konohamaru was in his room, busy doing push-up! On the nearby desk, there was a picture of him and Naruto, both of them shirtless and flexing! Naruto clearly had more mass, but Konohamaru was nothing to scoff at either! There wasn't a lot of mass, but Konohamaru had great definition! As Konohamaru did his 100th push up, he glanced up at the picture, a smile on his face! It served as an inspiration to him! Konohamaru went on to do just a few more, pushing himself beyond the goal he set for himself!

"There is a faster way." A voice suddenly said. Konohamaru stopped, letting his body slam onto the ground before looking up. Right on his windowsill, the same boy who had just met with Shikamaru sat.

"Hey! Who are you!?" Konohamaru demanded to know!

"Me? I'm... Saburou." He replied, making up a name on the spot! "You're a hard worker, huh?" He said, noticing how much Konohamaru was sweating!

"Yeah! I'm gonna be a big as Naruto one day! No wait... I'm gonna be even bigger!" He said, his hands on his hips as he puffed out his chest. Saburou just chuckled. He clearly hadn't seen Naruto lately!

"Cute." Saburou replied, hopping into Konohamaru's room. He walked over, picking up the picture of Konohamaru and Naruto.

"H-Hey! Put that down!" Konohamaru demanded, running in closer! Saburou set it down before Konohamaru had to force him to. "Whadd'ya mean 'there's a faster way'?" Konohamaru asked.

"You know, to get bigger." Saburou replied. "That's what you want, right? You just said you wanted to be bigger than Naruto."

"Well... Yeah... But how?" Konohamaru asked, looking down at Saburou. This kid was about the size Konohamaru was about two years ago...

"Here!" Saburou quickly held up a bottle of pills to Konohamaru's face that he pulled from his jacket pocket. "You just take one of these before a workout. They'll help you gain more muscle!"

"Really?!" The guillable Konohamaru said, snatching the bottle right up! "So I just take one of these before I work out?"

"Yep." The boy said with a smile, "You'll topple Naruto over in no time!" Saburou said. It wasn't until now that he learned just who Naruto was, drawing a connection from Konohamaru's ramblings and the picture on his desk! "Now if you'll excuse me..." Saburou hopped over onto the windowsill again, "I gotta get going."

Before Konohamaru could even respond, Saburou was gone like a breeze! "A rising star... Check!"

----------------------

Back at the gym, Asuma glared on with jealousy. Kakashi was a lucky dog, with his Sharingan ability. He was able to mimic the workouts of some of the biggest guys in the gym, and thusly, he had outgrown Asuma in just a matter of months! The once thinly muscled sensei had easily bulked up to three times his previous size, while Asuma had only managed a few twenty pounds and some better definition! Sheer hard work was losing out to someone who was just copying everything! Asuma panted as he finished doing chest pressed, but just across the gym, Kakashi was getting way more looks as he was doing ab crunches! Suffice to say, Asuma was jealous. But he was a man about it! He wasn't about to throw a fit, no, instead he was going to keep working at it! He would easily surpass Kakashi, and reclaim his status as the biggest Jonin!

Just as Asuma was about to get up, a boy in dark blue stood in his way!

"Hey, little guy? Could you move for me?" Asuma asked nicely. He was good with kids.

"Actually... Would you like to try my dad's company's new product?" Saburou asked, giving him the same song and dance that he had given Shikamaru.

"Uh, sure... I guess." Asuma said, as any normal person who was suddenly offered an unknown product would react. Saburou reached in his jacket and pulled out a bottle of pills for Asuma. "Here you go. These pills help men gain more muscle mass when they work out." Saburou explained.

Asuma's eyebrows rose. "Really?" He took the bottle and looked it over. "... What's in them?" Asuma asked.

"... T-Tetra... T-Tet..." Saburou suddenly started acting like a kid who was trying to pronounce a difficult word. Asuma just chuckled and pat his head.

"Don't worry about it, kid." He said with a warm smile. "Thanks for these! I'll be sure to use them!"

Saburou smiled and said, "Thank you sir!" Before walking off! "And finally, someone with ambition... Check."

-----------------------

"What a drag..." Shikamaru said. "... I guess I could work out just a little longer..." He sighed, popping a pill in his mouth.

"These things are really going to help me...!" Konohamaru thought, "In fact, I'll even take two!" He said, gulping down two little pills!

"I guess if I'm gonna beat Kakashi, I'm going to need all the help I can get!" Asuma said, popping a lone pill for himself!

Saburou just smiled. Now it was time to pay a visit to the guinea pig that started it all for him...!
1121222111212.title: Sewing the Seeds

choices: Asuma and Shikamaru work out together to try to catch up!
Naruto finds Konohamaru and has some fun!
11212221112121.content:
Saburou was fast, nimble, and incredibly hard to catch. He had the unique ability to sink into the shadows, to go unnoticed and unremembered. Anyone who happened to see the strange boy quickly forgot about him as soon as he was out of sight. It made his job so much easier. After delivering the pills to his other test subjects, he had quickly scaled to the top of the gym, moving across the rooftops, away from it, as Naruto started lumbering through the streets toward the gym, a mischievous grin on his face. Saburou grinned as he saw him approach. "Perfect!" He thought to himself as he headed for the gate. "Now, Kiba said he'd be in the forest..."

Kiba panted and gasped as he pushed himself, doing more pushups than he had ever done before in his life. Sweat was dripping from his body and pattering onto the dirt, his chest and arms swelling with every movement. But it wasn't enough! Kiba was a beast of a teenager, bigger than anyone else his age normally, but he was still only a minor nuisance to Naruto. Something to be swatted aside with a laugh.
