"Well if you don't help me, I'm not getting up! I don't have anything important to do so I can just sit here all day if I have to!" Konohamaru said, moving his ass around, pushing Naruto harder into the ground.

"Rrrrgh...FINE! I'll do it! Just LET ME UP!"

Konohamaru heaved his mass to his feet, puffing a little as he did so. "Awesome! Now I'm YOUR boss!"

"Yeah, yeah...let's just...did you get taller?" Naruto asked, suddenly realizing that Konohamaru was only two inches shorter than he was!

Konohamaru measured himself up against Naruto and slowly grinned even wider. "Yeah! I did! I'm almost as tall as you are! I knew it! It's working!"

"But...why....how?!" Naruto sputtered. The whole situation was impossible! No one gained weight this fast and grew half a foot taller in one day! Not without some kind of jutsu anyway. "Is Konohamaru messing around with some kind of forbidden technique?" Naruto thought to himself.

"Who cares?! I'm keeping it up!" Konohamaru said, patting his big belly with a grin. "Come on! Let's go!"

Konohamaru took off, moving surprisingly fast for his size, Naruto jogging in his wake. His mind was a thousand miles away, still trying to process this insanity. He didn't even notice that Konohamaru was getting some pointed looks, though no one was about to say anything against the honorable grandson. Konohamaru turned the corner and pointed out a restaurant. "There! Let's go to that one!"

"Which one?" Naruto said, snapping to attention.

Konohamaru frowned and pointed again, "There! Pay attention!"

Naruto looked at the restaurant and said, "I haven't seen that place before...what is it?"

Konohamaru shrugged and said, "I don't know! Let's check it out! Hurry up!"

Naruto gritted his teeth, feeling tempted to pop Konohamaru in the back of his head! "He got lucky! That's all it was!" Naruto thought to himself. How else could he have been beaten so easily by Konohamaru? With that somewhat comforting thought, the two boys entered the new restaurant. Just what kind of new place was it?
114332.title: Payback

choices: Konohamaru makes his way over to the buffet tables to eat right from them!
Konohamaru wants to use his new size to "enlist" more followers!
1143321.content:
"Wha? Seriously?!" Naruto thought to himself as Konohamaru dragged him into the all-you-can-eat buffet! "Hey! Are you sure you don't want to go somewhere else?" Naruto asked the young man, trying to bargain with him a little.

"No! I went here, and this is where I want to go!" Konohamaru replied stubbornly, walking up to the register at the front!

"A-Ah, hello... Honorable grandson..." The man said slowly. It was clear it had come as a shock to him that Konohamaru was a blimp! "How can I...?" Before he could ask any further, Konohamaru held up his card, and glared at the man a little.

"It's Konohamaru. Remember it!" He told the man.

"R-Right... Konohamaru... So how many will that be?" The cashier asked.

"One. This guy won't be eating!" Konohamaru said as he raised Naruto's arm.

"Really?! I can't even have one little thing?!" Naruto whined. This prompted a little hip check from Konohamaru! The card was soon charged and the two boys moved to get a seat.

Konohamaru's chair creaked as the huge boy sat on it. And this was a brand new chair! He crossed his arms as he looked at Naruto, a grumpy look on his face.

"... What?" Naruto asked as he looked at Konohamaru.

"Go get me my food!" Konohamaru ordered Naruto, as if it was the most obvious thing in the world! "What, you expect me to get it myself?"

"Yeah, kind of." Naruto replied. Konohamaru puffed out his gut, shoving the table into Naruto's own stomach! "Ow! Okay, okay!" Naruto replied, getting back to his feet and walking over to the buffet.

Naruto eyed all kinds of delicious foods as he was there. From teriyaki fried pork to barbequed chicken. Fresh, hot meat buns and large, juicy prawns... Naruto was simply jealous of all this food he couldn't have! He piled on as much as he could onto one place, and brought it back to Konohamaru.

As Naruto set the plate on the table, Konohamaru rose an eyebrow. "That's it?" He asked his servant. Though displeased, he picked up the plate anyway and started stuffing his face! "Mmph... G-Go get more!" He told Naruto, "And when you come back, you'd better have TWICE as much as this!"

Naruto rolled his eyes and left Konohamaru to his feasting. As the older teen got his friend more food, Konohamaru was enjoying himself, stuffing his gullet with every little morsel of food on his plate! Each bite served it's grand purpose of making him bigger and fatter! Every little bit that he ate was like pure, delicious jewel meat that filled his cheeks with succulant magic! Konohamaru's mood only brightened as he heard another set of plates being placed down on the table! He rushed to finish his first one just so he could move onto his next!

As Naruto continued to rush back and forth to bring him food, Konohamaru was growing in size once again! Not only was he getting heavier and wider, but taller as well! In mere minutes, the boy matchd Naruto in size! He was practically a sumo wrestler now, and then some! His gut was swollen and huge, and took up a decent portion of his lap as he sat there! His pants had been shredded to bits, leaving him in little more than his underpants! The elastic was stretched to the max, still able to hide his shame.

After Naruto had brought him his eighth serving, he held up a hand, issuing him to stop. Naruto sat the table, watching Konohamaru engorge himsef, not even noticing the subtle, gradual changes happening to the boy! As Konohamaru slammed his plate down, he glared back down at Naruto. "How about you get to rubbing his stomach of mine?" He said, rubbing the side of it himself! "Get the air outta there so I can fit more food in!"

Naruto groaned under his breath before moving in closer to Konohamaru. Glancing up at his temporary master for a moment, he put his hands on Konohamaru's soft stomach and started to rub!

It was almost like dough... Maybe a little bit more firm, thanks to all the food that was stuffed inside! Konohamaru softly moaned as he felt Naruto's hands trailing across his belly! There was just so much for Naruto to run his hands over! Konohamaru was loving every second of this! Having a slave to feed him, unintentionally making him bigger and heavier, and also to massage his gurguling tummy!

"A-Alright, Naruto..." Konohamaru said in a softer tone, "How about..."
1143321.title: It Began...

choices: Chest!
Belly button!
11433211.content:
"A-Alright, Naruto..." Konohamaru said in a softer tone, "How about you help me up?"

He held up his chubby arms and looked expectantly at Naruto who was still kneeling in front of him, rubbing his massive belly. "Huh? Oh! Sure!" Naruto said, sounding relieved. "Finally, we're getting out of here!" He thought. It wasn't like "serving" Konohamaru was hard. Naruto had carried far heavier things than a couple of plates of food and rubbing Konohamaru's gut had been similar to kneading dough for making bread (something that Naruto had had to do as an earlier D ranked mission when he was younger) but the very idea of being forced to do it against his will by his former pipsqueak friend was grating on Naruto's nerve, hurting his pride. He quickly got up and got behind the tubby youngster wrapping his arms around his substantial moobs. With a grunt, he tried to heave Konohamaru up but failed. Konohamaru's wide ass lifted a few inches up off the seat before it crashed back down, making the chair creak and groan even worse!

"Come on you weakling!" Konohamaru snapped, glaring up at Naruto. "Put some effort into it!"

Naruto gritted his teeth and squeezed harder, forcing Konohamaru to his feet with a loud grunt of effort. Naruto panted as he hung on to Konohamaru, one hand squeezing Konohamaru's right moob while the other had a handful of Konohamaru's considerable stomach. Konohamaru noticed Naruto still holding on and said, "Uh...you can let go now."

"Huh?" Naruto said, suddenly noticing what he was doing. "Ah!" He quickly let go, stepping back, blushing a little. Konohamaru smirked and started walking. Naruto followed quietly behind him, feeling embarrassed. He barely registered the fact that Konohamaru was now the same size as him, though much heavier and far wider! He refused to acknowledge that his formerly puny friend was probably stronger than him now, pushing the thought away before it could even properly form. He looked up, about to say something when he noticed something strange. He looked behind him and saw that they were walking AWAY from the doors! "Hey! Where are you going?"

Konohamaru glanced over his shoulder and said, "Where are you going SIR! Or boss if you prefer. Or maybe master!" Konohamaru said, chuckling.

Naruto snorted and said, "Yeah right! You wish!"

Konohamaru shrugged and said, "Well, maybe you'll be singing a different tune after I'm done here."

"I thought you already were done! Why did you have me lift up your fat ass if you weren't?" Naruto said irritably.

"You're too slow, that's why!" Konohamaru said, frowning at Naruto's insolence. "I'm practically starving and you're walking two plates to me every few minutes! So I thought, why not just go to the source?"

He indicated the buffet tables in front of him, every tray full to the brim with delicious, steaming food. Naruto's mouth dropped open slightly as he saw Konohamaru grin. "You're just going to...EAT everything right from the table?!"

"Duh! Why else would I have gotten up dummy?" Konohamaru said, pointing a nearby chair.

"I...thought you were done..." Naruto mumbled, grabbing the chair and bringing it over.

Konohamaru laughed loudly, sitting down on the chair heavily, his bulk pinning Naruto's hands down to the seat, forcing him to the ground again, forced to look up at Konohamaru. This pleased him. "Oh Naruto, you really don't listen. Remember what I said back at Ichiraku? I'm going to eat and I'm going to keep eating and I'm never, EVER, EVER going to stop!"

His voice took on a dangerous note as he said this. He leaned forward, his belly rumbling ominously, shaking the chair, making Naruto himself quake a little. "So you'd better get used to looking up at me!" He grinned and lifted his ass up slightly, letting Naruto go free. "Now get into the kitchen and start bringing out everything they have in there! Tell them the future Hokage demands it!"

He turned away from Naruto after saying this, driving his fat hands into a tray of fried rice, stuffing his face with it, his already chubby cheeks bulging as his chins wobbled as he chewed. His determination was back, his hands moving with a single minded speed. Before Naruto could even take a step towards the kitchen Konohamaru had finished the tray, tossing it at Naruto's feet. "GET A MOVE ON!" He shouted, making Naruto jump. He quickly ran into the kitchen.

"Hey everyone! Listen up! Konohamaru is out there and he wants food! All of it! So get a move on! Cook up everything you got and send it out there!"

The various chefs looked at each other in surprise. Naruto had the reputation of a prankster so it was hard to take him seriously, especially when he said something outlandish like that. They turned back to what they were doing, deciding to ignore Naruto. "Hey!" The orange clad ninja shouted, looking annoyed. "Listen to me! He's going to be pissed if you don't do what I say!"

Nothing he said convinced them. Getting frustrated, Naruto ran back out into the restaurant proper. The buffet tables had been half decimated, Konohamaru sitting, rather uncomfortably, on a chair that was sagging dramatically, the legs almost bowed completely out. His swollen belly was pressed tightly against the table, every bit making it swell out another inch, pushing the table slowly away from Konohamaru. His thick, fat arms moved determinedly, shoveling more meat, vegetables, soup, salads and desserts into his ravenous maw, never stopping for an instant! His wiggling belly hung low between his fat legs, looking more like sausages at this point, his fat feet spreading slowly across the floor. Konohamaru was like a machine, the material of his underwear long gone, leaving his ass bare, his shame covered only by the thickness of his belly, his moobs resting comfortably on top of the gut. Naruto's mouth dropped open as he gazed upon this gluttonous youngster still stuffing his face. He gulped a little as he walked up to him. "K-Konohamaru?"

The hunger filled eyes turned on Naruto, his mouth stuffed full of chicken. He quickly swallowed and said, "Yeah? What's up?"

"The chefs aren't cooperating!" Naruto explained. "They don't believe me!"

"Oh yeah? Well maybe it's time I taught them a lesson!" He grinned down at Naruto, pointing at his belly. "First, let me finish all this food! You get to rubbing!"

Naruto nodded, not wanting to argue with the bloated boy. He rubbed furiously, noting just how much more flesh there was to cover now. Konohamaru was truly something else. Every bite he ate not only urged him on to grow fatter, taller, and stronger, but also seemed to stimulate his appetite. No matter how much he ate, he was never satisfied. Soon, not even a crumb was left on the tables, the chair finally giving up, sending his bulk crashing to the floor, making the whole restaurant shake! Naruto lost his footing, his whole body stretched out on top of Konohamaru's belly, his face planted firmly between the boy's moobs. He blushed and scrambled off, Konohamaru getting slowly to his feet with a grunt. "Now let's see what those chefs have to say for themselves!" He said, his voice sounding slightly deeper and more powerful.

Naruto looked straight ahead at Konohamaru, his eyes widening as he realized he was staring at Konohamaru's...
11433211.title: A Whale of a Tale

choices: Naruto enters the kitchen, only to see what Konohamaru had done!
Naruto remains loyal. Konohamaru soon exits the kitchen even bigger!
114332112.content:
Konohamaru had a grin on his face as he was making his way to the kitchen doors. He glanced back at Naruto that wicked smile and told the smaller blond boy, "Stay here, got it?" Konohamaru began, "Don't come in here for ANYTHING! Got it!?" Konohamaru said loud and hard, making sure Naruto understood his point! Naruto just nodded a little, and backed away from Konohamaru a bit. It was just a brief moment before his big, fat ass disappeared behind the swinging doors...

- - -


Konohamaru entered the kitchen, which was nice and hot. It didn't take long for the chefs to notice the gargantuan boy in the kitchen with a huge, bulging gut! Konohamaru could already hear whispers going around the kitchen with his name on them.

"What's the honorable grandson doing here?"

"Geez, you see the size of him!? What's he been eating!?"

"I guess Naruto wasn't lying!"

Konohamaru smiled, and beckoned for a few of the chefs to follow him. A few of them did as they were told, whereas a few others were too busy with their work to follow the boy. Konohamaru led them off into the pantry, where things were more secluded and quiet. Konohamaru had a grin on his face as he got three men into the pantry. Once they were inside, he closed the shutter doors behind him, forcing them inside.

"Uh... Why did you bring us here?" One chef asked.

Konohamaru just chuckled before saying, "I heard you guys didn't listen to Naruto! You shoulda listened." Konohamaru replied simply. The chefs just looked at each other in confusion, before one of them was suddenly grabbed up by the ravenous boy before having his head shoved into the kid's mouth! The two chefs just stared in horror, watching as Konohamaru swallowed him up whole, the man filling the boys mouth and making a giant lump in his throat as he slithered down his throat. One of the two remaining felt ill, while the other was still in shock! Konohamaru grabbed another man, forcing him into his mouth, gulping and swallowing fast, forcing the man down his gullet so fast that it almost hurt a little!

As the man went down, Konohamaru chuckled, patting his gut a little as he let the man settle in. He let out a monstrous burp that shook the entire room, rumbling the containers. Konohamaru looked down at the last chef that had foolishly followed him! He grabbed the man up, his gut growling in hunger and protest, begging for more!

- - -


Naruto was busy outside of the kitchen doors, doing some push ups as he waited. After all, if he was going to be forced to serve Konohamaru, he might as well get into better shape! Naruto wouldn't even be able to Konohamaru if he didn't start packing on the muscle!

It was then that Naruto could hear a crash in the kitchen! He hopped right to his feet, ready to charge in before he remembered what Konohamaru had told him! He hesitated a little, pulling his arm away from the door!

Just inside the doors, Konohamaru had started grabbing the men up and shoving them into his mouth! The once small kid was growing into a gigantic titan who only got bigger with every man that entered his gut! His belly was huge, round, and fat! Filled to the brim, hands pushing out at some ends! It only served to please Konohamaru as he kept grabbing men up! One man was trying to hit Konohamaru in the stomach with an iron skillet! It didn't even work, and bounced right off the kid's immense bulk and right back at him! He served as Konohamaru's next victim. With every person, man or woman, shoved into his mouth, his stomach seemed to bulge out even further, his arms and legs bigger, his chest softer, and his body taller!

Naruto gulped a little as he looked at the doors. He suddenly jumped back when a man came running out, only to trip! Naruto fell backwards on his ass, and could only see as the man was grasping at the floor, being dragged in my some force! Naruto would have grabbed his hand to help him, but he vanished behind the doors, which swung slightly as they closed. Naruto could only stare wide-eyed, not quite sure what to make of what he'd just seen!
114332112.title: Door of Dark Secrets

choices: "Help me break this place down!"
"Bring me more food! I want to break out of this place!"
1143321122.content:
Naruto was about to kick the door open and find out just what the heck was going on in there when he remembered Konohamaru's look and his words. Don't come in for any reason whatsoever! Before, when Konohamaru had just been about his height and fatter than him Naruto had treated the whole thing as a kind of unfortunate circumstance, annoying, but nothing more. Now that Konohamaru was nearly twice his height Naruto actually felt intimidated! There was no telling what Konohamaru was capable of, especially with his grumpy attitude. It didn't help that Naruto had been the one to annoy him enough that this situation even came about in the first place! So he stepped back, trying to ignore the sound of screams and clattering as whatever happened in the kitchen happened. The other patrons in the restaurant had slowly filtered out, not wanting to get involved with this situation any more than they already were.

Finally, after what felt like hours but was really only about ten minutes, all noise coming from the kitchen suddenly ceased. Naruto slowly walked towards the doors before a building shaking burp suddenly rocketed out from the kitchen, blowing the doors open, a wave of air blowing over Naruto, pushing him back slightly. His eyes widened as he looked towards the kitchen, the doors closing again before he could get a good look. "W-What the...?"

BOOM! The floor shook violently, nearly knocking Naruto down again! The doors to the kitchen vibrated slightly, another BOOM shaking the whole area once more. Naruto gulped, watching the door, his eyes fixed on it. BOOM! BOOM! BOOM! The shaking grew more violent as whatever was in the kitchen moved closer to the door. "Is that...Konohamaru?" Naruto thought, slowly backing away from it. Suddenly, the doors burst open, a gigantic fat gut bursting through the doors, knocking them clear off their hinges! Naruto's jaw dropped open as he saw this massive globe of fat before him, filling the doorway completely! Naruto heard a loud grunting sound, the belly jiggling slightly, barely moving where it was wedged into place. A loud chuckle was then heard followed by a voice.

"Heh, guess I'm just way too big for this place! Hey Naruto!" It WAS Konohamaru! Naruto quickly rushed up to his friend's enormous stomach and shouted out to him.

"Hey! Konohamaru! I'm here! What do you need?" He asked, trying to see around the belly but it was impossible.

"I got myself stuck in here! Give me a push!" He ordered.

"O-Okay! I'll try!" Naruto said, looking at the mound of fat before him. He shrugged and just ran forward, pushing against the giant globe, his whole body sinking into the soft skin slightly, barely making any difference as he pushed. On the other side, Konohamaru was pulling, both boys working together to free his huge body. Finally, with a metallic wrenching sound, Konohamaru freed himself, falling back onto his ass, Naruto landing on top of his huge belly. "Ooogh..."

"There we go!" Konohamaru said with a grin, looking down at Naruto.

Naruto slowly looked up into Konohamaru's face, his eyes taking in those cute chubby cheeks, and confident eyes before trailing down the rest of his bloated blubbery body. His moobs rested softly on top of his bulging gut, each one looking bigger than Naruto himself! His fat arms were draped over the various tables and counters int he kitchen, his massive ass wedged between the rows as well, his enormous bare feet planted on either side of the door! Naruto could feel his body rising and falling slowly as Konohamaru breathed, the gelatinous mass of his belly warm and doughy. He could feel himself sinking in slightly! His once shorter friend's head was now almost to the ceiling! "K-K-Konohamaru!" Naruto stuttered, completely overwhelmed by this unthinkable transformation. "Y-You're....you're...you're...."

"Just getting started!" Konohamaru finished, his grin widening.

Naruto gulped, looking around the kitchen. "W-Where did the chefs go?" He asked.

Konohamaru merely burped loudly again, shrugging. "Who knows? Those idiots didn't believe you anyway! They must have run off while I was clearing this place out!"

Naruto wasn't sure if he believed that, but getting on Konohamaru's bad side would be a very, VERY bad idea now. He moved around slightly, massaging Konohamaru's gut without intending to, eliciting a little groan of pleasure from his younger friend. "As good as that feels, now's not the time for it little guy."

Naruto stopped and said, "What do you mean?"

"I mean I need to get out here! And get back to eating!" Konohamaru said as though it was the most obvious thing in the world.

"B-Back to eating?! Are you crazy?! You're already HUGE!" Naruto said, shocked by the blimp like boy's words.

"So? I can be even bigger! I WANT to be even bigger! I want to be SO BIG that no one can forget my name! So big that no one can stand up to me!" Konohamaru said, his voice getting louder in his passion. "And if you're not going to help me, you're just going to get in my way!"

He glared down at Naruto, striking fear into the orange clad ninja's heart. He slowly slipped down Konohamaru's belly and said, "What do you want me to do?"

Konohamaru smirked again and said, "Easy! I want you to..."
1143321122.title: Rising Ambitions

Naruto almost couldn't believe his own ears! He shooke his head a little as he looked up at Konohamaru!

"D-Did you say...?" Naruto replied, gulping a little. Konohamaru just knocked the puny blonde ninja on his head, almost knocking him out!

"Are you dumb!? Look at that door! Do you really think I'm gonna fit out of that!?" Konohamaru replied, "What other choice do I have?"

Naruto was about to open his mouth when he realized it probably wouldn't have been a good idea... He started rushing back to the buffet tables, brining Konohamaru entire trays full of a single food! Konohamaru would do little more than sit there and tilt them upside down into his gaping maw! All of it was delicious, and all the running was good for Naruto's cardio!

It took a moment, but Naruto was slowly starting to realize how each trip back to Konohamaru was gradually growing shorter and shorter... And speaking of growing, Konohamaru's head wasn't touching the ceiling while the boy was sitting, last time Naruto knew...

Naruto looked back, only to see Konohamaru rising up and getting to his feet as he let out a loud (but admittedly cute), "ROAAAAAR!"

Konohamaru stood for but a moment, before crashing back down on the debris of the resturant! His large ass cushioned anything that could have been painful to sit on, while his massive gut laid comfortably on his lap! Naruto gazed up in amazement at the boy who must have been at least twenty five feet tall! A belly twice the size of a wrecking ball and a pair of flabby, soft moobs on top of it! Naruto's lips quivered slightly as he gazed in amazement.

Konohamaru, in turn, was gazing back down at Naruto with a grin on his face. He slapped in stomach, feeling triumphant and powerful! It was a brief moment, before Konohamaru said...
11433211222.title: Indulge and Bulge

choices: "Get out of the village and enjoy the show."
"I totall forgot! I'm taking you with me!"
114332112222.content:
Naruto was so in awe of Konohamaru's towering flab that he didn't quite register what he was asking. "H-Huh? What was that?"

Konohamaru's expression darkened as he looked down at Naruto, his hand rising up. He slammed it down next to Naruto, easily knocking the fox boy off his feet. "LISTEN UP NARUTO!" Konohamaru's voice bellowed, heard from miles around. "I'M THE ONE IN CHARGE NOW! AND I'M ONLY GOING TO GIVE MY ORDERS ONCE! IF YOU DISOBEY, IF YOU REFUSE, YOU'RE JUST GOING TO END UP ANOTHER MORSEL FOR MY BELLY! GOT IT?!"

Naruto covered his ears, his knees shaking slightly. There was some kind of force in Konohamaru's voice, some kind of power that compelled him to listen and obey and fear him! "Y-Yes...Master!" He quickly said, hoping the title would please him. Judging by the arrogant smirk, it did.

"Good! Now just this once I'll repeat myself so listen up!" Konohamaru said, lifting his finger up!

Naruto quickly moved in closer, looking up at him intently. It was hard to see his face decently from this angle. He looked up and had to get past Konohamaru's mountainous belly and bulging moobs before he could even get a hint of the chubby face behind it. "How does that shadow clone thing work?" He asked again, a devious smile on his face.

"The Shadow Clone Jutsu?" Naruto said, smiling slightly. "That's an easy one! It's my best move! All you have to do is a regular clone but use a bunch more chakra so that it lasts longer! The more chakra you have and use, the harder it is for one to get dismissed forcibly!"

Konohamaru's devious smile grew wider as he heard this. "Is that all? Awesome!" He closed his eyes and started reaching into his chakra pool. He was a bit surprised to notice that it was much larger than normal! "Guess all those useless chefs were good for something after all!" Konohamaru thought with a wicked snicker. He opened one eye and looked down at Naruto. "What are the hand signs?"

Naruto held the index and middle finger on both his hands up and brought the right pair horizontally behind the left pair, making a plus sign. "Just do that! And make sure you're concentrating more of your chakra than normal!" Naruto was so eager to teach (it was starting to feel just like his old lessons with Konohamaru) he didn't realize what he was unleashing until it was too late. Konohamaru brought his fingers together and bellowed, "Shadow Clone Jutsu!"

When Konohamaru had first broken out of the restaurant, all the citizens in the vicinity had immediately panicked, running in all directions. Those that recognized Konohamaru still fled in fear, his body so radically changed they couldn't process it. It had left the entire area where Naruto and Konohamaru were empty. That left only Naruto to witness the amazing event that followed. In a puff of smoke large enough cover the entire district in a fog, the ground quake impressively as three enormous BOOMS! shook the area, knocking Naruto back down on his ass. He coughed, waving his hand slightly, trying to see what had happened. When the smoke finally cleared he was staring up at the twenty five foot Konohamaru who was looking to the left and right with a satisfied grin. Slowly, Naruto turned his head the same way. To the left and right of the original Konohamaru were two equally fat, equally titanic clones, both of them laughing and rubbing their massive guts. "This is awesome!" One shouted, pumping his fist as he got to his feet, not noticing that his appearance had reduced an apartment complex to kindling under his colossal ass. "Urgh, man I'm so hungry!" The second clone said, also getting to his feet.

"Hey! Let's just eat this guy!" A third voice said from behind Naruto.

Before the fox teen could turn around he felt a vice like grip clamp over his entire body, lifting him up into the air. Naruto struggled but the fat fingers of a third clone, thick as trees and twice as strong, were impossible to fight against! He stared up in horror as the clone licked his lips, opening his mouth wide, hot air gushing out of the cavern, ruffling Naruto's hair! "NOOOOOOOO! Don't eat me!" Naruto shouted frantically as he was brought closer and closer to the gaping maw!

"Hey!"

The third clone suddenly let out an "Ooomph!" noise as Konohamaru punched him hard in the gut, the mouth snapping closed, his grip loosening enough that Naruto fell into Konohamaru's hand. "You should know better! He's not food! He's a servant!"

Naruto felt a mixture of relief, gratitude, and annoyance, though at least his bruised body wasn't being battered anymore. Not to mention Konohamaru's plump hand was really soft and warm...Before he could get too comfortable, Konohamaru dropped him back down onto the ground. "Listen up Konohamaru's!" The original shouted, getting his clones attention. "This whole village is about to learn who's really in charge! I want every scrap of food to be found and eaten! By the time we're done I want to tower over this village like a god! No ninja should be taller than my pinky toe if even that! My shadow should cover the whole village and then some! I want to be able to see every inch of it no matter where I stand! I want all retaliations to be nothing more than pin pricks against my belly! And I want it all NOW!"

The three clones cheered, each one lumbering off in a different direction to fulfill Konohamaru's grand design. Naruto could feel his heart hammering in his chest. What had he done? He had just handed Konohamaru the king to devouring the village! If he wasn't already unstoppable now he was going to be very soon! Before he could think more on it, he felt a poke on his back. He looked behind him, seeing Konohamaru's plump toe poking him. "Y-Yes sir?" He said, looking up at Konohamaru's cute fat face.

"Don't worry Naruto! I'm not going to let you get hurt....unless you deserve punishment of course!"

Konohamaru chuckled as he walked off, the ground quaking with his every step, his ass cheeks jiggling as Naruto watched him walk away. "W-Wait! What do you want me to do?" He asked, not wanting to accidentally do anything that would be punishable.

Konohamaru stopped and thought about it. "Hmm...Oh! I've got it!"
114332112222.title: A Plague of Tubby Titans

choices: The Konohamaru's all finish, and combine with the original!
The Konohamaru's combine! But inside the original's naval...
1143321122221.content:
"Get out of here! Enjoy the show!" Konohamaru instructed, "I don't want you around when this goes down!"

Naruto nodded, feeling just a bit of relieft. Not needing to be told twice, Naruto bolted for the village gates, to get as far from here as he possibly could! Konohamaru smiled and turned back to the village. Then, like his clones, started causing terror, uprooting the village for all it had!

One clone happened upon the market district! Immediately, he started tearing the roofs off of buildings, and raiding them for all the food they had! Food came first, and if it came down to it, people would do too! Entire shelves would disappear down his throat, the gigantic young man not even caring to unpackage anything! Each store left his belly a little bit bigger, making it harder to reach into places with every place he devoured! Nowhere was safe! Konohamaru even plucked up little peddler carts, crushing them up in his teeth like little treats! This Konohamaru soon took a seat between two competing stores. His gargantuan fat ass slammed into the ground, making a crater! He started reaching into either store with both of his hands, and carelessly shoveling whatever he could grab into his mouth! Everything making him all the more bigger!

Another clone was off in the food district, having the time of his life! He woould bend down on all fours, much like an animal, and started digging in to resturants like they were a dog bowl of food! Of course, his gut touched the earth, making it a little harder for his hands and legs to touch the ground! This only became more problematic as he kept eating, his gut swelling up bigger and bigger with every bite! He would just crawl right over to the next building and start ravenously detroying that one as well!

The third clone had made his way into the residential district! People were already fleeing at the sight of him, so he had to act fast! He chased people down, their efforts futil in comparison to that of the bloated, starving giant! Konohamaru-clone would grab them by the handfull, like candy, and toss them into his mouth! He stopped for nothing and would even throw his weight into the earth to make the ground quake! The people would fall to their feet, disoriented and unable to move, only to be snatched up by their ravenous god and tossed into his cavernous gullet!

For the original Konohamaru, however, he had tossed all his cares aside! The pain of hungry from having to create clones was so greath that he had began uprooting the very buildings of the villages and tossing them into his mouth! He couldn't stop! He wouldn't! Anything he got his hands on soon ended up in his mouth and down his throat! Out of all his clones, he was getting the to be the biggest! His body was shooting up like bamboo, height passing seventy five feet, eighty, a hundred! His bulging belly was so firm and round, taking up more and more space! His arms and legs were like overstuffed sausages, and his chest so overstuffed with fat! The only few things that got past him were a certain lucky few refugees that managed to get caught in his belly button!

Naruto was far off by now, watching from a cliff. Each of the Konohamaru's had become apparant, all of them growing and filling those black holes they called stomachs! He sighed a little, rubbing the back of his head. He had no idea what would come of this, or what his new master would want of him!
1143321122221.title: From a Distance

choices: "...Who the heck is that inside your belly button?!"
"P-Please don't eat me Master Konohamaru! I'll do anything!"
11433211222212.content:
For Naruto, it was like watching various mounds of dough slowly rising up out of a pan, like rolls baking in an oven. Each Konohamaru, one per section of the village, was slowly rising into view, hands full of buildings, food, people, street, anything and everything they could get their greedy hands on, bellies swaying as they stretched higher into the sky, taking out lesser buildings, their fat feet shifting slightly, shaking the whole area enormously, causing even more structural damage. Naruto gulped slightly as he watched this. In the back of his mind, he felt completely responsible for this. He had started this whole fiasco after all! Taunting Konohamaru, feeding him without question, teaching him the Shadow Clone jutsu...no matter how you looked at it, Konohamaru had gained a fierce ambition and Naruto had done nothing except fan the fires of that ambition, bringing them both to this moment! A series of thunderous burps echoed from the village, a warm breeze smelling of food wafting over Naruto. He knees shook slightly as he took a deep breath of the scent, a tinge of breath behind it all. This was getting to be too much!

As though responding to Naruto's issues, the three clones suddenly POOFed out of existence, the sudden disappearance of the tubby titans enough to shroud the whole village in smoke. Naruto ran to the edge of the cliff, shading his eyes as he tried to see through the dense fog. Suddenly, he saw a series of brown spikes rise out of the smoke, followed Konohamaru's grinning face, his cheeks wide and fat, still looking completely adorable even as it outgrew the Hokage Faces themselves, his ample moobs ballooning further out, resting on top of a belly that looked like it could fit the entire Hokage's mansion within it, his boyhood guarded by the massive orb, his fat thighs rising up after that, his hands on his hips as he grinned down at the dwindling village. Naruto could hear Konohamaru's laughter, quiet at first, getting louder and louder as more and more of the once runty boy came shooting into view, his shadow extending across the village, the remaining villagers fleeing from his encroaching toes, the fat digits demolishing any building foolish to stand in their way! More and more and more, Konohamaru continued to expand, his enormous gut gurgling and growling the food of three extra giants filled his belly, all the accumulated chakra deepening his pool, making him even more powerful. Every step violently shook the village, even as Konohamaru merely spread his legs to gain more room, his friends, teachers, and former superiors all shrinking away into miniscule bugs as he towered over the village like a god!

Naruto's mouth dropped open as he saw Konohamaru's gigantic form appear in all its glory. If he thought he had been fat before, Naruto hadn't seen anything yet! Konohamaru's belly loomed over the village like a moon, his wide ass providing a view from behind that was just as glorious as the one in front. Everything about Konohamaru's form had been amplified hundreds of times over, the buildings of the village barely reaching his ankles. It was like the model cities that Konohamaru had played with as a child, pretending to be a giant as he kicked them down and stepped on them, loving the feeling of distorting plastic beneath his soles. Now, however, he viewed that destruction as a waste. Now there was only one purpose for the village, its structures, and its inhabitants.

A low growling sound filled the air, Konohamaru slapping his wide belly with a grin.

"GUESS WHO'S STILL HUNGRY?" His voice bellowed for miles around, his god like hand reaching down to scoop up a nearby cluster of buildings. He brought the handful up to his face and licked his lips. He could just barely make out the sound of pleading voices before he said, "SORRY, BUT YOU GUYS ARE JUST WAY TOO PUNY FOR ME NOW! BUT AT LEAST I STILL HAVE A USE FOR YOU!"

He laughed cruelly, tilting his head back, his thick tongue rolling out of his mouth like a red carpet, the modelesque buildings landing in pools of saliva as Konohamaru emptied his hand, the tongue quickly drawing back into his cavernous maw, swallowing the clump whole. "MMMMM~ OH YEAH, I'M GOING TO ENJOY EATING THE REST OF THIS PLACE!"

Naruto was able to hear Konohamaru's every proclamation, helpless, watching his as his former home slowly disappeared into the greedy gut of his once little friend. His words sent a chill down the older ninja's spine. If Konohamaru saw the villagers as bugs useful only as food, then what did that make Naruto himself? Just another bit of fuel for the fire? Once Konohamaru finished with the village would he find Naruto and eat him just as easily? With all his power could he even provide a challenge to Konohamaru? And in the very back of his mind Naruto still had to wonder: why? What had caused this incredible transformation in the first place? It was all too perplexing.

While all this was going on, completely unaware to Naruto and Konohamaru, a small group of refugees had managed to escape the wrath of Konohamaru. When Konohamaru had lifted the latest cluster of buildings to his mouth, he didn't even register that Naruto's classmate and friend, Kiba, had been amongst the trapped. Thinking fast, the dog ninja had managed to slip out between Konohamaru's fingers, free falling right on top of Konohamaru's considerable belly. Bouncing slightly, he slid down the slope, heading for the ground, only to end up tumbling inside of Konohamaru's navel, landing hard on his back. "Ooof! Not the most graceful landing..." He thought, groaning a little.

"Hey look! It's Kiba!" A familiar voice called out.

Kiba sat up and looked behind him, noticing two other men resting in this natural cave, saved from becoming a meal to the titanic youngster. "Choji? Shikamaru? Is that you?" He said, slowly moving closer.

"Yeah, it's us." A bored sounding voice admitted, the figure of Shikamaru crouching on the ground, hands in a thinking posture. "Guess you managed to escape too, huh?"

"Yeah, but barely. When did you guys get here?" Kiba asked, standing next to Choji.

"Shikamaru and I had been on a mission." Choji explained, "When we got back, there was that huge kid rampaging around! We were about to try and subdue him when he suddenly grabbed the entire area we were in, ground and all, and tried to eat us! Shikamaru managed to get us home free by using shadow stitching to make sure we didn't fall to our deaths after we jumped out of the hand."

"But we still ended up trapped in here." Shikamaru said, sighing as he got to his feet, hands in his pockets.

"This is insane! What the hell is going on here?!" Kiba shouted, asking the question more to the ether than to either of his friends.

"Whatever is going on, it's not going to be pretty." Shikamaru said, looking out of the navel with concern clear on his face.

"BUUUUUUUUURP!" Konohamaru let one loose, his mouth wide open, his tongue hanging out, reveling in how he could be as rude as he wanted with no one to tell him what to do! "AAAAAGH, MAN THE VILLAGE TASTES GOOD!" He said with a chuckle, rubbing his churning gut. "I WAS GOING TO LEAVE SOME OF IT BEHIND FOR LATER BUT I'M NOT THE KIND OF GUY WHO LEAVES FOOD ON HIS PLATE!"

He took a few steps back before driving his hands deep into the ground, the few remaining villagers looking on in horror as the pillar like fingers erupted all around the village, the ground shaking uncontrollably as Konohamaru slowly lifted the remains of the village into the air, drool slowly dripping from between his lips as he looked down at it, reflecting slightly on the fact that he was holding his former home, in its entirety, in a SINGLE hand!

"BET YOU ALL WISH YOU WOULD HAVE REMEMBERED MY NAME NOW, HUH?" Konohamaru asked, grinning from ear to ear. "WELL NOW YOU CAN REMEMBER THIS: YOU WERE A SMALL STEP ON THE ROAD TO MAKING KONOHAMARU THE NEXT GOD OF THE SHINOBI WORLD!"

Without further ado, he opened his mouth wide, setting the village delicately on his tongue, a single gulp sending the once proud village on a careening course down his esophagus, landing with an almost unnoticeable plop into his gastric juices. Konohamaru sighed happily and wiped his mouth. "ALRIGHT...NOW TO FIND NARUTO!"

Naruto watched as Konohamaru slowly moved toward his location. It was like watching an ambulatory mountain. Every step made the ground shake violently, trees crushed flat under Konohamaru's soft soles, his toes ripping into the ground easier than any bulldozer. His arms swung slightly as he walked, even these simple movements kicking up a maelstrom. Konohamaru had become a force greater than anything the ninja world had ever known, more powerful and destructive than even the ten tailed beasts! Naruto was brought to his knees as his former student loomed over him, his belly button level with the cliff he was standing on, easily able to engulf it if Konohamaru so much as took a step forward.

"WELL?" He asked thunderously, arms crossed over his flabby chest. "WHAT HAVE YOU GOT TO SAY NOW?"

Naruto gulped and looked straight ahead, opening his mouth to say
11433211222212.title: New World Order

choices: Naruto had run his usefulness! Down the hatch!
Naruto would be spared... If he could survive being tossed far away!
114332112222122.content:
Konohamaru heard Naruto's pleas. They were like music to his ears. Hearing the voice that was calling him a runt and a kid now begging to be spared from an eternity in his massive, swollen gut. Konohamaru got an idea, just in case Naruto planned anything suspicious. Slowly, he started reaching down and picked Naruto up right in his doughy fist! The little blonde ninja was slowly brought up to his face, were he was met with Konohamaru. His face had lost it's former shape and was now like one big face in a mountain of fat! His cheeks were so chubby that they wiggled at least a second more after he would stop talking. His neck was like a frog's when it took in a breath, swelling it out. It was hard to tell where his jawline ended and his face began!

"I'M GONNA REMIND YOU..." Konohamaru's husky, booming voice blasted, "JUST WHO THE REAL MAN AROUND HERE IS!" Konohamaru opened up his cavernous mouth, bringing his hand ever closer to it with Naruto clasped inside!

"No no no! Konohamaru stop! Aren't we--" Naruto tried to protest, but was cut off as Konohamaru's wide hand stuck inside his mouth, and let his tongue casually slide Naruto out from between his fingers! "Friends." Naruto grumbled, falling flat on Konohamaru's wide tongue. It must have been as huge as several buildings in here! Naruto gasped, barely able to get to his feet! Things were already starting to heat up inside Konohamaru's mouth as his steaming hot breath poured in from the back of his throat! Naruto could only recall a feeling like this once in his life: when he was gobbled up by that giant snake in the Forest of Death!

- - -


"Pfft, yeah, real heroic." Kiba sputtered as Naruto was suddenly grabbed up by Konohamaru! "G-Geez! That kid isn't having mercy on anyone!" He then barked, watching as Naruto vanished from sight!

"Kiba, focus!" Shikamaru demanded, grabbing his friend's shoulder. "We have to plan out a counter attack. I think it's pretty obvious that any attacks on this titan are useless. Shuriken and kunai are just going to bounce off of his fat, and any explosions at this size are just going to tickle him!"

"Uh... Right!" Kiba agreed, getting his head into the game. He was almost instantly broken out of it when he heard some loud moaning nearby. It was Choji, who was curled up in the corner and making quite a fuss over something. "Hey, Shikamaru, what's wrong with Choji over there?"

"Hm? Choji! Hey! I need you to weigh in on this too!" Shikamaru requested, glancing over at his friend, "Get over here with the rest of us."

"Mmm... Shikamaru, you pulled me away from breakfast...! I haven't eaten in a whole twelve hours!" Choji groaned, holding his stomach, "How do you expect me to think or even fight without any food...?"

Shikamaru groaned. When they were on missions, this was always the bane of their objectives. Choji practically had to be stuffed before he was taken out to battle! Otherwise his growling stomach would give away their position, and if he brought something along, his noisy chewing would produce the same effect! "Choji, if I didn't come for you when you did, you'd be IN this huge kid right now." Choji just moaned again. He couldn't remember a time he was this hungry!

"Mmmmn... I swear, when this is over, I'm just gonna keep eating and eating and EATING until I burst!" Choji whined, crawling on all fours over to the others. He laid there on his stomach, glancing up at them as he did.

"You're going to be playing a key part in this mission, Choji." Shikamaru told his friend with a little smile, ruffling his messy, chestnut hair. "Me and Kiba can't grow to a huge size like you can. You're probably the only on here that can put a stop to all this!"

"Yeah yeah..." Choji replied passively, his stomach letting out another huge groan. Little did he know, it was such a desire that got Konohamaru where he is now! If he didn't keep his appetite under control... Konohamaru might be the least of their worries!

- - -


Naruto fell and slid around Konohamaru's mouth as the gargantuan kid tossed him around on his tongue! He would press Naruto up against the roof of his mouth, just to feel the tiny ninja squirm around and try to fight back! Konohamaru gave a short laugh before sloshing Naruto around and putting him UNDER his tongue instead! Soon, just as he'd hoped, Naruto tried standing and lifting Konohamaru's tongue up and off his body, but it was all for naught! Konohamaru took great joy in forcing his tongue right back down, slamming Naruto into the soft, sensitive flesh below!

Just below his massive belly, Konohamaru could feel a tingling sensation he'd never experienced before! It kept sending little jolts of pleasure throughout his body, and messing with Naruto the way he was only made the feeling more intense! The inexplicable feeling of dominating another man with such ease! Konohamaru didn't even have to lift a finger for Naruto to be put in a tough spot! Getting this huge was the best thing that had ever happened to him! The young man's head started to bead with sweat as the pleasure increased!

"Hmph. Why not get even HUGER?!" He though, getting a cocky smirk on his face. Glancing down at what remained of Konoha, he shrugged it off like it was nothing before deciding to move onto a new food source! There were tons of villages and towns dotted throughout the Land of Fire, and as far as he was concerned, they all belonged to HIM! After all, he WAS the honorable grandson! It was only fit that he inherit the land to do with as he pleased!

Konohamaru continued to play with Naruto, before he reached into his mouth and plucked him out! Naruto was a mess, panting as his sweat mixed with Konohamaru's saliva. The kid grinned down at Naruto, who was now shirtless! The massive boy thought he tasted something come off of Naruto! Because the moment it did, there was a whole new spectrum of flavor that filled his mouth! Indescribable, yet incredibly addictive!

Naruto wheezed a little as he gazed up at Konohamaru, who ran his tongue over those plump lips of his, getting them wet just like it did Naruto! Before Naruto could plead once more, Konohamaru had decided...
114332112222122.title: A Strong Reminder

choices: Shikamaru, Choji, and Kiba attempt their plan!
Naruto explains the situation while Konohamaru begins devouring the Land of Fire
1143321122221222.content:
Naruto stared up into Konohamaru's fat face, his body sweating slightly as he was sitting on top of the vast expanse of Konohamaru's palm, his body practically nothing more than an insignificant speck to the incredible titan. His mouth slowly opened, a plea already on his lips when Konohamaru suddenly shifted his hand, the plump fingers curling around Naruto like a series of snakes, trapping him in darkness.

"I'VE MADE A DECISION BUG!" Konohamaru said loudly, slowly winding his fist up, scanning the horizon. "I DECIDED I'M GONNA SPARE YOU! BUT ONLY IF YOU CAN PROVE YOU'RE TOUGH ENOUGH TO HANG WITH ME!"

Naruto was starting to get dizzy as his tiny body was tossed about like a penny in a dryer, his shirtless torso starting to bruise slightly in places. His heart was hammering in his chest. What did Konohamaru mean exactly by proving himself? What sort of task would he have him perform now? He soon received his answer as Konohamaru thunderously announced, "IF YOU CAN SURVIVE THIS AND FIND YOUR WAY BACK TO ME AND GET MY ATTENTION WITHOUT ME CRUSHING YOU LIKE A BUG OR EATING YOU LIKE A GRAIN OF RICE THAN YOU'LL HAVE THE HONOR OF SERVING ME AS I CLAIM THIS WORLD AS MY OWN!"

Without further ado, at the top of the spin, Konohamaru released Naruto, sending the tiny ninja flying through the air! "GOOD LUCK RUNT!" was the last thing Naruto heard before the wind whipped away any sound outside of the whirling maelstrom, his body turning head over heels as he was launched far into the distance! He managed to get a glimpse of a series of rivers before the lush forest scenery was replaced by a vast desert of sand, stretching seemingly endlessly in all directions. Naruto showed no signs of slowing down, his body hurtling towards the borders of the Land of Wind, his stomach clenching, making him feel as though hew as about to throw up.

Just when he was at his limits, he felt something soft wrap around his body, slowing down his momentum, bringing him closer to the ground without reducing him to a bloody stain on the ground. With a slightly rough thump, he landed on his back on the sand, his heart hammering in his chest, his mouth completely dry, and his head spinning like he had just gotten off a carnival ride. He had no breath to speak. It was all he could do to give out a little squeak of joy as he saw a familiar, stoic face lean over his own, complete with black ringed eyes that made him look as tired as Naruto felt.

"Naruto Uzumaki..." Gaara said softly, a hint of a quizzical tone in his voice as he stared into Naruto's blue eyes. "Why were you flying through the air like that, out of control, half naked?"

Naruto weakly held up a hand, still trying to catch his breath. "Y-You...you...you....are not....not....not going to....to....to believe this..." He managed to choke out before fainting. Gaara sighed and turned his back on Naruto, sand swiftly, gently rising up around the fox ninja cradling him as it lifted him into the air, moving silently behind Gaara as he took Naruto into the Kazekage's mansion.

Meanwhile, back in the Land of Fire, Shikamaru was outlining the final tenants of his plan. "Alright so are we clear on what we're going to do?" He asked, looking from Kiba to Choji. Kiba quickly nodded while Choji groaned, rubbing his still loudly growling belly, practically ignoring what Shikamaru was saying. "Well Choji?" He said loudly, trying to get his attention.

"Yeah, yeah...are you sure we can't eat something first? Anything? I'm soooo hungry!" Choji whimpered.

"Then chew on your tongue!" Kiba snapped, getting irritated by Choji's complaining. It wasn't something he had to deal with on a daily basis like Shikamaru did and he had little patience for it. It reminded him of how Shino would quietly complain and that only pissed him off more!

"Enough you two! We all need to be working together if we want this to work!" Shikamaru loudly interrupted, snapping his fingers to get the other two male's attention. "First things first, we need to get down out of here."

"Right." Kiba said, taking up the narrative of the plan. "You're going to use your Shadow Stitching Jutsu to lower Choji and me out of here, making sure we stay safely connected to the kid's body until we hit the ground."

"Exactly." Shikamaru said, turning to Choji. "At that point, I'll remain here, resting and regaining my chakra. While I'm doing that, what's the next step?"

Choji sighed and said, "Right...I'm supposed to grow as big as I can possibly get, using any means necessary that aren't going to kill me in the long run. Kiba will ride with me, siphoning off his chakra into me so I can maintain my Expansion jutsu for as long as possible."

"And," Kiba swiftly cut in, "hopefully you'll be able to use my chakra to get bigger than you normally can get. While Choji fights, I'll also take a soldier pill every so often to give him an extra boost."

"Perfect." Shikamaru said, nodding. "With any luck, he won't see any of this coming. I'm guessing he'll be too focused on eating to pay any attention to us."

Choji's stomach gurgled loudly at the word "eating" eliciting an even louder moan from Choji. "You better hope I don't eat anyone when I'm big out there!" He warned peevishly, only half kidding.

"Alright, listen up Choji!" Kiba suddenly shouted, grabbing Choji by the collar. "If you just shut up and follow the plan, when all this is over, I'll buy you a fucking feast and you can stuff yourself silly! Got it?!"

Choji's eyes widened at the promise before grinning happily. "Y-Yeah! Okay! That sounds great!" He was much more invested in the plan now that he had such intense motivation!

Shikamaru smiled slightly and said, "When you subdue the kid, I'll be ready with a sealing jutsu to make sure he won't be able to escape and cause any more trouble. What happens after that...we'll figure out when we get to it. For now, let's concentrate on taking this giant down!" Shikamaru stuck his hand out in front of himself.

"Yeah!" Choji and Kiba both shouted, putting their hands on top of Shikamaru's.
1143321122221222.title: Plans in Motion

choices: Meanwhile, Inu-Shika-Cho's plan is holding Konohamaru off!
Meanwhile, Inu-Shika-Cho's plan is failing! And Konohamaru is getting BIGGER!
11433211222212222.content:
Meanwhile, Naruto was resting up in Gaara's private room in Sunagakure. The young blonde seemed to mumble in his sleep, tossing and turning not long after Gaara had set him on his bed! He seemed to go on about something needing to "stop eating" and how it will "eat us all." Gaara, at first, had just assumed that it was just the ramblings of a wild imagination. However, he could feel the hairs on the back of his neck were tingling slightly... His sixth sense was trying to tell him that there was something far more powerful at work here!

After about half an hour, Naruto finally woke up with a yelp, shooting straight up out of bed!

"GAAAH! DON'T EAT ME!" He shouted, his arms straight up in the air in surrender! Once he realized that he wasn't in Konohamaru's belly, he started looking around, where he saw Gaara sitting in the corner in a comofortable chair, gazing back at him. "Uh... Ehehe..." Naruto chuckled nervously, "I'm... Alive?" Naruto thought silently. His head turned and gazed all around. He didn't recall this room at all, but through the shutters on the nearby window, he could see a city made of sand and stone outside! "I'm... In Suna?" He finally managed to say.

"Yes." Gaara replied, unfolding his arms and standing up. He walked over to the bed where Naruto lay and took a seat right next to him. "You were flying through the air. I caught you so that you wouldn't splatter on the ground."

"Uh... Right!" Naruto agreed. That was a very... Unappealing thought.

"Why were you flying through the air anyhow. Or maybe I should ask, how?" Gaara asked, gazing at Naruto, who seemed to be shuddering at the thought of such a terrible end. Naruto's eyes popped back open, as if he had just now realized he was asked a question!

"G-Gaara! You gotta get ready! It's Konohamaru!" Naruto shouted, suddenly grabbing onto Gaara's robes! Gaara merely took Naruto's hands down off of him, and proceeded to ask Naruto his next question.

"The little village boy? What about him?" Gaara asked. He hadn't seen much of Konohamaru, but he knew who Naruto was talking about. The little runt that rammed into him when he was in Konoha for the Chuunin exams, and again, when he beat Naruto on a technicality in Suna's Chuunin exams.

"H-He's huge! And he ate the entire Leaf village!" Naruto insisted, waving his arms up and about!

"Naruto, you're delusional." Gaara said, shaking his head with just a small smile in the corner of his mouth. "Konohamaru... He isn't one of the Akamichi... It's impossible for him to grow that big. And especially to have the appetite to consume a village. He--"

Gaara was soon stopped as Naruto grabbed his shoulders. The fox ninja stared him point blank in the eyes. Gaara couldn't help but look back at him. "Gaara... I know what I saw." Naruto assured, "Konohamaru is huge. He's hungry. And he ate the entire village." He glared Gaara down with such powerful conviction, such sincerity, that he felt the Kazakage would have no choice but to believe him!

Gaara seemed to stare back for a moment, his eyes just a little wide. His heart seemed to scream that Naruto was telling the truth, but his mind kept trying to remind him what logic would dictate.

"Naruto..." Gaara said slowly.

"Gaara, please... You have to believe me!" Naruto pleaded, his heart hammering in his chest, "Otherwise... Otherwise Suna might suffer the same fate!"

"But how...?" Gaara asked Naruto, "How could a child get so large to consume an entire village? And more importantly, why would he betray his own village?"

"It's... A long story..." Naruto woefully admitted, "I think part of it is my fault..." Naruto went on to explain everything that he believed lead up to his point. How he taunted and teased Konohamaru for not being strong or manly, or how deeply rooted his anger was for people not recognizing him for all the hard work he really did. Gaara and Naruto soon realized that Konohamaru must have gotten so wrapped up in his own anger that it warped his mind!

Once the story was told, all the way up to when Naruto was tossed straight to Suna, Gaara let out a deep sigh.

"This is madness, you know." He told Naruto. "I trust you. I believe in you. But... What of the village?" Gaara asked, "I cannot simply state that a giant child is coming this way to destroy us and expect everyone to believe me." Gaara rubbed his forehead. There was no doubt in his mind that Naruto was telling the truth. Now the hard part was being able to rally their defenses. People would need to be evacuated, supplies for survival would need to be gathered... Possibly the biggest obstacle of all was the overcast of doubt the people would hold for Gaara, especially when they heard the reason for all this from his own mouth.

But... If it would save lives, then it had to be done.

"So what now?!" Naruto asked, looking at Gaara the entire time, watching as his friend's face was twisted by stress. Naruto had little idea of how hard it truly was to be Hokage...

"I... I shall send word." Gaara finally spoke, "We'll have everyone safely evacuated as soon as we can." Gaara stood up and slowly started walking for the door. As he had his hand on the handle, he stopped to speak, catching Naruto's attention. "I do not know if we can fight back against this force. Especially not if it's as you described it. But we CAN defend. And we will." He assured Naruto.

With those words, Gaara left the room, leaving Naruto to think on this matter for himself.

114332112222122221.content:
Shikamaru was focusing every last bit of chakra he had into this singular jutsu. Kiba and Choji could survive a steep fall, but one from this height could be fatal! Not to mention the constant sound of Konohamaru's lips smacking and munching in the background, a constant reminder of the looming danger over their heads. Lower and lower the two went, Kiba going as far to carrying Choji in his arms just so he could exert a little energy as possible so he would be fully prepared to fight off Konohamaru. What's more, Shikamaru, the brains of the whole operation, had no way of keeping in contact with Kiba and Choji, who were the muscle. Kiba kept his eyes on the ground while he held Choji tight. He never really called Choji fat, but damn did he realize how heavy the teen was when he was actually in his arms!

"A-Ah! Kiba! You're squeezing my butt!" Choji suddenly squealed when Kiba was reaffirming his grip.

"Like I wanted to grab that!" Kiba barked back, "Just hold on a little longer! We're almost to the ground!" Choji merely whimpered in response, a little blush on his cheeks as they fell. He never had someone groping his butt before. It actually felt kind of nice as long as Kiba didn't squeeze TOO hard. After all, the dog man had some serious nails!

Soon Shikamaru could feel the tension of the jutsu wear down, and he then knew that they were safely on the ground. Shikamaru immediately retracted the jutsu and fell onto his back. It was finally time for him to relax and hope that the rest of the plan went on without a hitch!

Kiba felt a little out of breath, if only for the fact that his arms were a little sore from holding Choji the entire way down. Choji, on the other hand, was the only one in peak condition!

"Okay... You got this, Choji?" Kiba asked his friend, who was stretching and warming up for this massive transformation!

"Yeah, ready!" Choji smiled, giving Kiba a thumbs up. Kiba took his position behind Choji as Choji formed the hand sign. "Super Multi-Size Jutsu!"

Kiba immediately had to hold on tight to Choji as the already sizable young man suddenly began to skyrocket in size! It was like a carnival ride, shooting you skyward only it seemingly never ended! Kiba shouted out in dismay as he held on as tight as he could, finding it easier once he was able to climb fully onto Choji's shoulder!

Huger and huger Choji grew, remaining clothed unlike the massive flabby giant before them. They were soon peaking over the trees, and getting even huger thanks to Kiba's help! Kiba sat as peacefully as he could on Choji's shoulder, focusing on giving him every scrap of chakra he could muster! Bigger and bigger Choji grew, every inch of his flabby body shooting up in side along with him! It didn't cease until Choji was at least as big as Konohamaru, maybe a few tens of feet taller! But Konohamaru was still several hundred tons heavier! Choji grunted, feeling a slight burn in his body from being this gigantic!

"Don't push it Choji! We'll make do with what you have!" Kiba shouted to his ally. Choji whimpered in a reply once more, but his voice was far deeper this time thanks to his gargantuan stature. Choji made a short stride towards Konohamaru. He tapped the kid's shoulder a few times, which made him turn in confusion. Before he could even look up at who it was, Choji didn't hesitate to slam his fist against Konohamaru's face, sending the kid plowing down onto the town he was devouring!

"H-Hey, careful! There's people down there! And don't forget about Shikamaru, he's probably still recouperating from lowering us down to the ground!" Kiba shouted, extra loud this time to make sure Choji heard.

"R-Right!" Choji replied immediately. It was more than clear that he was extremely nervous about this whole ordeal. And not to mention the constant pain in his stomach from his starving belly. He readied himself as Konohamaru steadily got back to his feet and began to charge at Choji! Choji braced himself, thinking he was more than ready to take the kid on only to get bowled over! Konohamaru landed with a gargantuan "BOOM!" on top of Choji, that decimated the entire area from shockwave alone!

"Hey! I know you!" Konohamaru barked as he looked down at Choji. "You're that chubby ninja guy!" He roared. Choji was surprised at first, if only for the fact that he was shocked at huge Konohamaru was! His hands pressed at the titanic teen's belly, pathetically trying to fight him off! Konohamaru snickered as he looked at Choji. "What's wrong? Mad you can't push me around?!" Konohamaru sat up and folded his arms against his plumped chest. "Too bad! I'm the biggest ninja that ever lived! No one's ever gonna underestimate me again!"

"C-Choji, you have to do something! Hurry!" Kiba barked as he clung tightly to the armor on Choji's shoulder.

Choji...

Choji, Kiba, and Shikamaru celebrate, unaware of the danger...
1143321122221222212.content:
Choji growled at Konohamaru, making the tubby titan raise an eyebrow. "What's your problem? Finally figuring out that nothing you can do will ever stop me?" He grinned wickedly at the older teen, the smile quickly wiped off his face as he felt himself getting lifted into the air! Before he could react, Choji rose with a triumphant roar, tossing Konohamaru clear off of him, throwing him a few feet (a few miles to the normal sized villagers) onto yet another town, smashing it beneath Konohamaru's bulbous gut.

"Don't you call me chubby!!" Choji shouted angrily, a new burst of energy welling up inside him.

Kiba chuckled and bit down on a soldier pill, feeling his chakra pool fill back up. He quickly siphoned it off into Choji, the gargantuan ninja feeling the new flow, immediately reactivating his expansion jutsu, his already colossal form rising up and up and up into the sky, his shadow stretching across the landscape, engulfing even Konohamaru! Choji's sandaled feet stretched across the landscape, his spiky head of hair rising into the clouds, the various towns becoming nothing more than dots on the landscape! Konohamaru shook his head, gaping as he looked UP at Choji! "W-What the hell?! No way! I'm not going to come this far and get stopped by THAT guy!"

Konohamaru frantically started grabbing any towns that were in front of him, stuffing them into his mouth, swallowing them down, desperate to squeeze out as much growth as he could while Choji was still using the jutsu. Unfortunately for him, the towns provided little sustenance, his enormous frame only expanding slightly, rising up tens of feet higher but these mere inches were like nothing. Choji quickly ended the jutsu when he felt a sharp pain across his chest, his body already taking heavy damage from having the jutsu active for this long at this level! "Gotta end this fast..." He muttered, his voice still loud enough to boom across the landscape like godly thunder!

He lifted his foot into the air, a hurricane of wind whipping around the appendage, uprooting trees, sending people and buildings flying, such devastation beyond even the Tailed Beasts to create! Choji winced, knowing how much damage he was causing, but still moving, knowing that this was for the great good of the world! The earth quaked impressively as he set his foot back down, taking a step forward, cracks radiating out from his sole, driving deep into the ground, the glimmer of lava practically visible within the depths of the planet.

As Choji strode closer to Konohamaru, the now doll sized fatty was starting to panic, shoving anything he could find in his mouth! Trees, ground, dirt, rock, anything he could close his fingers around went into his mouth, his size increasing at a faster pace, but not nearly fast enough! Before he could grow any significant amount bigger, he felt an enormous pressure on his back. Choji was pressing down with his foot, easily pinning the trouble making giant under his sandal. "NOW SHIKAMARU!" Choji's enormous voice boomed across the landscape, as audible to the ninja of the world as he was visible.

"Right..." Shikamaru panted, barely able to cling to the wall of the navel as Konohamaru was forced to his knees, hands on the ground, arms shaking, teeth gritting as he tried to push back against the foot. Shikamaru's hands moved in a blur as he made the signs of a complicated sealing jutsu, slamming his hand down against the wall he was currently sticking to.

Konohamaru could feel his body growing sluggish, strange symbols running out of his belly button and over his chunky body, sealing his limbs, making them feel sluggish and heavy. "No...no! It can't end like this! It WON'T end like this!"

With the last bit of strength in his body, Konohamaru made a simple hand sign, concentrating on a point far, far away from their current location, deep in the desert. If everyone hadn't been so focused on him and Choji, they might have noticed a puff of smoke appearing there. As it was, Konohamaru's arms fell to his sides, his entire body slamming into the ground, motionless. Shikamaru had managed to slip out at the last second, falling to the ground seconds after Konohamaru, sighing in relief, his chakra completely depleted. "Made it..." He muttered, passing out.

The entire world seemed to hold still as Konohamaru lay sealed, this nightmare seemingly over. Choji grunted in pain, his body shrinking swiftly down, down, down, Kiba jumping from his shoulder as soon as he was low enough to the ground, both teens ending up next to where Shikamaru was. Choji fell onto his back, completely drained, his stomach rumbling ferociously. Kiba chuckled, falling onto his ass between Choji and Shikamaru. "We...we did it you guys...It actually...worked!"

"Yeah...but I've never felt hungrier in my whole life!" Choji moaned, barely able to even move his arms to pat his belly.

Kiba laughed and rubbed Choji's stomach for him, saying, "Don't worry Choji. Now that this big tub of lard is under control I'll make sure you have the biggest, tastiest feast you could ever hope for!"

Both teens chuckled, feeling a sharp sense of relief now that it was all finally over...

Meanwhile, in Sunagakure, before Konohamaru had been sealed, Naruto was standing on the balcony of the Kazekage's palace, Gaara standing next to him, watching as the entire military force of the Sand was mobilized. Gaara still had his doubts, but had sent messengers to see if what Naruto said was happening was true. His doubts were completely obliterated when Choji's gigantic body suddenly appeared on the horizon, jutting proudly up through the clouds, miles tall, looming over the landscape! Gaara's mouth dropped open in uncharacteristic surprise, wondering how such a giant could even exist!

"C-Choji?! What the heck?!" Naruto shouted, just as shocked as Gaara.

Both teens watched as Choji took a few steps, the ground around even THEM shuddering in protest, knocking half the army off its feet! Gaara and Naruto had to hold tight to the railing lest they get pitched over the side! The confusion lasted until they heard Choji call out, "NOW SHIKAMARU!"

Naruto's confused look of disbelief cracked into a smile. "Heh...T-They must have come up with a plan! They're stopping Konohamaru! Ahahahahahaha!"

Naruto's laughter was almost crazed, relief dripping from his every word. Gaara, still a bit confused, smiled ruefully as Naruto laughed. "This will certainly make for an interesting story I suppose."

Naruto sighed, his giggles tapering off. He had opened his mouth to say something when a massive amount of smoke suddenly surrounded them from nowhere, making both teens cough loudly. Naruto could feel his heart beat faster. He recognized this smoke. He had seen it dozens of times! And if there was this much smoke it could only mean...

He slowly looked up into the grinning face of Konohamaru.

"AAAAAAAH!" Naruto shrieked, falling to his ass, looking up in utter horror at Konohamaru!

"Awww, you didn't think I'd go down THAT easily did you?" Konohamaru said, waving his finger at Naruto. "You should know better than THAT bug!"

He suddenly reached down, his enormous hand able to easily scoop up half of Suna into his palm, dragging half the army up with him! Sand cascaded down from Konohamaru's hand, nearly burying the other half of Suna as he did! He gulped down the village, licking his fingers afterwards, grinning down at Naruto and Gaara. "A little gritty, but still tasty. Now listen up! The original Konohamaru ran into a small road bump! I'm here to make sure that it's not an issue! So I want each and every one of you remaining ninja and citizens to start gathering up food! LOTS of food! And bring it all here to me! I'm going to eat and I'm not going to STOP eating until Konohamaru is able to break out of that seal! You got me?! Anyone who doesn't obey..."

He slapped his belly menacingly. "So GET TO WORK!"

Naruto closed his eyes, feeling drained. He had been so close...so CLOSE to freedom! He opened his eyes, yelping as he saw Konohamaru's gigantic fingers reach down, plucking him up once more, raising him up to his face. "As for YOU...I've got a special job for you!"

Naruto gulped and said, "W-What do you want me to do....master?"

Konohamaru chuckled deeply, glad to hear that pathetic plea once more. "It's something that only YOU can do, with that massive chakra pool of yours. Make me up some clones! Hundreds of them! THOUSANDS even! Keep making them until you run out of chakra! Take some soldier pills if you have to, but do whatever it takes to make more clones! I want MILLIONS of them now that I think about it! Entire populations!"

"What are you doing to do with all that?" Naruto asked, his heart hammering in his chest, unsure if he would be able to do such a feat.

Konohamaru's gut rumbled ominously in response. "I'm going to EAT them all of course! Just think of it...a neverending supply of food, all for me!"

"But...won't they just disappear once you eat them?" Naruto asked.

"Heh, maybe if I was NORMAL. But I'm a ninja GOD now! I can feel it! All the chakra the clones are made up of will just be absorbed into my body, feeding me more!" Konohamaru insisted, sure of this feeling inside of him. "So what are you waiting for? GET MAKING!"

Ichigo quickly ran up the stairs in his house, making a sharp turn into his room before slamming the door behind him all in one fluid motion. He tossed his bag onto the floor before darting around the room, checking the closet, under the bed, behind his desk, in his drawers, and anywhere else Kon might be hiding. He wasn't anywhere to be found in the room which meant he was either out and about making trouble or he was trapped somewhere in Yuzu's room. Either way worked for Ichigo since he desperately needed some time alone to himself.

He locked his door before closing the curtains, throwing the room into a premature twilight. With slightly trembling fingers, the orange haired teen removed his school shirt, tossing it carelessly over the back of his chair before fumbling with his belt. His hands were clumsy as his mind whirled with thoughts of everything that had happened today. He managed to undo his button and zipper, taking a few minutes longer than he normally did, and pushed his pants down until they were around his knees. That was good enough for what he wanted to do.

Laying out on top of his bed, his heart hammering, Ichigo pulled down his boxers, revealing his impressive manhood, hard as a rock, and quivering in the open air, able to finally stretch now that it was no longer contained inside its cloth prison. Ichigo drew in a shuddering breath as his hand enclosed around it. For a boy his age, he had an impressive cock, measuring at least nine to ten inches hard depending on how turned on he was. Right now it was probably stretched even farther than that. He had never been turned on quite like this before in his life.

As he began to stroke himself, Ichigo's thoughts drifted back to the school day...
