Most of the girls in his school considered him a grumpy weirdo anyway so he had never had much choice in dating, even if it interested him. After becoming a Soul Reaper, and seeing all the busty babes the Soul Society had to offer who didn't seem to care about his attitude...he still wasn't interested in the slightest. There just always seemed to be something more important to concentrate on than women. This had suited Ichigo just fine for his fifteen years of life. However, something unexpected had happened that morning at school. It had started out the same as any other day. He had sat down and Keigo had begun chattering about something he had done over the weekend, asking Ichigo if he wanted to go over to his house after school who bluntly declined which set Keigo into a loud fit about how Ichigo never liked to hang out with him. Totally, one hundred percent normal. His attention had begun to wander when his teacher suddenly said, "Oh, and we have two new transfer students coming in for awhile...again...huh...That seems to happen a lot in this class doesn't it?" Her tone was cheerful. It was obvious she didn't really mind in the slightest. "Anyway! Please welcome Renji Abarai and Ikkaku Madarame!"

Ichigo's attention was immediately drawn to the front of the classroom, a look of shock on his face. Only Renji was standing at the front of the room, making him wonder briefly why his teacher even mentioned Ikkaku, before noticing something else...Renji looked...huge! He had to be at least a foot or so taller than Ichigo remembered him being (He had seen him just last week when they took down a stray arrancar together) and his muscles were enormous! His button down school shirt was visibly straining, the buttons looking ready to burst if Renji so much as took a breath. The material was so tight against his body Ichigo could clearly make out a steel hard six pack pushing out from his stomach! His pecs were like beach balls bulging out a good ways from his body. His biceps were equally impressive , straining the sleeves of his uniform to their limit. Threads were already starting to come undone, unable to withstand the sheer mass of Renji's arms.

Ichigo's wide eyed stare was interrupted by the sound of giggling coming from behind him. He shook his head a little as he heard a girl whisper, "Oh my God, just look at that bulge! What a man~"

Ichigo involuntarily felt his gaze drift down to Renji's crotch. The girl was right to be impressed! The dress pants did absolutely nothing to hide Renji's bulging manhood. It looked as though the pants would explode if Renji ever got hard, not to mention his enormous thighs were filling up his pants legs to the maximum, his calves doing their part to make sure everything was not just skin tight on Renji, but skin tight to the point of ripping at the slightest movement! Even his forearms looked thick and strong and his hands had a strong, masculine look to them. His feet seemed to be cramped into a rather uncomfortable looking pair of shoes, but if they bothered Renji he didn't show it in the slightest, his expression one of pure cocky confidence.

Ichigo gulped as he looked Renji up and down, heat rising to his face as he felt a strange stirring deep inside him. He had never felt anything quite like this before in his life. He wasn't sure what to make of it. He shifted slightly in his seat and found, to his dismay, that he was as hard as a rock! This was an unusual occurrence for him. His rarely found the time to pleasure himself with constantly dealing with homework, family business, and Soul Reaper duties. The most release he got was when his body actively rebelled against him, leaving him with morning wood so intense he pretty much had to jerk off just to be able to get anything done. Ichigo didn't have a frame of reference for what was average, but he had a feeling that his dick was above it and his loads were equally impressive. One time he had been too slow with his tissues and had ended up covering his entire torso with hot, sticky seed. Getting to the shower without running into any of his family members had been a bit of a luck based mission...

Ichigo was snapped out of his thoughts once again when the teacher said, "Why don't you go sit down next to Ichigo?"

Renji nodded, grinning as he caught Ichigo's eye. He sauntered over to him, slipping easily into the desk even though it was a size or two too small for him. He leaned over and whispered, "Hey Ichigo~ Like what you see?"

"Renji! What the hell happened to you?!" Ichigo hurriedly whispered back, his face still red at this whole situation.

Renji merely chuckled and said, "Research and Development's been working on some new enhancers. They're completely experimental so only Ikkaku and I wanted to try it."

"Where is he anyway?" Ichigo asked, his mind diverted somewhat.

As though in answer, the door to the classroom was slid roughly open with a sharp BANG! a loud, low voice growling out, "I'm here, don't mark me absent or whatever."

The entire classroom fell silent as Ikkaku lumbered into the classroom. He was truly a sight to behold. He was so tall, he needed to crouch down just to get into the classroom! When he stood back up, his head smashed into the ceiling, a curse slipping out from Ikkaku as he immediately crouched back down, rubbing his head. "Damn low ceilings..."

Ichigo's mouth dropped open. Ikkaku's muscles were so huge, vascular, and uncovered they made Renji look like a child in comparison. No shirt would obviously properly fit Ikkaku's bulging physique, so he wasn't wearing one. Equally absent were pants. Only a tattered looking pair of black shorts clung gamely to his thighs, the waist band riding low on his hips, the v leading down to his crotch clearly visible. A pair of improvised sandals tied to his feet were the only other clothing that he was wearing. He glared down at the teacher and said, "Sorry about the outfit. Nothing else fits me. You got a problem with that?"

His gaze was so menacing, the teacher merely held up her hands and said, "Not at all! Please, take your seat! Um...we...seem to have run out of desks..."

Ikkaku waved his hand carelessly and said, "Whatever. I'll find a place." He made his way down the aisle, students quickly moving their desks out of his way until he was standing just behind Ichigo. He glared at the girls sitting there and barked, "MOVE!" They scattered like mice, leaving a large space for Ikkaku to sit down in. With a sigh, he crashed down on top of the desk, smashing it to pieces, his legs stretching out on either side of Ichigo. The young teen's heart was racing even faster, his pants uncomfortably tight. This was going to be a long, long day...

Ichigo could barely think the entire time he was in class. With Renji constantly at this side, and Ikkaku's pillar legs on either side of him, he easily found himself nervously tapping on the side of his desk, waiting for time to just hurry up and pass. He couldn't listen to his lessons, Renji's powerful shoulders and arms kept pushing into him, at from time to time, he could have swore that he could barely smell a thick musk coming from behind him. Curiosity took hold as he could only IMAGINE what that scent was without looking behind him, and the gigantic Ikkaku seeing him.

Doing his best to calm his libido, he started to think of things that would turn him off. Or at least things that would distract him from his raging boner. "Come on..." He thought, his eyes darting all over the room. "C-Clock! Time... Patience... Boring... So bored... Uhm... Bones! Bones, death... Life, soul reapers..." In an instant, Ichijo realized what was wrong with heading that direction. Soul reapers mean people like Renji and Ikkaku, and Renji and Ikkaku were huge, bulging, and thick beyond comparison.

Renji's ears suddenly perked up as he hear a noisy "thunk!" He looked about for a second, before looking down at Ichigo. A sly grin slid across his face as he watched the puny man fidget and squirm in his desk, desperately trying to hold back his thoughts. It didn't take a lot of thought on Renji's part to realize what that "Thunk" was. He was hot, he was attractive, and he knew it! He didn't mind having all eyes on him! He ate up all the attention like a sponge to water, and every little flex he gave to any admirers that passed by only left more "water" for him to soak right up!

What felt like an eternity, the bell rang, and thus it was time for lunch. Ichigo let out a long breath. After some rather... Unattractive thinking, he was finally able to control the snake in his pants. With a deep breath, he made his way to the door, waiting outside for the two "elephants in the room" to exit. Keigo stopped by in front of Ichigo, surprisingly calm.

"Hey, Ichigo... Don't you know those guys?" Keigo asked, trying to be calm about the matter. Ichigo just glanced up, his look firm.

"Don't worry about it." Ichigo replied. Much to his dismay, this was the trigger that caused Keigo to flip out. His arms flailing about, he began to shout at Ichigo, but Ichigo just did his best to block it all out. As if right on cue, Renji and Ikkaku had squeezed out of the room. "Hey!" Ichigo shouted, looking up at them. This was a bit of a new feeling for him.

Renji just smiled to himself as he looked down at Ichigo. "Hey, look who it is!" Ikkaku, who was standing behind Renji, couldn't quite see from the angle he was at. His swollen pecs blocked the view he had directly below him.

"... Well!? Who is it!?" Ikkaku asked impatiently.

Renji looked back in confusion for a moment, but then chuckled. "Who d'ya think, you big lug? It's Ichigo! ... And his little friend." Renji gave a glare down at Keigo, who just whimpered and quivered under the presence of the two colossus. Renji gave a fake lunge at Keigo, which caused him to run off screaming.

"DON'T SQUISH MEEEEEE!" He cried out, his voice quickly fading away. Looks like it was just the three boys... And a small crowd of girls behind Ikkaku. Ikkaku quickly caught up on this, and let out a loud "ROAR!" that easily scared the lot of them away. He smirked to himself, feeling even more powerful that he was, if that was even possible!

"... Let's head outside." Ichigo suggested, "Somewhere more... Secret." Although he wouldn't admit to it, Ichigo had got a little twinge in his pants from hearing Ikkaku's beastly roar.

---------------------------------

Later, the three men met ouside, hiding the best they could behind some bushes and trees. Having just arrived, Ichigo turned to begin speaking to the two.

"Now--" Ichigo was interrupted, only for Renji to suddenly press his sizable bulge into Ichigo's face!

"You feel that?" Renji chuckled, moving up and down a little so Ichigo was forced to rub against it, "That's 100% man right there!" Renji then pushed a little harder. Ichigo tried to push back, but failed horribly. It just made Renji laugh, before he grunted a little, making his dick shake and push the pathetic man down. "Hey, Ikkaku, why should we listen to what Ichigo has to say?" He asked his fellow Soul Reaper. "Who says a pair a huge guys like us have to listen to a pipsqueak like him?" Ikkaku just looked down at Renji in confusion for a moment, before getting a grin on his face as well.

121312112.title: Coup d'état

choices: Renji heads for the mess hall to get some breakfast
Renji gets called out on a mission to the World of the Living

122.content:
"Message from Captain Kurotsuchi of Squad 12." A smooth female voice emanated from the fluttering black butterfly in front of Renji Abarai. He had been on his way to breakfast when the Hell Butterfly had floated in front of his line of sight with a message. "Please report to the Soul Reaper Research and Development Institute at once."

Renji sighed as the butterfly quickly flew away. So much for getting something to eat! He changed directions and began to run towards the R&D Institute. The impressive, and slightly imposing, building luckily wasn't too far off. The very second he reached the door, it slowly swung open to reveal a plain looking woman with long black hair tied up in a ponytail standing just inside, her hands clasped in front of her, looking for all the world like a model student. She bowed slightly and said, "Please follow me."

Renji was used to Nemu's submissive attitude. She was always soft spoken and polite, her expression always unchanging. "So...what does Captain Kurotsuchi want with me anyway?"

Nemu answered without so much as a backward glance. "I'm terribly sorry, but I can't divulge that information without Captain Kurotsuchi's permission."

Renji grumbled to himself, getting more annoyed by the second. He didn't dare raise any objections while Mayuri might have been within hearing distance however. The last thing he needed was to be kidnapped and used in some strange experiment!

The white halls had an oddly sterile feeling to them. It made Renji slightly uncomfortable. It was like being inside a hospital run by a mad scientist...which actually wasn't too far off from the truth, given Mayuri's disposition. Nemu suddenly stopped in front of a large set of double doors. She easily pushed open the rather heavy looking door and beckoned Renji inside. She didn't follow him, but pulled the door shut as soon as he was over the threshold. The room Renji found himself in was dark, only one area lit up thanks to a massive computer screen. Mayuri could be seen at the base of it, sitting in a strange chair shaped like a crescent moon, his fingers clacking the keys of a rather large keyboard. His eyes were focused, unblinkingly, on the screen. Renji slowly walked towards him.

"Do not take another step!" Mayuri's sharp voice suddenly shouted out. Renji immediately obeyed, looking over at the strange captain in surprise.

"...Why?" Renji asked.

"Because I said so that's why!" Mayuri replied, annoyance clear in his voice. "Why do you people think it's okay to just wander about willy nilly in my labs? What do you want anyway?"

Renji glared and shouted, "Hey! You sent for me! Do you think I want to be here?"

Mayuri sighed and pushed the keyboard away from himself, the lights coming up as the screen went dark. "Honestly! How is a man supposed to get any honest research done with all these constant interruptions?"

He beckoned Renji over with a curled finger and walked over to the upper right corner of the room. When the room had been cast in darkness this corner had been completely hidden. However, now that light filled the room, several barrels could clearly be seen there. Mayuri walked over to one and slapped his hand on top of it. "This is a failed experiment that is doing nothing constructive and is taking up far too much space! I need you to haul it out of here!"

"...What?!" Renji shouted, stomping over to the barrel. "You've got to be kidding me! This kind of work is for Squad 4! I'm not your damn garbage man!"

"Such impertinence! Are you refusing the order of a superior officer?" Mayuri asked, his expression darkening. "It's merely one barrel! Don't act as though it is an insurmountable task!"

Renji groaned but grabbed the barrel, hoisting it up onto his shoulder. "Fine! Whatever! Where do you want me to take it?"

"There is a waste disposal unit at the entrance of the lab. Put it there." Mayuri said, waving his hand. He was already losing interest in Renji, heading back to his chair.

The crimson haired Soul Reaper quickly headed for the exit. "If I stick around here much longer I'm going to put my fist through his teeth!" He thought angrily to himself. He kicked the door open and headed for the exit.

As soon as the door was closed again, Mayuri pulled the keyboard back over to him, the screen lighting up as the room darkened once more. With a swift series of keystrokes the screen showed surveillance cameras. A few more, and the entire screen was filled with Renji's form, carrying the barrel. Mayuri's finger hovered over one particular key as he watched the lieutenant make his way out of the building. The second he entered an empty hallway Mayuri pressed the button. With a loud hissing sound the barrel popped open, releasing a cloud of dark green gas into the hallway. Renji yelled out in shock, coughing loudly, the barrel falling with a clatter to the ground. Mayuri's expression remained inscrutable as he watched the gas fill the hallway. Exactly ten seconds later he pressed another button causing a series of air ducts to activate and siphon the gas out of the hallway, leaving it clear again in no time flat. Renji groaned and held his head, feeling his way along the wall with one hand. He was shaking slightly but this didn't seem to bother Mayuri in the slightest.

"Interesting..." He muttered, pulling up a smaller window within the screen, typing out his observations as he watched Renji leave the lab. Switching off the surveillance screen, Mayuri brought up yet another new window, this one showing a single red dot swiftly leaving the lab. A slightly sinister smile rose to Mayuri's face. "Let the experiment...begin!"

Renji's head was swimming. Out in the open air he slowly began to recover, but his relief was quickly replaced by anger. He turned and stared at the facility, his hands clenched into tight fists. He was tempted to run back in there and teach Mayuri a lesson, but he knew that wouldn't solve anything and it might land him in deep trouble. He settled for spitting on the ground and leaving. If he hadn't been so angry, he might have noticed a slight tingling sensation running through his body...

Grimmjow panted as his back was against his bedroom door in Hueco Mundo. They had just finished a meeting of the Espada, where their leader, Aizen, had presented some kind of pill that resulted from their research. Once he was done, having picked the creature clean, down to it's bone, he laid on his back in the sand, letting out a sigh. The pain had subdued. He could still feel the need of hunger deep within him, but for now, the pain was bearable. As he laid there, he didn't even see as his muscles began to expand, as he grew an inch or two taller in the process! His biceps bulked up a bit, adding about a half inch of mass onto his arms, as his pecs pumped out further from his body. His abs, for what they were worth, having a large hole in his stomach, tightened and pushed outward, making the hole just a tiny bit less visible in the process. Under the bottom of his arrancar pants, his thighs grew larger, which was quickly accompanied by his calves. His sandals, which had a little bit of growing room in them previously, was now filled out. Grimmjow's back not only grew taller, but grew wider as well, adding just a little more mass that would make all the difference in the long run.

Grimmjow didn't even notice the small changes. No, in fact, his mind was on what he would do now... He wasn't dead yet, which was a good sign, and now with all the unquestionable power he believed he had now, he finally decided to...

Grimmjow belched as he laid stretched out on the cold sands of Hueco Mundo. The world of Hollows was a dark and dreary world, with no sunlight of any kind shining its warmth down on the desolate landscape. This world was barren and dying. Nothing but Hollows as far as the eye could see, and even they were scarcely visible. Grimmjow had been lucky to find such prime feasting material in so short a time. It might be hours before he found something else worthy of eating. He carelessly rubbed his stomach as he heard it growl again, softly, but insistently. The young Espada stared up at the dark sky, his arms behind his head, as he tried to think of a good place to find a lot of food. There were usually roving bands of Adjuchas and Gillians around but ever since Aizen had set up camp in Las Noches, all able bodied hollows had been (and were still being) rounded up to enlist in his army. Grimmjow would be lucky to find even two or three still left. The thought made him scowl. That damn Aizen...he was so smug! Acting like he already ruled the world just because he managed to trick a bunch of stupid Soul Reapers and steal a magic ball! Big deal! There was only man who was going to be king around here and it wasn't that slick haired asshole!

Grimmjow suddenly sat up, a grin on his face. Now that he thought about it, there WAS actually a place where he could get a reliable amount of food for free! Aizen had forbidden them to ever travel to the world of the living unless they were ordered to but Grimmjow had already went against Aizen's word by stealing that experimental drug so why not add to his record before he was caught? He easily jumped to his feet and sliced through reality, opening the door to the world of the living. Getting between there and Hueco Mundo was ridiculously easy, especially for an Arrancar like himself! He had made the trip many times before. The only thing that was different about this trip was his intention. For once he wasn't going to search for a worthy opponent or create mayhem on Aizen's orders. No, this time he wanted only food. And the humans in the world of the living would be the perfect feast!

A rip in reality stretched across the sky above Karakura Town, unnoticed by all. Grimmjow stepped through and looked around, the rip slowly mending itself as he did so. His eyes fell on a wandering plus soul, a timid looking young man who seemed confused. "Heh." Grimmjow said with a grin. "A wandering soul, looking so confused. I think I'll give him a hand. Ease his suffering!"

His stomach already beginning to roar at the prospect of another meal, Grimmjow dropped to the ground in front of the soul, cornering him in a dark alleyway. The young man jumped, looking fearfully at Grimmjow who was shrouded in shadow, his glowing eyes the only thing he could see clearly. "W-Who are you? C-Can you help me? I don't know what's going on!"

Grimmjow slowly stalked forward, a feral grin on his face. "Yeah...I can help you. Just watch!"

The man turned to run but Grimmjow was too fast. He leaped onto his back and sank his teeth into his neck, ripping the jugular open in a single tug. The man fell to the ground, no blood pouring forth from the wound, just a stream of reishi. It was all the same to Grimmjow. He sucked down the spirit particles until the flow slowed. He then began to rip into the man's incorporeal flesh, his teeth and claws ripping meat from his bones, the bones themselves crunching as Grimmjow carelessly stepped on the corpse. Grimmjow ripped the man's arm clean from its socket with a sickening squelch, devouring it like a human would devour a chicken leg, going to far as to crack the bones in half and suck out the marrow.

Finally, the soul was gone, resting peacefully...in Grimmjow's belly. The arranacar licked his lips with a satisfied smirk, his hand rubbing his stomach. He once again took no notice as his body stretched another two inches taller, his muscles bulking up one by one, the hole in his abs growing smaller as the muscles around it grew larger and stronger. Grimmjow irritably rolled his shoulder, his jacket feeling tighter on him for some reason. He shoved his hands in his pockets, the material stretching and nearly tearing as he did so. "Damn human...barely filled me up!"

His stomach was still growling. The Hollow he had eaten had been a better meal than that scrawny human soul! If he wanted something meatier, he was going to have to do better than chasing down Pluses. It was night currently, the perfect time to prowl around town and pick off unwitting humans, devouring them and adding them to the collection already resting in his belly. Grimmjow had eaten a lot of souls to get to his current level but he was always on the look out for more!

As though responding to his thoughts, Grimmjow saw three burly looking men leaving a building together, laughing and carrying on, their faces flushed with drink. Grinning like the wild animal he was, Grimmjow slipped back into the shadows and began to tail them, planning on picking them off one at a time.

It was the last this the creature saw before it vanished into Grimmjow's mouth! Grimmjow gave a hard gulp, slurping up the tail as he did! He then licked his lips, and let out a quick "ahhh" before picking up another!

Grimmjow decided not to be as greedy with this one. He held it with both hands and stuck the head in his mouth. He ran his tongue over it's face, which made it whimper slightly. Grimmjow just chuckled before shoving it in a little further, letting his tongue wash over it's fat stomach. Grimmjow's head accidentally tipped back, forcing the armadillo to fall right into his throat! A large lump formed before vanishing behind his pumped chest.

Speaking of Grimmjow's body, these hollows were pumping him up quite nicely! After just those two, his pecs had pushed out so far that his nipples stuck out on either ends of his open jacket, all perked up. He was clearly getting some kind of thrill out of all this! His abs crunched together and swelled, and the hole in the center vanished a little more, only about the size of a baseball by now! What would happen once the hole vanished!? Grimmjow's arms filled out the sleeves of the jacket, putting a great strain that nearly made them tear! His broadening shoulders didn't help much either! Below the waist, Grimmjow's thighs were filling with power, pressing up against each other, as his calves struggled to keep up! Grimmjow's toes burst through the front of the sandals, finally able to breathe! Back up a little ways, Grimmjow's cock had grown immense and swollen, looking like a thick, long sausage with a dark pink tip! And behind, his ass pushed out a good inch or two, adding onto his already impressive body!

The final armadillo was the most unfortunate one of all, since he could only watch as Grimmjow grew stronger from eating his friends! It's misery would soon come to an end as Grimmjow then picked him right up! The arrancar shoved the whole thing in his mouth, and kept him there for a moment to just suck on him, enjoying the flavor. A myriad of tastes flowed through his mouth, as his hand dragged across his thick pec. This was a wonderful dessert, he had nearly forgotten what "food" tasted like! After just a few minutes, Grimmjow swallowed it down. He released his spiritual pressure, and got the treat of feeling the little creature struggle all the way down into his stomach. In fact, now he could feel all three moving and rumbling around in there! Grimmjow just laughed, giving his stomach a pat!

At that moment, Grimmjow heard a loud growl! He could see that something had blocked out the light of the moon! Without fear, the arrancar turned and saw a giant hollow, who looked very similar to the ones he had just eaten! It didn't seem to pleased about having it's friends swallowed whole for a mere treat! Grimmjow just smiled as he put one of his hands in his pocket.

"What? You wanna be next!?" Grimmjow barked at the giant thing. It held it's ground, snarling at Grimmjow. Grimmjow, on the other hand, just shook his head. "Whatever... It's your funeral!"
123321.title: The Superior Species

choices: Grimmjow grows much larger from the power of the Soul Reaper!
Grimmjow takes a nap and digests his big meal.
1233212.content:
Just as Grimmjow was about to charge the massive beast, the hollow quivered, stopping dead in its tracks. Grimmjow could already sense something was wrong, the hollow's spiritual pressure dropping to almost nothing. He growled as he saw a burst of white energy run through the hollow's body, neatly bisecting him, the two halves disappearing in a flash, leaving nothing behind except some broken pavement. Grimmjow stalked forward, looking around for whoever had just done that. He didn't have to look far. Standing on the roof of a nearby building was a young Soul Reaper sheathing his sword. The blue haired Arrancar launched himself into the air, barely having to strain his massive legs to make the jump, landing hard in front of the Soul Reaper, smashing the area around his feet from his sheer weight. Normally Grimmjow was a tall, imposing figure, but since he had started growing he had become even more intimidating. This kid Soul Reaper looked like he was about the same height as Ichigo and he only came up to the bottom of the Arrancar's thick chest, his eyes staring at the top row of Grimmjow's impressive abs. The young Soul Reaper gasped, shocked by the sudden appearance of a new enemy! He gripped the hilt of his sword and unsheathed it again, pointing it at Grimmjow's chest. The Arrancar flashed a feral grin before stepping forward. "You know, I was pissed you killed my dinner but now I can see a bright side to the situation. How about I test how strong I am now on you?"

The Soul Reaper thrust his sword forward, the tip inches from Grimmjow's chest. "S-Stay back! Don't come any closer!"

"Hey!" Grimmjow shouted, his spiritual pressure spiking in anger, forcing the Soul Reaper to his knees. "Don't you fucking talk back to me you little shit! Now listen up! What's your name?"

The boy gasped, unable to even lift his head, forced to stare at Grimmjow's thick toes poking out of his socks. "S-Shou Fujisaki!" He stammered. This was bad. Very bad! He had only recently graduated from the academy and become an official Soul Reaper. He had gone on four missions so far, all supervised. This was going to be his first on his own. It should have been simple! Go to Karakura Town, eliminate the hollow Arma Dillinger and its cohorts, and return to the Soul Society. He had just been about to open the portal back when Grimmjow had appeared from out of nowhere, a demon in the dark. Shou was easily able to identify the Arrancar Grimmjow Jaegerjaquez, member of Aizen's hollow army. He wasn't supposed to have left Hueco Mundo yet! All of the Soul Society's projections indicated that no Arrancar would move until the entire army did. Everything about this situation was wrong.

Grimmjow grinned and stepped foward, looming over Shou's crouched form. "Nice name kid. I think I'll call you something a little more appropriate though. How about dinner?" He licked his lips as he said this, drool dripping from off his teeth and landing on Shou's head like the rain of Hell. The unfortunate Soul Reaper quivered, like a frightened animal in front of a predator. Grimmjow relaxed his spiritual pressure slightly and barked out, "Stand up! NOW!"

Shou hurried to his feet and gulped, looking up at Grimmjow. Irrationally, he noticed how small Grimmjow's clothes looked on him and almost burst out laughing. He paled at the very thought. If he did that Grimmjow would tear him apart on principal! That thought killed the laughter pretty fast. Grimmjow stepped forward again, now only a few inches away from Shou, the swell of his chest blocking the shorter male from view. "Yeah...that's where you soul reaper scum below. So far under me I don't even notice you're there!"

He grinned, stepping back again. "Now lift up your sword."

Shou did as he was told, aiming the sword at Grimmjow. "That's right, just like that. Now stab me! Right in the chest!"

The young Soul Reaper's mouth dropped open. Was he...serious? Why would he leave himself open to such an attack? As though reading his thoughts, Grimmjow chuckled and said, "Don't worry, it won't kill me! Just do it! As hard as you can!"

Shou took a deep breath and moved forward, jamming his zanpakuto into Grimmjow's chest as hard as he could! The blade struck the harder than steel skin and glanced off, not leaving so much as a mark! Grimmjow laughed and said, "Yeah, that's about what I thought! Try it again."

Shou was forced to strike Grimmjow's body over and over again in a variety of ways, each blow doing nothing to harm the beastly Arrancar. When he was finally bored, and Shou's arms felt like they were going to fall off, he caught the blade in his hand and snapped it in two. "Release your zanpakuto and try again."

"M-Melt the plains and boil the oceans! Daikaji Akuma!" Shou shouted, his zanpakuto turning into a curved scimitar. With a shout he ran forward, attempting to plunge the blade into Grimmjow's chest, but once again, the blade did nothing to harm the Arrancar. Grimmjow's grin widened as he saw that this kid's zanpakuto, in all forms, was unable to so much as scratch him! The blade began to leave streaks of fire in the air, the flame type zanpakuto doing its best to harm Grimmjow. Unfortunately, he couldn't even singe his clothing! Grimmjow finally got bored and grabbed the blade again, snapping it half. "Pathetic." He said, tossing the now useless metal to the ground. "You're better off in my belly!"

Without another word, Grimmjow smashed his hand down on the Soul Reaper's head, knocking him out, his body crumpling to the ground. Crouching down, he suddenly got an idea. When he was younger, he remembered seeing a snake hollow devour a mouse hollow whole and the process had intrigued him. "I wonder..."

He opened his mouth wide and picked Shou up, shoving his head against his open mouth. Surprisingly, his jaw seemed to unhinge, his body reacting to his desire, allowing the young Soul Reaper to be taken into his mouth! Grimmjow grinned, his thick tongue dousing the young male in saliva, his hair wet down as his head reached the back of Grimmjow's throat, which immediately opened wide to accept him. It was almost comical, watching the ripped Arrancar balance his body, his legs spread wide, with his head tilted back, slowly swallowing the boy whole! A massive lump appeared in his throat as he forced the boy deeper and deeper inside him, his shoulders passing Grimmjow's lips as his head reached the halfway point in his throat! Grimmjow moaned, never having felt anything quite like this before, his throat bulging as he swallowed, hard, over and over again, eating the biggest meal whole he had ever eaten before! Once Shou's head and shoulders and passed into Grimmjow's stomach, the rest of him came easier. Soon, with a loud slurp, Grimmjow had sucked Shou's socked toes into his mouth, giving one last hard swallow, his fingers following Shou's final descent into the hollow's belly. When he was done, Grimmjow let out an enormous belch, grinning down at his now bloated stomach. "Who would have thought you miserable pieces of shit could taste so good?"
1233212.title: A Different Kind of Prey

choices: Far off into the night, a strawberry headed teen sensed a disturbance!
Grimmjow begins to wreak a little havoc on the unsuspecting Karakura Town!
12332121.content:
Just as Grimmjow pat his abs, the hole on his stomach shrunk considerably, now only about the size of a half dollar coin! His stomach had begun to gurgle, and as it did, that pregnant lump in his belly was already starting to die down, and in it's place, more mass was being added!

Grimmjow's height began to increase in small bursts! First a few inches, then a few more until he was a whole foot taller than before! His pecs popped out even further than before, the overgrown muscles unable to be contained any longer by some flimsy jacket! His arms burst forth with new strength, pumping up bigger and bigger, until they were the size of canteloupes! His abs pushed further out and were more defined, all six of them now proudly on display as his former hollow hole looked nothing more than an oversizd naval! Grimmjow let out a grunt, flexing his upper body! His expanding muscles made a huge tear in the back of the jacket that went right down the center! Grimmjow smirked, putting his hands on his hips and stretching his broad back out, making the tear even wider than it already was! Below the belt, Grimmjow's thighs had bulked up, looking as thick as tree trunks! His calves quickly followed behind, filling out with pound after pound of beautiful muscle. His feet finally shredded those tiny socks that dared to hold back such large, powerful feet! Every toe clenched before undulating and growing! His already impressive cock, that would make any man jealous, continued to grow as well, making more than just a sizeable bump in his front! It was in strict competition with his ass, which pushed out further behind him, looking both tight and bouncy at the same time!

And it didn't stop either! Grimmjow continued to grow bigger, and not just bigger, but stronger! More powerful! His spiritual pressure began to spread throughout the town! As everything slowed to a halt, Grimmow was at least half the height of a street light, and with muscles that made bodybuilders look like kids!

Grimmjow stood tall, his hands on his hip. "NGH!" He grunted, flexing every muscle on his huge body! His jacket finally tore in two, as he felt them slide down, but unable to move past his beefy biceps. "Heh... Pathetic..." He said, ripping them from his body, and leaving him completely shirtless! His body was reflected off the light above his head. His pecs so huge that they overshadowed his abs! Grimmjow smirked, bouncing each of his heavy pecs, watching each one flex and bunch up at his command.

Grimmjow looked over at the lamp post that held the street light high above him! He wrapped his hand around it, his hands just big enough to fit around! With minimal effort, he yanked it right up out of the ground! Grimmjow grinned to himself. "That guy may have been a runt... But he was a soul reaper... And that just means more power for me!" He said, taking the pole and bending it! His entire upper body seemed to double in size, his pecs flexing hard, and his biceps surging with power as he bent the pole with ease as if it was rubber! The metal wailed noisily into the night, as he then crumpled it up like paper and tossed it aside, letting it hit the nearby ground with a noisy thud!

Grimmjow began to walk off, or rather stomp off! Every step he took make the earth quiver and shake beneath his amazing power. A permanent grin was stuck on his face, as he imagined his next meal...
12332121.title: Once You Pop...

choices: Find me some food! Hollows, Soul Reapers, humans, whatever!
Worship your new master!
123321211.content:
While Grimmjow hunted in the night, far on the other side of Karakura Town, Ichigo Kurosaki was walking down the road rather irritably, a paper bag clutched in his arms. It was full to the brim of various cloths and sewing supplies. "Damn that Uryu! He's going to pay for this!"

--One Hour Ago--

"I told you already, I didn't do it!" Ichigo shouted, slamming the fridge closed, a soda in his hand.

"I know better Ichigo!" Uryu shouted, holding up a crumpled ball of paper. "You were supposed to bring my homework to me while I was out sick and THIS is all I received!"

"Look, I dropped off all your assignments in perfect condition! Whatever you did afterward is your problem!"

"Why would I ruin my own homework? Clearly YOU were just irresponsible!"

"Whatever." Ichigo said, rubbing his head. "It's not like I can do anything about it now."

"True. But you can apologize. If you do, I won't take drastic measures."

Ichigo snorted, popping open the can of soda. "Oh yeah? And just what kind of "drastic measures" can you possibly do?"

Uryu's glasses seemed to turn opaque as he turned his back on Ichigo, looking out into the living room. "Yuzu! You like playing dress up with your dolls, right?"

Yuzu, who had been watching TV, quickly nodded and said, "Oh yes! I don't have that many different outfits for them though..."

"Well it just so happens I know of an all night fabric store. If Ichigo were to go and pick up some supplies for me, I could make some new clothes for your dolls."

"Wait..what?" Ichigo said, nearly choking as he quickly swallowed the soda in his mouth.

"Oh will you Ichigo? Pretty please? For me?" Yuzu said, turning the puppy dog eyes on him.

Ichigo glared at Uryu who merely smirked in triumph and said, "Geez...Fine! Where is the stupid store anyway?"

"Oh don't worry. It's only a few miles away. Shouldn't take you more than half an hour or so." Uryu said, thrusting a piece of paper into Ichigo's hands. "Here's what I need. You WILL be paying for it all yourself of course."

"Thanks Ichigo! You're the best big brother ever!"

--Now--

"I should have known better than to trust him!" Ichigo muttered, squeezing the bag in his arms slightly.

Just as he was about to turn the corner of the street his house was on, a strange, heavy, ominous presence filled his mind, making him stop dead in his tracks. It was coming from the other side of town and was unlike anything Ichigo had ever felt before. It almost made him shake it was so intense. He ran back to the house, Uryu opening the door as he arrived, a worried look on his face. "Ichigo! Did you feel--"

Ichigo slammed the bag of supplies into Uryu's arms and said, "Stay with Yuzu. Don't leave until I come back. And make sure she stays calm!"

Uryu nodded as Ichigo ran upstairs. He burst into his room, grabbed his substitute Soul Reaper badge and slammed it into his chest, his body falling onto his bed as he leaped out the window, running over the rooftops as he made his way towards the ominous spiritual pressure. It didn't take long for him to find the source. He skidded to a halt, crouching on top of a building, his eyes widening as he saw the monstrous Grimmjow walking down the street. His every step not only caused the ground to quake, but his feet left deep footprints in the solid concrete, indicating just how dense his enormous body was! Ichigo couldn't help but gulp. The beastly Arrancar's spiritual pressure was weighing heavily down on top of him even now, while his attention was focused elsewhere. As Ichigo grabbed his sword, he couldn't stop his hand from shaking, ever so slightly. He steeled himself and unsheathed his sword, jumping down and stabbing Grimmjow directly in the back, his sword piercing the Arrancar's skin and erupting out the front of his chest!

...Is what Ichigo had hoped to accomplish.

Ichigo could only look up in horror as his sword not only failed to pierce Grimmjow but to make any noticeable mark at all! It was like the beast's skin was so dense, not even his hardest slash could hope to penetrate it! Ichigo quickly swung his sword again and again, trying to make any kind of mark on Grimmjow, completely in vain. Ichigo soon was out of breath, his sword smashing into the ground as his arm was too tired to lift it. Slowly, Grimmjow turned around, an evil grin on his face. "Well, well, well! If it isn't the little Soul Reaper!"

Ichigo grunted as he lifted his sword, smashing the point into Grimmjow's chest! Grimmjow just chuckled darkly and said, "That all you got? Even what's his name earlier put up more of a fight!" He grabbed the sword roughly in his huge hand and squeezed, the blade shattering into pieces! Ichigo gaped, stumbling as he tried to move away. Grimmjow leaned down and grabbed him roughly by the front of his robes, lifting him up to his face. A dull growl emanated from Grimmjow's stomach as he stared at Ichigo. He licked his lips, drool already leaking form between his lips. Grimmjow wiped his mouth and said, "Damn...you look good enough to eat! I wonder if you taste like strawberries!"

As soon as those words passed Grimmjow's lips, Ichigo began to struggle, kicking against Grimmjow's abs, hoping to do something, anything, to save himself! Unfortunately, Grimmjow didn't budge, even slightly. He opened his mouth wide, wider than Ichigo thought possible, and smashed his other hand into Ichigo, holding him tightly in his grasp! He began to lift Ichigo up to his mouth, his stomach gurgling, demanding more food! Soon, Ichigo's face was firmly planted on Grimmjow's tongue, his head getting soaked in saliva! Just as Ichigo's life began to flash before his eyes, Grimmjow slowly pulled him back out, staring at him again with a small grin on his face. "No...I think I can make better use of you."

"What the hell are you talking about?" Ichigo said quietly, his hear pounding in his chest.

"I won't eat you. But in return, you're going to do every damn little thing I tell you to do. As far as you're concerned you're my little bitch from now on. So thank me."

"What?!"

"I said, THANK ME! I'm being more than generous so you better fucking thank me!"

Grimmjow's face was inches from Ichigo's own, the look of a feral beast on his face. Ichigo calmly leaned in closer and said, "No."

Grimmjow looked livid. His grip tightened. But then he let Ichigo drop to the ground. "Fine...But you know something? I'll bet those little sisters of yours will make a tasty little snack."

He turned his back on Ichigo and started walking away. Ichigo saw red. He ran forward and jumped onto Grimmjow's back, wrapping his arms around the massive Arrancar's neck, squeezing as hard as he could. "You leave my sisters alone you freak!"

Grimmjow easily grabbed Ichigo's arm and pulled him off his back, punching him hard in the stomach, knocking all the wind from him. He then let Ichigo drop to the ground, smashing his big foot on top of him, pinning him down. "Then thank me~ Thank me for being so generous and get ready to be my slave and those two will never have to get hurt."

Ichigo wanted nothing more than to tear Grimmjow limb from limb, but he knew that wasn't an option. "T-Thanks..."

"Now that just won't do." Grimmjow said, pinching Ichigo's face between his big and second toe.

"Thank you for being so generous!" Ichigo shouted, trying unsuccessfully to free himself.

"Now kiss my foot." Grimmjow said with a grin.

"W-What?!"

"DO IT!"

Ichigo winced at the sheer volume of Grimmjow's voice, the giant man's spiritual pressure weighing heavily on top of him. He leaned forward and gave Grimmjow a little peck on the big toe.

"Eh, that's good enough for now." He let Ichigo up, crouching down next to him. "Now listen and listen good. You do exactly as I say, your sisters don't need to get hurt. Got it?"

"Yeah..."

"Good. Now, first things first..."

13.content: Let's start with some of the Straw Hat Pirates!
13.title: One Piece Men!

choices: Luffy grows bigger, with an appetite to match! Better keep him satisfied...
Luffy grows bigger and is pretty thirsty after eating all that meat!
The water seems to have a reverse effect on humans...Luffy begins to get smaller
131.content:
Luffy tilted his head as he gazed up at the hunk of meat sitting on the table in front of him. It was perfectly prepared by Sanji, glistened with juices in the light, and had a tantalizing scent that made the rubber man's mouth fill with a waterfall of saliva. Yet, for some inexplicable reason, Luffy hadn't so much as touched a single bite of the tempting shank in front of him. His mouth was turned down in a slight frown, his eyes seemingly blank and far away. He was clearly thinking about something but what that something was was anyone's guess.

"Hmm..." He said to himself, poking it gently with his finger. He stuck the finger into his mouth and sucked on it pensively for a moment. His eyes lit up when he realized just how amazing it tasted! Without further ado, he threw himself onto the huge chunk of meat and began to rip into it, eager to get the entire thing into his aching belly.

**Several Hours Earlier**

With a primal yell, Luffy managed to catch the horns of the oncoming bull like creature, wrestling with it before heaving it over his head, flipping the monstrous animal into a deep pool of water in front of a ruined stone structure. A tremendous wave of water was displaced as the creature sank like a stone to the bottom, dazed and quickly drowning. Luffy threw his arms triumphantly into the air, yelling out in victory as the water cascaded over him, leaving him soaked to the bone, but refreshed and happy. He jogged over to the edge of the pool and looked down into it.

"Woah! This is so cool!" He said excitedly, noticing that the pool of water was so clear that the excitable captain could see all the way to the very bottom. The creature as not moving, its eyes closed with not even a single bubble rising to the surface. It was clearly dead. Luffy grinned and said, "Well, you put up a really good fight! But I'm getting pretty hungry and you did attack me first!"

He pulled his arm back and launched it forward, his hand closing into a fist around one of the creature's horns. With a huge pull, he managed to yank the animal out of the water and in a heap next to him. "Whew! This thing is heavier than I thought!"

Luffy was about to drag the thing back to the ship when he remembered the reason he had come all the way out here. He was supposed to be looking for water! The four gourds tied to a harness around his chest were a constant reminder of that and yet Luffy still had almost forgot! He quickly began unstrapping them, dunking them into the clear water. Since the pool hadn't made him feel weak, it was clear that there as no sea water in it, making it safe to drink. He filled the four gourds up and then strapped them back into their places on his harness before grabbing the creature's horns again.

"Huh? What the...?" Luffy said to himself. His hands, which had been able to perfectly enclose around the horns, now barely reached halfway around them. "I guess this guy's bigger than I thought he was!"

Luffy happily dragged the animal back to the ship, though it seemed to get progressively harder the longer he did it. It almost seemed as if the animal was getting bigger or heavier as Luffy moved! But that was insane. Nothing like that could ever happen. Still, Luffy was suspicious of it even after he had managed to get it on the ship and everyone (well, everyone who was currently on the Thousand Sunny anyway) praised him for his amazing catch. It was for this reason that Luffy had been reluctant to eat the meat, despite it being a perfect specimen of culinary delight.

**Present Time**

Luckily, that was no longer an issue. Luffy had swiftly devoured the meat, leaving nothing but a picked clean bone in his wake. Sighing happily, he leaned back in his creaking chair and rubbed his bulging belly. "Man that was awesome! I hope Sanji cooks more of this guy fast!"

Luffy belched loudly and heaved himself to his feet, grabbed the bone and tossing it over the edge of the ship. Certain fish would break it open to get at the marrow, something that Luffy was not interested in. His stomach began to churn and gurgle as it worked on breaking down the meat. Luffy had no idea that the water that the creature had swallowed in its panic had physically altered it, making it bigger and stronger even in the throes of its death. The water that now currently was contained in the Going Merry's water supply and which had saturated the creature that was still stored in the kitchen. No one on the Going Merry, however, was any the wiser.

As Luffy headed down to the kitchen to bum more meat off of Sanji (or so he hoped), his body was slowly beginning to undergo a strange and wonderful change.
131.title: With Water Like This, Who Needs Milk?

choices: Luffy's thirsty... Some water sounds good!
Sanji returns... And he's pissed!
Luffy runs to hide, which he starts to find difficult...
1311.content:
Luffy was walking about the Thousand Sunny, yawning lightly. This afternoon sun was casting it's spell on him, and Luffy wasn't exactly one to refuse! He walked around the deck a little, before taking a shady spot up against a wall. He set his cool hat, which smelled of his hair, over his face, and closed his eyes. It didn't take long for the young man to fall fast asleep.

As Luffy slept, his body started to go through small changes. His shoulders spread out wider, his traps bumping up slightly to give him a more intimidating look. His biceps swelled out, becoming round softballs of muscle. His forearms beefed up, giving him unquestionable grip. His pecs started to push out at his red vest putting a slight strain on the first gold button. No one could quite see it, but his abs tightened up and became much more defined and hard. His thighs started to thicken up, filling with muscle, followed by his swollen, taut calves. His feet grew too large for his sandals, the straps handing on for life, as his large toes hung over the edge. Luffy started growing taller and stronger altogether, becoming more imposing and threatening in the process! As if that wasn't enough, Luffy's pride and joy started to spring out, becoming a long, thick 10 inch pole, enough to make any man jealous! All the while, Luffy had a silly little grin on his face, drooling and giggling in his sleep.

No one seemed to notice their enlarged captain as he slept soundly, his chest rising and falling slightly as he slept soundly. Luffy got a good two or three hour nap in, but as he slept, Sanji began to cook up more of that strange creature that Luffy it had caught. Looks like it would be the main course tonight! Not to mention he wasn't even cooking it all, there was plenty left! It didn't take long for that mouthwatering scent to reach up, and across Luffy's nose. Luffy laughed again, as that little stream of drool had practically become a gushing waterfall!. Luffy's eyes fluttered open, as he began to wake up.

"H-Hey! I'm blind!" Luffy shouted, flailing his arms around, before realizing his hat was still covering his face. He slid it back up to his hair, and giggled to himself. "Oops!" Before he could revel in his moment any longer, that scent soon struck his nose once again! Luffy seemed to float in midair as he was led to the kitchen below the decks.

Luffy soon wandered into the kitchen without a sound, hiding behind the table as he peeked over to see if Sanji was done yet. It was astounding he could even move silently. Sanji soon wandered out of the kitchen for a moment, not even noticing Luffy as he walked out! Luffy got up and started heading for the stove, when he heard a click. He looked back at the door, and heard someone speaking.

"There... This lock should keep Luffy out..." Sanji said to himself, before putting the key off and walking away. For him, a slightly burnt dinner was better than no dinner, which is what they would be having if Luffy got inside! Little did the blonde chef know was that the very person he was trying to keep out, he had trapped IN.

Luffy grinned to himself. "Stupid Sanji." He said in a playful manner. He then turned his attention back on the meat, which was cooked rare at this point in time. Luffy quickly snatched a slab of it up, the fat still popping from heat. Not even hot to his skin, he tossed it carelessly into his mouth, and started to chew it up, doing his best to rush and enjoy the flavor in equal parts. Getting lost in the rush, he snatched up another slab, and another, eating more than his fair share in the process!

Before he knew it, the grill was cleaned out. The rubber man licked each and every one of his fingers clean, before realizing his deed. "Aw man, Sanji's gonna yell at me...!" He groaned. Last thing he wanted was a beating and a lecture. He dashed for the door, and pulled at it. With his new musculature, and his already admirable strength, he easily snapped the door right off! "Awesome!" Luffy laughed, unaware of his changes. With that, he dashed out of the kitchen, just managing to escape the wrath of a chef...
1311.title: Insatiable as Ever...

choices: Sanji finds Luffy and is shocked by his growth!
Zoro and Franky start noticing their changes...
13113.content:
Luffy was an incredibly strong fighter, a fearless captain, and a man who faced any danger with a smile on his face. However, he was not about to stay and face Sanji's wrath! Especially since they were in the middle of the ocean and Sanji tended to try and toss him overboard whenever he got extremely pissed off. Luffy decided that the best course of action would be to hide until the trouble blew over.

Luffy had barely made it down to the end of the hallway when Sanji returned from the bathroom, drying his hands on a towel. 1311322121221111212121.title: A Growing Threat

13113221212211112121211.content:
For the first couple minutes, Luffy stood proud over the ocean, happy that he could touch the clouds, that he could see everything, and not to mention crush anything! Yes, life was great for our straw hat hero, that is until one insurmountable obstacle seemed to arise.

Luffy was bored.

Once he grew bored of standing, he laid on his back in the water, floating bigger than any boat ever made! He splashed around now and again, sprinkling water around as he did. The giant captain didn't even know that these little movements were channeling water from the gyser into a current that led right to Redport! Franky's defenses might have stopped unwanted guests, but he couldn't quite stop nature!

"Zoro!" Luffy said, getting down closer to the swordsman. To Zoro, Luffy's voice was like standing with your ear pressed to a megaphone!

"Owww! Geez, what is it Luffy!?" Zoro asked, looking a bit spitefully up at Luffy.

"I'm bored!" Luffy said simply, looking down at Zoro. He was about the size of a mouse compared to Luffy.

"Yeah? What do you want me to do about it? I'm busy guarding the waters for you." Zoro answered. At this exact moment, he spotted a ship! He plucked it up, a smile rising to his face as he heard screams upon the ship. Hell, he even saw a few little dots jumping overboard! Zoro gave them a shred of mercy, and let them plunge into the waters below before crushing their ship between his pumped pecs like it was made of paper maché!

"See?! Like that!" Luffy said, "I don't get to do anything!" Luffy said, beginning to whine.

Zoro sighed, dragging his hand along his face. "You're the one who wanted to be captain. I'm just following your orders."

"Yeah, but when Franky gets done, there won't be anything left for you to do!" Luffy replied rather quickly! Zoro's eyes popped open a little. Luffy was right for once! Zoro then just sighed again, probably going to regret his next words...

"Fine, I'll play with you when he's done..." Zoro said.

"Nuh-uh!" Luffy replied, "I'M gonna be the one who's playing with YOU!"

---------------------------

Meanwhile, back in Redport, Smoker was slick sucking down every drop of water he could get! The already massive officer continued to grow beefier by the second! His stomach was swollen like a beach ball, filled to the brim with water! It shrank a little at times, only to be replaced by twice as much water! Smoker had grown so tall, that his feet could touch the ocean floor near the port! The rest of the navy could only watch on as their commander continued to grow and grow! His back was slowly becoming an insurmountable wall, while a canyon of rippling muscle trailed down his back! His pecs were twice the size of houses, and his arms were gigantic boulders packed with pure size! His abs were non-existant at this time, hidden beneath a giant, bloated stomach of water!

Standing tall, the water barely reached below Smoker's naval. At times, he'd stop, just to fight through the sleepiness he was feeling, and in doing so, he seemed to be growing bigger at a much faster rate! But even at his great size, he would barely come up to even Sanji's chest! A fierce look on his face, Smoker would then lower himself back into the water, opening his mouth wide and gulping down countless gallons of water, and even some fish in the process!

"Bigger..." Smoker thought to himself, "BIGGER! I won't stop until I can crush those filthy pirates under my foot! They'll be kissing my toes, BEGGING for mercy!" Smoker thought. "I'll grow until I can hold this entire planet safely in my hands!" Smoker then grunted as he felt his body surging upward, not to mention he was feeling even heavier as his already massive muscles grew bigger and mightier! Smoker didn't want to stop until there was no one who could stand above him!
13113221212211112121211.title: The Smoking Gum

choices: Smoker's growth starts to pick up speed, putting him on par with Luffy!
Zoro spots the growing Marine and reports it to Luffy!
131132212122111121212111.content:
Smoker, panting slightly, was just about to move down closer to the water for another guzzling session when something huge landed just off the coast of Redport, sending a massive tidal wave over the island! The men guarding the pier let out a cry of anguish as they were swept suddenly away, the water flooding areas of the town as well! Smoker saw this and growled, his growl turning into a somewhat sensual grunt as his body surged taller and wider, the water level now reaching his knees. He had easily withstood the tidal wave and crossed his arms, facing what had landed outside his fair city.

Sanji's self assured grin, which he had been wearing when he swooped down over the island, faltered as he saw Smoker glaring at him, equal to him in height! He had been looting all the neighboring islands of their food for the last few hours and had met absolutely zero resistance. The inhabitants were like bugs to him, not even worth thinking about! Some of the islands had honest born giants on them as well, but even they were more like toddlers than fierce warriors! He had gotten complacent and now he was faced with a far greater threat! Smoker at normal size, with his Devil Fruit powers, was a force to be reckoned with. Sanji hesitated, holding the back of food he had so far gathered tightly in his fist. He flung the sack over his shoulder and said, "Well, guess I'm actually going to have to try this time!"

Smoker flexed his biceps, his chest bulging out as he glared at Sanji. "You're not taking a step past this shore line pirate!"

Sanji snorted and said, "Fat chance! I've gotten used to being this huge! You're new. I doubt you've even adjusted to how heavy you are now!"

Smoker hesitated now. Sanji had a point. He had been so focused on growing bigger he hadn't taken the time to try and acclimate himself to his new size. Would he be too slow to fight? Would his movements be slow and clumsy? As he thought Sanji quietly tried sneaking up behind him, lifting one leg out of the water. With a swift vibration, Sanji's leg burst into flame! He kicked out, hard, his bare foot slamming into Smoker's back, sending him flying forward, head fist into the water! Sanji chuckled and said, "Too easy! But I'd better be fast!"

He turned his back on Smoker, expecting him to be paralyzed and sinking to the bottom of the ocean. He would soon learn, however, how wrong he was. Smoker gasped as his body hit the water, sucking in a tremendous amount of water and causing him to nearly choke. Under the surface, he opened his mouth wide and began to drink, the water level actually lowering slightly as he filled his aching gut with more and more water, his belly actually stretching out a few inches past its normal limits.

Sanji, totally unaware of this, stood tall on the edge of the city and shouted, "Alright you bugs! Listen up! Captain Luffy has ordered me to gather food for him to feast on and as you can imagine, he's a growing boy and needs a lot of food! So I want you to gather every scrap of food you can find and bring it to me! If I find you're holding out even a single grain of rice, I'll not only destroy this entire island, sinking it into the ocean, I'll gather up each and everyone of you and add you to Luffy's meal! So get to it!"

The citizens of Redport, not wanting to end up as food, all rushed about to obey Sanji, creating a pile of food in the center of the town that grew larger and larger and larger! Sanji kicked back and watched the bugs scurry, a big smile on his face. This was the life~

His good mood was interrupted, however, by a strange rumbling that ran throughout the entire town, causing everyone to pause as they tried to discover what it was...earthquakes weren't common here on the island after all. All their questions were answered when a gigantic series of what appeared to be strange white trees rose from the water, followed by an enormous peach colored wall. Two gigantic eyes surfaced next, followed by a massive nose, and a titanic grin, the head of Smoker staring at Sanji with murder in his eyes. Sanji gaped as more and more of Smoker's tremendous body came into view, the slope of his gigantic chest sending a torrent of water over the city, his nipple decimating a dock without him even noticing! The citizens cheered as their savior rose from the ocean like a god, his abs rising next, followed by his thick horse cock, the massive purple head crashing through a mountain as it swung, slapping against his meaty thigh. Higher and higher he rose until his toes had broke the surface, his right foot alone the same size as the island! Truly Smoker was a sight to behold! He stretched and let out a groan, cracking his knuckles as he stared down at Sanji. The cracking echoed over the island like thunder. Sanji could feel his legs shaking, unable to move as Smoker's god like hand reached down and snatched him up off the island. He brought him up to his face and growled out, "I think I can handle my size just fine."

Sanji gulped and didn't say anything. Smoker didn't expect him to. Any words right now would be completely wasted on him. "Normally I'd let the World Government decide your fate, probably end up throwing you into Impel Down where you belong. But at your size, and with the destruction you and your crew have caused, I'm going to have to mete out punishment on my own."

"W-What are you going to do?!" Sanji shouted, terrified of what his fate might be but refusing to show it.

Smoker's stomach growled loudly, answering Sanji's question for him. "I'm going to put you in the one place more terrifying than Impel Down. My stomach!"

He tilted his head back and opened his mouth wide, dropping Sanji carelessly down onto his thick, wide tongue, coating the chef in his saliva. His teeth clicked shut, sealing the tiny pirate's fate. The massive tongue tip flicked Sanji in the head, dazing him and causing him to lose his grip. He quickly slid backwards down the tongue and fell into the hole at the back of Smoker's throat, the gigantic Marine swallowing, Sanji making a tiny lump that traveled down his throat, quickly depositing him into the stomach. Unfortunately for him, all of the water that Smoker had guzzle had already passed into the man's system, leaving nothing but stomach juices behind.

Smoker belched slightly and bent down, speaking in a low voice. "I'm going to spend a little more time preparing before I go take care of the Strawhats. I'm sorry for any damage I've caused. Talk to Tashigi and she'll organize some money to pay you back."

Smoker could barely register the tiny citizen's cheers as he turned around, crouching down and gulping down even more water. If he was going to take down Luffy, he still had a ways to go!

As Zoro stood there, however, he failed to notice someone even BIGGER slowly rising up behind him! The cries of the people below didn't go unnoticed. There was no contest. Smoker was an unstoppable beast! He began to tread water around the island, a task easily done by someone his size, making his way to Zoro! Every step made a small quake on the ocean floor, and every movement sent waves crashing into the island! Smoker loved every second of it. Smoker licked his lips, his hand slowly rubbing up and down his swollen gut. It had been even more satisfying taking down Zoro, someone who had given such grief to his subordinate in the past. Smoker's mind briefly returned to the now nearly microscopic people he was leaving behind, all in the name of the great good, and looked down at the island at his feet. He could just barely make out a high pitched squeak, what was literally thousands of voices cheering him on in unison. The island that housed Redport was now smaller than his big toe, barely visible over the magnificent swell of Smoker's nearly unparalleled chest. He nodded, his face a mask of seriousness and said, "Enough waiting. Enough preparing. It's time to finally end this nightmare once and for all!" His voice never rose above a whisper, and yet everyone on the island heard him clear as day, his voice rumbling lowly making the very island shake, every citizen feeling that profound bass voice vibrating in at the core of their beings. It was a feeling of warmth and protection and only made them cheer louder. Smoker felt uplifted by this show of confidence, turning his back on the mini island and heading into the deeper waters, heading straight for the Strawhat compound.

While this was going on, Luffy was still sleeping soundly, his snores like thunder, heard round the world. Those feelings had slowly been disappearing as first Sanji and then Zoro went missing. His worst fears were confirmed as he saw Smoker getting closer and closer. "I've...I've got to warn Luffy!"

The human shaped reindeer dived into the water, leaving his little lab on top of one of the completed fortifications and swam as fast as he could towards Luffy. "LUFFY! LUFFY! WE'RE UNDER ATTACK!" He shrieked as loudly as he could, hoping to break through the haze of Luffy's tiredness. It was no use, however. Luffy was impossible to wake up when they were both normal sized. Now that Luffy was several times Choppers size it was like an ant trying to wake a human. Chopper, who had been one of the biggest giants, had been slightly left behind, Sanji, Zoro, and Franky getting upgrades from Luffy to assist in their work. Since all Chopper had to do was experiment with the water, he had been kept consistent at his size. He was bug like compared to Luffy and therefore bug sized compared to Smoker who had managed to reach Luffy's lofty height! "Oh no...Oh no!" Chopper worried, paddling around by Luffy's feet, looking around for Franky. "FRANKY! Where are you?!"

"Woah, what's with all the noise little reindeer gorilla?" Franky asked, suddenly looming over the wall, raising an eyebrow. He was about half Luffy's size, needing to be enormous to work on the containment walls. Chopper waved his arms frantically, babbling as he tried to explain himself. "Slow down, slow down! What's up?"

Chopper took a few deep, calming breaths and said, "Smoker! He's coming!"

Franky chuckled and said, "So what? He can't compete with us! He must be like, a germ by now!"

"N-No! Just look!" Chopper insisted, pointing out to sea.

Franky just chuckled and looked up, his smile disappearing as he saw the titan approaching. "SHIT! Alright! Time to put my SUPER defenses to work!"

He dove under the water, a gigantic, water proof control panel situated at the base of the containment wall. He slammed a big red button, making a series of sirens go off, disturbing Luffy enough to cover his ears before falling back to sleep. The walls began to close, a ceiling rising up and covering the entire area, making a protective cocoon. Once the place was properly sealed, a massive cannon popped out of the wall, aimed directly at the approaching Marine! Smoker stopped as he saw it, bracing himself! With an earth shattering KABOOM the cannon fired off a lead ball, bigger than dozens of islands combined, heading straight for Smoker! The colossus gritted his teeth and caught the ball, sliding back in the water, his enormous pecs cushioning the blow like a pillow, his massive arms slowly crushing the ball! With a crack that could split the heavens, the ball shattered, the pieces raining down into the water around Smoker's legs, causing tidal waves to overrun several more islands in the vicinity.

"You'll have to try harder than that you scum!" Smoker roared, issuing a challenge that would not be denied!

The battle of titans had truly begun!

Chopper, too busy musing over the possibilities and eager to run experiments again, was completely unprepared as Smoker elbowed him in the gut, following it up with a punch across the face, ending with a boot to the chest, knocking him down, crashing into one of the pillars surrounding the geyser. "Sorry kid. But I'm not going to lose here!"

Chopper struggled to his feet, the protective armor dented slightly, but still holding! Franky had built it to be impenetrable to normal sized humans. No one on the planet could hope to crack it except for any of the Strawhats...and now Smoker. If the possibility of an enemy giant had even occurred to him Smoker would have had no chance of succeeding. As it was, it wouldn't take much more to break into the geyser! Smoker shoved Chopper aside and slammed his meaty fists into the cocoon over and over again, the metal squealing and shrieking as it began to bend inward. Chopper let out a roar and jumped on Smoker's back, slamming him against the metal shell. He grabbed the back of Smoker's head and slammed it over and over again into the metal, dazing the Marine captain, forcing him to stumble back! Smoker lashed out wildly, striking Chopper a few times, but doing no lasting damage. Chopper held on tenaciously, his heels digging into Smoker's gut, trying to force him to puke Franky back up!

Smoker kept his abs tense, flexing them with the same instinct that he normally used to keep his body in its smoky element, refusing to let anyone escape from his belly! Chopper's focus was once again his downfall as Smoker managed to rip him from his back, throwing him against the shell as hard as he could! With an almighty crack heard around the globe, the metal shell fell apart, revealing the geyser in all its glory! Smoker quickly started making his way over to it. "At last! I can put all of this to an end!"

He had barely taken three steps, however, before he was stopped by something!
