132.content:
The Thousand Sunny was resting in the port of a small, yet active town. It was here that the Straw Hat crew was stocking up before setting back out. Luffy had nearly exhausted the entire food supply, Chopper and Franky needed more raw materials, and Robin had ran out of reading material. Everyone had their reasons for going to market, except one man. That man was none other than Roronoa Zoro.

Zoro laid out on the beach, his eyes closed as he listened to the soft lull of the waves, and the seagulls flying lazily in the sky. There were a few people visiting the beach, but as long as none of them bothered Zoro, he wouldn't bother them either. Unfortunately for him, that wasn't going to happen today.

As Zoro laid there, his peace was interrupted when wave after wave of sand was carelessly kicked in his face! Zoro sputtered before immediately sitting right up, looking for his offender! A tall, brown haired man walked right off, paying no mind to Zoro! Zoro sprung right up and chased after the man, tapping his shoulder.

"Hey!" He said in a gruff tone, clearly displeased. The man turned around. His eyes were sort of... Glazed. He had a bit of an aura of stupidity to him.

"Whuh?" The careless stranger asked Zoro, looking down at him. It was at this moment Zoro saw that this man was at least a foot, if not a foot and a half, taller than him! Not to mention he had a body that rivaled that of a heavyweight bodybuilder! He had a volleyball tucked under his right arm as he looked down at the moss headed man.

"You kicked sand in my face." Zoro said sternly. One of his eyes was still closed tight, irritated by some of the sand.

"So? What's a sack of bones like you gonna do?" The man asked, giving Zoro's shoulder a shove. Such power! Zoro was actually pushed back a few inches!

"So? Apologize!" Zoro barked at him, "Now!"

"I ain't apologizing for nothing!" The man replied. He tossed the ball behind him and gave Zoro a more forceful shove, knocking him to the ground! "Especially to some scrawny little dwarf like you!" He stomped his foot hard on Zoro's chest, winding the brave swordsman. "How 'bout you just get off my beach, thin mint?" The man gave Zoro an extra kick of sand before turning around and resuming his game with his friends. Zoro soon sat up, wiping his face off.

"Worthless punk..." Zoro grumbled as he got to his feet. He turned and made his way into town, still steamed over the whole incident. As he walked through town, he saw a few of his friends, but he didn't bother meeting up with them. Right now, he prefered to be alone. As he walked along aimlessly, he feet had ended up dragging him into a blacksmith of sorts. As he wandered in, there were a few others wandering within. Someone would have greeted him, but the cashier, as well as the owner, were busy talking. Zoro idly listened in on the conversation.

"Listen, I don't care WHERE you dump it, just get rid of it!" The man told him. "I'm not going to sacrifice my reputation over a stupid cursed sword!" Zoro's ears perked up! He heard someone's footsteps, and as he turned his eyes, he saw someone leaving the store! Without drawing any attention to himself, Zoro casually walked out of the store, and began to tail the man.

Out on the streets of the market, the man was walking, holding the supposed "cursed" sword in a large cloth over his shoulder. It wouldn't be too hard to just take it from him, but then he'd risk looking like a theif! It was best to just keep on following him, and wait until he dumped the sword off before snatching it up for himself! Zoro followed the man all the way down the street, and soon realized that this was the exact same way he had come up! The young man soon led Zoro back to the port where the Thousand Sunny was located. The man wandered off onto the pier, looking left and right, before tossed the sword into the water, and sprinting off! He dashed right past Zoro, not even noticing him! Zoro walked up to the water and took his shirt off. Zoro had a dazzling physique, that comparable to a model! His tanned skin accentuated his sexiness, while the scar along his body gave him a manly air. Without wasting another second, Zoro dove in after the sword! The water was cold, and Zoro had to be quick before the sword sunk down too deep to reach! His muscular arms pushed him further and further down, and in mere seconds, he spotted the sword! Pushing himself just a little bit harder, he managed to swim down and clasp it in his arms! Tucking it under one arm, he used his other to swim back up to the surface... And just in time too! His lungs were starting to feel the strain of not having air...

Zoro tossed the sword up onto the stone pier before pulling himself up. He sat there for a moment, taking in big breaths of air to recouperate. As he sat there, he heard a dull growling! He turned around, but no one was there! The noisy growl echoed again, but this time, Zoro could see the package containing the sword beginning to rumble! Zoro picked up the sword, and unraveled the cloth. There stood the sheathed sword. It gave off an eerie purple aura. Zoro couldn't help but notice the mystical seal on the sheath, which was holding the sword and it's container together! Zoro didn't mind much. He was fearless! Without a second thought, he pulled the sword from it's cage, breaking the seal! Zoro could hear the growling much louder now, watching as the sword shook before him! The metal was black as a moonless night, and reflected the shine of the setting sun off it's dark blade.

"You..." A deep voice bellowed. Zoro rose an eyebrow. "I am what mortals call a muramasa. My name is Kinninusu..."

"Huh... So a talking sword, eh?" Zoro said, holding it sideways. He gave it a slash, getting a feel for it's weight.

"You seek power... Yes?" The sword then asked.

"Huh? What're you talking about? What would you know?" Zoro asked, "You're just a sword."

"All men crave power. Power is what rules this world. And I can give you that power. All of it." Kinninusu replied.

"Yeah? And jus how are you going to do that?" Zoro asked, obviously suspicious of the sword.

"That much is easy. I am not a sword that cuts. I drain." Kinninusu replied, "Slash anyone with me, and their energy will drain, and fill you up, making you bigger and stronger! Unlimited power is yours to wield!"

"That right?" Zoro asked, holding the sword up high as he now stood. "Guess you're pretty useful!"

"Kehkehkeh... Yes... My master..." He replied.

Zoro chuckled. "Alright, I'll give you a shot! And I think I know just the person..."

Zoro turned and made his way...

1412.content:
It was a splendid summer day on Mount Paozu. The birds were chirping, the sun was shining and there was a gentle breeze blowing that offset the high temperature perfectly. All the creatures, big and small, were out and about, taking advantage of it. Some, however, were taking advantage of it in an altogether different manner. Inside the Son household, there was completely silence except for a loud snore coming from one of the bedrooms and the soft sound of rushing water coming from the bathroom. The Son house was small, with only as many rooms as was strictly necessary. Two bedrooms, one for Goku and Chi-Chi and the other for Goten and Gohan to share, one bathroom (mostly for Chi-Chi and Gohan now that he was old enough to have experiences with indoor plumbing via school and friend's houses), one kitchen, and one living room for down time (Chi-Chi being, again, the only person to get much use out of it. Gohan used his room and friend's houses while Goku and Goten preferred being outside). While Goku was taking a nap after having gone fishing and bathing afterward, Gohan had recently come home from school and was taking a shower in the bathroom. Everything was calm...right up until the door was suddenly flung open and Goten came rushing in. He dropped something carelessly on the dinner table before running as fast as he could to his father's room.

"Daddy! Daddy!" He shouted, jumping on top of the slumbering Goku. "I'm home!"

Goku jumped and let out a little yell, looking around wildly before seeing Goten. He smiled and sat up, picking Goten up at the same time. "Hey Goten! Did you have fun over at Trunks' house?"

Goten giggled as his father set him down on the floor. "Yeah! It was tons of fun! We trained for awhile and I almost beat him this time in a sparring match! It was so cool! You should have seen the look on his face!"

"Sounds great!" Goku said enthusiastically, standing up and hunting around for his clothes. He had been napping in a pair of boxers and nothing more. He was allowed to be more lax whenever Chi-Chi wasn't around and since she was spending the month with her father in her old village the Son men could act in any way they wanted! Gohan took care of all the domestic chores along with doing his homework. It was a lot for an average high school kid but he could more than handle it. Gohan was one of the lucky few to be gifted with brains AND brawn. Goku was soon dressed in his standard orange gi, matching his son Goten. Father and son then made their way to the kitchen to start looking for something to eat. Goku always had a bit of an appetite after taking a nap. Before he could search the cupboards for anything to snack on before dinner, however, he noticed a strange looking gun of some kind on the table. Curious, he went over to it, picking it up to examine it more closely.

"Hey Goten?" He asked, turning to his son who was standing on top of the counter to reach the higher cupboards. "Do you have any idea what this is?"

Goten glanced over his shoulder and said, "Yeah! That's something Trunks gave me to try out! He said it's a...a...Matter...E...E...Exp...I can't remember what he called it. There were too many big words! He said you just have to set it and then point it at something and fire to make it work."

Goku scratched his head. He couldn't make heads or tails of the strange thing. There was a switch of some kind on the side that could be flicked up or down. It was currently in the middle. Goten, a box of cereal in his hands, suddenly grabbed the gun and flicked the switch up. "There! He said to make sure it was up first."

"And you don't remember anything else he said about it?" Goku asked, clumsily pointing the gun. He had next to no experience when it came to hand held weaponry. The closest he had come to it was when he had fought opponents who used guns. All he knew was that if he or any of his friends or family members got shot (except perhaps Chi-Chi) they would survive with little damage. It came with having a powerful alien heritage. It was because of this that he wasn't exactly using proper gun safety as he waved it around, looking for something to shoot.

Goten shook his head and said, "He just said that something cool happens when you shoot something with it."

Goku shrugged, aimed it at random and pulled the trigger.

As he looked behind himself, he saw Goten sitting there, pouring out some cereal into a bowl for a midday snack. Looks like he didn't even notice the bright beam shoot out! Goku sighed. That probably would have scared him, so it was best he didn't see it anyway. However, Goku immediately began to feel a change within him.

What was left that Goku couldn't feel didn't mean it wasn't growing as well! Goku's already meaty thighs seemed to grow in little explosions that made them a whole inch bigger! His calves became even bigger, making his pants feel quite tight all around. Thankfully the saiyan was barefoot, for even his feel began to stretch and expand into two large stomping machines. "Uh, Goten, I'm going to head back to my room real quick..." He said to his son, already halfway out the doorway. "I forgot... Underwear!" He said, trying to think of an excuse.

Goku pulled down on the torn collar, looking at his bulging pec as it flopped out of the cloth. Goku grinned. "Wow! I look even more powerful than before!"

Just then, Goku looked down at the gun that he had set down on the desk of the mirror. He was already this strong now... Why not get even stronger!?

It was his greatest joy to be able to train his body more and more under harsher and harsher conditions in order to build up his body, his muscles bulging just a little bit bigger, his clothes becoming just a bit tighter, and fighting off opponents that, even months earlier in his life, would have been able to easily take him out. Even the gods of the universe couldn't hold a candle to his fighting strength. Vegeta stood there, tall and proud, flexing one of his arms, enamored as he saw it bulge upward, pushing the veins right up against his skin! Vegeta just chuckled to himself, his deep voice rumbling from within him! The conceited man would have kept admiring himself if it wasn't for all the noise that was happening behind him! Otherwise his huge, ballooned pecs stood right in the way!

"Hello there, worms." Vegeta said with a grin, "I see you all have noticed your prince... No... Your GOD standing before you." Vegeta said with a confident smirk. "I'll tell you what... If you all get on your knees and worship me, I won't crush the life out of every last one of you!"

Much to Vegeta's dismay, he didn't see anyone obeying. All they seemed to do was chatter, too shocked to do anything! Vegeta's smile soon became a frown.

"No? Then I'll crush you under my foot like the bugs you are!" Vegeta growled! He stood back up to his full height once more. The people below only got a moment of sun before they were coated in the shadow of the titanic man's foot! "Bye bye bugs!" Vegeta's boomed, before bringing his foot down hard onto the ground below! It made a huge quake, that shook buildings all around, bringing them quickly to the ground! Vegeta just laughed to himself, as he ground his foot into the concrete below! He then looked out to the city. "If you all won't fall to your knees before your saiyain god, I'll just MAKE you!" Vegeta said, taking a big stomp forward into the city!

Countless buildings were smashed under Vegeta's gargantuan feet! His heel would decimate buildings, as his massive toes would crush cars like they were made of paper! Vegeta laughed, his voice echoing throughout the entire city! He stomped through, picking up a handful of small buildings and people, before mercilessly tossing them into his mouth and swallowing them whole! An ominous gulp was heard by many nearby citizens, striking fear into their hearts!

"Not the most delicious food I've tasted..." Vegenta then pat his canyon-like abs, "But it satisfies me...!" Vegeta reached down for another handful, raising it to his gaping maw before tossing it in and swallowing it down! Vegeta then chuckled, wiping some debris from his lips.

The giant saiyan looked down and started to stomp around, demolishing more buildings than a tornado, earthquake, and tsunami combined! Vegeta was an unstoppable force that terrorized the city! And he loved every second of it!

"Bow to me! Your master! Your unstoppable ruler!" Vegeta rose his arms up and flexed them HARD! His biceps welled up to the size of small mountains, pumped with a split peak at the top! His pecs were heaving slightly as he stood there, each a giant orb of pure power. "None of you can stand up to me! I am all powerful! I AM A GOD!" Vegeta roared! He then had a thought as he flaunted his strength. Why stop here? Why just one city? Why not two? Or entire countries? Or the entire world!? Vegeta's massive dick twitched slightly as he imagined himself ruling over the entire earth with one large, powerful fist! He smiled, and turned back to where Capsule Corp. once stood. He wanted to confront his son, and force him to make him even bigger!

Goku picked the gun back up and aimed it at the mirror. "I guess... Just one more shot can't hurt!" He said to himself, taking aim at his image. "Here we go!" He said happily, pulling the trigger! From what Goten could see, his father was getting taller and taller, his head slowly starting to approach the ceiling! His back was stretching out even further apart, a slight tear forming at the top of Goku's gi near the back of his neck! Goten was but a witness to his father, hulking out before his very eyes! Out front, Goku's pecs were starting to swell out, the already thick muscles deepening and putting on pure mass. The collar of his gi was pushed even further down, giving all a look at those bulging, round muscles. Goku's sleeves were quickly filling up to the point they were ready to rip! The cloth lied upon the peak of his bicep, and was just begging for him to flex and tear it right down the center! Such massive, powerful arms, only made even more so by his saiyan blood!

"D-Dad... You're getting huge!" Goten said, getting excited as he watched his dad ascend!

"Goten! Not so loud!" Goku said in a loud whisper to his son, who was getting smaller compared to him by the second! Goku's impressive abs were bulking up even too, each one popping out into a hard brick of muscle, forming a long, cobblestone road of muscle! Below the belt, Goku's thighs had grown so large that they were starting to rub together! They were starting to tear his pants at the seams, his skin peeking out from between the holes it was making! The bottoms of his pants were starting to ride up, making the once baggy pants look like a tight pair of khakis! Each calf was a pillar of muscle that was only getting bigger! His feet were starting to get painfully tight inside his boots, ready to burst out if they grew much bigger! As if it wasn't enough, Goku's manhood was pushing out further, forming a nice, big pouch in front of him! It was a dick to be proud of, that would make any man jealous of its size! And right behind him, his round, globular ass was popping out even more, making for two beachballs that were just begging for a smack! This, of course, went unnoticed by Goten.

The growth, thankfully, seemed to come to a halt as soon as Goku's head hit the ceiling! He looked back and down at Goten, chuckling nervously. "U-Uh... Hey son!" He said to the tiny little kid, "You mind closing the door behind you?"

Goten did as he was told, and then proceeded to walk up to his father fearlessly. He then asked, "Hey dad! How did you get so big? Huh?" He asked, smiling up at his father expectantly.

Goku glanced at the gun briefly, before looking back down at Goten. He decided that the best choice would have to be...

1511.content:
Tsuna was just leaving the front door one peaceful morning. Surprisingly enough, he hadn't seen any of his Vongola family... No Lambo or Reborn! The young brown haired boy might have been a little bit more worried if it wasn't for the fact he was enjoying all the relaxation... After all, the guys were the ones who caused the most trouble for Tsuna, especially Lambo. However, the more he thought about it, the more it started to worry him. It was one thing them to just have had suddenly gone missing, but for Nana (Tsuna's mom) to not even say anything about it was a bit strange...

Deciding not to worry about it right this moment, Tsuna continued on his way to school. Along the way, he was still wasn't joined by Gokudera as he usually was... How strange... Nor, as he passed Yamamoto's, did the young baseball player join him. The worry starting to catch up with him now, Tsuna made a dash for school. Maybe there was something there that he wasn't told of... Tsuna was always making little excuses for others like that.

"Is that the one?" A mysterious voice asked, pointing at Tsuna as he spied on the boy.

"Yes. Can you do it?" A much more familiar voice asked. After all, the figure was only about the size of a baby... With a yellow pacifier. The first man just chuckled at the infants notation.

"I am an expert! I will not fail."

With that, the second man nodded, and the first one dashed out. He walked calmly behind Tsuna, doing his best to not make a sound. Quickly pulling out a rag and dousing it with chloroform, it was pressed to Tsuna's nose. Without a struggle, the boy was instantly knocked out, and the man carried him away.

-----------------------------

"Ughhhh...." Tsuna groaned, as he began to wake up. Everything was pitch black. "H-Hey! What's going on!?!?" Tsuna shouted. He started to struggle and move, but to no avail. All his limbs were tied down, and if he was feeling it correctly, all of them were spread out. "Am I dead?! Is anyone there!?" Tsuna continued to shout.

"Calm down, Tsuna..." A voice called out.

"Wha? Who's that...!?" Tsuna looked around again, but still couldn't see in this curtain of darkness. There was a sudden click, and the lights turned on, illuminating the bright room. Tsuna was blinded, slamming his eyes shut, before re-opening them slowly. He was able to make out a figure... Before his vision returned, and looked at the person before him. "Reborn!?" Tsuna was surprised to see his little tutor. "There you are! I was wondering where you were! ... But... Where am I? Where are we?" Tsuna asked, looking about the room. He saw he was laid out on an experiment table, which was raised at a 45 degree angle. His limbs were held down by steel cuffs, leaving him bound.

"These are the secret Vongola labs." Reborn finally answered. "Japan branch."

"Vongola labs...?" Tsuna asked, "What am I doing here?" Tsuna was noticeably more calm than he was previously. It didn't mean he wasn't on edge anymore though. The young man was still very paranoid.

"Recently here in Japan, we unearthed some strange tank." Reborn began to explain. Tsuna figured it was in his better interest to listen. "It's horribly burned, as if it went through some kind of explosion. The tank itself had a huge hole in it when we found it, was a bit rusted out, and it wasn't easy to find either. All the plants around it had grown out of control..." After saying this, Reborn snapped his fingers. A large, round machine was rolled in. It almost looked like a gumball machine, only the orb was filled with some strange, yellow liquid. "After a few tests, we found out this liquid is what made the plants grow so well! So everyone back in research and development decided we need a test subject for this. They chose you!"

"M-Me!? Why me!?" Tsuna demanded to know, starting to feel increasingly uncomfortable.

"You're the 10th." Reborn answered simply.

"What the heck is this stuff even going to do to me!?" Tsuna demanded to know.

"That's why we're testing it." Reborn retorted.

"B-But!" Tsuna began to whine once more, but before any more arguments could be had, the scientist who had rolled the machine out pulled out some kind of tentacle with a needle at the end! Tsuna shouted out in displeasure. "Y-You're going to put that thing in me!? Let me go!" Tsuna demanded, starting to struggle and move around. The scientist, who was surprisingly strong, held Tsuna's head down and carefully placed the needle into his neck.

"And now we begin!" Reborn said in a singsong tone, flipping a switch up into the "on" position! Tsuna's eyes were on the liquid, as it ran through, starting at the machine, and to his neck! He could feel his heart racing already, everything somehow moving so fast yet so slow at the same time...

15113.content:
Tsuna's heart raced as his breathing slowly got heavier, his eyes becoming half lidded as he felt the liquid get pumped into his body. He couldn't quite believe that the people he considered friends would ever allow him to be pumped with some strange, unknown liquid from an ancient and rusted machine. Then again, his friends weren't exactly difficult to fool. All it would take would be a few pleasant words from Reborn and they would each be on board. At least it explained why his walk to school had been so deserted...this was no doubt all part of Reborn's sick plan!

Tsuna was so busy ruminating on his situation that he barely noticed the changes his body was going through. The yellow liquid sent little shocks throughout his body. It reminded Tsuna of getting a static shock from a piece of metal after rubbing your socked feet against a shaggy carpet. It almost felt as though his body was being injected with pure energy! After about two minutes had passed, the machine shut itself off with a loud clang, the needle vibrating slightly before pulling itself out of Tsuna's neck, the hose it was attached to falling limply to the side of the machine once more. The scientist exchanged as surprised look with Reborn as Tsuna moaned, the transformation beginning! The scientist quickly ran over to the machine to see why it had shut itself off while Reborn watched Tsuna with his usual smirk.

Tsuna weakly tried to move his body but his movements were sluggish, almost like some kind of strange mush was filling his limbs. He felt like he was about to cry as he looked down over himself to see what exactly was happening. His frightened expression swiftly changed to one of pure shock as he saw that his once puny body was slowly growing taller! With a series of pops and groans his body stretched itself taller, his clothes becoming tighter and smaller on him. His shirt swiftly pulled itself up, revealing more and more of Tsuna's flat stomach while his pants pulled up much the same way around his calves. His shoes were becoming uncomfortable as his feet swelled within them, the material warping and stretching as it struggled to contain the growing feet inside them. After a few minutes, the sleeves of his shirt were stretched tight against Tsuna's upper arms, everything below his belly button exposed while his pants clung tightly to his slender hips, the hem pulled tight around his upper calves. His toes had popped both out of his socks and his shoes, the rest of the shoe looking pretty ragged. Tsuna looked down with amazement over his body. "I'm...tall! This is so weird..."

His expression had done a complete turn around. Gone was the look of worry and the creases of concern. A big smile lit up his face now, Tsuna eagerly wanting to look over his body, wishing he wasn't strapped down like this! Luckily for him, the changes had only just gotten started! With a sudden wave of dizziness, Tsuna's body started to grow again, though in a much different way!

His biceps slowly began to swell, the sleeves of his shirt swiftly ripping, his forearms growing thicker, giving him a far stronger grip! His once flat and unimpressive chest suddenly bulked upward, thick slabs of meat straining and finally bursting free of his shirt, the slightly sweaty skin visible to all in the room. The tear continued down his torso, showing off a tight six pack before splitting open entirely, only rags now attached to his broadening shoulders and widening back. With a grunt, his voice sounding slightly deeper, Tsuna watched as his belt popped off, followed by the button on his pants. The zipper slid down with a low, whispering sound, revealing his boxers, packed to the brim with Tsuna's now far more impressive manhood! Tsuna blushed a little as he saw the button straining on his boxers. If he made the slightest misstep, he would end up revealing himself to everyone! Below the waist, his thighs had already popped the material of his pants open like the husk of a cocoon, thick striated muscle emerging. His now massive calves had made short work of the rest of his pants. His feet had grown a bit thicker and wider to better balance his now impressively muscled body, long tears running down the sides of each of his sneakers.

Tsuna, his eyes now nearly bugging out of his head, could only mumble incoherently as he looked down over his body. The scientist, meanwhile, ran back over to Reborn and whispered, "It seems the machine was preset to run an experiment. We're going to need at least a day or two to reprogram it for any further experiments."

Reborn nodded and said, "That's fine. We'll let the 10th here to get used to his new body before doing anything further."

Tsuna, hearing Reborn's voice, looked sharply up at him. "Wait...you mean you're going to do this again to me?! But...But..."

Reborn chuckled and said, "Look at you Tsuna! You're nearly taller than Yamamoto and at least twice as muscular as Ryohei! Why wouldn't you want to keep this improvement going?"

Tsuna looked down over his body, his much larger pecs now making that a little difficult, and instinctively tried to flex his arm. The cuffs, which were nearly as rusty as the machine, actually broke, allowing the formerly small boy to flex his arms. Tsuna watched in amazement as the mound of muscle slowly rose up into a peak. Was that big thing really attached to him? "Yeah...Maybe you're right..."

"But first things first!" Reborn said sharply, bringing Tsuna's focus back down to him. "We need to get you some new clothes AND start training you to use this body properly!"

Reborn started heading for the door, leaving Tsuna to break himself free and follow after him, his bigger body making him even clumsier than before! "W-Wait up Reborn!"

The very second that Gokudera and the others had formed their plans, Gokudera had ran out of the house, heading for the uptown area to look for Tsuna. The man looked down at Gokudera in shock, a slight blush running across his nose before a confident smirk appeared on his face. "Oh, hey Gokudera!"

If there was anyone who would support him in his ventures, no matter what they were, Gokudera was that person. Tsuna's tight ass stuck out from behind, and his growing package from the front, putting a constant strain and a losing battle on his boxers. His thighs stretched the limits of his boxers, his bulging calves remained hard and flexed with every step, and his gargantuan feet had burst from the shoes; All of these things attributed to the way the land shook all around him.

"Hey, you see that Tenth!? You're so massive that everything is shaking underneath your mighty power!" Gokudera brought to his leader's attention. Tsuna just smiled to himself.

"Yeah... Guess I'm just so powerful, everything quivers under my power!" He said with a cocky grin. It was at this moment someone had bumped into Tsuna. The random man immediately fell to the ground, while Tsuna still stood, tall and proud.

"Hey, why don't you watch..." The man rubbed his head, as his mouth then gaped open, just barely seeing past Tsuna's massive pecs to see the young boy's face. Tsuna bounced his pecs with an arrogant smile. "S-Sorry!" He stammered, getting to his feet, "I didn't mean it!" The man ran off, never to be seen again.

"Yeah, you better run!" Gokudera shouted, "That's what you get for messing with the all-powerful Vongola Tenth!" Gokudera lifted Tsuna's powerful arm, pointing at it. "Next time you'll be torn in half and swallowed whole by these pythons!"

All this only forced Tsuna to swell and grow even larger, his ego ballooning nice and huge. As he grinned with his hands on his hips, he didn't even seem to notice as...
1511322111.title: Flattery DOES get you Somewhere!

choices: Tsuna leads his little harem to the beach
It's getting late, time to go home...with Tsuna?!
15113221111.content:
"Woah! Is that Tsuna?" Yamamoto asked Ryohei, looking over at him with the same easy going smile he always had.

"Of course it is!" Ryohei shouted out, clenching his fists, a grin stretched over his face. "Looks like that experiment thing really worked on him!"

Yamamoto chuckled and said, "Looks like Gokudera found him too."

Gokudera was swinging happily from Tsuna's arm while the once small mob boss flexed his substantial bicep, easily able to hold Gokudera's weight without so much as breaking a sweat. The two teens quickly ran over to Tsuna and Gokudera, the people around them watching curiously as two new men arrived on the scene. Tsuna didn't seem to notice them. He was too busy focusing on Gokudera who was happily chattering away compliments about how big and strong and unstoppable he was which in turn was making his boasts reality, Tsuna's body growing more and more!

"Hey Tsuna! You look amazing!" Yamamoto said with a smile, hands in his pockets. Tsuna looked over at his shoulder and smirked at Yamamoto. "Oh hey. Almost didn't see you down there puny."

Yamamoto snickered and said, "You're so funny Tsuna." He patted the massive boy on the back while Ryohei ran in front of him, holding up his fists.

"Now you just gotta join the Boxing Club!" Ryohei shouted, throwing a few air punches as he grinned up at Tsuna. "No other team in the district would be able to stand a chance against us!"

Tsuna chuckled and said, "Sure, sure, I'll think about it. In the meantime, let's take a walk."

Tsuna wrapped his arms around both Yamamoto's and Ryohei's shoulders, pinning them against his bulk as they walked away, both teens now adding their compliments to Tsuna, Ryohei going so far as to run his hands up and down Tsuna's abs and squeeze Tsuna's pecs. Yamamoto meanwhile playfully slapped Tsuna's butt, complimenting him on the shape and hardness. Tsuna soaked it all up, not even noticing that Gokudera had fallen behind with a sour look on his face. As always, he hated when anyone got in between him and his boss. It didn't help that Tsuna didn't even notice that he had fallen behind. He kicked morosely at the ground, a sad expression on his face. Suddenly, a shadow was cast over him. Gokudera looked up in surprise and saw Tsuna smiling confidently down at him. "Hey little man. Get over here!"

He opened his arms and Gokudera immediately jumped into them. Tsuna wrapped his arms tight around the smaller teen and lifted him up onto his shoulders. Gokudera happily held on. "Tenth you are the coolest guy ever!"

Tsuna flexed his bicep and watched as it rose up another inch without him even flexing. "Yeah, I know~"

By this time Tsuna was passing twelve feet tall, his thick arms wrapped back around Yamamoto and Ryohei again. As the four teens made their way down the sidewalk, attracting even more attention from the crowds, every word of praise soaking into Tsuna and making him bigger and bigger! Yamamoto looked a little concerned as he gently played with some of Tsuna's thick fingers. "Yeah, Tsuna?"

Tsuna tightened his grip a little on the baseball player and said, "Yeah? What's up?"

"Aren't you worried about, you know, maybe getting too big?" He asked.

Gokudera snorted and said, "There's no such thing as too big! The tenth can get as huge as he wants!"

"Yeah, lighten up!" Ryohei said with a laugh. "He's not hurting anyone so what's the problem?"

Yamamoto shrugged with a small smile. "Yeah, I guess you're right. Maybe I am just worrying about nothing."

Tsuna grabbed Yamamoto by the back of his shirt and lifted him off his feet. "Don't worry about anything small fry! With a big guy like me around, nothing bad is going to happen to any one you! As long as you don't get in my way. Got it?"

He tightened his grip a little on Yamamoto. A flash of fear passed through the once taller teen's eyes, followed by a weak smile. "S-Sorry! I get it, I'll be good."

Tsuna smiled again and let Yamamoto down, his arm tightly wrapped around him again. Like it or not, these three were with Tsuna until the end. Gokudera just snickered while Ryohei said, "That's the kind of passion we're looking for!"

Yamamoto's heart was beating just a little faster as they walked along. Tsuna had always been a meek, sweet, gentle boy, a little hapless, but with a good heart. This new body of his seemed to be making him more aggressive, cockier, and arrogant along with making him supremely more confident. Yet....when he looked in Tsuna's eyes, he still saw the same guy he had made friends with so long ago. This is what made Yamamoto smile again, his fears at a rest.

And still Tsuna grew.
15113221111.title: Two More to the Fold

choices: Accepts Reborn's offer!
Ryohei declines. The next morning, it's time for Tsuna's second treatment...
151132211112.content:
The sun was already starting to set on this glorious day. Glorious for Tsuna, that is. From the start of the day to the finish, he had went from being a five foot one, one hundred six pound weakling, to a gargantuan twelve foot eight, and just a few hundred pounds short of being a whole ton of muscle! Everything around him rumbled, vases falling from shelves, animals making a commotion as they heard the sound, only to shut up once they saw the source of it all. Tsuna took a deep breath, taking it all in, and enjoying every second of his new self. Things were going to be MUCH more different from now on.

--------------------------------

"To Tsuna!" Gokudera cheered, the four of them literally squeezed in Tsuna's room. Their new, bulky leader practically took up an entire quarter of the room! If not more!

"Tsuna!" Everyone cheered. They all had a round of sodas together to finally celebrate the return of their beloved friend and boss. Of course, having a party in his honor was just the thing that Tsuna needed to get even bigger! Not many seemed to notice as the brown haired boy continued to bulk up and out, filling up more of the room!

Long after the party started to calm down, every was slowly starting to settle in. Tsuna demanded that everyone stay the night. No one knew why, but Tsuna did. He wanted to be closer to his power source. He took a few of his sheets out of his closet, and tried getting out the door. There was no way he'd be able to sleep in his bed tonight, so perhaps sleeping out under the stars wouldn't be a bad idea. Besides, what's wrong with hiding such a thick, godly body from the world?

"Dang it! Why is this frame so small!?" Tsuna growled. With a loud grunt, he slammed out, demolishing the door frame in the process.

"Tenth! You're so cool!" Gokudera cheered, "Who needs doors when you're massive enough to smash from room to room!?"

Tsuna let out a chuckle, the joke starting to become a bit of a serious suggestion to him. After all, he was only going to get bigger, right? Brushing it aside for now, he made his way outside as he allowed his friends to have his room.

"I call the Tenth's bed!" Gokudera demanded, jumping over into the cushy, iron bed. Yamamoto didn't mind taking the floor. Before Ryohei could argue, however, Reborn tugged on his sleeve.

"Huh? Reborn?" Ryohei looked at his shoulder.

"Come talk with me in the bathroom." Reborn said simply. With that, he just up and disappeared! Ryohei looked about for a second, and saw no one else saw that. He stood to his feet, looking down at everyone. "I'm... Uh... Going to the bathroom..." He said, still a little thrown off by it all. Gokudera just pointed and laughed.

"Turf head can't hold his soda!"

-------------------------------------

Ryohei arrived in the bathroom downstairs, and closed the door behind him. "You wanted to see me?" He asked Reborn, who he saw was sitting on the edge of the tub.

"Tsuna's getting pretty big..." Reborn started.

"Yeah! It's pretty extreme!" Ryohei shouted proudly.

On the floor above, Gokudera snickered to himself, and whispered to Yamamoto, "You hear that? He even uses the bathroom in an extreme way!"

"He's starting to get really self-absorbed too... Always wanting you guys to compliment him..." Reborn continued, trying to see if Ryohei would pick up.

"Yeah!" Ryohei agreed again, "Wish I could be as huge as he is... That'd be pretty EXTREME!" He shouted again. Reborn smacking him in the head to remind him to keep quiet. He bent back up a little, chuckling nervously. "Right, sorry!"

"So... You want to be that big?" Reborn asked quite simply.

Ryohei, surprised at this proposition...
151132211112.title: The House of the Vongola

choices: Ryohei gathers up the boxing club and drains them for his own gain!
Meanwhile, as Tsuna slept back home...
1511322111121.content:
"Uh... Yeah!" Ryohei whispered loudly, "I'll do it!"

A small smile stretched across Reborn's young face. "I'm glad to hear it. Now we have to go get Yamamoto and Gokudera."

"But they're sleeping..." Ryohei replied, "Wouldn't it be rude to--" Reborn interjected by holding up some kind of pill.

"I've already spiked their drinks. They won't wake up for a while."

----------------------

The streets were dark, as Ryohei carried his two friends over his shoulders. "Where are we going...?" Ryohei asked. He didn't have a problem carrying one of them, but both of them at the same time was more of a challenge. A challenge that Ryohei was more than happy to accept!

"The Vongola Labs. Japan branch." Reborn replied, walking along the concrete fence of the street. "We'll be there soon."

"Hope so... Gokudera's snoring is really getting annoying!" Ryohei whispered back, a bit leery about waking the two up. He even made sure not to run too fast and end up shaking them awake. "Why did we need them again?"

"You'll find out soon." Reborn replied, hopping all the way across a street onto another fence.

---------------------

The two of them together soon came across a large, abandoned warehouse. Reborn knocked on the door in a strange way the Ryohei didn't really understand. After a brief moment, the door slid right open, leading to a staircase that went downwards. At the bottom of the stairs, Ryohei could barely see a dim light shining. Reborn hopped down from step to step, and Ryohei followed closely behind. The door closed quietly behind them, and soon there was no sound other than the echo of footsteps as they wandered down.

At the bottom, Reborn pushed open a door, where three iron beds, much like what Tsuna had seen earlier in the morning, lay. Reborn merely had to point at them for Ryohei to know that Yamamoro and Gokudera must belong on those beds. Gently, he set them down. Gokudera whined a little, mumbling in his sleep.

"Tenth..." He chuckled and blushed. "You're getting so big...!"

As Ryohei looked over, Reborn was standing at the third and final bed, patting it. Ryohei walked over, and sat on the edge of it. He looked down at Reborn, trying to see what he was supposed to do next.

"Shirt and pants off." Reborn said simply. Ryohei just shrugged. He slid of a blue sweatshirt he was wearing, along with his light blue sweatpants. With that, he was left in nothing but a pair of white boxers. He looked over and saw that Reborn had already undressed Yamamoto, and Gokudera was already halfway there! "Lie down!" Reborn commanded from afar, giving a wave to what appeared to Ryohei to be complete darkness.

Ryohei did as he was told, and with it, he was suddenly shackled down! It came as a shock to him at first, and he did struggle, but after a moment, he gave his trust to Reborn. Glancing over, he saw the same had been done to Gokudera and Yamamoto! Then, there was a shrill sound that broke the silence. Ryohei looked over and saw a large machine pushed by a man in your stereotypical science garb, but instead of the stinging syringes that Tsuna had seen earlier, this one had suction cups. One side had a red light, the other a blue. Reborn took the cups from the red side, and stuck them to Ryohei, while the scientist took the blue side, and was quickly sticking them to the other two boys. Ryohei noticed that they were all placed the same location that Reborn was sticking the cups on him!

-----------------------------

Tsuna let out a loud yawn as he laid out in the backyard. His arms stretched far, as he idly rubbed down his body. A cocky smirk stretched across his face as he felt his large, bulbous pecs, giving them a hard flex. He loved the way they just barely tapped his chin as he was looking down at them. His massive, powerful arms, strong enough to crush rocks, and his thick, rippling thighs that could squeeze a man's head off! "Yeah..." He thought to himself in a confident way, "Things are gonna be a lot different from now on..."

As Tsuna turned on his side, and scratched his ass, which looked as if sculpted by the god themselves. As he did, there was someone who was watching him from the back sliding window.

"Whoa... A squishy monster!" A young boy, with a large back afro, adorned with cow horns whispered to himself.

----------------------------

Ryohei chuckled somewhat nervously. "What's this thing do again?"

"You wanted to be big, right? Here's how we're going to do it!" Without saying anymore, Reborn flipped a switch!

Ryohei felt a tingle from all the cups that were on him. Not a stinging feeling, but more of a ticklish feeling! He couldn't hold back a little chuckle as the machine began to work it's magic on him! Ryohei's legs started to grow thicker. As if they weren't toned enough, they quivered and shook, before bursting forth with new size and power! Ryohei's eyes practically popped out of his head as he was watching his own already strong physique growing even larger and stronger! Ryohei's already wavy abs soon tightened and became more visible, turning from a large 6-pack, before a new row sprouted and began to fill up, giving him an amazing 8-pack! His pecs pushed out, swelling and filling with pure mass that could make any man (save for Tsuna) green with envy! He gave them a hearty flex, wanting to feel that same ecstasy that he saw Tsuna experience all day! His back flared out, stretching into an immovable wall of strength, while his powerful biceps and forearms, already powerful from throwing so many punches, balled up even faster than the rest of his body, pumping up bigger and bigger and BIGGER until they were nearly the size of softballs!

Ryohei could barely believe his eyes! But before he could get much further, Reborn turned the machine off, which caused Ryohei's head to snap right up to the infant.

"Hey! Why'd you stop!?" He demanded to know. Reborn pointed at Yamamoto and Gokudera. While Ryohei had filled out and hunked up, his friends appeared to be much more scrawny than he remembered... He could see Gokudera's ribs from where he lay, and Yamamoto, who had given more mass than his fiery friend, was panting, clearly worn out.

"All that mass has to come from somewhere." Reborn finally replied. Ryohei felt a little bad inside. After all, who wouldn't? He just potentially hurt his friends! However... All this size... All this mass... It felt so worth it! Ryohei started to make excuses in his head.

"They can gain it back!" He chuckled nervously, "It's not like it's forever... R-Right?"

"If you want more... There's always more people..." Reborn suggested, teasing the young man.
1511322111121.title: Under the Table Operations

choices: An even LARGER man appeared on the scene!
Even more people arrived on the scene!
15113221112.content:
Now that he was in a new area in a street, a new crowd was already starting to gather, mainly thanks to the commotion that Gokudera had made. Tsuna's ears perked up and a smirk ran across his face as he now heard all kinds of new compliments reaching his ears.

"Look at that kid..." One person said.

"He's huge!"

"Look at those pecs!"

"Pecs? Look at his tight ass!"

Tsuna turned around to the crowd, looking down at them. They all seemed to suddenly freeze with fear, looking back up at him. Tsuna raised his arms... And suddenly flexed his thick arms, showing them off for all the people to see. He grinned, all the "ooh"s and "ahh"s feeding his already swollen physique. More and more people started to gather, admiring his bulging muscles. Suddenly, a little kid stepped bravely forward, and pointed over at a small car on the edge of the street.

"Hey! Mister! Can you lift that?" He asked. Tsuna glanced at the car, before smiling down at the kid.

"Sure thing!" He smirked. With that, Tsuna began to walk over to the car, the ground quaking beneath him. The whole crowd followed behind, wanting to see. Gokudera stayed behind, smiling to himself. It was no big deal if the people just wanted to see how strong his boss was! It was just when they were getting a little too close to him for Gokudera's own comfort.

Everyone was muttering to each other, looking as Tsuna squatted down and set his hand down along the bottom rim. With a mighty heft, he easily was able to lift up one side, which made the crowd gasp! Tsuna grinned as he felt even more mass added onto his godly body, as he was now able to go a step further, and lift the vehicle up off the ground! Higher, and higher, and higher, Tsuna was quickly able to dead lift the car directly above his head. He shot a cocky grin down at the crowd, and they all began to cheer and shout for him!

Immediately, Tsuna began surging up higher, all those people's eyes and words feeding his appetite for size. His bulky pecs shot out at least another two inches from his already immense pecs. His over sized biceps started bulging and undulating, flexing larger as the car was held in place, becoming even less of a task for this herculean boy. Tsuna's enormous back flared out even further, nearly completing his top-heavy physique. His abs were long down his stomach, rippling and hard as another row popped into place, giving him a mighty 8-pack that could crush a rock! Tsuna's thighs were swelling out, rubbing even closer together until no light could be seen between them. His calves had also been thickening up, starting to near bowling ball size! Tsuna's shoes had long fallen off, and now his huge feet had been growing larger! Not even a size twenty five shoe would be able to fit those massive things! Tsuna let out a triumphant laugh, his voice noticably deeper than it was when he had started!

It was strange that no one seemed to notice how large Tsuna had become! The car, while it had to be held from under and took much of Tsuna's strength, Tsuna could now hold at both ends high above his head with relative ease. He looked down at the people who seemed to settle down a little... That was no good for him! A lightbulb went off in Tsuna's head as he realized what he should do next!

Tsuna let out a noisy grunt, which immediately caught everyone's attention. The seventeen foot boy shouted and groaned, even scaring a child or two to the back of the crowd! As everyone looked up, they quickly saw what he was doing! The could hear as the metal of the car had begun to creak and moan as Tsuna started to squeeze it together like it was a soda can! While some were surprised, others began to cheer Tsuna on, which only made the boy become even more of a Goliath than he already was! Tsuna's muscles expanded even further out, becoming red as the veins began to surface, throbbing as the cocky teen kept squeezing the car tigher together! Everyone watch as the car quickly became smaller and smaller, to a volkswagon, to even smaller, squeezed between the gargantuan vices that were Tsuna's arms. Tsuna soon lowered it, pressing one end to his chest, and his hands wrapping around the back in a bear hug, as he was now able to mash the puny tin can between himself and his arms in a crushing bear hug! There was a sudden leak as the gasoline tank popped, splattering between himself and the people.

Before anyone knew it, Tsuna tossed the piece of scrap metal to the ground, not even making the loud thud it normally would have. The whole crowd looked down in amazement at the piece of junk at the ground, before looking back up at Tsuna. Tsuna, of course, was smiling, bouncing his pecs as he flexed his mountainous biceps. The crowd erupted into applause and cheer. Tsuna grinned, as he felt his body surge upward bigger, and bigger, and BIGGER! His biceps bounced up to about halfway up his forearm, as his thick, throbbing pecs brushed up against his chin with every bounce. His abs pressed out from his body as well, almost like a set of mini-pecs themselves! Tsuna's ass had become two large beach balls, but if you squeezed them, it was like two giant watermelons! His thighs could crush steel, and his calves bounced and shook with every step as it helped support the colossal teen's body. While 25 was previously the limit with Tsuna's shoe size, but now it was arguable is size 40 would fit! His back was an immovable wall of waves that could take a cannonball!

Tsuna was without question THE hugest, most powerful thing in all the town! But Tsuna would soon be in for a shock as...
15113221112.title: Crowd Pleaser?

choices: Tsuna is bigger...but Ryohei is still stronger! He lifts him up!
Ryohei brought along a crowd of his own!
151132211121.content:
Tsuna was so absorbed in the attention he was receiving from the crowd and on such a high after not only lifting a car up but actually crushing it in his bare hands, he didn't even notice as the crowd began to get much quieter, moving aside as someone else arrived on the scene. Tsuna didn't look up from admiring his muscles until a shadow fell over top of him. Tsuna blinked and slowly looked up, his eyes widening as he saw an even bigger standing before him! Now Tsuna was already enormous by human standards. The normal people milling around him only reached up to his knees. But this man towered over even Tsuna! The bulge in his briefs was level with the young crime boss's face! Tsuna leaned his head back and tried to see who was standing before him but couldn't see the man's face past his thick, swollen pecs! "Hey!" Tsuna shouted, his voice easily heard not just because it was now deeper but because everyone else had gone deathly quiet. "Who do you think you are?"

The man leaned forward with a grin, revealing the face of Ryohei! Gokudera's mouth dropped open in pure shock. "W-What the hell?! What happened to you? I just saw you a few hours ago and you were totally normal!"

Ryohei just chuckled and said, "Let me answer your questions one at a time. First, who do I think I am?" He grinned at Tsuna and slowly stretched back up to his full height, bringing his arms up into a powerful double biceps pose, his arms erupting into twin mountains, thick veins powering the muscles as he flexed them bigger and bigger! The crowd "oohed" and "aahed", completely enraptured by Ryohei's display, clapping and cheering, causing the enormous teen to actually stretch higher and wider! "I think I'm more man than you could ever hope to be!" He leaned over and gave each of his biceps a kiss, growling and flexing them harder afterwards, the fierce display earning renewed cheers! "As for what what happened to me...well~"

--Hours Ago--

"Are you sure this is a good idea?" Yamamoto asked, scratching his head as he watched Reborn and some doctors hook Ryohei up to some kind of strange machine.

"Definitely!" Reborn said, that enigmatic little smile on his face. "At first I thought Tsuna experiencing side effects would be a bad thing, since it would involve a lot of civilians and might make a big mess. But after Gokudera "reported" back to me, I realized this was the perfect opportunity to build Tsuna's confidence and get a little training in!"

"How did Gokudera report to you anyway? You don't have a cellphone do you?" Yamamoto asked, smiling slightly at the idea of a little baby having a cellphone.

"I planted Leon on Gokudera and he's sending reports back to me." Reborn said simply, pointing at his hat, his chameleon pet noticeably absent.

"Wait, how does Leon know how to--"

"Prepare for phase one of the experiment!" Reborn swiftly interrupted, raising one finger into the air.

Ryohei winced as the needles came down, slowly injecting him in the same process Tsuna had gone through. "See, with Ryohei out there showing up Tsuna, Tsuna will get jealous, his new confidence and pride forcing him to be better than Ryohei, to show HIM up! It's important for mob bosses to have not only a lot of confidence but to not be afraid of taking down his enemies!"

"But Ryohei isn't an enemy." Yamamoto pointed out.

"I know that. That's why we'll be watching! If things get out of hand, I have a contingency plan." He held up a rather wicked looking syringe filled with a colorless liquid.

"What's that?" Yamamoto asked curiously.

"Don't worry about it." Reborn said, little smile firmly in place.

--An Hour Ago--

"Woah! What happened to me?!" Ryohei said, flexing his now much bigger biceps, each one looking as big as a softball.

"Wow, he got even bigger than Tsuna!" Yamamoto said, measuring himself playfully up against Ryohei. He only came up to the top row of the giant teen's abs! Ryohei grinned and tousled Yamamoto's hair, eliciting a chuckle from the smaller teen.

"Of course he did! He started out not only taller than Tsuna, but stronger as well! If Tsuna wants to keep up with him, he's going to have to work twice as hard!" Reborn said.

Ryohei bounced his pecs and chuckled. "Hey, I really like this! No one could beat me at boxing before but now...it's not even fair!"

He turned to the wall and punched it, knocking a huge hole in it! "Hahahaha! I feel amazing!"

"You look really amazing too!" Yamamoto said, putting his hands in his pockets.

As soon as Yamamoto's words reached Ryohei, his body pulsed, slowly growing taller, his muscles bulging bigger all over his body! Ryohei groaned and squeezed his pecs, loving how heavy and huge they felt in his hands. Reborn nodded and said, "It's already starting. Alright Ryohei! Tsuna is near the park! Go out there and show him who the bigger man is!"

"Yeah! I'm on it!" Ryohei said, moving towards the door. "But I need to make one little stop first!"

--Now--

"And that's what happened!" Ryohei said, crossing his arms smugly.

Tsuna clenched his fist and growled. Leave it to Reborn to take the one thing he had going for him and turn it into a stupid training exercise! Gokudera suddenly shouted, "Don't get discouraged tenth! He might be bigger but you're better! Come on! Show him who's boss!"

Tsuna couldn't help but smile at Gokudera, his grin slowly returning. "Yeah! You're right!" He flexed his own biceps, a look of pure confidence on his face. The crowd quickly started cheering again, applauding for Tsuna. They had followed him this far, no other guy was going to get their attention!

"Yeah, show him whose boss!"

"Crush a car on his head!"

"Squeeze his head between those melons on your chest!"

Tsuna chuckled as he felt his body stretch higher and higher, his biceps pumping up, his chest inflating out in front of him! Gokudera cheered loudest of all, fueling the already cocky and huge teen! He locked his hands under his pecs and pushed them up closer to his chin, his tongue giving the massive slabs of meat a long, slow lick. The cheers only got louder, pushing Tsuna up taller and wider, soon reaching Ryohei's height! As soon as they were eye to eye, the crowd went ballistic, causing Tsuna's height to surge up until his right pec smacked Ryohei in the face! Tsuna laughed and said, "You really think YOU'RE the biggest man around? Try saying that around these huge pecs you little wuss!"

He got Ryohei in a headlock, his gigantic bicep pressing hard against the back of Ryohei's head, forcing his face deeper into the cleft between Tsuna's pecs! "Mmmm~ Why don't you show how much better I am then you by worshiping this huge body? Give my chest a little lick~"

The crowd laughed as Ryohei was brought down, though he seemed oddly calm about the whole thing. He raised his hand and held up the victory sign. The crowd only laughed louder.

"Oh man! Who does this guy think he is?"

"What a loser! He's already lost!"

Tsuna squeezed harder, having to bend over now as his body grew bigger from the support. "Hear that? You're nothing but a joke compared to ME!"

No sooner had Tsuna said those words then something made him wince in shock!
151132211121.title: Competition

choices: Tsuna had to take on Ryohei and regain the favor of the crowd!
Tsuna had to run off and find a new, bigger crowd to outgrow Ryohei!
1511322111211.content:
Tsuna's body seemed to be suddenly moving against his will! This wasn't the truth, in fact, the whole crowd was silent as they saw the smaller, tanned Ryohei slowly pulling Tsuna's arms apart! Tsuna looked down, and saw Ryohei pulling himself free, and flexed harder in an attempt to capture his little friend! It proved to be no use, as Ryohei broke free in seconds! The crowd gasped, looking up at the two tiatans before them!

Ryohei immediately moved behind Tsuna and put on hand on his friend's ass, and another on his shoulder! Tsuna blushed a little as he felt his ass suddenly groped, but he was more focused on just what Ryohei was doing! Soon enough, Tsuna had an answer! He felt his legs starting to feel a little wobbly, and not because of their weight! Tsuna was slowly being hefted right up off the ground! Ryohei grunted, his muscles flexing, and the ground beneath him even cracking a little as he held Tsuna up above his head! One look at this place, and you would notice it's most popular landmark; some kind of large castle. In fact, this "castle" was the DWMA, or the Death Weapon Meister Academy. An academy of youth that creates a death scythe, a weapon of great power, attained by consuming 99 malicious souls, and 1 soul of a witch. It is here that our story begins...

--------------------

"Step one... Blend into the shadows, control your breathing... And wait for your target to let down his guard..." Black Star shouted noisily.

"Oh, Black Star..." Soul, Black Star's shark-toothed friend said, noticing the blue haired ninja. "I was wondering where you were. C'mon, we got class."

He was, of course, referring to the little ride he let Black Star hitch off of him. Ever since the Kishin was defeated, they had a little more free time, Soul and Black Star had grown at least a little more closer than the friendly brotherhood they once shared.

As the two entered the classroom and took their seats, it didn't take long for their teacher, Dr. Stein, to come in.

"Alright, take a seat kids..." Stein said, no more interested in teaching than he usually was. "Oh, Black Star." Stein pushed up his glasses and pointed at the young man. "Shinigami-sama wanted to see you."

Black Star, who had just sat down, sprung right back up. "Heh, figures he'd want to see me! I'm the strongest man in this room!" Black Star said with his usual cocky arrogance. He began heading right for the door, everyone of his classmates shooting daggers at him once his back was turned. Black Star didn't mind. He took all eyes on him as a compliment, no matter how they were looking at him!

"Black Star, wait!" Tsubaki, Black Star's weapon and companion called out. Stein rose a hand up to her.

"Just Black Star. Shinigami-sama was very clear about that." He instructed the young woman. She sat back down, a bit of worry and sadness on her face. After all, there was a bit of an issue with Black Star last night...

You see, the two were close. They were weapon and meister after all. They even slept in the same bed together! But last night was different... Just as Tsubaki had entered the bedroom, Black Star had packed up his pillow and had one of their extra blankets.

"I'm sleeping on the couch." Black Star told Tsubaki.

Those words seemed to resonate within her, tormenting her, playing like a bad movie, over and over in her mind. She couldn't help but worry that it might have been something she did... Or said... Nothing seemed different between her, which just left her confused...

Meanwhile, Black Star was already in Shinigami-sama's office, getting a run down of a mission he was getting sent out on!

"So! Are there any questions?" Shinigami-sama asked, his lone finger popping up.

"So I get to do a solo mission, AND skip out on class?" Black Star said, a smirk across his face as his arms were behind his head. "Sounds good to me! Don't you worry, I'll check out that warehouse for you!"

"Do be careful..." Shinigami-sama said with concern.

"Don't worry!" Black Star replied, already heading out, under the intimidating guillotines that led to Shinigami-sama's office. The young ninja had no idea what was in store for him.

----------------------

"2-C..." Black Star mumbled to himself, looking around. Many of the iron plates that labeled the houses were rusted out. They weren't even near water, so this only emphasized how old this part of town was. "Aha!" Black Star shouted out, finding the warehouse in question. -----------------

"The soul of the mighty O'Lanturn Jack." Shinigami-sama said, as Black Star recalled. "When he was on the brink of death, he hid himself from hiding, for the one who would find his soul would find a power beyond that of any witch, meister, or weapon! Possibly even beyond that of a death scythe!"

"So... You want me to find this dude's soul or something?" Black Star asked.

"No, no, in fact, great news! We've already spotted it!" Shinigami-sama said enthusiastically. "However, Spirit refuses to let us take Maka from her studies, and Kid is already off on an important task... And we can't send a weapon to do it..."

Black Star grabbed Soul's hand, the weapon's paw quite a bit bigger than his own, and was hoisted to his feet easily. Black Star, who had been suspicious of Soul suddenly appearing in front of him again, quickly forgot his objections when he was face to...abs, with Soul. His muscles were still just as thick and powerful and his clothes were still just as tattered. It really showed how much Soul cared about Black Star that he would wait in public while he was half dressed to make sure his friend was following. This made Black Star feel even better about Soul's size. No matter how big he got, he was still the same stand up guy...maybe a bit cockier than normal, but that was something Black Star could deal with...especially since his friends had been putting up with it from him for as long as they'd known each other.

"You okay?" Soul suddenly asked, raising an eyebrow at Black Star. "You seem a little out of it."

Black Star shook his head and grinned up at Soul. "I'm fine! Don't worry about me! Let's get back to your house quick and get you some new clothes!"

Soul chuckled as Black Star ran off, following him at a more sedate pace. "Same old Black Star~"

It didn't take the pair long to reach Soul's apartment since they hadn't walked very far on their way to school. Of course they were now officially late for class and would probably end up paying for it later but at the moment they didn't care! Especially since it meant Maka was out of the way. They avoided any lectures because of this. Black Star flopped down on Soul's couch with a sigh, watching as Soul pulled off the remains of his clothes, leaving him in nothing but a pair of really tight boxers which were clearly too small on him. Black Star blushed a little and said, "Do you have anything around here that's going to fit you?"

"I don't know...I'm looking but I can't find anything. Everything is three sizes too small now!" Soul said, rifling through his closet.

Black Star nodded slightly, thinking about Soul's predicament. It sure would be nice if he had at least one outfit he could wear...

"Oh wait! I forgot I had this! Awesome!" Soul exclaimed, pulling a coat and a pair of pants out from the closet. He opened his drawer and pulled out a new pair of underwear, these ones fitting him perfectly! Black Star politely looked away since Soul had forgotten to close the door to his room. Within minutes Soul was stepping out of his room, hands in his pockets. He leaned against the wall, adopting a "cool" pose and said, "Well?~ What do you think?"

Black Star's eyes widened as he saw Soul dressed in a black and yellow jacket, unzipped, showing off his thick pecs and rock hard abs, the sleeves reaching as far as the base of his biceps, unable to pass over them. His pants were tight around the crotch and ass areas while more roomy in the leg area, a pair of sandals on his feet along with a different headband for his hair. "Wow! You look really cool!"

Soul stood up straight and crossed his arms. "Glad you think so! I don't really have any other options so this is the best I can do."

"You'll get some new clothes soon!" Black Star said. "Just wait until after your next job! You'll be able to take on a high level assignment and make some serious cash with that bod!"

Soul blushed slightly and said, "You're being awfully complimentary today~" He had a bit of a silly grin on his face.

"Yeah, well, I'm happy for you!" Black Star said, thumbing his nose. "You look good! You should feel good too!"

Soul wrapped his arm around Black Star's shoulder and pulled him close in a bear hug, forcing the smaller Meister against his abs. "Thanks Black Star~ You're a real friend~"

Black Star blushed but smiled up at Soul, his heart racing. He didn't want to go to class anymore. There was just something about Soul that made him want to spend more time with him!

"Hey...we're already late for class, what do you say we just skip today?" Soul suggested, smiling down at his friend.

"Awesome! I was just about to say the same thing!" He shouted excitedly. "What do you want to do? Play basketball? Go get some food? Hang out here?"

Soul chuckled and shrugged. "Let's do whatever you want to do."

Black Star thought about it and said, "Okay! I've got it!"

It was a typical afternoon in Medusa's secret base. Free had just returned from a reconnaissance mission, just as he was instructed. He pushed open the large wooden door of Medusa's lair, and began to wander in. The first thing to do was to report to the head honcho herself and tell her about everything he had found out.

Free made his way down into Medusa's room. She was always doing some kind of experiment in there, so Free had to make sure he didn't stop in at the wrong time. Free took a breath as he placed a hand on the door. That woman always had some kind of creepy glint in her eye that freaked him out. He finally took a step inside.

"Hey, snake woman, you in here?" Free asked, as he then looked up. Not a person was to be found! The first thing that Free noticed was a large circle drawn in the ground, and in the center was a tome that stood silently on a stand. Free looked around the room real quick, before walking up to the strange set up.

"What the heck was she up to this time...?" Free mumbled to himself. Free looked down at the book, both of his hands resting idly at either side of the stand. "Yeesh, frog torture techniques?" Free said. "Why would... Oh..." The wolf man quickly realized Medusa was just looking up ways to punish Eruka. "Heh... Guess this means I'm her favorite!" He said with a sly little grin. In boredom, Free started flipping through the book, making sure to keep place of the page he was on.

The strange book listed all kinds of things about various beings. From frogs to bears, rabbits to wolves, and even an article on humans! But as Free looked at this particular section, he immediately notices something strange about it. The entire section was written in another language! Squinting a little, his finger trailed along different texts, trying his best to read them.

After a moment, Free snickered to himself. "This is stupid!" He said with a laugh, "Just listen to some of this dribble! What the heck is 'Bol'she bol'she rasti moe telo'?!" Free cackled, but just as he uttered those words, he felt a sudden jerk in his stomach!

Free's entire body started to heat up! He could feel his heart throbbing, reading to beat out of his very chest! He started to gasp for breath... And his left eye was starting to hurt! Little did Free know, his entire body was beginning to expand and grow! His traps were starting to rise and swell behind his head like bread rising in an oven! His shoulders shot outward, and as his thick, masculine arms bulked up even more, his sleeves were decimated, leaving him in only his black top. Down his arms, thick veins pushed their way to the surface, pumping even his forarms up bigger and stronger! The shock practically traveled back up his body, and Free's chest shot forward, causing him to knock down the pedestal before him! His pecs pushed out further, the once toned muscles doubling, tripling, quadrupling in size! The collar of his shirt tore down slightly, barely able to contain the two watermelon-sized muscles in his shirt! Free let out a roar, as his thighs and calves bulked up in unison, tearing his jail pants into tatters! The once proud wolf man now looked as if he was jammed into a pair of short shorts! Free's foot stomped down once, then twice, but on the second slam, his feet were nearly three times the size they were before! To top off his perfect body, his tanned, fuzzy behind pushed out further, not only making his new shorts feel tight, but his beautiful ass had grown so large, it actually peaked out the bottom of the shorts!

As it all slowed to a stop, Free fell down on his side, making a crash inside the room that shook everything! His sharp teeth were grit shut, as his face was a grimace of pain. Slowly, he started breathing normally, and opened his eyes. Ever so gently, he pulled himself up, and got to his feet. He then looked down at his body, and in a few short seconds, his tired face started to smile!

"This... This is me...?" Free panted. His hand reached up and touched his giant pectoral, and squeezed it gently through the fabric. He could feel it! Then his hand slid down, quickly reaching the end of the shirt and along his cobblestone abs. Free's face only grew happier as he came to realize all this! "I was pretty big before... But now this..." Free rose both of his arms, and flexed his biceps. The muscles erupted with power, both pumping up to their full size. "This just isn't fair!" Free laughed arrogantly.

"I'm not about to tell you, you bulky, brutish, behemoth!" A voice sharply reprimanded.

Free blinked and looked around. The voice didn't belong to Medusa or Eruka. It was too deep and masculine. He shrugged and went back to flipping through the pages. When he started growing, he had dropped the book, effectively losing both spots he was holding. He was less concerned about what Medusa might do at this point and more worried about finding a way to get even bigger!

"...How dare you ignore me! I am shocked, surprised, sickened! Now remove those grubby fingers of yours from off my pages!" The voice called forth once more.

"...Are you talking?" Free asked, poking at the book.

"Yes of course I am you dimwitted, dim bulbed, dummy!" It was clear now the voice was coming from between the pages. "I am a book of magic! All of the best books of magic can speak. I also serve as librarian of the information within. If you need to find a spell I am at your service!"

"Alright!" Free said with a grin. "Great, so how about you tell me where to find that growing spell?"

"Ohohohohoho! What kind of book do you take me for? I do not flip open my covers and let every passerby peer at my pages!" The voice said. "If you want me to help you you are going to have to help me!"

Free rolled his eyes and said, "Fine, what do you want me to do?"

"It's quite simple my good man! Merely help to escape from this place! I do not rightfully belong to that deceitful, dangerous, delinquent! She merely purloined my precious pages from a stronger magician."

"You're not going to tell me you're the Book of Eibon or something are you?" Free asked.

"Alas, no, I do not belong to a magician such as he! I am a lesser book of magic, though still powerful! The name of the magician is not important. You, however, may refer to me as BOM. Now, are you going to help me escape or not my huge, hulking, hombre?"

"If I do, you'll help me find the spell to make me bigger, right?" Free said, wanting to be sure.

"Yes, and more besides! I know more tricks than just simple growth! Together we can be an terrific, tremendous team!"

Free chuckled and said, "I like you, even if you are just a book. Okay, let's get out of here!"

Before BOM could complain about being referred to as "just a book", Free tucked him under one of his thick arms and carried him out of Medusa's base. It was surprisingly easy to steal the book from Medusa. Not a single magical trap tried to stop Free. Soon enough, he was out of the base. He ran as fast as he could away from it, getting about halfway between it and the nearest town before stopping under a tree to open the book again. "There! We're out. Now you'd better hold up your end of the bargain!"

"But of course! I am a book of my word! And I have many words within my beautiful, broad, body! Where would you like to begin?"

Free grinned and said, "Where else? The spell to make me bigger of course!"

"You have a rather one track mind. What specifically would you like to grow? Body part? Muscle? Height? I have many options to offer as obeisance."

Free scratched the stubble on his chin as he thought about it. He had never really considered the idea of growing individual body parts or growing taller without getting any more mass and vice versa. Not only that, but who knew what other kinds of powers he could find in the book? The possibilities were endless! But for now, he was happy with something simple. "Full body growth! Height, muscle, the works!"

BOM didn't speak. He merely flipped the pages for a few minutes until about halfway through the book. Free bent down over the page and scanned it. "Okay...so which one of these spells is it? There's like ten of them!"

"Third down from the top right column. Read those words and you shall grow huge, hung, and high!" BOM said.

Free quickly found the spell after that, reading the words much more confidently this time. He grinned as he set BOM down, eager for his changes to begin! Soon, the familiar pain engulfed his body again, though Free welcomed it this time, knowing that it was going to make him even bigger than he was now!
