Luckily for them, America was dumb as ever, and shrugged it off (tearing the seams of his shirt even further in the process) as he continued to walk. He was only about 5'9" upon leaving the store, but now he must have been at least 6'7"! In the short time he had walked home, he had nearly grew up an entire foot! But his height aside, there was something else that would grab any decent person's attention...

From being a generally thin man, perhaps with a little bit of pudge, America was now a large, beefy soldier! His rippling biceps straining against his jacket; they had long since broke free of their cocoon. His pecs made it impossible to button up the shirt he was wearing now, as his big healthy pecs bounced with every step he took. None could see it under the layers, but there was a solid row of abs under his shirt. Anyone who dared to throw a punch at his stomach would end up hurting themselves more than him! America's glutes had burst forth, leaving him with a bubbly, rounded ass which stuck out nicely in his skin-tight pants. Each cheek was huge, pressing against the other, and shaking with every step! His thighs were practically rubbing together as he walked, his calves so bulky that they rose his pants up slightly. As if all this wouldn't boost his confidence, the man's already admirable cock had gained some size of it's own, pressing against his boxers! America's shoes were torn a bit at the seams, which gave him a little freedom for now, but he'd be in a world of hurt if he didn't get out of them soon!

Germany, his eyes too focused on the titan that was walking down the sidewalk, accidentally floored the gas! With that, the car flew forward, rushing past America! The funny thing was, the momentum didn't even phase the giant man! He just watched as the speeding car zipped right past him!

"Whoa! What's their rush...?" America mumbled to himself. Shrugging again, he downed the rest of his fried and chugged his drink as he walked up the way back to his house. He tossed the trash into the bag, crumpling it up with relative ease as he entered through the doorway. "Is this really my house...?" He thought to himself, "That doorway is WAY too low..." Every step he took in his house seemed to shake everything, picture frames shaking on the wall, and the floor groaning just slightly under his weight.

America tossed his trash in the kitchen, looking onward when he suddenly saw something that was strange. Out of the corner of his eye, he saw something strange in the mirror in his hallway. As he took a step back and looked, he felt around his neck.

"What is this... Is that...!?" America looked down over his gargantuan body. "Whoa! Check me out dude! I'm totally ripped!" America laughed, his hands opening up the collar and popping open the buttons. He smile only grew wider as he looked down. "Damn, I look good! Check out those abs! And these pecs!" America ditched his gloves and rubbed his massive pecs in his hands, a tender moan escaping his lips as he did. "Oh man... How did this happen to me!?" He said, beginning to think.
15311.title: The Strongest Nation just got Stronger!

choices: America has some fun with the captive Germany
Italy thinks about Germany's instructions...
153111.content:
America kept groping his body all over, from his juicy pecs to his tight ass, loving how huge he looked and how powerful he felt! He had always been incredibly strong for his age, but now he was like the perfect super soldier! Anyone who had looked down on him or considered him a childish nuisance would think twice about saying anything nasty about him or try to fight him! America's thoughts began to drift to the men he was fighting, the Axis nations. He had never really considered Italy to be too much of a threat and now he'd probably wet his pants just looking at America! Japan was harder to read, being so much quieter, but America had a feeling that they could get along sometime in the future, once this whole war thing was over. It was Germany that gave him the most trouble! That tall, fierce blond man had always stood in his way no matter what he did. It drove him crazy! America smirked as he flexed his biceps, the vein covered mounds rising up impressively from his thick arms. "I'd like to see that sausage loving weirdo beat me now!"

A light bulb seemed to go off in America's head. "Hey! I'm huge! What's stopping me from kidnapping Germany and stopping this whole war right now?"

He grinned and punched his palm with his hand, overflowing with even more confidence than he normally did! His shirt was all but ruined, but his jacket was still fitting pretty well so he didn't bother to try and change his clothes. His shoes were more like flapping rags of canvas around his thick feet and his pants were way too tight and torn in several places but the young nation didn't seem to care in the slightest. Why should he hide his awesome body anyway? He quickly made his way out the door and ran down the street, heading for Germany's house.

Germany himself slammed the door on his truck, a look of anger on his face. Italy and Japan both got out of the vehicle rather slowly, not liking the expression Germany was wearing. Before they could so much as say a single word, however, Germany slammed his fist against the hood of the car, denting the metal rather severely and shouted, "We're done here! Go home!"

Japan bowed quickly before beating a hasty retreat. Italy, however, looked at Germany with a hurt and worried look on his face. "Hey, Germany...It's-a okay! Just because America got really big all of a sudden doesn't mean we can't win!"

Germany sighed and pinched the bridge of his nose. "Ja Italy...sure. Thank you. But I vould rather be alone right now. Go home and get some rest. Ve'll come up with a new plan tomorrow."

Italy smiled and nodded. "That's-a the Germany I know! I'm-a going to get a real good night's sleep and make you proud tomorrow! Promise!"

He ran off with a big goofy smile on his face. Germany couldn't help but smile a little himself. As soon as Italy was out of sight Germany stretched and headed into his house, eager to take a shower and just relax for awhile.

America, panting slightly, arrived in front of Germany's house in record time! He cracked his knuckles and walked up to Germany's door, knocking on it three times, the wood splintering slightly under his huge fist. America crossed his arms and waited for Germany to answer, his eyes wandering around the yard slightly. He did a double take as soon as he saw the car sitting in the drive way. "Hey...wasn't that car in that weird burger place?"

America closed his eyes, searching his memory. In fact...that burger place had been run by three guys who had looked very familiar...Another light bulb went off in America's head. This was a good day for him~ He almost never got any real bright ideas! He snapped his fingers as he realized that it had been Germany, Japan, and Italy who had been running that burger place! And he hadn't started growing until after he ate there! Which meant that they must have been the cause of it! "Wow! That's really nice of them to do this to me! I mean, I'm their enemy!"

He chuckled to himself as Germany finally opened the door. He was dressed in a dark green tank top with a light pair of nylon shorts, his feet bare. His hair was wet, the slickness gone out of it entirely. It was clear that he had just recently got done with a shower. His neutral look suddenly turned to one of pure shock and horror as he saw who was waiting on his door step! Moving on instinct, he tried to slam the door closed. Before the door could shut, however, America grabbed it, forcing it back open. Germany stumbled, moving back and heading for the nearest drawer. He had weapons stored all over his house. He wasn't about to allow this home invasion to continue! America calmly walked inside, closing the door behind him before advancing on Germany. "Hey dude! I don't know why you did this for me, but thanks! That makes you pretty awesome in my book! Too bad I gotta capture you and all!"

Germany gave up looking for a weapon and just ran. He was no coward but he was also no fool. America at his current size could easily overpower him in seconds. If he wanted to get out of this, he was going to need some back up! He made a beeline for the nearest phone, America hot on his heels.

"Dude! Don't run! Let's do this the easy way for once!"

Germany picked up the phone and swiftly dialed Italy's number. Before the ditzy nation could answer, America had grabbed the receiver, tugging it out of Germany's hand. He carelessly dropped it, the receiver dangling near the floor. "Okay dude! We'll do this the hard way then!"

America charged forward like an angry bull, wrapping Germany up in a big bear hug before falling to the floor, his full weight pressing down on Germany's body. Germany let out a gasp, his lungs emptying of air as he slammed into the ground. America quickly got back on his feet, pinning the smaller man's arms at his sides as he picked him up. "Don't bother struggling! I've got you!"

Germany, weakened by the assault, could barely breath, let alone fight back. America slung Germany over his shoulder and headed for the door. As they passed by the dangling receiver, Germany could faintly hear Italy's voice calling out to him, wondering what he wanted. Glancing over at America to make sure he wasn't paying attention, Germany knocked over a vase. America stopped as the pottery shattered in front of him, distracting him. Germany used this time to quickly pick up the receiver and whisper. "Take the canister in your fridge...drink it...and go to America's house!"

Germany, being the cunning nation he was, had hidden the Supersize Me chemical in Italy's house, positive that he would be too dumb to actually notice it. This way, his secret project was kept safe and hidden and no one would tamper with it. Whether or not Italy would follow his instructions was to be seen. It didn't take America long to recover from the shock of the broken vase. Once he was sure there wasn't a ghost or anything scary like that around, he quickly left the house, running down the street back towards his own home.

Germany stared back at America, who was slowly approaching him. Germany scrambled backwards, trying to get away, only to fall off the sofa in doing so! Germany could hear a loud "THUD!" with every step the muscular titan took tword him. America let out a dark chuckle as he cracked his knuckles.

"N-No! Stay back!" Germany shouted. His hands reached around from something to throw, before finally landing on a television remote. Germany chucked it at America, only to miss and hit his chest! It bounced right off of America's thick, engorged pecs, which he then flexed in retaliation.

Not to mention he outweighted him by fifty, if not a good few hundred pounds! Germany gulped, before his fist pulled back, and nailed America right in his abs!

"Augh! Mein Gott!" Germany groaned, shaking his hand. America just laughed once more, before then picking Germany up by the front of his shirt.

"Looks like it's my turn!" He grinned. His massive arm pulled back, and jabbed right into Germany's tender belly! Germany coughed, before America let him fall to the ground. He curled up, holding his stomach, as America knocked him over on his stomach with his giant foot. America then pounded his foot onto Germany's back, causing the tiny blonde man to cry out in pain. America snickered, lifting his foot back up. He picked Germany right back up, and gave him a hug... It seemed innocent at first, and Germany didn't fight back, until America then began to squeeze him as hard as he could! Germany began to groan once more, as America had an arrogant, smug little smile on his face.

America smiled, loosening his grip on Germany only to shove the helpless male's face into his pecs. "You feel those? You smell those? That's what a REAL man smells like! Musky! Powerful! Unlike you, you twiggy little girl!"

Germany wanted to reply. His burning spirit so desperately wanted to bite back, but his body felt so worn down, talking back was impossible! America rose his foot up, and enveloped Germany's face.

"Heh, you're so small my foot could crush your head!" America bragged on. He put a little pressure, making Germany moan a little. Then Germany heard his tormentor say the last thing he wanted to head.

"Lick it." America ordered. There was a brief pause, where nothing was said. "Did I stutter, dude!? I told you to lick my damned foot like the worthless bug you are!" America demanded, putting even more pressure on Germany's face! Not wanting to end up a mess on the floor, Germany weakly stuck his tongue out and gave America's foot a tiny lick. America just chuckled. "Yeah... More!" America ordered. Germany whimpered for a moment, actually shaking for a second. He closed his eyes tight, and put his whole tongue into it, licking all over America's toes, as well as the top of his foot! A thick, heavy musk penetrated Germany's nose, not to mention it was now being wiped all over his tongue. In mere seconds, America had made Germany his bitch. America's thick toes flexed a little, as if a warning if Germany stopped without being told.

After a good few minutes, America took his foot off of Germany, and smiled down at him. "Looks like you're starting to get it..." America chuckled. Before Germany could move, he could see his beefy tormentor start to shuffle around! Without giving Germany a chance to escape, America sat right on top of him! The powerful nation's ass was right before Germany's face, barely contained in a pair of Stars and Stripes boxers. They were like two large, round orbs that pinned down his entire body! Germany let out a long groan as he could feel America's full weight on top of him. It was like music to the giant's ears.

"I really have to thank you!" America said, looking behind him and down at Germany. He then flexed his back, the powerful wall suddenly growing longer! "If it wasn't for you, I never would have become this hot, irresistable stud I am now!"

"Y-You wait..." Germany choked out. America rose an eyebrow, listening to what Germany had to say. "Once Italy get here with zhat mixture, I'll be sure you pay!" Germany barked.

"Italy...?" America repeated. It was then the little hamster wheel in his head began to work. "You mean that wimpy little thing has more of this stuff!?"

"Grk!" Germany gulped, as he realized what he just said.

"Dude, that's awesome! How about me and you pay him a little visit?" America said with an evil grin.

"No! No! I-I mean... I have it! It's in my pocket right now!" Germany said, trying to stall for time.

"No way!" America replied, "If you did, you would have drank it by now! Come on!" America said, as he got up and jerked Germany up, tossing him over his shoulder.

Heading right out the door, America began to take a trip to go visit the weakest nation he had ever known.

Italy looked around the room, trying to find an escape route...but there simply was none! America was blocking the window and the bed was blocking the door! Escape was impossible! Unless...Italy looked down at the canister. It was a desperate move...but what choice did he have? He quickly began unscrewing the lid of the canister, his fingers fumbling slightly as he hurried. "Woah! Hey, don't do that!" America shouted, quickly moving toward Italy!

This, of course, caught Italy's attention, who finally looked down. His first response was surprise.

"Wh-Whoa whoa whoa!" Italy shouted, hardly able to believe his eyes! Beyond his bouncing, bulging pecs, his thighs had begun to press against each other with the pure mass that was slowly filling them. Italy's height was shooting upward, as he soon found himself just short of eight feet tall! And he wasn't even done growing yet! His calves slowly grew heavy and beefed, leaving his pants even higher than they were before, as his feet now burst from his shoes, one massive toe at a time. Italy laughed happily as he saw this, thinking it was almost like a game!

As his growth finally rounded out, he looked over himself, amazed at how massive, how powerful he felt now! He raised his arm and gave it a hard flex, watching as the muscles bunched up and tightened, forming a hardened peak. Italy then hoisted his other arm and did the same, laughing happily to himself.

"This is-a so cool!" He cheered happily, "I can't-a wait to show Germany the new me!"

Italy, even more excited than he was before, began running off to Germany's house.
1531112.title: That's Not Pasta!

choices: Italy finds another canister in his fridge and drinks it! Time to save Germany!
America dominates Germany, showing him who the stronger nation is!
15311122.content:
Italy ran as fast as he could towards Germany's house, his now much longer, thicker legs propelling him forward at even greater speeds than normal! It would no doubt piss Germany off, but if Italy was still the same coward as he was before, he would be running away from trouble even faster now! But those thoughts were far from everyone's heads as Italy continued on his way to Germany's house.

At the same time, America was still running away from Germany's house, the cocky nation carrying the strict nation over his shoulder like he was a bag of laundry. He wanted to get back to his house as soon as possible so they could start negotiating victory or at least press an advantage against the other nations! He was so focused on his mission, America didn't even notice Italy barreling towards him from the other direction. Italy, for his part, was too fascinated with how his new muscles bounced and moved as he ran to notice America coming right at him! Predictably, both nations crashed headlong into each other!

America and Italy were flung back onto their asses, America's glasses flying off and skittering on the ground. "Ah! Oh man! Not Texas!"

Italy groaned as he laid out on his back, feeling dizzy. He sat up and saw America searching for something. "H-Hey! Did you lose something?" He asked, not noticing Germany who was bound and gagged behind America.

America squinted, unable to tell who was talking to him without his glasses. "Uh...yeah! My glasses are missing!"

"Here, let me help you look for them!" Italy said, getting onto his hands and knees to search for the eye wear.

"Oh man! Thanks dude! You're a lifesaver!"

"It's a-no problem!"

Germany, a vein popping out of his forehead, struggled and tried to shout, doing anything he could to get Italy's attention. Italy was too focused on helping America to notice, however. It was hard to tell if Italy had even noticed who exactly it was he was helping. His good nature seemed to be overriding what little common sense he had. Soon enough, Italy found the glasses. "Hey! I found your glasses!"

America quickly crawled over to Italy and grabbed them. "Awesome! Thanks again dude!"

America slipped the glasses back on and blinked at Italy, both men just smiling at each other...

And then recognition settled in.

"Holy crap it's Italy!" America shouted, pointing at Italy.

"AAAAAH! It's America!" Italy screamed in fear, turning to run.

America hoisted Germany over his shoulder, Italy taking notice before he ran off. "Hey! You have Germany!"

"He's my prisoner now! And there's nothing you can do about it!"

"O-Oh yeah? Just a-watch me!" Italy said, raising his fists up, though he was visibly trembling. America snickered and shifted Germany slightly, getting him in a more comfortable position on his shoulder.

"You've got to be kidding me! We may be about the same size but I'm still way stronger than you!" America boasted, raising his own fists up. "Come and get some if you think you can handle me!"

Italy gulped but charged forward, his fists swinging wildly. America held out his hand and pressed his palm against Italy's forehead. Italy's fists stopped just short of America's face. Try as he might, Italy couldn't move any closer. America gave Italy a shove, knocking the weaker nation onto his butt again. "Toldja!" America said, arrogantly bouncing his pecs. "Don't mess with the hero!"

He started running again, leaving a dejected Italy behind. He looked like he was about to cry. "I...I couldn't save Germany! One of my best friends and now he's been captured! It's not a-fair! Why can't I be stronger?"

He sniffled a bit and got to his feet. He started walking aimlessly down the sidewalk, trying to think of something he could do. About halfway to his house it suddenly hit him! There were multiple canisters of that stuff Germany made in his fridge! One canister had made both America and Italy the same size! If Italy were to drink another one of the canisters he would get bigger and stronger than America! Then he could rescue Germany! A big smile broke over his face as he realized this. "Don't worry Germany! Big Italy is going to a-save your butt!"

He started running back towards his house with renewed vigor! Meanwhile, America had finally managed to make it to his house. He tossed Germany onto his bed and crossed his arms. "Now I got you right where I want you dude! If I can keep you here this war is as good as over!"

Germany snorted derisively. He obviously didn't agree with America's proclamations.

"If you're waiting for that weak little nation to come save you, you're going to be waiting over a hundred years! There's no way that shrimp will ever beat me!"

Germany sighed, his struggling stopping for now. America was an idiot, but he did have a point. It would take a miracle for Italy to come through and save him now...
15311122.title: Limits

choices: Two salesmen! At least, that's how America saw it.
It was England! He popped by to go over some notes for tomorrow's meeting.
15312.content:
America didn't seem to notice at the moment, but every bite he took traveled down his throat. The moment that savory food hit his stomach, it immediately pushed out just a little bit further! He didn't seem to notice after the first few bites, but after a while he could feel his pants starting to get a little tight!

"Man, this feeling again? I barely ate!" America mumbled to himself. Making a quick glance around, he undid his pants button, but kept his zipper up! America kept walking, eating his food as he moved. Every bite was making him bloat out like a balloon! By the time he finished his burger and started his fries, he must have put on at least twenty pounds! His clothes were getting tighter on him, as his soft chest was rubbing up against his shirt! His waistline had pushed out considerably, his red, white, and blue striped boxers just barely visible! His fat thighs were getting a little cozy in his pants as he continued to walk.

As if all this wasn't bad enough, every fry he ate seemed to add on another pound!

"Yes! It is working!" Germany said happily, "Look at zhat fatass! He cannot stop!"

America soon stopped to sit on a bench, feeling a bit tired out for a reason he didn't know...

"Aw man! I'm sweating up a storm! Is it really that hot out...?" He asked himself, shielding his eyes as he looked up at the sky. He was sipping the last of his soda now, which had also only served to make him even fatter! America looked like an overstuffed doll in his own clothes! Every inch was stretched wide over his newly plumped up body! It was at this moment America looked down at his swollen gut. "Dude!" He said loudly! "... That place was a total ripoff! I'm not even full!" He then said, not even seeming to notice or care at how large he had gotten! "Aw man, this really sucks... I was hoping I wouldn't have to cook for myself..." He whined. Getting back up, he started to walk again, ditching his garbage in the nearby garbage can. He was making his way back home now, not even seeming to notice the three sets of eyes peeking out from the bushes!

"It-a looks like he's going-a back home..." Italy said softly.

"Ja... Vhat shall ve do from here...?" He asked his cohorts quietly.

"Ah! I have an idea!" Japan said suddenly, "Germany, Itary! You two will possu as sarusumen." He told them, "I will sneak into the fat one's kitchen and put Supahsize in all hissa food." Japan explained.

"Japan, zhat... Is brilliant!" Germany said, "And Italy and myself can pose as energy drink sales men, but zhe drink will also have the chemical in it!" He said, having his own stroke of genius! "Stupid Americas like him love energy drinks! Gohd only knows vhy..."

- - -


America, who had arrived at his own home, was making something for himself. A classic American comfort food known as Macaroni and Cheese! It wasn't hard to make, so a simple-minded man like him could make it if was told how! America was right in the middle of making the cheese sauce when he heard a ring at the door! Turning the heat down just a little so it wouldn't burn, America made his way over to the door. By now, he was wearing a fresh pair of light blue boxers and a white tanktop. He hadn't planned on leaving the house again today.

As America opened the door, he was greeted by...
15312.title: Fast Food Nation

choices: Germany kicks his training into high gear, pushing himself hard!
There's a package for Germany from Japan.
Italy wants to help Germany~
1532.content:
It was the middle of the night and deathly quiet over at Germany's house. He was sitting up in his study, head resting on his hand as he looked over all the various documents spread across the table, his tired looking blue eyes scanning left and right. His big hand would occasionally shift papers around but it was a listless motion. He seemed incredibly unmotivated which was very, very strange considering his usual strict attitude. He picked up a smaller scrap of paper with a wince, looking over the figures listed there. He sighed deeply and shook his head. "Nein, nein, nein, zhis is no gut."

He crumpled the paper up and tossed it away. He had been training exercises all day with Italy and Japan and things had gone even worse today than they normally did! While Italy was always a wild card, today he was particularly rambunctious, barely paying attention, playing with the cats, and running away at the slightest provocation! Japan, on the other hand, had spent the day sitting under a tree, writing a haiku while eating three rice balls. Germany had barely paid him any attention in return. When Japan got into a weird mood like that, it was best to just to let him work through things on his own.

"Zhis whole operation is a complete disaster!" Germany muttered, slamming his beefy fist against the table, his bicep flexing irritably. "Zhey are both uncontrollable, und ridiculous, und completely insane! Vhat can I do to make them listen to me?!"

He at least knew why Italy had been acting up today. He had had a dream about his grandfather, the Roman Empire. This happened from time to time and it always put Italy in the best of moods. Unfortunately, for Germany, this also meant that the man visited them, pestering Germany all night while never once even attempting to wake his grandson up and actually talk to him! So not only did Italy act like a complete ninny as a result but Germany lost a full nights sleep! It was a lose lose no matter how it was presented! Last night had been no different. That arrogant former empire had strutted right up to the side of the bed, with no shame, and asked, "Hey, you a think I'm sexy right?"

"Dumkoff!" Germany had shouted, ready to slap the brazen man. "How should I know if you are sexy or not?! Go talk to a voman for that kind of information!"

"Aw come on Mr. Sauerkraut~" Rome had said gleefully, stretching Germany's cheeks into a smile. "You are always so a serious! Don't you ever lighten up? There's nothing wrong with a two men admiring each others bodies! Just ask a Greece!"

Germany had kicked Rome in the face at this time, forcing the older man to let go of his face, though it also pulled Germany from his bed, landing face first on Rome's ample pecs! The nation had blushed fiercely, struggling to escape, but Rome had clamped his arms around him, biceps bulging, and grinned. "Yeah, see?~ You know you a like it! I always did a want to try having some fun with another man you know!"

Germany had struggled even harder at that point, but Rome held him completely at his mercy! The former empire had just laughed though, and let him go, getting to his feet. "Si, si, anyway, take a look, tell me a what you think!"

Germany had watched, dumbfounded, as Rome stripped down his to waist, revealing his chiseled, manly upper body, just slightly hairy around the abs and chest and along his arms, giving him a virile look that Germany, in the back of his mind, couldn't help but admire. Rome grinned as he flexed, his biceps bulging, his pecs dancing at his command, giving Germany quite a little show. "So? What do you think? Totally a sexy right? I bet you're wishing right now that my little a grandson will grow up to be as big and sexy as me, ah?~"

"Vell he vould certainly FIGHT better if zhat were the case..." Germany had mumbled, distracted by Rome's antics. "Vhy can't you just leave me alone? I'm very tired tonight..."

But Rome had completely ignored him, jabbering on and showering off every aspect of his body, only leaving once Germany had pulled a gun on him to prevent him from exposing himself fully. By the time he had left, Italy was just waking up and the madness had begun.

"How did such an irresponsible und shameless man ever command an entire empire? It makes no sense!" Germany complained, getting up from the table and pacing around the room, his hands behind his back. "Vhat could possibly have drawn people to him?"

He stopped in front of a mirror, glancing at himself within it. He was pretty well built, with his baseball sized biceps and bulging pecs, barely contained now in a tank top. He gently groped his chest, raising an eyebrow. "Hmm...all of my training is finally paying off...I hadn't noticed before..."

Suddenly, something in his mind clicked. That was it! Rome might have been a total ditz, completely crazy, and a hormone driven moron, but he was able to command respect through his muscles! "Zhat dumkoff held me tight and I couldn't move even one muscle! Zhat MUST be how he vas respected! If I vas bigger und stronger Japan and Italy would HAVE to listen to me, no matter vhat!"

There was a gleam in his eye as he came to this conclusion, his hands tightening into fists. "So be it! I must throw myself into my training harder zhen ever! I will bulk myself up until Italy and Japan are quaking in fear at my very presence! Vhen I say jump, zhey will say how high!"

He was so excited, he didn't realize how loudly his deep voice was echoing through the house. His study door opened a crack and Italy stuck his head in, sleepily rubbing his eyes. "Hey, Germany? Why are you being a so loud? Come back to bed, ah? Pleeeeease? I'm a so cold in there all by myself!"

Germany sighed and walked over to Italy, ruffling his hair. He was feeling more calmly now that he had a plan of action, not to mention how tired he felt. "Ja, ja, Italy, I'm done. Let's go to bed." He had long since stopped fighting the fact that Italy slept with him. No matter what he did, the little nation was always in his bed in the morning. It was pointless to fight it. When they got back to Germany's room, Italy immediately jumped into bed, pulling the covers back for Germany. Germany slipped in and sighed, closing his eyes. Italy immediately snuggled up close to him, wrapping his thin arms around Germany's more burly body, rubbing his face against the side of Germany's chest.

"That's a so much better~ How are you so bulgy and yet so soft Germany?~" He asked with a smile.

"Never mind zhat Italy. Just go to sleep, alright?" Germany mumbled, already half asleep himself.

Italy nodded and did so, both men soon fast asleep.

The next morning...
1532.title: Learn From the Past

choices: The slurping of pasta! Italy was sitting right there!
The sipping of tea! Japan had let himself in!
15321.content:
Thankfully with Italy in his arms, Germany didn't get woken up by Rome. It was annoying to have someone cling to you at all hours of the night, but if it meant not having to lose sleep over having some ghost trying to molest you, it was sometimes worth the price.

Germany woke up the next morning, trying to shake off that morning grogginess as fast as he could. He got himself a hot cup of black coffee and started sipping it down quickly. It was hot, but nothing a powerful German couldn't take! He finished it as fast as he could, trying to imagine all the exercises he could pull off to try to get even buffer than he already was! Germany was determined to get big, and get big as fast as he could!

... Now that he thought about it, how did Rome get so big all of a sudden? There had to have been some way for an old man like that to get so massive so quick...

"... N-Nein! His is just und apparition!" Germany assured himself as he shook his head! "Of course he got so huge so quick, he just has to imagine it!" Germany nodded to himself as he made his way to his basement where he had some old weights and a weight bench. Heading down, dressed in nothing more than black tanktop and cameo pants, he was getting himself psyched up, imagining his future as the biggest, most hulking nation of them all! Commanding power that no other living nation could ever have!

Germany got to his basement, and started looking around, "Ah, here zey are." He said to himself as he picked up some old free weights. "Vell, better get to it!"

Germany immediately began doing bicep curls, watching himself in his wall mirror as he went! "I'll be huge! Beyond huge! Zhose puny nations von't even know how to handle me!" He smiled a little, watching as his biceps were already starting to swell. The veins slowly started to rise up against his skin, the every little striated muscle visible as he pushed himself! It didn't take long for him to start working up a sweat, which beaded down his body!

Germany stopped after a few minutes, setting the weights down as gasping softly. "Ja... Not bad... Not bad..." He said to himself, looking at himself in the mirror. "Hmph, I sink I'm getting bigger already!" He stood straight up, flexing his biceps! He was sure they looked even bigger than when he started! The bulging muscles throbbed slightly as he held them in this position, making the beefy nation grin. He smirked as he then said, "Maybe I should vork on mein legs before I start working on zhe pecs..." He mumbled. Grabbing his weights and resting them on his shoulders, he then started to do squats! Hunching down and flexing his tight thighs and muscled ass outward with every rep he did. He grinned, going again and again! "Oh ja! Zhat feels good!" He said with a grin, feeling the burn in his muscles. It was fantastic! In his mind, he felt like he was getting bigger with every squat!

There was about ten minutes this time, before Germany dropped the weights and fell back on his ass! "M-Mein Gott... Zhat... Ahhh..." He groaned, taking a breather~ "Hm... I should have brought und canteen..." He thought as he looked down. He then sat back up and walked over to his weight bench where he could move onto working his pecs. He looked into the mirror, feeling a bit more worn down than he was thought he'd be. Then again, he was working a lot harder than normal!

It was just then that Germany saw Rome in the mirror! He was standing tall, flexing his biceps that bulged up to the size of cantaloupes! He was laughing boisterously as he had the other nations at his feet, on their knees and begging to be kept safe by one so powerful and huge! Germany felt the fire in his belly reignite as he saw this! He wanted to be that man!

Laying on his back, he held the free weights once more and started lifting them to work out his pecs! It was nothing at first, but he kept on going! He wanted to feel that burn, and he wanted to get huge! It wasn't long before the muscles were red, squeezing against each other as he completed a rep! He grunted, pushing harder and harder, wanting that size, that power! He kept going, faster, doing as many as he could before he got tired! And then one more! Germany was sweating bullets. He could smell his own odor in the air, sharp and pungent. It was pure adrenaline and only made him want to work harder!

After what seemed like hours, Germany emerged from his basement with a towel over his shoulder. His basement was steaming warm and smelled of a powerful musk. His muscles were bulging and red! His pecs were barely fitting into his shirt, his nipples poking out of either end! They were going stiff as soon as he stepped out, the air so comparably cold! He got goosebumps, shuddering a little and making his muscles shake. His biceps were the size of a grapeshot after having been pushed so far! Germany groaned a little, deciding to take a little rest on his couch before he would get back into working out! This was turning out to be a lot of work... But Germany was determined to reach his goal!

Germany rested on his couch, sprawled out like some American. He was snapped to as he suddenly heard...
15321.title: Hardcore German... Training

choices: England
Italy
Other
1533.content: How about some of the other Allied or Axis Powers?
1533.title: Hetalia Men -- Part 2

choices: America annoys England during the meeting. He grows quite a lot!
America is out sick. England keeps his composure and barely grows.
15331.content:
"Curse this bloody chalkboard!" England muttered as he stretched as high as he could, putting the finishing touches on one of the many drawings he habitually drew in the conference room. Usually he stood on a stool to get the top row done but someone had moved it to a different room and he didn't have time to look for it. He let out a sigh, setting the chalk down and dusting his hands...only to notice that he had smudged the lower row of drawings, getting chalk dust all over himself. "Confound it! I don't have time for this nonsense!"

He huffed and brushed himself off, irritably grabbing the chalk again to sketch the drawings over again. This wasn't the first time he had been inconvenienced thanks to his size. As the shortest among the Allied Powers it was easy to overlook him. Luckily he always loudly voiced his opinions, making sure that no one ever forgot he was there. "I'm the second strongest nation besides America! And yet all anyone ever sees when they look at me is a shrimp who drinks tea! That damn frog and that blowhard are the worst of them all!" England said to himself, slashing through the drawings. "If I was the one in control I'd have this whole outfit whipped into shape so fast those wankers wouldn't even know what hit them!"

Breathing heavily, his drawings finished, he glared at the little cartoon heads of France and America. He looked over at the drawings of the Axis Powers. Idiot Italy, reclusive Japan, and Germany. He was the only one who had any kind of intimidation factor. He was tall, strong, and strict to the point that even his allies were nervous around him. Now that was respect! "How does he do it? I'm loud and confident! I'm strict! Why does America not respect me?!"

He moved over to the opposite side of the chalkboard and started aimlessly doodling. "Let's see...What does Germany look like? Tall...strong...hmm..." England drew America and France chibi sized next to a normal sized Germany. They looked up at him with fear on their faces. England erased Germany's head and drew his own in its place, a confident and arrogant expression firmly in place. "That's it!" England shouted happily, tossing the chalk down. "I need to be taller and stronger! Than they'll finally learn some respect!"

He quickly erased the drawing to make sure no one would be wise to his plan and dashed out the door. He always came into the conference room early to draw on the chalkboard so he had plenty of time before the meeting actually began. He ran all the way back to his house and and ran upstairs to his room. He skidded to a halt in front of his book case and looked over his shoulder before pulling one halfway out. With a loud clunking sound, the mechanism in the bookcase activated, swinging the heavy oak case forward. England walked through the opening, closing the bookcase behind him, walking carefully down a flight of stone stairs. "Now, I could work out diligently for hours every day until I'm ripped like Germany but not only would that take too long, I would still be as short as I am. No, there's only one way to get what I want, fast!"

He kicked open a door at the bottom of the stairs and threw his arms out to his sides. "Black magic!"

Laughing darkly to himself, England quickly pulled on his robe and moved over to a large table. On top of it was a thick leather bound book, a cauldron, and several strange items including a dark crystal, a brown skull, and a silver hand mirror inscribed with strange runes. England flipped the book open and started turning the pages rapidly. "There's got to be something in here...I just have to find it!"

The book was over a thousand pages long, with no table of contents, every spell, potion, charm, and curse randomly ordered. If the book didn't want him to find a certain spell, he wouldn't be able to find it. "Come on...I need something to make me grow!"

The next page England turned, he saw the heading "Growth: By Potion or Spell". "Aha! Perfect!" England said with glee, running his finger down the page. "Let's see...well, this seems simple enough. Why have I never tried this before? Hah!"

He quickly set about getting the ingredients down for a growth potion. His spells had been...less than perfect in a lot of cases (mostly relating to Russia) so he was trying his luck with a potion this time. In about half an hour, the potion was bubbling in the cauldron. With a flourish, England pulled the spoon out and held up a flask, tipping the cauldron so the thick green liquid poured into a flask. "At last! Now I'll finally get some respect!"

England poured the potion into a tea cup, filling it to the brim. "Niceties must be observed. It IS almost teatime."

He stripped the robe off and, with one arm behind his back, his posture erect, he sipped the potion. It actually tasted not unlike his usual cup of tea! He was quickly able to finish it off, draining the cup in a few minutes. He set the cup down and stood in front of his full length mirror, his hands on his hips. He waited...and waited...and waited...and nothing! "Damn! Just another dud! I should burn that bloody book!"

He irritably kicked a small stool over, heading back upstairs. He had a meeting to get to after all. He was the first one there, again, so he took his seat at the conference table and folded his hands, glaring at the wall. He wasn't going to let America get away with a single thing in the meeting today! Little did England know, the potion had actually worked perfectly! The growth was only triggered by a specific action, making him grow bigger every time it happened. The angrier he got, the more he would grow! Already his body was slowly starting to change as he fumed in his seat.
15331.title: Not so Jolly old England

choices: Yoshimori
Gen
Others...
154.content: A few great choices here...!
154.title: Kekkaishi Men

choices: He had grown taller!
He grew bigger AND stronger!
His little flab had become a rounded potbelly!
1541.content:
It was very late at night, and Yoshimori had just finished a shower. Working as a kekkaishi at night, not to mention when you got ayakashi entrails all over you, really left you a mess. As Yoshimori stood in front of the half-steamed mirror, he grinned at himself. For always being called average, he still had confidence! Although, as his eyes wandered down a little, his grin broke a little.

Maybe the steam was playing tricks on his eyes, but it almost looked like he had got a little flab around the waist lately... "Man, I really gotta cut back on the cakes..." Yoshimori mumbled to himself. He stretchd upward, his arms over his head. "But I can't just quit my passion! Baking is so much fun!" He chuckled. "Guess it couldn't hurt to just give the cakes away instead of eating them though..." Yoshimori kept going back and forth with himself, trying to decide what was best for him.

After a vigorous towling on his hair, he slipped into some pajamas, and headed up for his bedroom. After getting his bed out, and setting his alarm for school the next morning, and laid his head back on his pillow. His weight issue was easily the first thing on his mind. While it wasn't a huge issue, it was best to catch it now while he still could.

"Couldn't hurt to work out a little more..." Yoshimori thought as he laid in his bed. "I'm always practicing my kekkai, but I don't really do much with my body..." Yoshimori turned onto his side, looking out the window. "It'd be nice if there was a way to lose this weight faster..." Yoshimori's eyes then sprung wide open as he sat up in his bed. "Wait, I think we had a scroll in the shed about this..." The young Kekkaishi then reached into his desk and got a small flashlight, before heading out the door.

Yoshimori opened the front door quietly, and ran over to the shed. In doing so, he ended up waking Madarao, who sleepily looked around, trying to find out what was making the noise. As he spotted Yoshimori, he floated over, not consciously knowing who it was.

With a little muscle, Yoshimori pulled open the door to the shed and clicked on his tiny flashlight. With a smile on his face, he wandered right on in, and behind him, Madarao.

As Yoshimori shuffled through the dusty scolls, Madarao snuck right up behind him. "What are you doing...?" The dog asked sleepily.

Yoshimori let out a loud yelp as he sprang forward into a pile of scrolls. "Wh-What the... Madarao!" He shouted, pointing at the ghost dog. "What are you doing here!?"

"I could ask you the same thing you know..." Madarao replied, yawning as he kept one eye open on Yoshimori.

"I..." Before Yoshimori could utter another word, a scroll konked him on his head from above. "Ow!" Yoshimori grit his teeth unhappily as he grabbed ahold of the scroll. He searched for his tiny flashlight, which he had dropped, and began to look over the scroll. He grinned happily. "Hey, this is it! The scoll to transmute human matter!" Yoshimori chuckled. He dashed passed the sleepy Madarao outside to the front lawn where he could have the help of the full moon to read the scroll. Madarao followed out shortly after.

Yoshimori was laughing quietly to himself as he read the scroll. Some of the parts of it were faded and unreadable, but he got the general idea! He started to draw a pattern in the front lawn using the handle end of the flashlight as a temporary trowel. Madarao fluttered and looked over Yoshimori's shoulder.

"... You know, there was something about this that didn't quite work..." Madarao mumbled, "But I don't remember what..."

"I don't care! I just wanna lose this weight!" Yoshimori snapped right back at him.

"Weight?" Madarao looked Yoshimori over, "But you look just fine, I don't see any weight problem..."

"Just don't worry about it!" Yoshimori replied, "I know what I'm doing!" Madarao looked at Yoshimori, seeing the determination in his eyes. Madarao shrugged, not thinking much more on the subject. If he wanted to do this, it was his choice. The dog was just wishing he could remember why this spell wasn't a good idea in the first place... He was still so drowsy from working today.

Yoshimori stepped into the center of the symbol, as the instructions read. "Alright! Now I just create a kekkai..." In mere seconds, a blue kekkai formed around Yoshimori. Gradually, it turned from it's blue color to purple, then red! Yoshimori smiled as he looked around. "Hey! It's working! Madarao! It's working!" Yoshimori laughed. Eventually the kekkai turned from red to purple and then back to blue. Yoshimori lowered the kekkai, and lifted his shirt. To his dismay, the flab remained.

"Dammit, I must not have done it right!" He growled unhappily.

"Come on, Yoshimori, go back to bed..." Madarao complained, inching back tword his dog house. Yoshimori just yawned.

"Yeah... I guess I should sleep..." He agreed weakly. He dragged his feet along the ground to hide that he had done anything, before carelessly tossing the scroll back into the shed, and closing the door. With one final yawn, he made his way back inside his house.

Yoshimori would be in for a big surprise tomorrow to find...
1541.title: Body and Spirit

choices: Yoshimori doesn't go through a lot of change... Until P.E. comes around!
Yoshimori jumps the gun and shows off to his friends at school!
15412.content:
Yoshimori woke up the next morning to his own accord. Which was surprising since normally he never wanted to wake up in the mornings! As the young man rubbed his eyes, he grabbed his towel and made his way to the bathroom.

Leaving his clothes in a pile in the corner, Yoshimori began to run the water for a shower. The steam was quickly starting to fill up the room, and Yoshimori hopped right in.

"H-Hot! Hot!" He shouted out, his voice echoing in the small room, before his body quickly adapted. The bar of soap washed over his body, leaving a trail of suds. Once his rinsing was done, he made sure to get his hair all cleaned up as well! Once he was out of the shower, Yoshimori stretched a little before quicky drying himself off. He made his way over to the sink to brush his teeth, and then he'd head out to get breakfast!

Yoshimori was in for a surprise! As he wiped the steam from the mirror, a sharp gasp shot out of his lungs. He looked down to see if what he saw in the mirror was right. He had abs!? Yoshimori ran his hand down his once slightly soft stomach. Sure enough, they were there! A hard, wavy six-pack! Yoshimori got a big smile on his face! And it wasn't just his stomach that had lost the weight! Yoshimori's chest seemed to be just a little bit more ample. His arms, which he then flexed, had a nice, egg-shaped muscle on them! His thighs looked more sleek, and his calves felt a little more powerful! Any other changed that might have went through his body were a bit too small to be noticed right now, but Yoshimori was happy with what he got! Kids at his school could only dream of having the body he had!

Yoshimori had a big smile on his face as he walked out of the bathroom. Fetching a fresh, new uniform, Yoshimori's mood only seemed to elevate as he noticed the uniform felt just a little snug in some places!

In a matter of minutes, Yoshimori was out the door, and heading for school! Little did he know, every step he was taking, every little bit of activity he put his body through, was making him even stronger! His young pecs pushed out just a little bit further. His taut abs deepened and became more defined. His once cute little biceps were slowly on their way to becoming big, brawny guns! His thighs were starting to plump up, and his cut calves were growing in size as well! Yoshimori's feet had begun to grow, not to mention his tight ass began to swell out a little as well! His back stretched out a little further, and on top of it all, his manhood got just a little bit thicker!

Yes, today was going to prove to be an eventful day indeed for the young kekkaishi.
15412.title: The Snowball Effect

choices: The boy introduces himself to Yoshimori, keeping close to watch him grow more
Yoshimori hears something tear. He's going to have to change!
154121.content:
It was amazing what a little size did for Yoshimori's confidence. He was standing up straight, strutting around the school like he was ten feet tall rather than just a few inches taller than before. His classmates noticed but no one complimented him on his improved physique. This deflated Yoshimori's confidence only slightly. It was unrealistic to think that everyone in his class, who had always ignored him, would notice such slight changes. "I'll just have to do something to get them to notice..." Yoshimori thought to himself, sitting at his desk, his head resting on his arms. Unfortunately, he couldn't think of anything he could do before the teacher came in. He cursed slightly under his breath. "Well...at least I have P.E. today! I'll show everyone just how different I am then!"

Little did he know, just how right he was!

The day seemed to move by incredibly slowly. Yoshimori was too anxious to even sleep! He kept glancing at the clock, willing it to move faster! Finally, after what felt like hours, the bell ran, signalling P.E. Yoshimori sprang up from his seat and dashed down to the gym. He was the first one in there, changing as quickly as possible into his gym clothes. He was waiting in the gym for class to start before the majority of the class had even reached the gym. He stood off to the side, crossing his arms. About five minutes later, the rest of the class filed into the gym. The dark haired kekkaishi started noticing a few of his classmates giving him second glances. He grinned as he put his hands on his hips, flexing his arms slightly, trying to stick his chest out. The teacher came soon after that, holding a clipboard in his hand. "Alright everyone! Gather around! We're going to be doing a fitness test today!"

Everyone in the class groaned as they heard this news. Fitness tests were always a pain in the ass. There was nothing duller than doing push ups and sit ups and shuttle runs for an hour. Yoshimori was the only one who wasn't bothered. His grin hadn't left his face! This was the perfect chance to show off his new body! The class was divided into groups, about four people to a group. Each group was then assigned a task to test for. Yoshimori's group was doing sit ups first. Yoshimori eagerly laid down on the ground, a boy he didn't exactly recognize from his class holding his feet. The teacher waited until everyone was ready and then blew his whistle to signal the start of the test!

Yoshimori took off, his body moving fluidly as he sat up and then laid back down, his abs crunching and rising with every movement! The boy holding Yoshimori's feet shook his head slightly as he watched Yoshimori work out. He could have sworn he saw Yoshimori's abs slowly become more visible under his shirt, the hem pulling up just slightly, showing a strip of skin between the bottom of his shirt and the waistband of his pants. The teacher blew his whistle again after Yoshimori had done over one hundred sit ups! He jumped up, still energized, not a single drop of sweat visible anywhere on his body! The boy looked closer and saw that, yes, it appeared that Yoshimori's abs were now perfectly visible against the material of his shirt! The boy slowly stood up and did a double take a second time when he saw that Yoshimori looked taller, the tips of his spiky hair reaching the boy's chest now. He closed his eyes and too a deep breath, touching his forehead. Maybe he was coming down with something...

After everyone had finished, the group switched to a new station, this one being push ups. Yoshimori positioned himself on the mat and the boy quickly took a spot next to him, eager to see if Yoshimori would change again. This was just too weird...

The teacher blew his whistle again and Yoshimori swiftly began doing push ups, his biceps bulging with every downward movement while his chest pushed out just a bit further. The boy watched in amazement as he could see Yoshimori's shirt grow tighter around his pecs while his arms filled his sleeves. The boy ended up losing concentration and crashing to the mat, sitting off to the side to continue watching Yoshimori. The teenage kekkaishi could feel his classmate's eyes on him and he grinned, picking up the pace. He was the only one to keep up the exercise all the way until the teacher blew the whistle again. When he stood back up, the boy's eyes widened as he saw that Yoshimori's shirt was skin tight on him, every bulge and curve of muscle standing out in sharp relief, the sleeves of his shirt filled to bursting with the baseball sized muscle stuffed inside it! Yoshimori casually turned to the side and flexed his arm, pretending to scratch the back of his head, his bicep bulging up even further! The boy could swear he heard a soft tearing sound coming from the sleeve...

Yoshimori drank in the attention, loving how his classmates were finally starting to pay attention to him! Even he was impressed by how big he looked! In fact...was he this big this morning? Yoshimori wasn't exactly sure...but if he WAS still growing he wasn't about to start complaining!

As they moved on to the next fitness test...
154121.title: Healthy Exercise

choices: Yoshimori should join the weighlifting club!
Every little flex made Yoshimori just a little bit bigger!
1541212.content:
Yoshimori stood up, but just as he did, he heard a loud tearing sound! At first, Yoshimori had hoped it would be his shirt, but alas, it was his pants... In the back, no less! As Yoshimori covered his behind, a flushed look on his face, all his classmates were looking at him. He gulped, waiting. He knew it was going to happen. He knew in mere seconds they'd erupt into a roar of laughter. He'd be the mockery of the school for the next few weeks!

Yoshimori was wrong.

As Yoshimori peeped an eye open, he looked around. No one was laughing... In fact... It almost seemed like everyone was blushing! All the guys in the class were red, but behind that they were green with envy. Yoshimori was truly something to be admired! And that's exactly what all the girls thought! A tear in Yoshimori's pants? That was like a dream! Anything to see this hunked up kekkaishi's ass! Yoshimori just gulped as he looked around, but finally let his guard down a little.

"I'm gonna... Go change..." He announced. Still, no one said a word. Making a bee line for the locker room, Yoshimori left his classmates speechless.

Meanwhile, Yoshimori had just arrived at his locker, and was undoing the combination. Part of his was embarassed... But part of him loved how in that very instant, all eyes were on him!

As Yoshimori began to change his pants, he immediately noticed how much closer his pecs came to his chin! Not to mention that his shirt was now riding up higher than it was this morning! Immediately, Yoshimori removed his shirt and pants, looking over himself. He couldn't believe his eyes! Just to be sure, Yoshimori ran over to the sink and splashed a little cool water in his face before looking up at the mirror. This body was for real! Slowly, a grin crept up on Yoshimori's face.

"Oh man, I can't believe this!" Yoshimori said, running his hands down his body. His pecs felt deeper, his abs were cut, his tree trunk thighs, and powerful arms... All of it was for real! "Heh..." Yoshimori grinned, and flexed both of his arms. They shot up in unison, forming two thick, juicy pair of bulging muscles. Yoshimori set his hands on his hips and gave his pecs a flex, enjoying the feel of the muscle bouncing up and down at his command! His abs were like a wall of bricks, and just as hard when he flexed them!

"Forget barriers! I could just beat up ayakashi from now on!" Yoshimori thought arrogantly. "Just look at these pecs..." Yoshimor bounced the glorious, heavy muscles once more, chuckling at how big he was.

As Yoshimori stood there, he kept posing in the mirror. He loved the sight of every muscle rising and bulging out, the unqeustionable power they held within! Every inch of him, from his huge traps to his rippling back and tight ass! His large, heavy feet, his rippling thighs and calves, burly pecs and hulked out arms, all this massive, heavy muscle shoved onto his somewhat shorter frame. Not an inch of him wasn't covered in beautiful, beefy muscle! And not a soul would dare question him ever again!

Yoshimori stood there, panting slightly. He had actually broken a sweat from just flexing there! But as he did, he realized something...
1541212.title: Visions in the Mirror

choices: Everything seemed to be getting bigger...
Everything seemed to be getting smaller...
He passed out, nothing (outwardly) changed about him...
1542.content:
Gen rolled his shoulders, moving his backpack higher up to get a better grip on it. It was early in the morning and he was making his way to school as usual, his stoic expression firmly in place on his face. He had been going to the same school as Yoshimori for a few months now and had fallen into a standard routine. Every morning he woke up early, got dressed, ate breakfast, finished his morning ablutions, and then walked to school, giving himself about fifteen to twenty minutes to walk at his leisure before class actually began. This system worked for him and nothing had ever changed, even slightly, to make him late for school.

Until today.

He was about two hundred feet from the school building when a voice suddenly called out to him. "Hey! You there!"

Gen stopped and looked down an alleyway, his expression unchanging. There was a teenage boy standing there, short and with a worried expression on his face. His hair was long and unkempt, his clothes dirty and tattered and his feet completely bare. Gen was about to walk on without saying anything, not wanting to deal with some random vagrant, when the boy shouted out again, "Hey! You can see me! Awesome! Come over here!"

Gen sighed and walked a few feet closer, still keeping a bit of distance from him. "What do you want?"

"Oh man, you have no idea how long I've been waiting for someone to be able to see me! The last person I talked to was this old dude who told me to visit someone called Mother-san or something but I couldn't find her anywhere!" The boy's voice was slightly raspy. Gen noticed a rather nasty scar running across the base of his neck, mostly concealed by the boy's shirt collar. "Anyway, I...I think I'm dead! But...but there's something coming after me!"

Gen's eye twitched slightly. Something that was coming after him? "What did this something look like?" he asked.

The boy tilted his head and crossed his arms, thinking about it. "Looked like? Well, it looked kind of like a kid...a boy with spiky red hair but he had wings coming out of his back. Oh! And a little forked tail! He was...about this tall." He held his hand about three or four feet off the ground. "His eyes were a darker reddish brown and he was wearing a pair of sandals that laced up to his knees and a pair of shorts and a kind of gi top."

"...Why exactly does this boy scare you?" Gen asked. "He doesn't sound like any kind of threat."

The boy shook his head and said, "No way! He's really scary! When he looks at you, you get this feeling like he's going to eat you! It's really super scary!"

Gen was about to respond, when he saw something dart across the alley way in the background. He ran through the ghost, causing him to yelp slightly, before getting into a fighting position, his hands turning into his ayakashi claws. The ghost yelped as he saw a small boy step out of the shadows, flying away as fast as he could go, disappearing into the distance. The boy frowned before crossing his arms and looking at Gen with a pout. "You scared away my toy."

His voice was that of a normal boy, but his looks were clearly those of an ayakashi. Gen sniffed the air lightly, just to be sure, and caught the unmistakable scent of an ayakashi. "Who are you? What do you want?"

The boy stuck his tongue out and said, "I don't have to talk to you! You're mean!"

Gen frowned and dashed forward, clawing at the boy. He quickly dodged and Gen succeeded only in ripping the ayakashi's gi. The ayakashi looked down at his shirt in surprise before glaring at Gen. "You jerk! You're going to be my toy now!"

Without another word, his eyes began to glow and raised up one of his hands. Gen charged forward again, but the boy was prepared this time, flapping his wings and jumping into the sky. The tip of his wings eventually left the shadows of the alley and the full light of the sun shone on them. Instantly they were burned, causing the young ayakashi to fall back to the ground, crashing into some garbage cans.He groaned but before he could move, Gen was upon him, grabbing him by the collar and hoisting him out of the strewn trash. Without so much as a word, Gen was about to slice the ayakashi to pieces when the boy sank his fangs into Gen's hand. The bite itself didn't hurt too badly, but a searing heat accompanied the piercing fangs, spreading swiftly through Gen's body. He dropped the ayakashi, wincing as he felt his body suddenly burning up. The ayakashi child snickered and melted into the shadows, his glowing eyes the only things that remained. "That'll tech ya! Let's see you get along like that!"

Gen barely heard the words and didn't see as the boy melted away fully into the shadows. His concentration was taken up by the incredible pain that was throbbing inside him. There had been some kind of strange poison in the ayakashi's bite and it was slowly coursing through his body. This wasn't a deadly poison, however. The boy wasn't sure how it would end up effecting Gen, since the changes were always random. As Gen collapsed to the ground, writhing in pain, he was barely aware as
1542.title: Disrupted Routine

choices: Shrink! Just like your friend!"
A little more wicked! Maybe then you'll be more interesting!"
15422.content:
By the time Gen came to, everything was dark. He could hear noises... Even someone talking, but he was still encased in darkness, as far as he could see. However, one thing struck him as strange: It was very warm, where ever he was... Feeling around, everything was soft... Like cloth. Just then, there was a shimmer of light from above! Gen looked up, and after a brief moment, it shone out again! He covered his eyes in recoil, but got a grip on the cloth, and started to climb up it. As he peeked out over the edge, he saw something that really shocked him.

Everything was massive! The walls that were once simple obstacles now stood hundreds of feet tall! Regular houses were like mansions to him now! As he looked around frantically, a loud voice shook his eardrums!

"Hey! You're awake!" It called out. Gen immediately covered his ears, and started to look upward. He was shocked when he saw who it was.

"Yoshimori!?" He said in a sudden grunt. "How did you get so huge?!" He demanded to know.

"Me? How did YOU get so small?!" Yoshimori demanded to know in return. It took Gen a moment to realize how stupid his question was. Of course he was small, here he was, poking out of Yoshimori's school uniform's shirt pocket, and glancing all around at the world as if it was his first time seeing it... It would make more sense if he was the small one.

"There was this ayakashi..." Gen started. "And this kid... Ugh... Who was it...?" Gen rubbed his head.

"An ayakashi, huh? Never knew they could do this to you." Yoshimori said, poking Gen lightly.

"Hey!" Gen barked back, "I'm not some toy!" For some reason, those words resonated with his memories...

Yoshimori just chuckled. "Of course you're not." He kept on walking, a silly smile on his face.

It took a moment, but Gen finally asked. "Where are we going?"

"I'm heading home. School's over." Yoshimori answered.

"School's over!?" Gen shouted in surprise, "How long was I out!?" Yoshimori just shrugged in reply.

"I dunno, I was walking home and I thought I saw a weird looking bug. When I walked over and looked, it was you! So I just put you in my pocket and started heading home." Yoshimori answered. "You looked tired, and this was kinda weird, so I decided it would have been better to just let you sleep..."

"Okaaaay..." Gen agreed suspiciously. He didn't even know what was going on with this whole ordeal. However, neither of them were able to sense the mean-spirited little ayakashi hovering above them.

"Heh heh, this is fun already!" He smiled to himself, "I didn't think that other kid would find him! Maybe I could make him my new toy too...?" He asked himself. Easily able to hide his own presence, which was abnormal for such a young looking ayakashi, fluttered down and silently follwed closely behind Yoshimori.

"I think I'll make you..."
15422.title: The Game Begins!

choices: Night falls...the boys are captured!
Mercifully, someone spots Gen and helps him!
154221.content:
"I think I'll make you shrink! Just like your friend!"

The young ayakashi imp knew that his poison could create random effects in humans and other ayakashi since he had bitten several over his life and each time something different had happened. However, once he saw the effect occur to a living creature, he could concentrate and force the poison to have that same effect again! This was now the case as he swooped down lower above Yoshimori, timing his movements so that he was always within shadow, until he was right next to the young kekkaishi's feet. As Yoshimori walked under a tree, the ayakashi reared out of the shadows and bit him on the leg, his fangs piercing through the fabric of his pants before sinking into his leg. Yoshimori let out a yelp, jumping backward as he looked wildly around at his feet. Gen was tossed unceremoniously around inside the pocket, nearly falling out as Yoshimori jerked about.

"What are you doing?!" He shouted in annoyance, glaring up at his giant friend.

"Something bit me!" Yoshimori snarled, looking around at his feet for any sign of a bug or animal.

Gen sighed and was about to admonish Yoshimori when the teen suddenly stopped moving and fell to his knees, clutching his arms as he did so. "A-Argh! It burns!"

Gen's eyes widened as he realized what had just happened. "Dammit! That ayakashi is still around here!"

Yoshimori fell onto his side, his body twitching lightly as he lost consciousness. Gen jumped out of his pocket, landing nimbly on his feet. He looked up and saw the ayakashi leaning casually against a tree, the shade protecting him from the sun's harmful rays. "You!"

"Yeah, it's me!" The ayakashi said, standing up straight, hands on his hips. "You humans really are dumb! You can't even detect a little kid when he's right behind you!"

Before Gen could reply, Yoshimori let out a moan, his body quickly shrinking. Gen watched in horror as his friend was soon just as small as he was...no wait...he was a little smaller. Their heights were now proportional to each other as when they were normal sized. Yoshimori had clearly passed out. The young ayakashi laughed and slowly made his way over to them, his bare feet slapping carelessly against the concrete side walk. Thinking fast, Gen picked up Yoshimori in a fireman's lift and ran for the edge of the shadow. If he could get out into the light the ayakashi wouldn't be able to touch them! The ayakashi rolled his eyes and said, "Wow! And now you're trying to run away from me? How far do you think you're going to get?"

Gen, a determined look on his face, kept moving. If he could only make it just a few more feet, they'd be safe! The ayakashi had no idea what Gen was trying to do and was following close behind, giggling as his giant feet just barely missed stepping on the tiny half human. His fun was quickly cut short, however, as Gen made it out into the light. The ayakashi's eyes widened as he realized he had been tricked and glared hatefully at Gen who merely stared impassively back. "That's cheating! I'm going to get you!"

Gen shrugged and set Yoshimori down, crouching next to him to catch his breath. The newly shrunken teen could be out for over eight hours, if Gen's experience was anything to judge by. The ayakashi looked up at the sun and smirked. "Heh, sun's going down you know! You won't be able to stay out of the dark forever!"

Gen looked up at the sky. True, the sun was slowly starting to get lower, but he still had a few hours before it fully set. If he could find someone trustworthy to guard them in that time, they'd be home free. Otherwise...

The young ayakashi cracked his knuckles, slowly sinking back down into the shadows. Every bit of darkness that Gen could see was a potential trap. It would only take one single misstep and he would be condemning both Yoshimori and himself to a terrible fate. He hoisted Yoshimori back onto his shoulders and started making his way down the sidewalk, skirting every bit of shadow and staying in the hot sun. Sweat was soon beading on his forehead, his vision growing blearier as he moved with his burden.

"Getting tired? Don't worry! Soon you'll be able to rest. Then I'll be able to play with you!" The ayakashi's voice whispered from the shadows, but Gen couldn't see him. The only reason the creature had said anything was to let Gen know that he was still there, still watching, and still waiting. Gen glanced up at the sky again. He was running out of time...
154221.title: The Snake Strikes Twice

choices: The Karasumori Site!
Yoshimori's House!
1542211.content:
Gen continued to carry Yoshimori, his movements slowed from what they could have been. Not to mention he was practically stopped at one point by an ant, which to him, was practically the size of a small dog to him! Only halfway home, Gen had unzipped his shirt, hoping the extra cool air would allow him to travel faster. It held up for a good while, before he was just plan fatigued. His body wasn't going to hold up much longer! On a sunny part of the sidewalk, Gen collapsed, panting and sweating endlessly. There was a dark snicker from the shadows, as the sun was already starting to set. Gen practically let out a whimper as he saw all the darkness encroaching all around him.

"H-Huh?" Yoshimori moaned, lifting his head. "What happened...?" Gen was still panting, but before he could give Yoshimori an answer, the two of them were suddenly snatched up in a large hand.

"Hahaha!" He laughed wildly, "I got you guys now!" Gen looked up at the kid with fear, which was abnormal for him, but he knew that at this size, his life was in the hands of some mere child ayakashi. Yoshimori was still yawning, rubbing his eyes. "And now I have TWO toys!" He said with a wide grin. His teeth were sharp. Maybe not razor sharp, like a shark, but still pretty sharp. They were pearly white, like crystal gems that shone in the dark.

"Hey! What the heck is this thing!?" Yoshimori shouted, pointing up at the kid as he finally realized what was happening.

"Now we're gonna play a game!" He said, his eerie smile still shining through. "It's called..." The boy then dropped them onto the ground below. They weren't high enough to die, but they did get a few bruises from the fall. "Run for your life!" The kid then stomped his foot hard on the ground. He was at least nice enough to let the two get to their feet, and even gave them a head start. It wouldn't have been fun otherwise! Yoshimori would have argued the point, but at this size, his opinion didn't exactly stand for much... As the two began to run, Gen was already tired out, and falling behind.

"H-Hey, Gen!" Yoshimori called back, dragging his wrist. "Come on! That thing's gonna kill us!"

"I can't! I'm already tired out from dragging you everywhere!" Gen argued. Yoshimori sighed. He grabbed and held Gen over his shoulder as Gen did with him. He wasn't quite as muscular as Gen was, but he still managed to go at a decent speed. It was at this time the ayakashi ran out of patience, and slowly began to stomp to them. He enjoyed every second, how his feet must have made the ground shake under those boys' feet. He loved how he was feeling so big and mighty over the weak and pathetic bugs down below. It wasn't hard for him to catch up to the two!

Yoshimori then had an idea. He turned around, looking at the giant ayakashi. "Hoi! Joso! Ketsu!" A large green barrier, which was only about the size of a baseball to the giant, appeared on his arm. It managed to hold him in place.

"Hey! What the hell is this!?" He asked, banging on it.

"Metsu!"

With that the box imploded, but there was little sound other than that.

"Huh?" The giant looked at his arm. It was completely unharmed! "Oh!" He laughed triumphantly, "I get it now! You're that kekkaishi kid! But a tiny bug's magic like you can't hurt a big strong person like me!" He grinned, hooking his thumb at himself. With that, the chase continued, Yoshimori just barely rounding a corner to see where he was!

"Oh crap..." Yoshimori mumbled under his breath. He had led the ayakashi right to...
1542211.title: The Dark Night

choices: Gen starts to moan... Is he reacting to Karasumori too!?
Yoshimori slams into a large foot... He and Gen are captured!
15422111.content:
Yoshimori's eyes went wide. This wasn't good. This was far from good. Karasumori only made ayakashi stronger! Before he could even round the corner to change direction, a giant foot stomped down right in front of him!

"I found you! Now I got you!" The ayakashi boy said, bending over, just about to pick Yoshimori and Gen up, when Yoshimori cast another kekkai to buy time for the two. Yoshimori held onto Gen, who was heavier than he was, and Yoshimori didn't exactly have the same muscle mass Gen did. Still, the adrenaline rush helped get Yoshimori and Gen out of there in time. The ayakashi boy just smiled, and stomped down on the box, grinning to himself as he did. "You see what happened to that blue thing? Well you're next!" He said, his stomps becoming noticeably harder, and thus, throwing Yoshimori off his balance with every step he took!

Just then, the ayakashi stopped dead in his tracks. Yoshimori, looking back for only a second, started to run off again, taking advantage of this time to put some distance between the two of them! The ayakashi, however, wasn't in pain... No, quite the opposite. He was smiling!

"What is this place...!?" He asked, his voice now a much more darker tone, "I feel... Power! Lots of it! I feel... Strong!" He grinned. He looked to his arms, and was amazed at they thickened up, bulking to an immediate immense size. His pecs pressed out against the gi he wore, swelling up large and powerful until it looked like a basketball had been sliced in half and pressed on his young chest. They bounces and shook with the slightest of movements! An impressive wall of abs hardened just under his shelf-like pecs, even bloating out a little, giving him a bit of a muscle gut. His thighs pressed outward, just short of rubbing up against the others bulging size. His calves beefed up, becoming the two pillars that supported his massive frame, as even his feet, down to the toes were starting to stretch outward, snapping the straw barring of his sandals, leaving his feel huge and free. His voice got a little bit deeper with all this mass, and to top it off, he got a nice little bubble butt, as well as an enhanced boyhood!

The young ayakashi let out a primal roar, beating on his massive chest like an ape. He let out a heavy breath, grinning all the while. "Heh heh... I knew I was amazing before, but now I'm unstoppable!" He flexed his two, huge arms, a large vein running down both. "I'll crush both of you under my giant muscles!"

"Crap!" Yoshimori grumbled, looking back at the improved, stronger ayakashi. In addition to all that mass, there was no telling what he was capable of now! And the longer he stayed on the school grounds, he would just keep getting stronger and stronger! The ayakashi turned his nose to the sky, and started to sniff about.

"Aha! I found you guys!" He said, following the trail. All this running had left Yoshimori a sweaty mess... It was only a matter of time before he was found! Then there was no telling what could happen!

Just then...
15422111.title: Dismal Night

choices: Gen is still Gen!
Gen is more like the ayakashi!
154221112.content:
