Just then, as Yoshimori tried to push himself past his limits and continue running, he slammed into a large foot. He instantly dropped Gen and fell onto his butt, letting out a little yelp as he hit the hard ground. Gen let out a little grunt as well, though he was still too worn out to move on his own. Yoshimori gazed up at the towering ayakashi in front of him, the clothes clinging to his body like a second skin, leaving no inch of his chiseled physique to the imagination. The young creature just grinned and moved his foot closer to Yoshimori, his toes pressing up against the tiny teen. With a simple flexing movement, Yoshimori was pinned underneath the big toe, the thick digit easily able to hold him in place. "It would be so easy to crush you into paste right now!" he said with a snicker. "But that would be a waste of toys! I don't know if I'll get the chance to find any more interesting toys like you two!"

Yoshimori groaned, but his arms felt like noodles. He tried a few times to push against the toe but it was useless. There was nothing he could do. He was completely at the mercy of this child demon. "What are you going to do to us?" Yoshimori asked, trying to buy some time while he thought up a plan.

"Hmm...That's a good question!" the ayakashi replied. "I was planning on taking you back to my home with me but I really like the feel of this place. It's like something is filling me with energy! Making me stronger! So I think I'll just stick around here for awhile. The night is young after all!"

He bounced his pecs arrogantly before leaning down and snatching Yoshimori and Gen up in his hand. "I got some new powers too! Here, I'll show you!"

He bit his index finger, hard, until blood started to bead from it. He held the finger over Gen's face and gently pressed the drop of blood against the unconscious boy's lips. Gen, instinctively, started to suck on the blood, drawing it into his mouth and swallowing it. "Hey!" Yoshimori shouted. "What the hell are you doing?!"

"Just shut up and watch!" the ayakashi said, sucking on his finger to stop the blood flow. Almost immediately the cut healed itself. He grinned and muttered, "MAN this place is cool!"

Yoshimori watched, concern etched on his face as Gen shivered and convulsed, his body pulsing all over! Within seconds a change began to make itself apparent over his body. Yoshimori's eyes widened as Gen swelled up bigger, his height increasing, inch by inch, until he was at least twice Yoshimori's tiny size! Not only that, but his already muscled body had bulked up considerably, straining his school uniform by a significant amount! The young ayakashi laughed and said, "Every fluid in my body now has a different effect! My blood makes others grow! But it also changes them, makes them more primal! Your friend won't be your friend much longer!"

Yoshimori looked over in concern at Gen who was now sleeping more peacefully. The growth appeared to have recharged his body, taking away the aches and pains of his ordeal from earlier. Yoshimori couldn't help but feel slightly jealous at this turn of events. Gen, usually a very imposing individual with his dark expression and aloof manner, looked even more intimidating now that he was towering over him! "Gen is stronger than this jerk ayakashi gives him credit for! There's no way he'll be any different!"

These thoughts were interrupted as the young ayakashi let out a moan. "Oh man...There's that feeling again! I..think I'm...growing again!"

Yoshimori watched in horror as the ayakashi's body slowly began to stretch taller, his muscles all growing in proportion to his height. His gi top tore down the center slightly while the hem tugged up and pulled tight around his midsection, showing off the lower row of his abs. He no longer had the height of a child but that of a young adult! The ayakashi chuckled and checked himself out. "This is awesome! I'm going to get HUGE and teach those jerks back home a lesson!"

Yoshimori gulped, his problems going from bad to worse. Before he even had time to deal with this new chain of events, Gen started to groan as well. He was waking up! Now was the moment of truth! Would he be the same old Gen Yoshimori knew, or would he be a more primal creature like the ayakashi?
154221112.title: Troubles Upon Troubles

choices: Daylight breaks! The ayakashi must return to hiding, breaking his spell on Gen!
Gen, in that instant, comes to his senses.
1542211122.content:
Yoshimori gulped. As he saw Gen slowly get to his feet, he noticed as the young man's eyes were slowly opening. Yoshimori's face then went pale, as he Saw Gen's eyes were blood red, and his pupils were slits. This did not bode well...

"Alright, new little toy..." The ayakashi instructed, "Teach your new pet to behave!"

As Yoshimori head the instructions, he looked over at the ayakashi. He walked away from the two of them a bit, and was sitting on the ground with his legs crossed and his eyes closed. As he sat there, a dark purple aura began to envelop him. Yoshimori gulped as he quickly realized he was trying to absorb power from Karasumori!

"Oh no you don't!" Yoshimori rose his hand. While it was true he couldn't do much, he had to at least try! But before he even had the chance, he was tackled to the ground by Gen!

"Nnnrgh..." Gen let out a dull growl as he laid on top of Yoshimori. The smaller teen was, of course, trying to push him off.

"Gen! Get off of me! I'm your friend!" Yoshimori shouted at him.

"Friend..." Gen repeated in a low growl.

"Th-That's right!" Yoshimori agreed. He was starting to hope that this would get through to him, but that was dashed the moment Gen got up and suddenly slammed his elbow into Yoshimori's stomach! Yoshimori coughed, swearing he could feel blood in his mouth. "Stop it Gen! You could have killed me!" Yoshimori shouted at him. Gen didn't reply. He jumped up once more, and fell directly on Yoshimori, body slamming him into the ground. Yoshimori gasped again, before starting to cough. "G-Gen! Stop it!" He ordered.

Gen stood up on his feet again. The glare he was giving Yoshimori felt like it could penetrate steel. Gen's fist slowly pulled back, and before he knew it, it was coming right at him!

"Ketsu!" Yoshimori called, pulling up a barrier just in the nick of time. Luckily he caught Gen off guard, and the barrier stood in place, not shattered in the least! Yoshimori winced as he got to his feet. This wasn't looking good for him at all. He was exhausted from running, he had sustained terrible injuries, and to top it off, he felt that if he had to make any more kekkai, he just might collapse here and now!

Before he could think any further, Gen charged at him once more, Yoshimori barely able to dodge by jumping to the side at the last minute. Gen immediately pivoted on the spot, and sprang out at Yoshimori, tackling him to the ground. Yoshimori groaned in pain as he hit the cold, hard ground.

Panting and tired, he looked up at Gen who had pinned his arms down. Gen's eyes were fierce and steady, as his chest was heaving, pressing out of his uniform slightly. Yoshimori's head tilted upward and he got a view of the ayakashi.

Things were going from worse to terrible. The ayakashi had grown seveal feet, looking like an adult male on steroids. His massive shoulders ripped the gi to shreds, and his entire upper body, from his massive pecs, rock-hard muscle gut abs, and his thick, juicy arms bulging in every direction. His thighs had bulked up to twice their previous size, not to to mention his calves were like two pillars. His feet were like little walls that were bulldozing any earth that blocked their way. And not that Yoshimori was focusing on it, but he could have swore he saw the mere tip of what he was sure was the largest endowment in all the world.

Yoshimori sighed, as he felt a bit of moisture drip from his eyes. "So this is it for me, huh...?" He mumbled. "I never thought it was going to end up like this... Killed by my best friend..." Yoshimori looked up at Gen again, a permanent frown plastered on his face. "If I'm going down... I'm going to do what I always wanted to!" He shouted out. In a final burst of strength, before he was sure he'd black out and be finished by Gen, his arms suddenly broke free!

Time seemed to run slowly for that moment.

Yoshimori's arms rose up.

Gen let out a noisy, unhappy growl. His arm rose up, ready to strike Yoshimori down...

But suddenly...

Yoshimori's lips met Gen's.

Gen was immediately stopped in his tracks. Yoshimori's arms wrapped around Gen's neck, holding him in place as Yoshimori savored what he was sure would be his final pleasure in this world. For him, this single kiss seemed to last an hour, as he could see his life flashing before him.

Finally, Yoshimori fell back to the ground, his hand stroking Gen's cheek as he did.

"Gen... I..."
1542211122.title: Bottom of the Food Chain

choices: Yoshimori wakes up in the afternoon, alone. Gen slept on the floor.
Yoshimori wakes up in the embrace of Gen!
15422111221.content:
Before Yoshimori could finish what he was saying, a bright flash of light suddenly rose over the horizon! The ayakashi yelled out in a much deeper, manlier voice than he had before, his body smoking as the light touched him. For all his strength, he was still an ayakashi, and because of that, he was susceptible to the sunlight! His head whipped around as he tried to find a place he could hide, but thanks to his much larger body and the fact they were in a big open area, there was no shadow close enough for him to reach! With a menacing growl he shouted, "I'll be back! Don't think you've won!"

With that he wrapped his wings around his body and sank into the ground, the crushing aura of his malevolent presence disappearing. Yoshimori sighed, flopping back down on the ground, his eyes closed. The ayakashi was retreating...it was over. They had survived!

They...Gen!

He quickly opened his eyes and saw Gen still crouching over him, one hand covering his eyes, a low groan escaping from between his lips. "G-Gen?" Yoshimori said softly, afraid of what he might answer back.

"Yoshimori?" Gen's voice replied, just as softly. He moved his hand and looked down at his friend in confusion. "What...huh? What happened? Why are you smaller?"

Yoshimori chuckled, seeing that Gen was finally back to normal. "Ah...hahahahaha! You big idiot! I'm not smaller! Look at yourself!"

Gen blinked and looked down at his body. His eyes widened in shock. "How...did I get so big?! I mean...comparatively."

Yoshimori sat up, wincing a little as he did. "That ayakashi made you drink his blood. Apparently it makes things grow."

"Huh...why would he do that?" Gen wondered out loud, flexing his bicep, his hand running down his chest and abs. "Seems like a step backwards for what he was doing."

Yoshimori shrugged and said, "Who knows? That guy was a nut!" He didn't see any reason he should tell Gen what had happened. It would only upset him.

Gen nodded and got to his feet. "Oh sure..." He said, noticing his tattered shirt and pants. "My clothes shrink with me but as soon as I start growing again they tear."

Yoshimori chuckled and said, "Hey big guy! How about giving me a hand?"

Gen reached down and closed his big hand over Yoshimori's, easily lifting him to his feet. As soon as Yoshimori regained his feet, both boys felt a strange, swooping sensation in their stomachs. They looked around in confusion as everything seemed to shrink...they were growing again! They kept up, their clothes growing with them until Yoshimori was back to his normal size. "Hey! Look at that! We're normal again!"

He grinned over at Gen...only to see he was face to face with his waist still! He slowly looked up and saw that Gen had surpassed his original height! "Uh...well, almost normal anyway."

"What just happened?" Gen asked, looking over his body in confusion.

"Hmm...I guess since that ayakashi left to go back to his home dimension his poison and stuff is wearing off. But since you got the blood awhile AFTER we both got the poison I guess you're stuck being big for awhile."

Gen sighed and said, "That makes sense...not that I like it or anything."

Yoshimori stretched and put his arms behind his head. "Anyway, we should probably head home. I think I'm going to take the day off today..."

Yoshimori started walking away when Gen ran up to him, shaking the ground as he ran, gripping the smaller boy's shoulder. "Wait! Yoshimori!"

"Hey, not so rough!" Yoshimori complained, pushing Gen's thick fingers off his shoulder. "What is it?"

"Um...I don't think we should be alone. That ayakashi might come back after us. We need to be ready for it!" Gen said, his cheeks flushing just a little bit.

"Huh? You think? Yeah...that does make sense." Yoshimori said, nodding.

"So come back with me to my place. Okay? We won't have to explain...me if we do." Gen said, indicating his body.

"Sure! That makes sense!" Yoshimori said, feeling his heart beat a little faster. Just...how much did Gen remember? He didn't seem to remember growing and being possessed...but he was acting awfully strange.

Gen reached down and grabbed Yoshimori by the collar, tossing him up on his back. "Hang on. It'll be faster if I carry you."

Yoshimori's arms wrapped around his friend's thick neck, blushing slightly as he felt Gen's massive arms wrap around his much smaller legs, holding him tightly in place against his broad back. With a slight tensing of his leg muscles, Gen was off like a shot, his bare feet leaving slightly indents in the concrete as he ran. He briefly thought about jumping up to the roofs but doubted his new weight would be supported. Luckily it didn't take him long to reach his apartment. He jumped up onto his floor and crouched down, Yoshimori falling to the ground next to him. Gen looked at his smaller friend and said, "Can you get my keys? They're in my right pocket."

Yoshimori reached in, quickly grabbing the keys, blushing as he felt something else right next to it. He dropped the key in Gen's hand and said, "T-There!"

Gen opened the door and stepped to the side, letting Yoshimori go in first. Yoshimori yawned, his eyes feeling heavy. He was ready to just crash! Gen squeezed through the door, his thick chest nearly getting caught in the door frame, and closed it behind him. "There's some blankets and a futon in the closet if you want to sleep." He said, moving into his bedroom...only to find Yoshimori already asleep on his bed. Gen sighed and rubbed the back of his head. The kekkashi just looked too peaceful to disturb...
15422111221.title: Safe...for Now!

choices: Yoshimori cooks breakfast for Gen and discuss what to do about the ayakashi
Gen tries to take a shower while Yoshimori explores the apartment
154221112212.content:
Yoshimori was just plain exhausted after the events of the previous day. After he had gotten into Gen's apartment he had stripped down to the waist, leaving his pants on for the sake of modesty. It would have been more comfortable going down to his boxers, but since he was taking Gen's bed he thought it would be best to remain at least partially clothed, especially until he could figure out how much Gen had heard while in his possessed state. The decision to sleep in Gen's bed wasn't a calculated one to test whether or not Gen would share the bed with him. Yoshimori had just been so tired he had flopped onto the bed without a second thought. He had fallen asleep almost as soon as his head had hit the pillow. It wasn't until late the next day he finally woke up. The decision to skip class had allowed Yoshimori to have a long, untroubled sleep for once. Yoshimori slowly opened his eyes, letting out a yawn. Thanks to Gen's shades, it was still incredibly dark in the room. Yoshimori glanced at the digital read out on the clock and saw it was 4 in the afternoon. School would have already let out. "Ugh...I should probably call home so no one worries..." He thought to himself. "But it's so warm and comfy! I don't want to move!"

Yoshimori tried to reach down and pull the blankets up around his neck but he couldn't move his arm. Blinking slightly, he looked down and realized that something was holding him down! Panicking slightly, he looked around wildly, flipping over in the bed to come face to chest with Gen's massive pecs! A blush swiftly suffused his cheeks as his nose was inches way from Gen's bronzed skin. With every breath the enormous young man took, his chest inflated, brushing against Yoshimori's cute little nose, Gen's natural scent invading his nostrils and making him blush all the harder. He could feel himself stirring down below. Yoshimori gulped and slowly tried to ease out of Gen's grip. It was no good. He wasn't able to budge so much as an inch so matter how he wiggled or squirmed. He might as well have been a mouse trapped under the paw of a cat. He wasn't going anywhere. "Then again..." He thought to himself. "Why should I want to?"

He slowly scooted in closer to Gen, gently placing one palm on Gen's chest, his other arm pressed against his own chest, his nose buried into the deep canyon between Gen's pecs. One of Gen's bulky biceps was perfectly positioned behind Yoshimori's head, serving as an extremely comfortable pillow. Yoshimori's legs pressed lightly against Gen's abs, his toes reaching just past Gen's bulge, clad only in a pair of skin tight black bicycling shorts, the blankets bunched up against the foot of the bed. The bed itself was creaking slightly as it struggled to support Gen's new weight. "Huh...It's been so long...shouldn't he have shrunk back by now?" Yoshimori thought, slowly closing his eyes, tiredness creeping up on him again. He was too tired to care at this point. Just as Yoshimori was about to drift off to sleep, Gen stirred, letting out a huge yawn, rolling over onto his back and taking Yoshimori with him, the smaller teen suddenly lying face down on Gen's torso. Gen felt the minute weight upon his sculpted body and looked down into Yoshimori's eyes. They stared at each briefly before Gen's cheeks began to flush. "Good....morning." He said uncertainly.

"Good afternoon actually." Yoshimori said with a small smile, folding his arms and resting his chin on them. Gen's arms slowly slid off of Yoshimori's body until only a large hand was left which slowly moved up and down Yoshimori's back. Yoshimori chuckled and said, "I guess you heard me then."

"Yeah..." Gen admitted, turning his head slightly. He was quiet for a few minutes before he slowly asked, "Are you sure though?"

"Huh?" Yoshimori said, confused. "What do you mean?"

"Loving me." Gen said, gulping at the word. It wasn't one he had ever been able to use very often. "I'm not worth it. Are you sure you want to waste it on me?"

Yoshimori lifted himself up, his knees resting on Gen's abs as he glared into the half ayakashi's eyes. "What kind of question is that?! I tell you I love you and you say you're not worth it? Are you saying that I don't know what I want?"

"Stop shouting." Gen, an annoyed expression rising to his face. "I was just asking."

"Yeah and I'm answering!" Yoshimori yelled, moving his face in closer to Gen's. "I meant what I said and I'm not about to back pedal on it! So you'd better get used to me being around from now on!"

Gen stared passively at Yoshimori before a small, rueful smile rose to his lips. "Right...I should have expected as much."

"Geez, after all this time I thought you'd know me better than that!" Yoshimori grumbled, laying himself out on top of Gen again. "You'd better start learning! And put your arms back around me dammit! I'm getting cold!"

Gen slowly wrapped his arms around Yoshimori and flipped over, his enormous weight pressing down on top of Yoshimori's much smaller body. "Then I'd better keep you warm."

Yoshimori looked up in shock at Gen's face, a smirk firmly in place. His heart started to beat faster as Gen slowly moved in closer to Yoshimori and gave him a peck on the cheek. With a sigh, he laid his head next to Yoshimori's, closing his eyes again. "W-Was that it?" Yoshimori said, slightly relieved, slightly annoyed.

"I don't like moving fast." Gen said firmly. "You said you loved me. You know how I am."

"Of course!" Yoshimori said, moving in closer again. "You know...you never..."

"I never what?" Gen asked, cracking one eye open when Yoshimori suddenly stopped.

"N-Nothing...never mind."

Gen opened both eyes and stared deeply into Yoshimori's own. "I love you too." He said seriously.

Just hearing those words nearly made Yoshimori melt. He grinned and rubbed his face against Gen's chest. "Yeah, I know you big lug."
154221112212.title: The Start of a Different Kind of Journey

choices: That night, the plan goes off without a hitch!
In the shadows, the ayakashi heard the whole thing! Tonight didn't look good...
1542211122121.content:
Yoshimori let out a cute little yawn, but just as he did, he was interrupted by an even greater sound coming from Gen's stomach! Yoshimori popped on eye open and looked up at Gen, who looked aside, blushing slightly.

"Sounds like someone's hungry." Yoshimori said, looking at Gen with a smile. Yoshimori backed up a little, breaking Gen's gentle grasp on him, and smiled down at the teen. "How about I go cook us up something to eat?" He asked. Gen just nodded at Yoshimori. There was almost a sort of... Wanting in Gen's eyes, but Yoshimori was too oblivious at the time to notice.

The young kekkaishi hopped up out of bed, and started making his way over to Gen's kitchen! It was at this moment that Yoshimori was walking away that Gen noticed the smaller male was shirtless! Yoshimori, on the other hand, started to peek around Gen's kitchen, looking for something that he could use for ingredients. It didn't take long, as the Night Troops made sure to keep their base well-stocked with food for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Yoshimori started gathering up everything he needed to make Gen a delicious pancake breakfast!

As Gen was laying in bed, he could hear Yoshimori moving around in the other room. He turned on his back, looking up at his blank ceiling. As he lay there thinking to himself, he looked at his hand. It was so much larger than what he was used to... Everything in his room seemed just a little bit smaller... Whether is was his alarm clock, or even his closet! He looked down his forearm, down to his bicep, and even at his shoulder for a moment. Slowly, he closed his fist and flexed his arm. The muscle, in return, gradually swelled up, and as Gen tucked his thumb in, a peak popped up right on the top of his powerful bicep. He stared at it for a moment, before a tiny smirk cracked it's way onto his lips.

In the kitchen, Yoshimori was already mixing together some pancake batter, while a fresh batch of bacon was sizzling on the stovetop. Yoshimori made sure to put plenty on, since he was sure a bigger Gen meant a bigger appetite! It didn't take long for the pancake batter to be ready, and Yoshimori started to cook it right up!

Just as Yoshimori was cooking pancakes, a pair of arms reached down his chest from his shoulders! He could feel two soft, bulgy "pillows" push at his back. Yoshimori then felt a puff of warm air just by his ear! As Yoshimori's eyes slinked to the left, he saw Gen's face there!

"H-Hey big guy! You must be hungry, huh?" Yoshimori asked.

"I just missed you..." Gen replied, looking down at the cooking breakfast. Gen felt a little heavy on Yoshimori, but the smaller teen didn't seem to mind much. He felt warm and fuzzy when he heard Gen say he missed him. What really got him to blush is when he felt Gen's hands gently rubbing his bare stomach!

Yoshimori chuckled a little. "There's not much there, I know." He said, "Not compared to you, at least." Gen didn't exactly laugh or show any emotion at Yoshimori's little quip. In fact, all he said in response was a brief "Mm."

It didn't take too long for breakfast to finish, and before either of them knew it, they had to break apart so that Yoshimori could set the table. Gen would have helped, but with his newfound power, he might have ended up breaking a few things... But it wasn't as if Yoshimori minded doing it all for Gen.

"So..." Yoshimori said, as he just took his seat. "About that ayakashi..." He began. As he looked up at Gen, the big guy had already started eating! Yoshimori just smiled. "Right..." He said aloud. "I guess we should just enjoy the food first." He then thought to himself.

As the two sat there, Yoshimori ate at a slow, calm pace, taking generous breaks to catch undercover glances as Gen's body. Gen, on the other hand, was too focused on eating to notice! As Yoshimori bent down to get another bite of pancake, he stretched his foot over, and tapped Gen's foot with his toes. Gen, however, pulled away, and suddenly slammed his foot down on Yoshimori's! Yoshimori let out a wicked loud yelp, before pulling back! Gen immediately stood up, bending over the table tword Yoshimori!

"I-I'm sorry!" He said, his tone still calm. "I didn't mean to... I..." Gen stammered. Yoshimori looked up at Gen, a tear in his eye.

"I-It's... Alright..." Yoshimori winced, holding his throbbing foot. Thankfully nothing was broken!

After about 15 minutes, breakfast had come to a close, and both boys felt filled and happy.

"You wanted to talk about that ayakashi...?" Gen asked Yoshimori.

"Oh! Right!" Yoshimori said, sitting at attention, "I made up a plan! I just know it'll work!" He said. "Later on, when it gets dark, we'll head down to Karasumori! Then, once the ayakashi appears, you have to look like you're going mad! You'll pretend to attack me, but you have to let me win! Then the ayakashi will give you more power, and then we can take him down together!" Yoshimori grinned. "Pretty awesome plan, right?"

"I guess it could work..." Gen said, "But what if I really do lose it...?" He asked.

"Well then..." Yoshimori said. He got a slight blush, as he pushed two fingers together. "I-I guess I'll just have to... Well..." Gen just looked at Yoshimori in confusion. "Look, don't worry! I know it'll work! Trust me!" Yoshimori insisted. Gen just nodded.

Just then, Yoshimori gave Gen a strange look. Gen, in turn, kept his usual stare back at Yoshimori. Yoshimori got up from the table and walked around to Gen's side. "You got a little pancake on your face..." He said. Before Gen could look down in an attempt to see, Yoshimori moved in, and licked it clean off! "There!" He said with a bright smile as he looked back at Gen. Gen just blushed.
1542211122121.title: Food for Thought

choices: Yoshimori grows to Gen's height and the two have some fun!
Yoshimori grows BIGGER than Gen...and the two have some fun!
15422111221211.content:
The rest of the day passed by at a leisurely pace. Gen and Yoshimori spent the time together, Yoshimori taking to cleaning Gen's place up a bit. Living on his own, Gen kind of made of mess of things around the apartment. Dirty, ripped clothes were piled in the closet, the bed sheets were a tangled mess, the bath tub needed a good scrubbing as did the floors, and the oven was a bit of a greasy mess. Gen sat in the corner of the living room, watching quietly as Yoshimori tidied the place up.

"I feel like I have a wife..." He muttered as Yoshimori passed, earning a glare from the smaller teen.

"Hey, if you weren't such a slob then I wouldn't have to clean up after you!" Yoshimori said, shaking his head. "You're going to learn some better habits now that I'm going to be living here with you."

Gen nodded a few times before his eyes shot wide open. "Wait...what? Y-You're moving in with me?!"

Yoshimori sighed and tossed a particularly ripped up pair of pants into the trash. It was beyond his mending skills. "Well I don't really like living at home. My grandpa's a pain in the ass, Masamori visits at random times, it's right next door to Tokine..."

"I thought you liked her." Gen said, crossing his arms slightly. This was a bit of a point of contention with him.

Yoshimori grimaced and said, "Yeah, I thought I did but that was when I was young and stupid. Come on, you've seen the way she treats me! I'm not an idiot anymore."

Gen suddenly reached forward and gathered Yoshimori into his arms, holding him against his chest. "Forget about her. You have me now."

Yoshimori blushed, a small smile rising to his lips. "Yeah, yeah, I know big guy." He patted Gen lovingly on the chest and gave him a kiss on the cheek, causing the bigger teen to blush as well. He let Yoshimori go and he continued his cleaning.

Later that night, with the apartment cleaned and their bellies filled from dinner, Yoshimori began to dress in his traditional Kekkaishi clothes while Gen rifled through his closet. "Nothing fits me anymore. What am I supposed to wear?"

Yoshimori tightened the sash around his waist before tying it, looking over at Gen's broad back. "I dunno, I think you look great just like that!"

Gen blushed and said, "Y-Yeah, but that's only okay when I'm with you. When I'm out there I have to look more...presentable."

Yoshimori rubbed Gen's back, leaning against him as he looked into the closet. "Well, I can let out a few of these outfits so they fit you, but I won't be able to do that for awhile so...in the meantime I would just make do with something simple."

Gen sighed and pulled out one of his old outfits. He pulled the top on, the bottom of the shirt only reaching midway down his abs, his broad chest almost immediately ripping his shirt down the middle, leaving him with a tattered looking vest. The pants did no better, the legs popping open like overdone sausages popping their casings, leaving him with a pair of short shorts that gripped his thighs. Gen felt like he looked ridiculous but Yoshimori was encouraging. "Don't worry! You look great! No one's going to see you out there anyway besides me and the ayakashi we're killing."

Gen nodded, moving towards the door. "Come on, let's go."

As soon as they were outside, Yoshimori clambered onto Gen's back, wrapping his arms around his lover's thick neck. Gen waited patiently until Yoshimori was firmly and safely in place before taking off, moving with all speed to Karasumori.

"Remember the plan Gen!" Yoshimori said. "We have to stay separate until the ayakashi shows up. He has to think that we're still fighting so the second you see him try to find me and attack me."

"Right. Then I throw the fight and he'll give me more power which will allow us to take him down."

"Exactly! We've got this in the bag!"

Gen landed with a loud thump inside the school grounds, his big bare feet leaving footprints in the soft grass. Yoshimori jumped down and immediately took off, Gen moving in the opposite direction. For about an hour they wandered the grounds, keeping their eyes peeled for the ayakashi, destroying any lesser ayakashi that dared cross them. Finally, at about one in the morning, Yoshimori ran smack into the ayakashi, getting knocked to the ground in the process. Yoshimori quickly got to his feet, glaring at the creature before him. The once young ayakashi now had the height and build of an adult, his face aged to around the same age as Yoshimori and Gen, his hair and clothing style unchanged, though the clothes were bigger to accommodate his much larger body. The ayakashi smirked and said, "Well, well, well. Looks like my poison wore off."

"Yeah and now I'm going to kick your ass!" Yoshimori shouted, pointing his fingers at the monster. "Ketsu!"

The ayakashi moved with blinding speed, kicking Yoshimori in the stomach before punching him across the face and slashing him along the chest with his claws. The ayakashi closed one eye and carefully aimed before flicking Yoshimori, the massive finger smacking him painfully in the ass before sending him flying through the air...straight towards an open window! The ayakashi yelled out and quickly ran after Yoshimori, trying to snatch him before he landed inside the room.

"NO!" He shouted as he saw Yoshimori land on the windowsill, slide across it, and fall onto someone's bed. "Well...I still have another toy out here!"

The ayakashi began to scan the ground for Gen. The half ayakashi teen had managed to reach the front door by this time, sneaking inside the house through a crack. Now both boys were safely inside the house, the ayakashi not quite daring to invade. There was something about the house that felt...off to him. After searching for a good ten minutes, he got frustrated and quickly darted up a tree, watching the house with sleepless eyes. "They have to come back out of there sometime!"

The young ayakashi had no idea why he didn't just go inside the house and start tearing it apart in his efforts to find his toys, killing any human who got in his way. He just had this overwhelming feeling that there was something or someone dangerous inside. Something that could actually kill him, unlike the toys he had created. Even if the ayakashi had been brave enough to sneak inside the house, he wouldn't have been able to. There was too many wards and spells to keep out negative forces. A young and relatively weak ayakashi like him would have been burned up in an instant! But he was mostly patient. He would wait.

Meanwhile, the two shrunken teens now found themselves in an entirely different world, both of them completely exhausted, but at least safer than they were outside. What would happen to them now?
15422112.title: New World

choices: Decided to "enlighten" Gen.
Decided to help Gen. Meanwhile, Yoshimori...
154221122.content:
Gen was finally able to rest inside Yoshimori's house. There was a light left on near the entrance, there always was, just for Yoshimori when he came home. Gen rested in the light, just to be entirely sure he was safe. Just a little nap was all he needed... Everyone was asleep, so he held onto that thought, hoping he wouldn't be stepped on.

Gen was able to rest for a good three hours or so. His eyes started to open, and he slowly got up and sat on his butt. Sleeping on hard concrete like that sure wore a guy out! His back felt a little stiff, but at least he had regained his energy. Looking up, he hopped up over the wooden curb and into the house. He started walking down the long hallway, looking all around. Now that he thought about it, this was his first time actually being IN Yoshimori's house... Speaking of which, where was Yoshimori? Last he remembered, he was flung through a window, but just where did he wind up?

Before Gen could think any more on the matter, he saw a light on in a room not too far away. Picking up speed, he ran over and listened in. He could hear movement from within, but it didn't seem like anyone was talking in there... Truthfully, Gen was just surprised to see someone still up at this hour! It took a lot of strength, but he managed to peer the door open a small crack, just enough so that he could peek inside. To Gen's surprise, he saw Yoshimori's older brother, Masamori, sitting shirtless at the table, looking over a book. His face seemed rather relaxed, so he must not have been working... Was he reading for pleasure for a change? Either way, Masamori being in a good mood was great news for Gen! Fearlessly, Masanori ran across the tatami floor, making his way to Masamori.

---------------------------

"Ugh... Where am I...?" Yoshimori mumbled to himself. He looked up and all around. The room was dark, but after he had fallen down from the windowsill, he landed onto soft ground... And the more he struggled to get free, the more tired he became. He ended up taking a nap just as Gen did! Yoshimori rubbed his head, standing on the wavy, soft ground. As he stood, there was a light, tender groan. Yoshimori was immediately on guard, and looking all around to see a large, bluish black globe at the head of what appeared to be a bed. That globe looked all too familiar... Yoshimori's eyes went wide as he saw the figure rise up. "T-Toshimori!?"

--------------------------

"Masamori!" Gen shouted from below the table. Masamori lifted his head, looking all around. It was quiet in the room after all, so it wasn't hard for him to hear. "Masamori!" Gen shouted again, louder this time. Masamori looked down, and saw Gen at the base of the table.

"Gen? Is that you?" He said, still calm. He gently picked him up and set him down on the table. "What happened?" With those words, Gen began to explain all the events that led up to this moment, from leaving for school, all the way up to taking a nap in the doorway. Masamori listened intently, asking all the questions necessary to find out everything he needed to know. After hearing Gen's whole story, he sat back, and began thinking.

"This isn't like anything I've ever heard. But it almost makes sense. If the ayakashi could shrink it's target, it could have an easier time capturing its prey." Masamori reasoned. "But even so, I never knew something like this existed..."

Gen just nodded, looking up at Masamori. Gen almost looked kinda cute at this size... So helpless... A smile stretched across Masamori's lips. "Maybe we could use this opportunity to teach Gen... How to take down bigger opponents..." Masamori reasoned with himself, chuckling to himself. "On the other hand, this IS a real problem... The sooner we solve it, the better..."

After a little more thinking, Masamori...
154221122.title: Gen's Journey

choices: Gen's strength gives out. Masamori lets him rest.
Gen pushes himself to his limits! Meanwhile, Yoshimori is...
1542211221.content:
Masamori, having come to a decision at last, closed his thick book, the breeze it created nearly blowing Gen off the table again, and smiled down at his little subordinate. "This might actually be a blessing in disguise."

Gen was rather surprised to hear Masamori say that but he trusted the man more than anyone so he withheld judgement. "What do you mean chief?"

Masamori chuckled and said, "I've watched you fight Gen and your style, while effective, is also a bit crude. You basically charge into battle and use your full power to rip apart any enemy that is in your way. While undoubtedly effective, such tactics don't always work and when you come back broken, bloody, and bruised, it shows that your technique could use a bit of work."

Gen lowered his head as he heard this. "I'm sorry...I've failed you..."

Masamori gently patted Gen on the head and said, "Not at all! Don't start thinking like that now. All I mean is that when you fight opponents stronger than yourself, you need to fight more with this..." he gently pushed his index finger against Gen's tiny forehead. "...rather than with these." He poked the various muscles in Gen's body.

"How do I do that?" Gen asked. Masamori's smile stretched wider. He was hoping that the conversation would go this way. "Well, that's what I mean when I say this situation is a blessing in disguise. See my book on the table? Try to lift it."

Gen looked between the book and his chief, trying to decide if he was serious or not. Masamori chuckled again and said, "Trust me. I'm trying to make a point."

Gen shrugged and walked over to the book. Once he was right next to it, he bent down and worked his hands under the cover. Bracing himself, he lifted with all his might...and moved it exactly no distance. While he struggled, Masamori reached down and lifted the book up easily in one hand. Gen, surprised by this sudden movement, hung onto the cover for dear life. Masamori brought the book closer to his face and focused on the tiny half ayakashi dangling from it. "You see? I'm far stronger than you right now. And we're in a completely safe environment. Do you see where this is going?"

Gen, a little intimidated by Masamori's enormous face, gulped a little and nodded. Masamori held his hand under Gen, allowing the tiny teen to drop onto his palm. It felt strange, sitting in the palm of the man who had done so much for him. Gen couldn't help but feel completely safe and at ease. Now that he was in Masamori's care, nothing bad would happen to him. Masamori got to his feet and replaced the book on the shelf, pushing it in place with his finger before sitting back down at the table. He set Gen down on top of it and put his hands on his knees, his expression suddenly serious. "Now then...How is your body? You're not in pain or anything right?"

Gen touched his body all over, moving his limbs, rotating his shoulders, and bending his legs. Everything seemed to be in proper working order...he was just a little worn out. He wasn't about to appear weak in front of his chief though! He got into a fighting pose and said, "I'm fine!"

Masamori smiled slightly before his expression became serious again. "Alright...We'll start with something simple. At my size, my body is too hard to be damaged. Try. Now!"

Masamori barked out the last word as an order, moving his chest closer to the table. Gen couldn't help but feel slightly intimidated. Masamori's body was quite impressive. He was very tall and his muscles were well developed. Gen truly felt like an impenetrable wall had rose in front of him. He transformed his hands into claws and charged forward, slashing at Masamori's right pec. Even though his claws clearly made contact several times, Masamori's skin didn't even turn slightly red from irritation. Gen stopped after a few minutes, already breathing hard. Masamori moved back, his hands on his knees again. "Do you understand? You can attack me as many times as you like, with as much strength as you like, but you will never kill me."

Without warning, Masamori suddenly reached forward and snatched Gen up in his hand, his tree trunk like fingers wrapping around the vulnerable teen. Gen let out a little yell as he was lifted into the air. Masamori lightly tossed Gen from hand to hand, squeezing him slightly before "accidentally" dropping him onto his lap. All of this was harrowing from Gen's point of view, but he was unable to do anything except take it. Masamori lifted Gen back onto the table and lowered his face so he was looking at Gen on the same level. "I could have easily killed you, however, several times without trying. THIS is why you need to train to fight stronger, larger opponents. I want to work on building your endurance first."

Gen nodded, eager to be taught how to fight from Masamori himself. This was a once in a lifetime opportunity! The fact that he was shrunk was only a slight issue in the back of his mind. Masamori, on the other hand, had ulterior motives for wanting to "train" Gen. This was a once in a lifetime opportunity for him as well! He had always taken a particular liking to Gen and now here he was, tiny and vulnerable with no one else knowing he was here. Gen had neglected to mention Yoshimori while he was explaining what had happened to him so Masamori's first priority was to make sure Yoshimori didn't interfere. He was liable to freak out if he saw Gen and then demand they fix everything immediately. Masamori wasn't about to let that happen. He got to his feet and surreptitiously locked the door before walking over to the table where Gen was standing. He lifted up his foot and held it over Gen's body. "Raise your arms!"

Gen did as he was told. The very second his arms were extended, Masamori lowered his foot down on top of him. Gen's arms immediately tensed up, the muscles in his arms bulging as he held up Masamori's wide, powerful foot. There was a slight smell to the appendage, but it was mostly of soap. It was clear that Masamori had just showered this evening. It was likely this was why he wasn't wearing a shirt. Masamori crossed his arms and said, "I want you to hold up my foot for as long as you can. Push yourself to your limits and beyond!"

Gen braced himself, sweat already dripping down his face. He was already weary, passed his limits. His pride wouldn't allow him to admit it however. He kept it up, his palms growing sweaty as he forced himself to keep holding the foot up. Masamori flexed his toes and applied slightly more pressure. His gaze was absolute. If Gen looked to be even in the slightest bit of danger, he would be helped.
1542211221.title: Training? ...Sure, Let's Call it That...

choices: Just then, the oven dinged! A fresh batch of miniature cakes were done!
Everything else was already packed up! Gen would have to wait until later...
15423.content:
As Gen woke up, he saw nothing but darkness around him! He sat up instantly and started to look around! He saw a bookshelf, a closet... His nose picked up on a scent that he recognized as Yoshimori's! This must have been his house... Gen rubbed his head sleepily, and got to his feet. He felt a little off balanced for a moment as he then started making his way out the door.

The moment the door opened, Gen's nose was hit with a different smell! It was sweet, alluring, delicious! Gen started walking down the hall to try to find the source of it all. It was so familiar to him...

Gen followed his nose, and it led him right to the Sumimura's kitchen! As Gen peeked in through the crack of the wall, he saw someone at the counter with a bandana on their head. Gen immediately recognized it as Yoshimori, and stepped inside.

Yoshimori was mixing batter, but turned to look at the door as soon as he heard it open! "Oh, Gen! There you are sleepyhead!" He said happily, "I'm glad you're finally awake! We have to get going soon." Yoshimori explained.

"Going...?" Gen asked groggily as he rubbed his head.

"Yeah! To Karasumori!" Yoshimori replied, "But are you feeling okay?" Yoshimori asked Gen, just to be sure.

"Y-Yeah... I'm fine..." He said softly, "... How did I get here...?" He asked Yoshimori.

Yoshimori shrugged before saying, "I thought you knew. I didn't see you at school, so I thought you were sick or something. I was going to go visit you after I got home, but as soon as I went up to my room, there you were, sleeping like a baby! So I just left you there. You didn't feel like you were running a fever."

Gen ran his hand over his head, just to confirm it. He wasn't sick, was he? And that ayakashi... Did that really happen? Or was it just a nightmare? And if it was just a dream, how did he wind up at Yoshimori's house? He vividly remembered going to sleep in his own house last night... Gen looked down at himself, and found that he was shirtless! Not to mention all he had on was a pair of black shorts!

"H-Hey, what happened to my clothes!?" He shouted unnecessarily.

"Well they were dirty!" Yoshimori replied, "You couldn't sleep in those. So I found that for you."

"Y-You mean you...!?" Gen said, turning away as he held his crotch!

"All nine inches." Yoshimori replied with a snake-like grin.

"Y-You... I can't believe..." Gen grumbled aloud.

"Hey now, don't worry! I won't tell anyone!" He said. He had walked over and was putting his arm over Gen's shoulder. He still held a spatula in his hand, and it was hovering just below Gen's head. "Would it make you feel better if I let you lick the bowl?" Yoshimori asked, gesturing twords the cookware. It was a joke, of course, but Yoshimori didn't even seen Gen's answer coming!

"Sure." He replied simply. He got out from under Yoshimori's arm, and over to the empty bowl!

"H-Hey! What?!" Yoshimori rushed back over, "But you told me you don't even like sweets!" Yoshimori wasn't only surprised, but a little upset! After all, he loved to lick the bowl!

"Well, this time's different." Gen replied. It was true, he wasn't the biggest fan of anything sweet, but for some reason, he felt differnt this time. He ran a finger along the edge of the bowl, getting lots of delicious batter on his finger. He then lifted it to his lips and tasted it! His eyes seem to fall closed as he enjoyed the full flavor, the sweet, creaminess of it all. It was like a whole new wave of flavor washing over his tongue! As he tasted it, he could only think of how he wanted more!

"S... So?" Yoshimori asked Gen, wanting to hear what he thought.

"I like it." He said plainly, "Is there any more?"
15423.title: Strange Appetite

choices: At Karasumori, Tokine is a no show. Well, can't waste good cake...
Yoshimori asks Gen to stay overnight (no one else is home).
154231.content:
A loud DING sound drowned out whatever Yoshimori was about to say next. Gen's head turned toward the appliance, much like a dog or cat does when hearing a can opener. His nose twitched slightly as he turned back to Yoshimori. "What's in there?"

"Cakes, what else?" Yoshimori said, shaking his head slightly. "I suppose you're going to want to have one of these too?"

Gen nodded, licking his lips slightly, saliva pooling in his mouth. Yoshimori pulled a tray of miniature cakes out of the oven, about twelve of them situated on it. They were about three inches long and an inch wide, plain cake, though different flavors were present. Lemon cake, vanilla cake, chocolate cake, butterscotch, and more! The smell was intoxicating, filling the small kitchen with the delicious aroma. Gen quickly wiped his mouth while Yoshimori's back was turned, walking up to his smaller friend. He reached out for one of the cakes when Yoshimori slapped his hand with a wooden spoon, frowning at him. Gen winced and grabbed his hand, rubbing it slightly. "What's your problem?" He sounded slightly annoyed.

"I haven't even decorated them yet!" Yoshimori said, waving his spoon at Gen. "You can have one, and I mean ONE, when I'm done! The rest is for Tokine and I to share!"

Gen sighed and crossed his arms, leaning against the counter, watching Yoshimori's every move. "I don't understand why you even bother making anything for her. On the off chance she actually does ever eat anything you make she's nothing but condescending and rude about it."

Yoshimori blushed and said, "S-Shut up! She's not like that..." Deep down inside, though, he knew Gen was right. He looked a little crestfallen as he decorated the cakes, adding frosting before putting in finer details. Bits of fruit, curls of cream, quick injections of filling, every new confection was making Gen hungrier and hungrier! He gently put his hand on his abs as he heard his stomach rumble loudly. Yoshimori raised an eyebrow as he heard the noise. Gen blushed.

"What are you staring at?" He asked.

"What's up with you tonight? You don't even like sweets and you're practically drooling to have these."

"I already told you, these are different...somehow." Gen said, running a hand wearily through his hair. He didn't understand it either and it wasn't easy to think when he was so hungry!

Yoshimori put the finishing touches on the cakes and said, "There! Done~"

Gen immediately grabbed the nearest cake and shoved it whole into his mouth, slurping the frosting off his fingers as he chewed it up, swallowing the mass of cake down in one gulp, a huge bulge traveling down his throat, disappearing behind his buff chest. He let out a satisfied sigh and immediately grabbed another one, eating this one more slowly.

"H-Hey! I said one! ONE!" Yoshimori shouted, waving his arms around, walking up towards Gen. The taller teen pushed his back against the counter, lifting a foot up and pressing it against Yoshimori's chest, holding him back while he ate his second, third, and fourth cake. "HEEEEEEEY!" Yoshimori yelled angrily, smacking Gen's muscly leg with his spoon.

"Settle down, I'm not going to eat all of them...probably." Gen said, picking up two more, stuffing them one after another into his mouth. "Mmmm...these are really, really good."

Yoshimori looked surprised, ceasing his struggling. It helped that he was also getting tired as the night progressed. "Really? You think they're that good?"

"Well, I don't normally like sweets right?" Gen said, picking up another cake and munching on it. "That should be proof enough there's something special about these."

Yoshimori blushed a little, rubbing the back of his head. "Yeah, I guess so...~"

Now that the pan was pretty much empty, Gen was finally starting to feel full. He picked up one more, leaving about four cakes left. "There. Two for you, two for her." Gen said, straightening back up, removing his foot from Yoshimori's chest.

"Huh? Oh! Yeah, right. Thanks." Yoshimori said, packing the four treats up into a box. Somehow, despite the fact he did this all the time, this felt wrong. "Y-You sure you don't want another one?"

"Me?" Gen said, rubbing his full stomach. "Not right now. Maybe later."

"Okay..." Yoshimori said, sounding disappointed. "Anyway, your clothes are in the laundry room. It's not what you normally wear when we go to Karasumori but it should work for one night, right?"

"Sure." Gen said, walking down the hall to the laundry room. It was quiet in the house. Not the normal stillness of a full house where everyone was sleeping but a kind of vacant silence, like no one else was there. He made it to the laundry room and quickly dressed himself, his white shirt falling a little awkwardly down over his stomach. It was pushing out slightly, stuffed full of cake. He grimaced, poking at his abs slightly. "What's coming over me? I've never done anything like that before..."

He made his way back to the kitchen, only to find it empty. "Must be in his room." Gen decided, heading that way. He opened the door to Yoshimori's room, catching him just as he dropped his pants, revealing his nude body in all its glory to his friend. Yoshimori stared, mouth hanging open while Gen stared. He pointed at the pale teen and said, "Now we're even." Without another word, he closed the door, listening to the curses coming from inside the room with a small smile.
154231.title: Sweet Snack

choices: As the boys sit there, Gen goes through a sudden change!
A new ayakashi makes an appearance! A particularly... Sweet one.
1542311.content:
As the two boys set out to do their duties for the night, Yoshimori made sure to wake up Madarao from his doghouse. With their little troupe complete everything was set. Even Gen, who was already starting to think about all the tasty little treats that Yoshimori hid inside his bag. He seemed to be keeping an irregularly tight grip on it.

They arrived at Karasumori without incident. As Yoshimori looked around, he found it strange that Tokine wasn't waiting for him at the gate like she usually was. However, after a brief moment, Hakubi came down from above!

"Yoshimori! Oh, Yoshimori!" He called as he fluttered down, "Ah, there you are! Tokine sent me here to tell you she can't make it tonight..."

"What? Why?" Yoshimori asked, walking a little closer to the ghostly black dog.

"Well she had a little bit of a spill and now her ankle is, well, sprained." Hakubi explained.

"What!? Is she okay!?" Yoshimori shouted!

"Don't worry, she's fine. In fact, she was more worried about you. But! She said as long as Gen is here with you, everything should be okay." Hakubi told him, "After all, next to Mistress Tokine, Gen IS the most capable."

"Yeah, yeah, I get it." Yoshimori replied plainly, less than interested in anything else Hakubi had to say, "Why don't you just get home?" Yoshimori replied, walking right by, "Some of us actually have work to do."

"Yeah! Why don't you go fluttering back to that little hovel you call a house?" Madarao taunted as he flew past, keeping up with Yoshimori.

"Y-You...!" Hakubi grunted in anger. Gen quickly followed Yoshimori. It was almost like a puppy following it's master for a treat! Realizing anything he said would go unnoticed, he flew back home. Not to mention his argument would be invalid against two bull-headed twits like the Sumimuras.

As Gen caught up with Yoshimori, his head was practically on the smaller male's shoulder! "So... Since Tokine's gone... I get her food, right?" He tried asking casually.

"Huh? Oh, sure." Yoshimori replied absent mindedly. "C'mon Gen, let's get to work!" He said, setting the container down in a safe place before running off onto the school grounds! Gen glanced at the container, a painful wanting in his eyes as he did! He shook his head as he remembered what he was here to do in the first place!

- - -


The night seemed to drag on for Gen, and it was only the beginning of the job! Soon enough, however, the two boys managed to dwindle the population down to a small enough level that Madarao and Gen couldn't sniff out anymore. Gen made a rush back to where Yoshimori had put the container down!

As Gen arrived on the scene, he noticed Yoshimori was already setting down the blanket! Gen immediately rushed over to join him, taking a seat on the comfy surface.

"Man, I don't think I've ever seen you this excited... Well, ever!" Yoshimori told Gen as he opened up the tin! He chuckled a little, and handed two of the cakes to Gen, who seemed to be staring them down! As soon as they left Yoshimori's hands, they entered Gen's, and the tanned teen seemed to tear right into them! In three big bites, Gen had the first one devoured, making a huge mess all over the blanket, and not to mention his face! He then began tearing into the other one! His lips smacked together as he seemed to shove it into his mouth!

"Hey, can't you at least appreciate the flavor!?" Yoshimori barked at Gen! "I spent a lot of time on these!"

Gen glanced at Yoshimori for a moment, who was also holding a cake in his hand. The two boys locked eyes for a moment, as a dead silence rang.

"... No." Yoshimori suddenly said, as if in defiance. Gen started to crawl twords him with that same ravenous hunger in his eyes! "Gen, get away! Th-This one's mine!" Yoshimori told him. It was all futile. Gen leapt at Yoshimori and his mouth made a dive for Yoshimori's hand! Gen held Yoshimori's wrist, and, using his superior strength, shoved the cake into his mouth all at once! Yoshimori was shocked, and while he could, made a grab for his other cake!

Just as Gen finished one, he was frantically looking for the other! As he saw Yoshimori eating it, his insticts were to get that cake, no matter the cost! Gen tried to break Yoshimori's hand away from his face, but when he saw that it wasn't working, he knew there was only one thing to do!

- SMOOCH! -

Gen had started to kiss Yoshimori to get the cake back from him! Yoshimori clenched his teeth, denying Gen any access! The half-ayakashi man had to resolve to licking Yoshimori's cheeks, which both tickled, and felt kind of funny! As Yoshimori swallowed the cake he had frantically eaten, he started to push back at Gen!

"G-Gen, stop! Ahaha! S-Stop! Get off!" Yoshimori barked through his laughter. Gen was a big guy, and though he didn't quite know it, he was getting bigger all the time...
1542311.title: Absence Makes the Gut Grow Fuller

choices: Keki attacks with more sweets! Yoshimori dodges but Gen...
Gen recovers, testing out his new body as he helps Yoshimori!
15423112.content:
As the two boys struggled and fought a bit, they barely noticed as an ayakashi floated down, hovering over top of them. "Oh my! What's this? A couple of quarreling boys? that won't do at all!"

Yoshimori and Gen both looked up, seeing a small, fairy like creature with long hair, wearing a dress that was as elaborate and decorated as a cake, a fancy hat shaped like a peppermint situated on her head. She was holding a magic want that seemed to be made out of a waffle cone with a chocolate covered ice cream star at the end. Yoshimori groaned and said, "What the hell are you supposed to be? Get out of here! We're busy!"

The ayakashi puffed out her cheeks, glaring at the raven haired teen. "Oh! Oh! Rude! Rude, rude, rude! How very rude! I should wash your mouth out with soap you rude, rude boy!"

Gen slowly got to his feet, licking his lips a little. The more he looked at this ayakashi, the more hungry he became! He was starting to see her as more like a living confectionery treat rather than a demon! She either didn't notice, or didn't care, still focused on Yoshimori. "Nobody treats Keki Yasashii like a cake after Christmas! Take THIS!"

She raised her wand, causing a shadow to appear over Yoshimori's head. He raised and eyebrow and looked up, yelling in fright as an enormous cake landed right on top of him, pinning him to the ground! The ayakashi giggled, twirling around in the air. "That's what you get~ Now be pressed to jelly under my delicious cake~!"

Gen officially lost all interest in the ayakashi as the delicious, moist scent of the cake filled his nose. He started to visibly drool, wiping his mouth as he slowly walked toward the cake. It was at least six feet tall, covered in enormous sugar roses and swirls, strawberries the size of beach balls sitting on the top. Madarao flew into the cake and flew back out, reporting what he saw. "Yoshimori is trapped under there! The cake is filled with chocolate! It's making the thing so heavy he can't move! If you don't get him out of there soon he'll be crushed!"

Hearing the danger his friend was in, Gen quickly tried to tear the cake apart, intending to destroy it so he could reach Yoshimori. His hands just phased through the cake, not able to touch it, let alone move it! The ayakashi giggled and wagged her finger back and forth. "Naughty, naughty~ You can't get rid of a cake that delicious just by destroying it~ You have to eat it! Aaaaaall of it if you want to save that rude boy~"

She said this with the total confidence that Gen wouldn't be able to eat even a portion of the massive sweet. Gen clenched his fist determinedly and shoved his hands into the cake, this time with the intent of eating! He scooped up two massive hunks, chocolate already oozing out of the holes, and shoved them into his mouth! He smacked and slurped and gulped as his sharp teeth ripped into the cake, his throat bulging as he swallowed down massive quantities all at once! Madarao's mouth hung open, as did Keki's, the two spirit creatures watching in awe as Gen gorged himself. He didn't pause, didn't slow, drinking the molten chocolate like it was water, his stomach swiftly swelling! His abs disappeared almost instantly as his belly bulged out, pushing against the net undershirt he was wearing, as well as his purple gi. He groaned a little as he felt himself getting full but kept pushing. He wanted to save Yoshimori more than anything...but the cake's flavor was just too intoxicating to stop either way!

His stomach wasn't the only thing changing. His once toned chest became to sag, becoming rounder and fuller, resting on top of his expanding gut. His arms were swelling as well, filling his sleeves, tearing them slightly. His legs followed suit, his pant legs becoming tight around his fattening thighs and doughy calves, his feet stretching across the cold grass, pressing down against the ground, digging into it. Gen's cheeks grew rounder and softer as well.

"This is both touching and completely disgusting." Madarao said, shaking his head, a paw over his eyes.

"My goodness! I've never seen anyone eat sweets like him!" Keki said enthusiastically, clasping her hands. "He might be the first human to actually eat one of my desserts completely!"

Gen ignored them both, half the cake now demolished in front of him. He paused for a moment, listening. He could faintly detect Yoshimori breathing. He was so close! A little more and he'd be free! He let out a thunderous belch and went back to eating! Handful after handful disappeared into his belly, the shirt ripping down the front, unable to hold back that quivering mass of tanned flesh! He was starting to feel like a sumo, spreading his legs to accommodate his gut, his hands still moving at lightning speed!

Finally, after nearly fifteen minutes of constant gorging, the cake was gone, leaving a dazed Yoshimori and a panting, chocolate and cake covered Gen, his eyes half open as his belly churned and growled, his entire body gone soft and pudgy. He was wearing nothing more than a loincloth, his body heavily muscled. He unleashed another roar, the noise trumpeting through the air, bringing about another fresh round of screams from the human inhabitants.

Kouga snorted and glared at the demon, calling him out! "Hey! You! What the hell do you think you're doing?!"

The demon turned to face Kouga, laughing as he saw the massive wolf. "If it isn't an overgrown fleabag! I am merely claiming my tribute from this village! Since they lack any tribute of food or jewelry I am taking their lives!"

He scooped up a crowd of humans with his trunk, stuffing them into his mouth, swallowing them whole! Kouga gritted his teeth and said, "Oh yeah? Well I'm not going to let that happen!"

The demon laughed again. "What makes you think you can stop me?"

"This!" Kouga shouted, running through the village, smashing his fist against the demon's face, knocking him down onto his ass! Ever since meeting Kagome Kouga had completely changed his views towards humans. Where he once pillaged human villages and murdered them indiscriminately, letting his pack devour an entire group of them without batting an eye. Now, however, he went out of his way to help humans, not letting them be murdered if he could help it. The humans at his feet, however, just saw two monstrous demons fighting over their village, their panic only increasing. The elephant demon slowly got back to his feet, glaring at Kouga.

"You rotten bastard! I won't forgive you for this!" He shouted, stomping the ground, charging Kouga! He wrapped his enormous arms around Kouga, his giant biceps pressing tightly into Kouga's back, pinning him hard against his rock hard pecs. Kouga struggled but couldn't break the grip, getting slammed against the ground, destroying at least three houses! Kouga leaned up and slashed his claws across the demon's chest, forcing him back, kicking him in the knee, making him stumble. The demon plunged his trunk into a nearby lake, sucking up the water. He straightened his trunk, blowing the water out, the energy inside his body turning the water into blades, cutting deeply into Kouga's body, even as he guarded!

"Nngh! That all you got?!" Kouga shouted defiantly, leaping on him, forcing him to the ground again before biting his neck, ripping a chunk out of his throat. The demon trumpeted in pain, adrenaline bringing him to his feet, his tusk goring Kouga in the arm! Kouga kicked and kicked at him, driving his bear foot into the demon's trunk, breaking it, before his toe claw plunged into the demon's eye, blinding it! Kouga managed to pull his arm free, holding the wound closed before delivering a roundhouse kick, caving in the demon's throat! All of this trauma finally brought the beast down, first to his knees and then fully supine, the light leaving his eyes. "Feh! Pathetic!" Kouga shouted, spitting on the demon's corpse. He turned around and saw a large group of humans watching him in awe. He grinned and gave a thumbs up. "No problem!"

Cheers erupted in the village at Kouga's victory, one old man stepping up to speak to him. "A god has saved our village! Please, stay with us as long as you wish!"

"God huh?" Kouga said softly, scratching his chin. "Not bad! I like the sound of that!"
155131112.title: A Savior is Born

Hiroyuki decides Shippou would be the easier target!
1551311121.content:
"Alright! I guess your new god could hang around for a little bit!" Kouga said, smiling down at the villagers. They all seemed to cheer happily as they heard that their savior would be staying with them! It brought a little smirk to the wolf man's face to hear them.

"Please, oh powerful one! We do not have much to offer, but hopefully a small portion of our crops will do?" The man pleaded up at Kouga. "I beg of you, do not abandon us for having so little!" He called out.

"Huh?" Kouga looked down at the small cart of food. It wasn't full, heck, it barely even came up to half! But still, it made Kouga feel warm inside to know that these people were giving all they could just so Kouga would continue to protect them! "Uh... Sure!" Kouga said, taking as much as his hand could hold! Glancing down at them briefly, he plucked out some of the rice that he held in his palm and tossed it in his mouth! He swallowed it with ease, glancing down at the people. "... Uh... Yum?"

The people seemed to cheer once again, glad to hear that their god was pleased! Just then, Kouga could have swore he felt his feet tingling! As he looked down, several of them had taken it upon themselves to rub his feet! Kouga just chuckled nervously. He liked being called a god, but all this new treatment was so new to him! Shrugging it off, Kouga checked his back before taking a seat, letting them better service him!

"Aw, yeah! That feels great!" Kouga said with a happy sigh, "Hey, a little more to the right! And really get in my soles, got it?" He said, enjoying his meal brought to him as the tiny, helpless people worshipped him. The massive man truly felt like a god! "Nnn..." Kouga grunted softly, he picked up a few of them and set them down on his thick pecs, before asking, "Hey! Could you rub my chest too?" He asked, laying on his back now. He soon felt the men getting to work on his chest, the muscles worked and softened without him even having to do a thing! Nothing could feel better...

- - -


It was getting late, and young Hiroyuki was traveling out in the fields, feeling just a little bit bummed by his latest failure. "What could have gone wrong? I did everything just like master said I should..." Hiroyuki rubbed his head with his staff, "And he's not going to be back from the mountains for another couple of years...!" Hiroyuki's ears suddenly perked up! He could have swore he heard voices nearby! As he ran over and peeked through some bushes, he spotted Inuyasha and the gang all huddled together around a fire! It was then Hiroyuki got an idea, his rather selective vision only seeing the two demons in the group! "Well... I could always capture one and try again... Maybe I'll use more purifying salts...!"

Hiroyuki remained in the bushes, waiting it out until the entire gang had fallen fast asleep! He got a sly grin on his face as he prepared to pluck one of them out...

15521.content:
Edward was sitting far back in a chair in Roy Mustang's office, listening to him ramble on about something Ed truthfully could care less about. All he could gather was that Roy had returned from some conference with some kind of award. Of course, he took no time in showing it off to everyone, especially Ed. Roy knew that Ed was the most short tempered and easiest to annoy of his men, which is why he spared no expense to embarass and tease him at any moment possible! However, today was just not the day for Ed. All kinds of events today had reminded him of just how short he was. The first twenty times caused his usual spasms, but after a while, it just got old... And it wasn't much help that Roy kept talking how much of a "big, important man" he was, while Ed was just an "expendable pipsqueak."

No, this time Ed was off in his own wonderland. If he was just a foot taller, how much he'd love to shove it back in everyone's face. As he sat there in the chair with a closed fist holding up his head, he chuckled to himself. Immediately, Roy caught wind of this, and turned to Ed from his self-absorbed speech.

"Oh? So you finally see the humor in my story?" Roy asked, actually feeling somewhat flattered for a moment there. Ed, of course, had to snap to right then and there, lest get a further lecture from Roy.

"Huh? Yeah! Sure." Ed replied half-heartedly. The unamused enthusiasm in his speech spoke for itself. The bored look on his face didn't help any. Roy's face soon formed a frown as he looked at Ed. This was proving to be less fun than he hoped.

"That'll be all, Fullmetal." Roy said, sitting back down at his desk and shooing Ed away. After staring at Roy for just a moment, Ed stood back up to his feet and slowly walked to the door. Even his boots seemed to leave a boring click with every step he took, before it was all silenced with the shutting of Roy's office door.

As soon as he heard the door shut, Alphonse, Edward's younger brother, looked up at Ed. They too had a brief staring contest before Al let out a yawn. "Is he finally done?" He asked, getting back up to his feet, "My legs are half asleep..."

"Your legs?" Ed chuckled, "I feel like my ears are about to fall off!" Ed clapped his hand on Al's shoulder, smiling at him. "Come on, let's head back to the hotel."

The two took their time returning to the hotel, looking up and down the market all the way home. Sometimes it was a bit of a pain to travel out to Central HQ from home, but the way Ed saw it, it never hurt to get out and see the world again.

"Hey! Brother! Look!" Al called, pulling at Ed's arm. "They have milk on sale, buy one get one half off!"

In reply, Ed just stuck his tongue out. "Bleh, Al, you know I hate that stuff..." Al thought for a moment before chuckling.

"Right, right, sorry! I forgot!" He smiled, before running off into the crowd to get in on the sale. Ed just chuckled again. Ever since he got his body back, Al sure loved being able to enjoy everything he missed out on while he was in that suit of armor. The fluffy feel of kittens, the sweet and delicious taste of food, and the aroma of every little thing, good or bad! Though, he did kind of prefer the good ones...

Ed waited for a full five minutes or so, before Al came running back, the two jugs of milk in his arms as he did.

"I think I'll have one of these with dinner tonight!" He said, grinning down at his brother. It was at this moment that Ed had realized how tall Al had gotten... All that milk must have been doing something for his body... Even so, Ed refused to drink the nasty stuff.

----------------------

Later that night, the two boys were laying out in bed together. Ed got the window bed, but Al didn't mind much. He just loved being able to feel the comfy, coziness of an actual bed!

"Hey, brother?" Al asked in a calm, quiet voice. Ed turned his view from the window over to Al. "I think I need a new shirt again... This one keeps rising up on me..." Ed looked down a little further, and sure enough, the white button-up they had just bought Al about a week ago was already getting too small for him! It was hard to see, but with the help of the moonlight, Ed could have swore he saw Al's naval! Ed just let out a sigh.

"Yeah... We'll go shopping for new clothes tomorrow..." He told his younger brother, before turning his view back out the window.

Al chuckled somewhat nervously as he heard his brother's reply. "I'm sorry..." He said shyly. It was obvious to Ed that he wasn't apologizing for the clothes.

"It's okay," Ed started out, "You can't help what your body does." However, despite his word, Ed knew that exactly what Al was doing that was making him a size bigger every week... The eldest alchemist brother couldn't help but be filled with jealousy. Maybe just one day, he could wake up and have his clothes not fit. Maybe one day he could know how it feels to shop for larger clothes than what he needed since he was always growing. Maybe someday he could just know how it felt to be... Bigger.

As the simple, predictable thoughts rushed through his head, a star in the sky twinkled brighter than all the others for a brief moment. Ed caught wind of it, before a small frown crossed his face.

"Poor little guy... All burned out..." He thought quietly to himself.

Little did Ed know, it was quite the opposite. For the next morning he would wake up much bigger than before, however...

As Edward slept soundly, not even noticing as he body began to change. Under his black tanktop, his pecs began to jutt out, pressing against the soft material as it did. His pecs grew so large and bulbous that they peeked outside of either edge of the t-shirt. His nipples were on clear display! Ed's abs, which were already well-defined, began to pack on mass, pushing up higher and further out. Each one was perhaps smaller than Armstrong's, but packed quite the size! Ed giggled in his sleep a little, as he could feel his thigh start to bulk up, growing tighter in his boxers as the lining struggled to hold in the massive muscles. Ed's calves welled up, balling into a huge size easily five times the size of a normal man's fist! As Ed's feet began to enhance and grow, his entire body was increasing in size! While once he was able to fit comfortably on the bed, his hand soon touched the floor! Soon enough, his feet shoved past the foot of the bed and were hanging over the edge! To top it all off and give Ed a nice ego booster, his dick had slowly going through some enhancements of it's own! He was at an okay size for his age, but in a few seconds, he had a rod that would make any man weep with jealousy! Not to mention his boxers started to feel all the tighter as his ass grew into two huge bowling balls that stuck out nicely from behind.

The entire time, Ed had remained asleep in his bed. One thing was for certian, he was in for a pleasant surprise in the morning!

Edward Elric awoke with a yawn the next morning. As he smacked his lips and got to his feet, he began making his way to the bathroom. That is, he WOULD have made in, but just as he made it to the door, he hit his head on the top of the frame!

"Ow! Dammit!" Ed groaned, rubbing his head. As he looked up, he quickly saw what had happened! "What the...?" Ed said. As he looked down, he gasped when he saw himself! From his bulging pecs to his diamond-cut calves, he was huge! Possibly rivaling even Armstrong! Ed chuckled almost hysterically as he looked over himself. "Wh-Whoa... Look at me! I'm huge!"

Ed began to laugh and dance around, almost unable to believe it! He just had to give himself a pinch, and sure enough, he wasn't dreaming! Ed smiled as he rose his arm and gave it a hard flex. A smile was plastered on his face as he watched the muscles thicken up under his skin.

"Oh yeah!" Ed said happily, "I could get used to this!"

"Brother...?" Al said softly as he sat up in bed, rubbing his eyes.

"Al! Check me out!" Ed told his little brother. He bent forward and did a crab flex, showing off his vascular arms and pumped up chest. As Al looked, his eyes went wide. "So? Whadd'ya think?" Ed asked with a cocky grin.

"E-Ed!" Al shouted. The fact that he called his brother by his first name just showed how shocked he was! "What happened to you!?"

"I dunno!" Ed replied. He stood back up, flexing one of his biceps for Al to see. "But whatever it is, I like it!" Al just tilted his head down a little.

"That doesn't make any sense... How could this have happened...?" Al asked himself. Ed didn't really seem to care. He was enjoying being the huge one for a change! And by huge, Al knew Ed was utterly massive! He must have just as big, if not bigger than Major Armstrong himself! "Ed, we have to go to HQ so they can find out what's wrong with you!" Al insisted.

"Central HQ, eh?" Ed said as he was admiring his thick, powerful quads. "That's where Colonel Mustang is, huh? Yeah... How about we pay him a visit?" Ed said with a vengeful grin. Al shuddered a little. As much as he cared for his brother, he definitely didn't want to be Mustang right now!

After a rough morning, mainly for Ed, the two began to get ready. The part Ed loved the most was how his clothes could hardly fit onto his buffed out physique! It just made him smile all the more! With one goal in mind, Ed and Al began making their way back to Central...
