1552112.content:
Ed had immediately wanted to set out to make his way to Central HQ in order to teach Mustang a little lesson. Al had no choice but to follow behind him, hoping to keep him out of trouble as best he could! Their place of residence was a few miles away from HQ so they had a bit of a walk ahead of them through the city. Almost as soon as they left their room, people had started noticing Ed, looks of shock evident on their faces. Some looked on in admiration while others looked confused as to why such a large man was wearing such tiny clothes. When Ed had dressed that morning, he insisted on forcing his old clothes to fit as best they could. Al, being taller and slightly more muscular than Ed normally, had offered his clothes to his now hulking brother, but Ed wouldn't be talked out of it. His skin tight leather pants were even tighter now, his thighs bulging out against the material. The bottoms of the pant legs were stretched tight around Ed's calves, the pants looking more like shorts. His ass and package both bulged obscenely in front and behind him, every curve perfectly outlined, leaving nothing to the imagination. When he had pulled his boots on, his thick toes had burst from the ends of the footwear and his laces had refused to be tied. Still, Ed's feet were so big the boots stayed perfectly on.

His black undershirt looked painted on his torso, the hem not even pulling down past the second row of his rock hard six pack. His massive pecs bulged out against the shirt, the collar tearing slightly, exposing a tantalizing glimpse of the smooth skin of Ed's chest. The sleeves had been utterly obliterated when he had pulled the shirt on, tatters around the shoulders the only testament to their existence. Ed hadn't even bothered with his puny jacket. The clothing had ripped clean in half when he tried to yank it on over his broad, manly shoulders. With his clothing in this state, it was no wonder Ed was getting attention!

The formerly tiny alchemist was only too aware of the attention he was getting. A cocky grin was plastered on his face as he walked along, flexing his biceps at anyone who stared long enough, drawing slight gasps from some people and blushes from others. Ed kept coming up with new poses the further he went. Al, walking along behind him slightly, had a bit of a sullen expression on his face. He didn't like all the attention Ed was getting...usually his brother only focused on him. He knew he had no right to be jealous. Ed had done so much for him, it was good that he was finally focusing on himself for a bit. Still, Ed was HIS brother...

Al glanced over at Ed, his face blushing slightly. He had missed that bright, carefree smile, the casual pose of his body, and the confidence he exuded. For so long all of that had been bravado. Now it seemed genuine and the changes in his body had done it. "Maybe it isn't so bad that he's this big..." Al thought to himself. "I'm probably just worrying too much..."

Al was deeply absorbed in these thoughts, he didn't even notice someone aiming a gun at him. Luckily, Ed DID notice and threw his body backward, his burly arms wrapping around Al and forcing him to the ground, a shot ringing out just above them. Al, his face buried in Ed's chest, went wide eyed, his protests muffled as Ed pushed his chest even harder against his little brother's face, trying to keep him as low to the ground as possible. "Stay down Al! I'll take care of this!"

Without another word, Ed drew up to his full height and charged after the man, clapping his hands and slamming his right palm against the wall. The man aimed his gun and was about to shoot at Ed when a brick spike erupted from the wall, knocking the gun clean out of the attacker's hand! With a slight curse he turned and started running. "Oh no you don't!" Ed shouted, giving chase.

Al shakily got to his feet as he watched Ed chase after the criminal, catching up with him and slamming him against the wall, forcing his arms behind his back. With another quickly clap, a pair of make shift hand cuffs formed around the shooter's wrists. A small crowd of people who had witnessed this act of bravery applauded Ed for his heroism and bravery. Al smiled slightly, making his way over to Ed. His smile widened as he looked up at his brother. "Ed, that was great! You saved me!"

Ed chuckled and ruffled Al's hair. "Of course! You're my little brother! I'm always going to be looking out for you! You're not exactly immune to bullets anymore you know!"

Al blushed a little and said, "Yeah, I know...I guess that's one thing I had gotten used to."

"Don't worry about it! Just keep your eyes open okay?"

Al nodded and the brothers continued on their way to Central. Ed may have been soaking up the attention of everyone around him, but one particular admirer went unnoticed. Al couldn't seem to look away from his brother. Ed had saved him countless times before, but this time just felt...special somehow. The act was enhanced by Ed's huge body. He was like a mythical hero now! Al moved in closer and brushed his fingers along Ed's own, moving ahead of him soon after, making it appear as though the act had been accidental. When he was a few steps in front of Ed he turned back and said,

Ed let out a noisy yawn as he woke up the next morning. The lack of shades or curtains on the window means he would be woken up the moment the sun hit his eyes. Ed rolled his legs out of the bed first, and sat up, finding a bit of difficulty. He rubbed his eyes and slowly got to his feet, moving to the bathroom. He kept pawing at the straps of his black tanktop, annoyed at how tight it felt... When it suddenly hit him!

"Hey! Maybe I'm taller!" He thought excitedly. He ran to the bathroom, not even noticing how much the room was shaking as he ran! As he slid in front of the mirror, his look of excitement immediately turned to one of shock. "Wh-What...?" He ran his hands over his face. It was soft and squishy, and he could clearly see a second chin right under his first! His eyes wandered lower, and he saw two large meaty breasts, soft and jiggly laying atop a gargantuan belly! His stomach was soft, and shook and wiggled with even the smallest bit of movement! Edward was in shock, as he couldn't even see his feet anymore! His shirt was criminally tight, raising up and practically giving him a midriff like what Envy wore! He could barely see a cavernous bellybutton. "What the heck is this!?"

Ed heard a brief groan from the next room. "Brother...?" Al called out softly, the sleepiness still apparent in his voice. "What's going on...?" Ed ran back out into the bedroom, him and his large gut confronting his brother.

"Al! Look at me!" Ed shouted. Al finished rubbing his eyes, before he suddenly lunged back in shock!

"E-Ed!" He shouted, "What happened to you!? What have you been eating!" Al said, his eyes practically focused on Ed's large stomach.

"I ate just as much as you last night!" Ed snapped back, "I-I just woke up and I was this huge!"

"Well... You DID want to be bigger..." Al said, chuckling nervously.

"Shut up, Al!" Ed shouted at him, "This is serious!" Al slowly wiped the smile from his face, as he tried to assume a more serious persona. It was proving difficult, however, with Ed's large stomach staring him right in the face!

"Do you..." Al stopped for a moment to snicker, "Feel okay? Like does your heart feel okay? Is it hard to breathe?"

Ed took a moment to feel around for the things that Al listed off. "... No..." he said slowly, "I feel just fine... For what it's worth." Ed grabbed his massive stomach in his hands, shaking it around a little. "Geez, how did all this happen...?" He groaned unhappily. Al just shrugged in reply. It was at this moment that Ed remembered something that made Hell seem appealing. "Oh crap... I have to meet with Mustang today..." Ed slapped his palm to his face. "Why... Why today!?" He shouted.

"Why don't you just call in sick?" Al suggested. Ed just shook his head.

"No, no, that's not going to work. Then he'll just come here... And he'll bring the entire army along with him..." Ed groaned. Roy always demanded efficiency. Unless you were on your deathbed or already paid your tolls with a broken limb or two, a little cold wasn't about to stop production! Ed began to think to himself, trying to think of a way out of this.

As his older brother thought, Al crept closer, looking at his brother's bloated physique. Gently, he poked Ed's stomach, looking up at Ed. Ed was too deep in thought to feel it. It actually felt kind of nice... As soft as a pillow... Maybe even softer! Gently, he wrapped his arms around it, hugging Ed close against him. That felt REALLY nice...

It was at this moment Ed noticed something grabbed at him. He looked down at Al, and a smile actually crept along his face. "What are you doing down there?" He chuckled, patting Al on the head.

Al looked up, a cute look on his face. "It's so warm!" He smiled, "And it's really soft too..." Ed laughed at his brother's reaction, and resounding shaking make Al giggle as he held onto it. Ed scratched the back of his head.

"Well... I guess I better get dressed..." He said. Al let go, still smiling happily, as Ed made his way over to the suitcase. He frowned as he held up his usual black undershirt and pants. They were definitely several sizes too small for his new, massive girth. Ed just sighed. "Well, I did always dream about my clothes not fitting..." He ran a hand down his stomach. "I just never thought it would be like this..."

He started to think that he hated that even more than the fact everyone was always calling him short...

Ed walked into Roy's office, finding that his stomach brushed slightly against the door frame. Thankfully Al was always behind him just in case he got stuck.

"Mustang! I'm here!" Ed said. His voice was a little more hefty and deep than before. Roy was looking out the window, thinking about something. He then turned around to see the massive, roly-poly Ed standing there. His eyes went wide as he then...

"Wh-What happened Fullmetal? Have a little too much to eat last night?!" Roy roared, "Y-You, You look like a frickin' penguin! Forget Fullmetal, we should call you Fullbellied!" Edward and Alphonse reached a nearby diner within a few minutes. As they were seated, Ed had to squeeze his newer, bigger body into the booth! His stomach pressed up slightly against the table. Ed just sighed to himself as he saw this. The two were handed menus and left to their own muses for the time being.

"Do you think this is going to be permanent?" Al asked Ed as he glanced over the menu.

Ed had experience taking out opponents who were bigger than him. Unfortunately he had also felt and experienced Mustang's muscles and he knew that normal attacks wouldn't cut it here. Therefore, he decided to risk it all on a gamble. His arm shot out and his fingers just barely managed to grab the gun in Roy's waistband, pulling it free. With an almighty push, he forced himself backward, able to break out of Roy's grip by virtue of surprising the giant man. He moved out of Roy's reach and held up the gun, aiming it steadily at Roy's chest. The Colonel's eyes widened slightly before lowering back to a more laid back position. "So what are you going to do now Fullmetal? Shoot your commanding officer? Even you must know what kind of position that will put you in. Even if you manage to fight your way out of here you'll be public enemy number one to the military. A dangerous rebel. Can you really afford that?"

Ed's hands shook, very slightly. Things had changed since he and Al had gotten their bodies back to normal. Ed had decided to stay on with the military now that the whole thing was being restructured after the fall of the Homunculi's regime, now that pointless war was far less likely. He could enjoy the benefits of the military without having to worry about the drawbacks. However, if he really did shoot Mustang and kill him (or even injure him) he would be arrested. He couldn't do that to Al! "I don't have to kill you. I can shoot out your knee or something if I have to. But what I really want to do, is just leave."

Roy laughed, his chest shaking as he did so. "Leave? And do what? Leave the entire military as well? If you leave my office now I can assure you I'll have you discharged. Threatening your superior officer is still subordination. Face it Fullmetal, you can't win. If you want life to continue on being as good as it has been for you and your brother you're just going to have to learn your place. Now come back over here, set the gun down, and I promise you I won't punish you for this."

Ed glanced down at the gun, something about the situation bothering him. "Why did you have this thing stuck in your underwear anyway? I've never seen you carry a gun before."

Roy shrugged and said, "Standard issue, military grade. Can't hurt to have it on you."

"I don't buy that! There's something special about this gun, isn't there?"

"Don't be an idiot! Look at it! Does it look like anything special to you?"

Ed held it up to his face and looked it over. It did seem like a perfectly ordinary fire arm...then again, his experience with weaponry of any kind was rather limited. Ed suddenly felt the floor shake, his head jerking up in time to see Mustang barreling into him like a charging rhino, pinning him against the wall with such force it put an enormous dent it! Ed yelped and dropped the gun, the back of Roy's forearm pushing against his throat. Roy gently put his foot down over top of the gun and gripped it in his toes, lifting it up to his other hand. He stuffed it back in the back of his underwear and said, "All things considered, I like your fire Fullmetal. It'll make breaking you down into my whimpering puppy all the more satisfying."

Ed spit at Roy, the small gobbet of saliva landing on Roy's cheek. He blinked and wiped it off, looking at his fingers with a bored look. "I guess that's what I should expect from you. Maybe you're just not getting it yet. I can fix that."

He let Ed drop to the ground, crumpling in a heap, gasping for breath. "You were right you know. This ISN'T just an ordinary gun. This little beauty has made me the man you see before you." He pulled the gun out of his waistband and grinned wickedly at Ed. "And now it's going to be the prime example of why you can't hope to beat me."

He pressed the gun to his chest and just as he was about to pull the trigger, Ed leaped up, clapping his hands and touching slamming them against the Colonel. Energy sparked as Roy pulled the trigger, the energy from the gun combining with the energy of the transmutation, causing a violent explosion of energy, knocking both Ed and Roy against the opposite walls! By now the noises coming from Mustang's office were starting to attract attention. The others watched the door as it shook in its frame, smoke coming out from underneath the door. Havoc leaned down and whispered to Fuery, "Ed's been in there for an awfully long time. What do you think those two are doing in there?"

"By the sounds of it?" Fuery replied. "Getting into another fight again."

"I don't know...something about this seems different." Havoc said, straightening up and moving towards the door. He knocked on it and said in a slightly raised voice, "Everything okay in there?"

No response.

Havoc knocked again and said, "Sir? Fullmetal? Are you two okay?"

Still no answer.

Starting to get a little worried now, Havoc gripped the doorknob and opened the door, the cigarette dropping out of his mouth in surprise. The office was empty, the entire back wall completely knocked down while the ceiling had massive holes in it! It was like a demolition had gone on in here! "W-What the hell?!" Havoc shouted, walking into the room. Fuery, Breda, Falman, and the rest all slowly walked in after him, taking stock of all the damage. "Something really weird is going on here." What HAD happened in here?

15531111.title: Double the Pleasure Double the Fun

1553112.content:
The Host Club members were all moving towards the exit of the Music Room when Tamaki suddenly stopped in his tracks. His head had been spinning and his body heating up for the last minute or so but he had been ignoring it. However, as time went on, the feelings only got worse and worse! He pressed his right palm against his forehead while his left arm was hugging him around the chest. Kyouya, being closest to Tamaki at the time of walking, noticed the golden haired teen fall behind and said, "Tamaki? Are you alright?"

Sweat was beading up on his skin as he looked blearily at Kyouya. The rest of the Host Club members stopped and turned, wondering what was going on. "He's just faking." Hikaru said, waving his hand in front of his face.

"I don't know, he looks pretty bad." Kaoru said, one hand on his hip.

"Tama-chan? Are you sick?" Honey asked, tugging on Tamaki's jacket.

Mori came by and picked Honey up, lifting him out of the way in case Tamaki threw up. "Give him some air."

To Tamaki, this was all a discordant jumble of noise that barely penetrated his ears. It was like cotton was stuffed in them. His eyesight was no better. It was like trying to look out a foggy window. Add in how dizzy he felt and it was like trying to drive while sitting behind a foggy windshield...not that Tamaki had ever done such a thing, but he had heard stories. Then everything went black as Tamaki's eyes rolled up into the back of his head and he fainted dead away. He didn't even feel the impact as he fell to the ground.

Tamaki wasn't sure how long he was out. It could have been five seconds and it could have been five hours. His body still felt quite weak, his head still swimming. He just decided to lie there, the cool tile of the floor comforting on his feverish skin.

"Woah, just look at him!" A voice said, seemingly far away, barely audible through the cloud of Tamaki's mind.

"What the hell happened to him?" A different, though similar sounding voice asked.

"I have no idea...." A third voice answered. "Something like this shouldn't technically be possible."

"Put me down, I wanna see something!" A fourth, much younger sounding voice shouted.

Tamaki groaned and turned his head to the left, slowly opening his eyes. Surprisingly, his vision was actually quite clear. Unfortunately for his heart, Honey's grinning face was inches from his own! With a little yelp he jumped to his feet, stumbling slightly as he felt a sense of vertigo, falling back down onto his butt. Honey giggled and said, "Careful Tama-chan! A little guy like you could hurt!"

"A...what?" Tamaki said, shaking his head slightly. Before anyone could say anything, a pair of large hands grabbed him under the armpits and lifted him up rather easily. "Thank you Mori-sempai, but I can stand up on my own." He said, his voice trailing away as he looked up and saw not the face of the stoic upperclassmen but Hikaru's mischievous grin!

"Hey~"

Tamaki nearly fainted again, his body going limp in Hikaru's hands. "See? See? I knew he was the same height as me now!" Honey said, giggling as he got back to his feet.

"W-What the HELL is going on here?!" Tamaki shouted, immediately struggling in Hikaru's hands. "This had better be a dream! I-It has to be right? This can't be real!"

Hikaru held Tamaki at arms length, trying to avoid the spastic prince's flailing limbs. "Sorry boss, but it's real as real can be."

Kyouya walked up and grabbed Tamaki, holding him protectively against his chest. "There there~ Settle down now~ Momma's going to make everything alright~"

Tamaki's eyes started to fill with tears as he clutched at Kyouya's shirt. "This is insane Kyouya! Why do all the terrible things have to happen to meee-hee-hee?" His last word trailed off into a tortured sob. The twins sighed and shook their heads. They knew theatrics when they saw them. Kyouya, one arm wrapped around Tamaki, pulled out a syringe with the other, gently pushing Tamaki's shirt sleeve up until he could stick the needle in, drawing out a small sampling of blood.

"Ouch!" Tamaki said, wincing and looking up at Kyouya with a frown. "Hey, what do you think you're doing?"

"Taking a blood sample~" He said coolly, putting the syringe into a special case. He set Tamaki down and said, "You want to know what's caused this...little problem, right?"

Tamaki dusted off his clothes, suddenly pulling out the hem of his jacket and looking at it in wonder. "Hey...my clothes shrank with me! That's odd..."

"Actually...." Kaoru said, looking a little embarrassed, "Your clothes were way too big so we just put you in one of Honey-sempai's uniforms."

Tamaki looked over at the short boy who smiled shyly at him. "We have the same size now Tama-chan~ Isn't that great?~"

"S-Sure...I guess...At least I have clothes that fit~" He said, smiling weakly at Honey. It was strange looking at him eye to eye...

"Now, I'm going to send this blood to get analyzed." Kyouya said, heading for the door. "In the meantime, I think it would be best if we all stick together to make sure Tamaki doesn't get hurt."

"Who would want to hurt him?" Kaoru asked.

"I don't think this shrinking was accidental. Someone could very well be trying to kidnap him or kill him." Kyouya said. "So! Everyone needs to stick together. Here, in the Music Room."

"Yay! Slumber party! Slumber party!" Honey chanted, running around excitedly.

Kyouya smiled and said, "Exactly~ I'll be back in an hour or so."

And with that, Tamaki was left with the other four members of the Host Club.

15531121.content:
With Kyouya gone, the five boys were all left to their own accord. Mori had quickly left to gather some blankets and pillows as well as a few mattresses! The twins had skipped off somewhere together, but no one knew where. It gave Tamaki a bad feeling in the pit of his stomach. He just knew that they were plotting something! Honey was the only one left doing nothing! Tamaki looked at him for a moment, before he smiled and took Tamaki's hand!

"C'mon, Tama-chan! Let's go eat some cake!" He said, dragging Tamaki along! As Honey pulled, Tamaki was instantly reminded of just how strong Honey was, as he was pulled along with ease! Tamaki stumbled for a moment, before he was sat at a table with Honey. Tamaki looked around briefly, before looking back at Honey.

"H-Hey, Honey-senpai, it's a little late for cake, isn't it?" Tamaki asked.

"Huh?" Honey said, looking back at Tamaki, "It's never too late for cake! Stay here, I'll go get some! I know just where Takeshi hides it!" Tamaki chuckled a little nervously, before watching Honey scamper off! He looked at the table, and noticed just how much bigger everything seemed! The forks were taller, the centerpiece was a little more of an obstacle, and he could actually fit his fist in the upper part of the tea cup! As he sat there, he kept a close eye out for Hikaru and Kaoru. There was no doubt they'd return soon with something up their sleeves...! Honey quickly returned, holding a large platter in his hands! "Found it!" He said with a grin, "Let's eat!"

Honey quickly distributed cake, and the two of them began eating together, having a little sweet dinner!

"Mm... This is really good!" Tamaki said, before taking another bite!

"Yeah! I eat this kind of stuff all the time!" Honey said proudly, "It's way better than vegetables!"

"Shouldn't you be eating those anyway?" Tamaki asked, "It might be why you're so short!"

"No way!" Honey replied, "Takeshi can't make me, and neither will you!" Honey snapped. "And I'm not short... Just... Fun sized..." Honey said, a little dispondant at the end there.

"R-Right... Sorry..." Tamaki said, feeling a little bad for hurting Honey.

"It's okay!" Honey said, beaming at Tamaki, "Because now you're short too!" Tamaki winced a little, reminded of his new height problem.

Later into the night, all the boys were settling down in bed together. That is, except the twins, who were still out missing... It only worried Tamaki even more than he already was! The little prince laid his head down on his pillow, trying his best to put his mind at ease...

"Takeshi, I wanna sleep with Tama-chan tonight!" Honey said, pointing at Tamaki!

"You have to ask him first." Mori replied, looking down at Honey. Honey walked over, and bent down, gently shaking Tamaki's shoulder.

"Tama-chan? Can I sleep with you tonight?" He asked softly.

"Eeyuh... Sure." Tamaki replied hesitantly. He never had to share his bed before, but Honey was pretty nice to him, and the experience wouldn't kill him...

"Yay!" Honey cheered! He turned to Mori and said, "He said yes, Takeshi!" Mori just rose a hand in reply to let Honey know he heard him. Honey got down in bed with Tamaki, and cuddled up close right behind him!

"H-Honey-senpai, what are you doing?" Tamaki asked nervously.

"I'm getting comfy!" Honey replied, "Me and Takeshi do this all the time, it's really comfy! This is the first time I get to be in back!"

"R-Really?" Tamaki stammered, having less than pure thoughts as Honey told him this. "Well, if you say so..."

Honey got close and personal, nuzzling Tamaki's neck a little and wrapping his limbs around Tamaki! A bit uncomfortable at first, Tamaki was surprised! Honey was absolutely right! This was incredibly comfortable! Tamaki sighed, before closing his eyes. He was easily able to fall fast asleep!

155311211.content:
All was silent in the room as the boys slept. Tamaki had never felt quite so warm and comfortable as he did in the arms of his small (well, equal sized now) friend. Everything from Honey's strong arms and soft chest, just slightly exposed as the top few buttons of his pajama shirt were undone, to the light puffs of warm breath on the back of his neck all combined to lull Tamaki into a deep sleep. Honey was similarly relaxed. Tamaki's soft skin and small, beating heart, just under his right hand, not to mention his soothing scent, made Honey feel completely at ease. Halfway through the night, Honey turned over onto his back, Tamaki resting easily on top of his sempai. Tamaki turned around in his sleep and nuzzled against Honey's exposed flesh, a small smile on his face.

As the night wore on, however, something was obviously wrong. At one in the morning, Tamaki's body, which had been equal in length to Honey's, was now slightly shorter. At 2, the difference was more significant, his head resting on Honey's chest, while his feet reached down to the small boy's knees. At 3 Tamaki's toes were level with Honey's crotch, Honey's big arms now covering a sizable portion of Tamaki's tiny frame. The shrinking stopped at 4, with Tamaki's feet now just above Honey's waistband, his head still resting comfortable on Honey's now much wider chest. Honey smiled in his sleep, turning over again, his legs curling up, almost completely shielding Tamaki from view, almost like he was protecting him. Tamaki, for his part, clung more tightly to Honey's shirt, hiding his face amongst its folds, his own body pressing fully against Honey's.

The last few hours of the night passed uneventfully, the morning sunshine soon streaming in through the blinds. Honey stayed fast asleep, his face buried in his pillow in such a way that the light wouldn't reach him. Mori slowly sat up and stretched, looking over at Honey, who was still curled up with a small smile. He couldn't see Tamaki but assumed that Honey was just lying on top of him. He got up and headed for the bathroom to get freshened up. Tamaki slowly woke up next, his eyes opening to a strange peach wall in front of him. He blinked, confused, before he remembered yesterday! He had shrunk! But wait...he had fallen asleep with Honey...so what was this wall? His eyes darted left and right, taking in the blue material of what appeared to be pajamas framing the wall. Slowly, it dawned on him.

"H-Honey sempai?" Tamaki said softly, pushing against the "wall" slightly, trying to see more of his surroundings. Unfortunately, Honey's grip was far too strong! Tamaki was trapped! "H-Hey! Honey sempai! Wake up!"

Honey let out a groan and said, "Just five more minutes please Takeshi..."

"Sempai, it's ME! Tamaki! You need to wake up!"

"Huh? Tama-chan? What are you doing in my bed?" He said, slowly rubbing his eyes, blinking down at Tamaki. He looked confused at first but then a light seemed to go off in his head. "Oh! I remember now! We were sleeping together and you were my height!" He smiled down at Tamaki, his eyes widening as he saw how small Tamaki was. "And now you're even smaller!"

He giggled and laid on his back, holding Tamaki up above him like he was a doll, shaking him slightly. "You're so cute now Tama-chan~!"

"What do you mean "now"?" Tamaki said, crossing his arms and looking a bit offended. "I've always been cute! ...But that's not the point! Look at me Honey sempai! I'm even smaller now!"

"Hey, don't worry Tama-chan~" He said soothingly. "I'm right here with you!"

"Yeah...that's true..." Tamaki said, looking around. Mori's bed was empty, but he could hear water running from the bathroom. His gaze slowly shifted over to where the twins' bed was. It was empty, but the covers were tousled. Someone had slept in it, though the two were still nowhere to be found. "I don't like that Hikaru and Kaouru aren't around...I think they're up to something!"

"I'll protect you Tama-chan, don't worry about them~" Honey said, hugging Tamaki close to his chest again. "As long as you stay with me, you'll be safe and sound~"

Tamaki let out a little sigh and hugged Honey back, his heart beating a little faster. "Thank you Honey sempai." He said softly. He wasn't sure how much he liked being held and hugged like a doll, but it WAS a relief to know that at least one of the Host Club members was looking out for him. There was no telling how long the blood tests would take or even if they would find anything useful out from them. Tamaki shuddered as another thought entered his mind. What if he kept shrinking? It was bad enough being child sized or even doll sized but what if he was action figure sized? Or small enough to hide under a thimble? Or bug sized? He imagined Honey towering over him like a colossus and shuddered a little again. Hopefully it wouldn't come to that.

"Hey Tama-chan?" Honey asked, feeling Tamaki's shudders. "Are you cold?"

"Huh?" Tamaki looked down at himself and realized that his clothes had become far too big on him, the pajama shirt surrounding him like a blanket. "Oh! I-I guess I am a little."

Honey smiled and said, "I'll keep you warm until we find some clothes for you."

He gently picked Tamaki up out of the shirt, revealing his fit, naked form which Tamaki modestly tried his best to cover, blushing fiercely as he did so, and gently tucked him into his shirt, doing up the buttons so that he was pressed snuggly against Honey's chest. "There~ Isn't that better?~"

Tamaki felt perfectly warm, not too hot and not too cold, Honey's soft skin making a wonderful pillow for him to rest against. "Yes, sempai, that's much better~"

Until the door to the music room began to creak! Tamaki's head whipped around, looking at the door. No one seemed to be coming in yet... Tamaki started to walk closer to it, keeping his eyes peeled upward as he did.

"M-Mori-senpai? That you...?" His voice said, trembling slightly. Tamaki's expression became livid as he saw Kaoru's head peek around and right at him! A devillish grin snuck across his face. To make matters worse for Tamaki, the second head of Hikaru appeared right above Kaoru's! Tamaki froze, taking a big gulp as the smiling twins stared down at him.

"Well well well!" Kaoru said, strolling right in, "Look what we have here!"

"Looks like our boss had a downsize!" Hikaru said, walking in behind Kaoru and shutting the door behind the two. "What do you think we should do to him?"

"I dunno. He's about the size of one of those action figures we used to play with as a kid...!" Kaoru replied.

The vibration of each step would nearly throw Tamaki off balance if he didn't time just steps just right! Tamaki was chased all across the room, under a few of the end tables, and past the couches! There was nowhere that was safe! Except maybe... The bathroom! Maybe he could squeeze under the door frame! It was worth a try!

Tamaki waiting, taking as much time as he needed, until he saw Hikaru peeking under the piano, and directly at him! "Peek-a-boo!" He said with a sneaky little smile. He began to crawl under, but at the first sign of it, Tamaki dashed out from underneath! He made a beeline right for the bathroom! He couldn't remember a time he was running so fast! He ran right past Kaoru who was just a foot away until Tamaki passed him by! The tiny man took a look behind him, and saw the two brothers closing in! He sprinted just a little bit faster, and closed his eyes tight before making a slide under the door!

Tamaki made a mad scramble, wiggling in, just in time to dodge one of the twin's hands slamming down on the other side! Tamaki sighed, wiping the sweat off his forehead. He could hear Honey taking a shower... He would be safe for now. He walked over to Honey's discarded clothes and collapsed on top of them, taking a well-earned rest.

"Dammit Hikaru...!" Kaoru said with a grunt, "I missed him!"

"No big deal, little brother." Hikaru replied, "He has to come out of there some time, right?" Kaoru's scowl soon returned to that grin that Tamaki feared. The two of them sat there on the floor and decided to wait it out. It would all be worth it in the end!

"Hey Kaoru." Hikaru said, getting a sudden idea.

"Yeah Hikaru?" Kaoru asked, glancing over at Hikaru.

"How about you and me drink the cure for Tamaki we snatched from the Ootori labs? It'll give him a real shock to see we're even bigger when he comes out!" Kaoru smiled in response.

"I like the way you think big brother!" He said, taking the vial of milky liquid from the inside of his jacket. He popped off the top, and took a whiff. "Well, bottoms up!"

"Yeah, yeah, just save some for me." Hikaru replied.

He happily skipped to the door and went out to face the twins.

Meanwhile, Tamaki found himself pressed firmly against Honey's soft skin, blushing as he was once more thrust into physical contact with the once smaller but older male. The flowery scent of his soap filled Tamaki's nose, his heart beating wildly, mostly in fear of discovery. Would this ruse actually work?
15531121121.title: Escalation

choices: Hikaru! The twins have arrived and start making trouble!
Mori! Back early from his business with Kyouya.
155311211211.content:
The now damaged door the bathroom opened right up! Honey had a big smile on his face, as he stretched upwards!

"Ahhh, nothing like a hot shower to get all clean!" He said in his usual happy tone. "Okay Hika-chan, Kao-chan, it's all yours!" Honey said, before walking off casually. The twins immediately sprung into action, crawling all over the bathroom in search of their new toy! In the meantime, Honey slipped off out the front door of the music hall, and began to wander about.

"It's okay, Tama-chan!" Honey whispered as he looked down his shirt, "I'll take good care of you! I'll feed you and clean you and and sleep with you and you'll be with me until we can get you all better again!"

"Y-You're an angel, Honey-senpai!" Tamaki replied, his overemotional side becoming apparant again as a tear came to his eye!

"No problem!" Honey said, smiling brightly. "Hey! You hungry?" He asked, still talking in a soft whisper.

"Hn..." Tamaki thought for a moment. His stomach felt a little empty, but not painfully so. "I guess I could go for a little brunch..." Tamaki answered.

"Great! Then we'll head out to the rose garden! Takeshi always brings lunch there for me!" He explained. Honey held the collar of his shirt open just a little bit longer so Tamaki could get fresh air before closing it right up! "I'll let you out again as soon as we get there!" Honey whispered, looking straight ahead. Tamaki made some kind of muffled sound, but nothing Honey could understand.

In the meantime, back in Music Room #3, the twins were getting tired of searching for Tamaki in the bathroom. There wasn't a lot of ground to cover anyway!

"It's no use, Hikaru..." Kaoru said disappointingly, "Little boss is already gone..."

"Yeah, I think you're right..." Hikaru said, "Do you think he slipped out right behind Honey-senpai?"

"No way, you said you were watching the ground when we came in, right?" Kaoru asked.

"Yeah, that I was..." Hikaru answered, stroking his chin a little. "He could just be hiding really well... Did you check inside the shampoo bottles?"

"No... How would he even open those?" Kaoru replied. Tamaki was small, but it was possible he could have opened the bottle, however it would have taken a little time, and with them being wet from the shower it would have taken longer!

"You think he went down... the drain?" Hikaru asked, kneeling by the tub and poking inside. He immediately pulled back, as disguisted look on his face as he shook his finger off. The drain had some of Honey's wet hair in it! The two of them looked at each other before they both said "Nah!" Hikaru then went to say, "Little boss is way too prudent to go down some place as gross as that anyway."

"Yeah..." Kaoru agreed. "You know... There's only one more answer I can think of." Kaoru suggested.

"Are you thinking what I'm thinking?" Hikaru asked, smiling at Kaoru.

"Honey-senpai!" They both said at the same time! They then laughed, Hikaru putting his arm over Kaoru's shoulder.

"He must have slipped Tamaki right by us!" Kaoru said.

"He's pretty slick! I didn't think he and Tamaki would be working together!" Hikaru agreed.

"Guess we should go hunt him down, huh?" Kaoru asked, "Now that we're so huge, Honey-senpai isn't anything to fear!" Kaoru said, a grin on his face as he flexed his bicep. The bulky muscle pumped up, a perfectly round bicep popping up on top!

"Yeah!" Hikaru agreed, puffing out his chest. He made his pecs bounce as he gave them a sharp flex! The perfect size to squeeze Honey's little head in, if he wanted! Without another word, the two of them set out to find just where Honey had ran off to!

Honey arrived in their secret little alcove of the rose garden, complete with a marble booth, table, and a small jardiniere of specially bred blue roses! On the table was a small teaset of what appeared to be cookies, biscotti, and a few dollar pancakes. Honey carefully reached down into his shirt and gently grabbed Tamaki! He set him down on the table, before taking a seat himself!

"Here we are, Tama-chan!" Honey said happily. He started by pouring himself a cup of tea.

"W-Wow..." Tamaki said with a gulp! "I've seen banquets before... But seeing the food at this size takes my breath away!"

"Me too!" Honey said with a giggle. Of course, he just meant it looked delicious. He had never seen the food from Tamaki's perspective. "Go ahead! Take whatever you want!" Honey insisted. He knew Tamaki wasn't that big, so he wouldn't be eating THAT much.

"My my! I think I'll start with... Hm? Honey!" Tamaki called after but a moment of looking around, "There's a note here for you!"

Honey peered over, and picked the note right up with Tamaki on it! Tamaki stumbled a little and fell back on the table as Honey lifted the note up to his face.

"Oh! It's from Takashi! I guess he's helping Kyouya-chan. I guess he's not joining us..." Honey said. "At least he got me brunch before he left!" Honey said, his smile returning! "And it's still hot too!"

"Yeah, good thing." Tamaki said before reaching in and grabbing one of the mini pancakes. He started to gnaw, not even bothering with butter or syrup!

Honey and Tamaki were able to enjoy brunch together in the solace of the rose garden. All was going well, when suddenly someone snuck up behind Honey! It was...
155311211211.title: The Garden

choices: The twins take Honey and Tamaki back into the Music Room for some fun!
Honey bites Kaoru's toe and manages to escape!
1553112112111.content:
Honey let out a little burp and giggled, looking a little embarrassed as he glanced at Tamaki. "Sorry Tama-chan! I didn't mean to be rude..."

Tamaki chuckled, noting how cute Honey looked. "Oh, it's just the two of us Honey-sempai! There's no reason to be so formal!"

Honey smiled, immediately happy again and said, "Thanks Tama-chan!"

He poured Tamaki a glass of iced tea, perfect for the hot day and then tilted his head, looking at it with a confused expression. The look didn't last long before Honey was popping a straw into the glass, making it much easier for Tamaki to drink. Honey nodded, proud of himself, before a shadow suddenly descended on their table. Tamaki, another bite of pancake halfway up to his mouth, slowly looked up, his face transforming into a mask of pure fear! Honey quickly turned around, only to be met by a rock hard wall of abs! Looking up, he just saw the undersides of a pair of massive pecs! He leaned out from under them and frowned when he saw Hikaru's grinning face looking down at him.

"Well, well, well! I thought I'd find you out here Honey-sempai! And look at what we have here! It's our little boss!" Hikaru said, turning his eyes on Tamaki who flinched, quickly getting to his feet and backing away. He quickly reached the edge of the table and slipped, falling backwards with a yell! He didn't fall far, swiftly landing on a gigantic hand, the fingers curling around him tightly.

"Don't worry little guy!" Kaoru said with an equally mischievous grin. "I've got you nice and safe!"

"Nice catch Kaoru!" Hikaru said, easily knocking Honey out of his seat and sitting down, the chair creaking under his incredible weight. He brought his enormous bare feet up and slammed them down on top of the table, dishes and food flying every which way, iced tea spilling all over the rich linen table cloth!

"Hey! You're messing everything up!" Honey shouted indignantly, jumping to his feet.

Kaoru snorted and sat down opposite Hikaru, propping his own feet up, casually knocking a scone into Honey's face. "Who cares? We can do whatever we want now! Who's going to stop us?"

He snickered as he held Tamaki against his massive chest, the little boss's feet gently touching Kaoru's abs. He trembled in his grasp, unable to so much as speak in the presence of these trouble making titans! Honey's face started turning red as he grew angrier, his fists clenched down at his sides. Without warning he suddenly jumped into the air, extending his leg, a mad glint in his eye as he slammed his right foot down on top of Hikaru's abs! Hikaru didn't even so much as wince! He did, however, snatch Honey by the back of his shirt and flip him over, slamming his little body down on top of the table! He let out a little wheeze as the air was knocked out of him, leaving him motionless just long enough for Kaoru to press his giant foot down on top of him, pinning him down.

"Geez, that was even easier than I thought it would be!" Hikaru said, leaning back in his chair and laughing.

"Looks like we're unstoppable now, huh Hikaru?"

"I have to agree Kaoru. I have to agree!"

Both twins laughed heartily, feeling completely in control of their co host club members. Honey groaned as he slowly got his breath back, struggling violently under Kaoru's foot. "Let me go! Let me go! Let Tama-chan and me go!"

Kaoru flicked his big toe against Honey's chin, effectively closing his mouth and keeping it closed, his thick toe unmoving. "That's not how you talk to your superiors Honey." He notably left out the honorific.

Hikaru picked up on this and grinned. "Yeah, from now on I think it would be best if you both referred to us as Hikaru-sama and Kaoru-sama. What do you think Kaoru?"

"You're absolutely right Hikaru." Kaoru agreed, nodding wisely.

"Y-You won't get away with this!" Tamaki managed to sputter out, unwilling to stay quiet in the face of Honey's struggles.

"Yeah, we will actually." Hikaru said, holding his hand out. Kaoru deposited Tamaki into the big mitt and Hikaru roughly brought Tamaki close to his face. "And do you know why? Because we're not just bigger and stronger than you or anybody else but we're going to get even bigger and even stronger soon enough!"

Even Kaoru looked a little surprised by this statement. Tamaki shivered, unwilling to imagine the twins growing even further. "H-How?"

"The same way you keep getting smaller!" Hikaru said, holding Tamaki by his hands and spinning him around like a toy. "You started out just kind of shrimpy, right? And now you're downright puny! So who's to say we, since we drank up your antidote, won't keep getting bigger? Besides!" He stopped spinning Tamaki and held him tight again. "Once Kyouya finishes your little antidote, the perfected one, we'll just steal that and use it for ourselves! You'll stay doll sized and we'll just keep growing!"

Kaoru chuckled and said, "Well, mother always said we're two growing boys."

Both twins laughed at this again, Honey and Tamaki feeling a little hopeless at this terrible situation. Before things could progress any further, however...
1553112112111.title: Double Trouble Just Got Worse

choices: Hikaru was looking in the direction Honey had ran off to. Hikaru was worried...
Hikaru was still looking at Kaoru's pecs! In all their massive, bulging glory!
15531121121112.content:
Tamaki let out a disdainful sigh. Things really were looking hopelesss now! That is, until he heard a shrill, piercing sound that woke him out of his funk!

"Ow!" Kaoru shouted, his foot lifting up off Honey, and forcing the giant twin to fall to his muscled ass! "What the hell was that!? Honey?!" Kaoru barked.

Honey immediately got to his feet and started to assess the situation! Just as he started to glance around, Hikaru shouted,

"Get him! Hurry!"

Honey glanced back at the table for a moment. He snatched a few cookies and shoved them into his coat, before making for the exit! Just as it was within arms reach, Kaoru's giant foot slammed down, blocking his path!

"You're not going anywhere, Honey!" Kaoru said angrily, as his hand was quickly closing in on the small boy. Honey flipped backwards, touching the ground on his hands, before flipping back and landing on his feet! He faced Kaoru, his hands raised like he was ready to fight! Just then, things went dark as Hikaru's shadow engulfed Honey's!

"Get over here!" Hikaru barked, quickly reaching down to grab Honey. But he just managed to escape Hikaru's grasp, rolling away to safety! Just as he hit the ground, he could hear the cookies crunch as they broke apart. Honey whimpered a little. He was going to save those for later! But there was no time to mourn, because Kaoru was closing in on him! The ground seemed to shake slightly under the bulk of the huge teen! Thinking quick, Honey reached in his jacket and grabbed the cookie. He quickly crumbled it up and tossed it high up, right into Kaoru's face!

"Augh!" Kaoru flinched back, getting little crumbs in his eyes! "Dammit!"

Honey didn't want to take another risk! As fast as he could, he dove right through the rose bush! His uniform tore on the thorns, not to mention he got a little cut on his cheek, but he had to bear it! He started to run as fast as his little legs would carry him, making as many turns as he could to lose the giant twins!

"Y-Yeah..." Tamaki thought quietly to himself, "I hope Honey-senpai brings back help... Then again, I'm not quite sure what could defeat these two beasts..."

"Kaoru, are you okay?" Hikaru asked, walking up to his brother with Tamaki still in tow.

"Y-Yeah..." Kaoru replied, rubbing out his eyes a little more. "I think most of the crumbs were too big to get in my eyes... Not to mention I think half of what he threw bounced off my chest..."

"Well, they ARE some pretty huge pecs." Hikaru said with a smile, rubbing his brother's chest appreciatively. "I'm just surprised that runt could throw that high!"

"Yeah... Yeah, you're right!" Kaoru agreed, slowly getting his confidence right back! "Besides, who needs him? We got what we came for right here!" Kaoru grinned menacingly as he looked down at Tamaki! This made the tiny blonde gulp.

"Yeah... You're right..." Hikaru replied, his mind seeming to wander. Kaoru looked up at Hikaru and saw that...
15531121121112.title: Creating a Loose End

choices: Hikaru and Kaoru!
Another member...
155312.content: Hikaru and Kaoru are both great choices. If you choose yes, you'll then be asked if you wish to see one of them grow, or both!
155312.title: OHSHC Men -- The Twins

choices: Yes
No
1553121.content: The elder, romantic twin, Hikaru Hitachiin.
1553121.title: OHSHC Men -- Hikaru

choices: Kaoru only!
Let's do both!
15531212.content:
The younger, mischevious teen, Kaoru Hitachiin.

Otherwise your choice is to have them both grow together!
15531212.title: OHSHC Men -- Kaoru

choices: Contrasts! One eats, the other works out!
Double trouble! Both focus on eating or working out to bring in a new group!
155312122.content:
Sunlight slowly filtered in through the curtains in the room of twins Hikaru and Kaoru Hitachiin, landing on the bed they shared together. The rich siblings could easily have had entire rooms to themselves but they had been incredibly close ever since childhood and adamantly refused to be apart, even in sleep. However, things weren't always as idyllic as they seemed on the surface...

Kaoru Hitachiin sighed slightly, his breath tickling his brother's stomach, his head resting lightly on his older brother's chest. He could hear Hikaru's strong heart beat, thumping with regularity behind his ear, a soothing sound allowing the younger twin's mind to slip into an imaginative state. Every few minutes he'd let out another sigh, as though whatever he was thinking about was displeasing him. After about fifteen minutes of this behavior, Hikaru started to stir. He let out a yawn, stretching his legs out before running his thin fingers through his brother's soft hair. "Morning Kaoru." He said sleepily, rubbing his eyes with the other hand.

"Morning..." Kaoru said listlessly, running his finger along his brother's smooth chest, ending in a tight spiral.

"Hm? What's up?" Hikaru asked, immediately tuned into his twin's less than happy mood.

"I've just been thinking is all..." Kaoru said, being deliberately evasive.

"Oh yeah? What about?" Hikaru asked, gently coaxing the information out of his brother.

"About us. Do you think that we're too similar?" Kaoru asked, suddenly becoming more direct.

"Of course we're too similar." Hikaru said, rolling his eyes. "We're twins! No one's been able to tell us apart since we were kids!"

Kaoru sighed again, thinking of how he wanted to phrase what he wanted to say before continuing. "I know that but I mean...well...I'm starting to think that everyone down at the Host Club is starting to get bored of our routine."

"What? You're crazy." Hikaru said, his attention focused more fully on Kaoru. "We knock them dead every day! What makes you think anyone's getting sick of us?"

"You really haven't noticed?" Kaoru said, sitting up in the bed, looking down at his brother in shock. "The last two weeks we've been pulling in smaller and smaller crowds! How could you not see that?"

Hikaru sat up, a mischievous glint in his eye. "Well, I've been too busy focusing on you I guess."

He leaned in suddenly, his arm wrapping around Kaoru's smooth back, pulling him in close. Kaoru blushed and turned his head slightly, his heart thumping more wildly. "S-Stop...no one's even here to see..."

Hikaru chuckled and said, "Yeah, I know."

Kaoru almost gave in at that point, turning to face Hikaru again, their lips inches apart...but he just couldn't go through with it. He had too much on his mind. "I'm serious Hikaru!" He said, pushing his hands against the older male's chest. "If we don't do something to change up our game we're going to get in trouble with Kyouya."

Hikaru sighed, flopping back down on the bed, frustrated. "I know, I know. He's been giving me looks every day at the end of club hours, waiting to pounce as soon our numbers drop past a certain point. But what are we supposed to do? Our whole deal is us together. We're already practically making out as it is."

"W-Well...maybe we could take things past that last step..." Kaouru tentatively suggested, but Hikaru was quick to shut him down.

"No. That kind of thing is for us and us only. There has to be some boundaries somewhere!"

Kaoru winced and laid down next to his brother, head on his shoulder. While they played off their attraction to each other as just a joke in the club room, keeping their distance and not so much as holding hands, in private things were much different. They were constantly together, touching in some way, as though being out of contact with each other too long would eventually cause them to die. They did everything together: Sleep, shower, eat, and even more, once the lights were out and everyone in the house was asleep. Their relationship had a tinge of the taboo to it, which only made their attraction deeper, their acts more lurid. Now, however, neither of them were in the mood for such romance. "I was just trying to help..."

Kaoru felt those cool fingers play with his hair again. "I know...but those girls only like it because we never actually touch. That way they can go on thinking they'd actually have a chance with us."

Kaoru couldn't help but giggle. "Maybe someday we won't have to worry about what anyone else thinks and we'll be able to just do whatever we want."

Hikaru grinned, his arm pulling his brother in closer. "Yeah, then I'd be able to throw you down right on the coffee table and have my way with you, while everyone watches."

Kaoru shivered at the idea, his face flushed. "Y-You wouldn't do that Hikaru..."

"I think you know me better than that little brother."

He turned Kaoru over, pinning his arms down, a lusty look in his eye. Kaoru gulped, feeling a stirring under the covers himself. Hikaru was insatiable today, wanting to push aside the problems of the club and lose himself in sex. Kaoru, always the more level headed one, kept them on track. "Hikaru...seriously, we need to come up with something and fast!"

Hikaru tightened his grip for just a second before releasing Kaoru's arms, laying down on top of his brother with a groan, his face buried in the pillow next to Kaoru's head. "You're killing me Kaoru!"

"If you can come up with one decent idea we can use then I promise you can do whatever you want to me." Kaoru whispered.

Hikaru lifted his upper body up slightly, looking into his brother's eyes. "You promise?"

Kaoru winked and crossed his heart. "I promise."

Hikaru grinned and kissed Kaoru directly on the lips, chastely, saving himself for the fulfillment of Kaoru's promise. "Alright...maybe we need to...change our look? Go for something more punk rocker or skater type?"

"That might work...but that might just alienate the fans we still have." Kaoru said, rubbing the back of his head. "Maybe we could change something...physically?"

"You mean with our bodies?" Hikaru said, raising an eyebrow.

"Yeah! Honey and Mori senpai have that whole contrast thing working for them." Kaoru said, getting a little excited. "We could try something like that!"

"Huh...that's not a bad idea..."Hikaru said, musing on the possibility. "Or we could both change something in our looks and cater to a different crowd altogether! I've heard that some people have this...thing for guys who are bigger than average."

"Bigger?"

"Yeah! Bigger! More muscular or fatter." Hikaru explained.

"Really? That's a thing?" Kaoru asked, looking confused.

"Apparently a really popular thing!" Hikaru said with a chuckle.

"Huh...sounds fun! Okay, so we have two ideas! Which one should we do?" Kaoru asked.
155312122.title: Changing Their Game

choices: The twins had effectively bulked up to twice their size!
The twins gave up on their extreme workout and decided to go fat.
1553121222.content:
"Well... The chubby chasing crowd is small among women..." Hikaru noted, "Not a lot of girls like a fat guy, even with faces as devlilishly handsome as ours..."

"Then muscle it is!" Kaoru said happily, his optimisim amusing Hikaru. "I guess we should find a fast way to bulk up then..." Kaoru sat there and thought on the matter for a moment before he then brought up, "Well, there's always surg--"

Hikaru immediately held his hand up to his little brother's face. "No, no, no! One, we could never put bodies as beautiful and perfect as ours under the knife, and two? Fake muscles are even more of a turn off to women than being fat!" He informed. Hikaru and Kaoru sighed in unison as they kept trying to think of a bulk up quick scheme. However, time and time again Hikaru could only come to a singular solution. "I guess we'll simply have to hire dieticians and personal trainers for the both of us." Hikaru rubbed the back of his head, looking at Kaoru who was still trying to think of a solution to their problem.

"I guess..." Kaoru began to speak as he released himself from his musing, "That's really the only way of doing things, huh? I mean, I guess it wouldn't be worth getting..." Kaoru gulped, "I-If we don't... Work to get it..."

Hikaru gripped Kaoru's wrists, frowning most unpleasantly as he gazed at his brother. "Don't say that, Kaoru, not... Work!"

"I'm sorry, Hikaru... But this is just the way it has to be..." Kaoru replied softly, gazing away from his brother.

There was a brief pause in the room before a lethargic groan filled the air. "Yeah, this isn't working as well without an audience." Hikaru said, chuckling to his brother.

"Yeah. Hey, you still have that guy from Germany on speed dial?" Kaoru asked.

"Yeah. You got the one from Russia?" Hikaru asked.

"Sure do." Kaoru replied before looking at his phone just to be sure. He then gazed at Hikaru. "Guess there's nothing left but to get to it!"

The two twins got right to work, hiring only the best dieticians and trainers to put them on the fast track to getting buff quick! Overnight flights, rooming and board, serving the twins of the rich Hitachiin brothers didn't come without it's benefits!

- - -


Hikaru and Kaoru woke up early the next morning, shortly after the break of dawn. The two got dress in matching plain white tanktops. Kaoru wore green shorts, Hikaru wore blue. As the two opened the door to their bedroom, there were two muscle-bound hulks there waiting for them! One wore nothing but a speedo, the other wearing a tight pair of red bike shorts and a black tanktop.

"Da, you ready?!" One said energetically, taking Hikaru's hand. He didn't care which twin was which, he was getting paid enough, he had to give SOME one a workour.

"Mein frou, jou vill come vith me, da?" The one in the speedo said, holding Kaoru's hand. He certainly was... Friendly. The two twins looked at each other before being dragged away from each other!

"S-See you later, Kaoru!" Hikaru shouted.

"You too!" Kaoru quickly replied.

It was only a few minutes until Kaoru was taken to his dining hall. He looked up at his trainer, smiling a little. "So... Dirk, what am I going to be eating?" Kaoru asked, leaning his head on top of his hands and smiling calmly at his German friend. The man could barely speak english, although there was something primal about that fact that gave Kaoru some assurance.

"Ja, you start vith egg, white chicken bress, und rice." Dirk told Kaoru. The meal was quickly placed before the teen. It was still steaming hot, clearly prepared in advance for the teen. "Zhis is what tiny diet man tell me to give you."

Kaoru shrugged. It wasn't glamourous, but the road to muscles never was! Kaoru had already begun eating when Hikaru arrived shortly after!

"Ivan, I told you, I could have gotten us here earlier if you just listened!" Hikaru barked as he was sat into his chair.

"You will do what trainer says." Ivan replied. He was far more fluent than Dirk was, but still carried his accent. "Meal of rare beef and protein shake with toast." He said, rougly dropping his tray before Hikaru.

"... Steak? For breakfast?" Hikaru noted aloud. He then shrugged and stuck it with his fork before smoothly cutting it. Kaoru looked at Hikaru with some jealousy.

"Man, you meat looks like it's actually tasty..." Kaoru noted. Hikaru glanced at Kaoru's plate.

"Yours looks pretty great too..." Hikaru noted, both twins jealous of the other's meal. But neither of their trainers would have any trading! The two were rivals in bodybuilding, after all... Dirk had a reputation for being cocky but always energetic! Ivan, on the other hand, was more focused and strict, but always got great results! Hikaru and Kaoru knew them through their sons, who were getting their education at none other than Ouran Academy. Dirk was studying up human anatomy to be just like his father, while Ivan's son was more interested in becoming a lawyer. The Hitachiins were old friends who's families were regulars to their social gatherings.

The two twins were quick to finish their meals, before their trainers whisked them away once more, this time to the Hitachiin's private gym. Kaoru was put onto a weight bench to immediately plunge him into his workout, the thin man's chest and biceps going red from the energy he was forced to exert!

"You must lift as much as you can for as long as you can. Zhen we work our way up, zhen back down." Dirk said, smiling as he shared his knowledge. On the other side of the gym, Ivan had Hikaru running on a treadmill.

"First we do warm up. Keeps body slimming for the showing off of more muscle. Then we do weights, da?"

"D-Da...." Hikaru replied behind deep breaths.

This quickly became the twins new lives. Wake up, eat breakfast, workout. Then lunch, a little more working out, then rest. The only days they got off were their Sundays. After all, muscles could never truly build without a little rest!

It took weeks before the two began to see any results in each other, but after only a month and a half...
1553121222.title: Beefing Up the Twins

choices: Honey is the one!
Another one...
1553122.content: The sweet shota-lolita with a dark side; Mitsukuni "Honey" Haninozuka.
1553122.title: OHSHC Men -- Honey

choices: "He's growing!"
"He's getting fatter!"
15531221.content:
"He hasn't noticed yet, right?" Tamaki whispered worriedly, glancing over at Honey who was laughing and playing with Mori.

"No way!" Hikaru said, crossing his arms. "Mori's doing a great job keeping him distracted."

"Well hurry anyway!" Tamaki said, practically shaking in fear. "Do you know what he'll do to me if he finds out I spilled something on Usa-chan?!"

"He won't stop at beating you bloody that's for sure!" Kaoru piped up with a grin.

"Oh and you think he's just going to leave you two out of this?" Tamaki snapped, glaring at the twins. "You remember what happened last time! No one was safe!"

"Not to worry." Kyoya said smoothly, straightening up with a small smile. He adjusted his glasses and gestured toward one of the tables, where a lone piece of cake was sitting. "It's done!"

"Yay! I knew I could count on you Kyoya!" Tamaki happily shouted, hugging Kyoya.

"So what's so special about it?" Hikaru asked, looking over the seemingly ordinary slice of strawberry cheesecake.

"The cake itself is completely ordinary." Kyoya said, holding up his clipboard. "But in the center of it, completely undetectable, is a tranquilizer my father's company recently developed. It should knock him out long enough for us to get Usa-chan properly washed."

"Is it...safe?" Tamaki asked, not wanting anyone in his Host Club to be harmed.

"Well...my father gave it to me to test so I have no idea. I was planning on testing it out on you two but this seems a more appropriate time."

"Gee thanks." Both twins said, completely deadpan.

"But not to worry. At best the side effects will be minor. I'm almost positive." Kyoya said, his smile suddenly looking a little darker.

Tamaki chewed on his thumb nail for a second before finally yelling, "Alright! We have no choice! It will just have to do!"

Kyoya nodded and held up his hand to one side of his mouth, cupping it slightly. "Honey-sempai!" he called out. "It's time for your cake!"

"Yay cake!" Honey shouted happily, already reaching out for it while still being held by Mori. The taller teen calmly carried him over to the table, sitting him down in the chair. The twins slowly backed away towards the door, slipping out of the club room before anyone noticed them. If this plan failed, they didn't want to be anywhere near Honey! Tamaki, similarly, was smiling nervously, but otherwise holding his ground, Usa-chan clutched in his hands behind his back. He didn't want to appear to suspicious. Mori merely stood by, watching as his cousin happily began to eat the cake. Kyoya watched him closely, writing down anything and everything so he could report back to his father later.

"Oh how I wish Haruhi was here!" Tamaki thought to himself as he watched Honey scarf down the cake. "She's so much better at handling these kinds of situations!"

Unfortunately for Tamaki, Haruhi had walked into the Host Club last week with the news that she was going to be gone for the next few weeks to visit family in America. Her cousin had offered to fly her and her father out there so they had, of course, jumped at the chance. Tamaki had been prepared to follow with the whole Host Club if necessary but Haruhi had told him there was "absolutely no way, by any stretch of the imagination, that you or anyone else here is going to come!". She had had such a scary look on her face when she said it, that Tamaki had balked and gave his word that he wouldn't follow no matter what. It pained him to be away from her but the idea of her hating him pained him worse!

His thoughts were interrupted by a loud burp coming from Honey. For such a short guy he certainly could make a lot of noise...

"That was delicious!" Honey said, his bright eyes sparkling. "Come on Takeshi! Let's play some more!"

Tamaki felt faint as he saw Honey jump up into Mori's arms, still wide awake. He glanced over at Kyoya who seemed just as surprised. The twins peeked through the cracked door. Hey, it would still be fun to watch Tamaki get beat up~

Suddenly, Honey drooped in Mori's grip, his eyes closing. Before anyone could ask him what was wrong, his head fell back and he began to snore loudly, his mouth wide open. Tamaki practically danced with joy he was so happy! Mori laid his small cousin down on the couch and covered him with a blanket. Kyoya nodded, satisfied at the results and said, "He should be out for at least five hours. Let's get Usa-chan to the cleaners."

"You're a life saver Kyoya! I owe you one!" Tamaki said cheerfully, all traces of his nervous demeanor completely gone. The twins walked back in the room, Hikaru looking a little disappointed. "Nice dodge boss~" Kaoru said, snickering slightly.

The mood in the host club had definitely lifted. It almost seemed like the sun was now shining brighter, making everything in the room glisten and sparkle~

"Wait." Mori said, his eyes focused on Honey.

"What? Did you say something Mori?" Tamaki asked, turning to face the usually silent club member.

Mori merely pointed at Honey who seemed to be...twitching slightly. Kyoya quickly pulled out his clipboard and began to write, watching as Honey's body began to pulse, his breathing getting slightly faster. The twins blinked while Tamaki was starting to chew on his thumbnail again.

"Ah...Kyoya?"

"Yes Tamaki?"

"What's happening?"

"I'm not sure."

"I'll tell you what's happening!" Hikaru shouted, pointing at Honey's changing body.
15531221.title: Science Gone Mad!

choices: "I'll be right back with more." Mori smoothly replied.
"I'm sorry, Mitsukuni. We're all out for now." Mori answered.
155312211.content:
The entire host club was staring at little Honey as he laid there under his blanket. His little feet were slowly stretching out, quickly making their way to the end of the blanket. Tamaki gulped, chewing on a whole row of nails, ruining his manicure. One of Honey's bare feet poked out of the edge of the blanket... Then the other! They were large, and frightened Tamaki and the twins as they suddenly made a loud cracking noise as they were clenched! As if Honey growing even taller wasn't scary enough, his little uniform was growing tighter as well! His back started to stretch outward, making him look even more intimidating! His young chest quickly developed into pecs, and started to swell and bulge outward, popping off the top few buttons of his uniform. With his new height, his shirt had rode up, leaving his bottom row of abs on display. His sleeves grew tighter as his biceps started to bulge up within their cage, ready to burst out at a moment's notice. His young, taut ass started to fill out, pushing against his pants, as his thighs were struggling to keep up. His calves began to buff up, giving support to hold up the massive teen.

By the time it was all finished, Tamaki was sweating a river as the twins held each other, their teeth chattering. There was a loud groan, the voice just a slight pitch deeper than Honey's normal voice. Suddenly, Honey sat up, his eyes half open. Slowly, his head turned, looking at the three cowering boys looking back in fear. Mori remained in place, his face unchanging, as Kyouya's hand was zipping along the clipboard. Honey let out a loud yawn that made the three boys flinch. After that yawn, his face resumed it's normal cuteness, as if nothing had ever happened!

"Takeshi... What's everyone so scared of...?" Honey asked his cousin, rubbing his eyes as he did. It was apparant that he was still a little sleepy.

"Honey. You've grown." Mori replied.

"I've grown...?" Honey replied, not understanding at first. He looked down at himself and let out a cry, "Wah!" His hands quickly ran down along his torso, rubbing the beefed up muscles with his tender, soft hands. "Takeshi! How did I get so big!?"

"It was the cake." Kyouya butted in. "At least, we think so. It's either that, or you're finally hitting a late puberty." Kyouya said with a smile.

Honey let out another yawn. "Cake sounds really good right now... Do we have any more of the one you gave me earlier?" Honey asked Kyouya.

Kyouya just paused for a moment. He started to question if giving Honey any more was a good idea. "Maybe it would be best to analyze this research first..." He thought to himself, pushing up his glasses. He turned around, heading for the door. "I'll be back in a moment." He said suddenly.

Honey still didn't have an answer to his question. He turned to Mori. "Takeshi? Do we have any more?"

Mori looked over at Tamaki and the twins. They were all doing their best to silently gesture "No!" to Mori.

Mori then turned back to Honey, who was looking up at him cutely. Even with the body of a football player, he still had a cuteness to him. After a moment, he finally replied...
155312211.title: Catching Up

choices: "One more." Mori said, much to Honey's annoyance

1553122111.content:
"I'll be right back with more." Mori said smoothly, turning to head to the table where the tainted cake was resting. Kyoya had filled the cake with several of the tranquilizers, one per piece, just in case they had needed it if Honey proved to be more resilient than they expected.

"Yay!" Honey said happily, rushing over to the table and sitting down, eager for his next piece of cake. Tamaki had nearly yelled out "WHAT?!" but had managed to contain himself. He backed away slowly from Honey before whipping around, bringing Usa-chan to his front, chasing after Mori.

"Mori!" He whispered urgently, catching up with him and walking beside him. "What are you doing?!"

Mori glanced down at Tamaki and said, "Mitsukuni usually has two, three, or four pieces of cake depending on how good he was the previous day. He'll get suspicious if that changes."

Tamaki groaned but he knew that Mori was right. "And if he sees us not taking the piece from the cake sitting out in the open he'll get suspicious of that too! What a mess this is turning out to be..."

Mori didn't answer. He was too focused on setting the slice of cake onto a plate.

As Mori and Tamaki talked, Hikaru suddenly got a mischievous grin on his face. He nudged Kaoru and smiled at him, tilting his head towards Honey. Kaoru smiled and followed Hikaru as he sat down on one side of Honey. The twins knew each other's body language perfectly. Hikaru's expression and movements pretty much meant "Follow my lead~". Kaoru was always up for some mischief, so he eagerly went along with his brother, sitting down on the opposite side of Honey.

"So sempai...how are you liking your new body?~" Hikaru asked, smiling at the bigger kid.

"Huh? Oh, it's pretty cool I guess! I don't feel that different. Just heavier! And my clothes are too small now..." He pouted, tugging at his collar.

"You know sempai, now that you're bigger and stronger, Tamaki won't be able to boss you around anymore." Kaoru said, gently feeling one of Honey's bulging biceps.

"Tama-chan never bossed me around!" Honey said, looking from one twin to the other. "He's always been really nice to me!"

"Oh sure, but just think about it!" Hikaru said. "If you want cake, who can stop you from getting it? You could just pick them up and toss them aside!"

"Yeah! And if anyone tries to make you sleep when you're not tired, you can just push them over!" Kaoru said.

"That would be kind of mean though..." Honey said. However, there was a look in his eye that showed the twins he was liking what they were saying.

"So don't be afraid to be a little more tough, especially around Tamaki!" Hikaru said, leaning in close.

"He's probably going to stop you from having more cake, even though you've been so good lately!" Kaoru said, a sympathetic look on his face.

"He wouldn't do that! Would he?" Honey asked.

"Who knows?" They both said, shrugging.

That was all the time they had alone with Honey, as Mori and Tamaki returned. Mori set the cake down in front of Honey who began to eat it, looking a little worried as he did so.

"Say Honey-sempai...how about that being your last piece for today?" Tamaki asked nicely, smiling down at the muscular teen.

"Why?" Honey asked, looking a little annoyed.

"B-Because! You don't want it all to be gone after one day do you?" Tamaki said, his expression wavering.

Honey glanced behind Tamaki and saw the twins shrugging and shaking their heads. "What did we tell you?" was being broadcast through his body language. Honey frowned and squeezed the fork, bending the metal implement while his bicep suddenly burst through his sleeve. "I'll eat the cake I deserve! Got it?"

Tamaki gulped, visibly sweating. "W-Whatever you say sempai! I was just trying to be helpful!"

Honey ignored the nervous Prince and angrily shoveled cake into his mouth. Kaoru suddenly appeared behind Tamaki and whispered, "Way to antagonize him boss!"

"Yeah, what are you thinking? Do you want to be smashed like a bug?" Hikaru snickered.

"Shut up you two!" he hissed back at them. "I'm trying to solve this problem if you haven't noticed!"

The twins shrugged and stepped back, smiling as they watched the events unfold.

Honey belched again, turning to Mori with a sweet expression on his face. "How many more pieces can I have today Takeshi?"

Mori thought about it, calculating his behavior and weighing it against the cake. Tamaki made a silent prayer, hoping it wouldn't be much...
1553122111.title: Mischief and Cake

choices: Honey demands more cake, but will Mori willingly give it over?
Just then, Honey suddenly noticed Usa-chan on the floor, stained.

Mori remained clueless to Tamaki's frustration. Mori softly scratched the back of his head as Honey continued to look up at him with an anxious look. "I suppose three more pieces..." Mori finally answered. "But I'M brushing your teeth tonight. Understand?" He asked firmly. There was no arguing this point, but Honey didn't really seem to mind much. He had a big smile on his face!

Honey's body started inching up higher to the ceiling. His shoulders stretched father out, sending a small tear down the back of his uniform. The young man looked behind him, thinking something had broken, but was relieved to see nothing was wrong. His pecs started pushing out further from his chest, making their way a good two or three inches, making a shelf over his abs. Speaking of which, his abs were a long, steel washboard, a set of eight plumped up abdominals in their place. Honey's arms couldn't be contained by his sleeves much longer! A tear quickly traveled up his forearm. This didn't go unnoticed by the boy. He looked down and say the rip, the seams struggling to keep it closed.

"Huh... Did I rip this while I was sleeping...?" Honey mumbled. Out of curiosity, he ran his finger along the strings, each of them snapping and only making the tear travel further up his arm. His powerful forearms soon broke free and his bulging biceps started breaking out of the cloth! Honey looked freaked out, and looked away, pretending he never saw it. Maybe if it looked like he was ignorant of it, Mori wouldn't be upset with him! Honey's entire upper body seemed to burst from the uniform, growing bigger and thicker in small twitches. Under the table, which seemed to shrink down in front of the boy, Honey's thighs were engorged with sheer mass, snapping the seams in an instant. They were a tiny inch away from rubbing together. And they weren't alone! Honey's boyhood had grown as well, making the entire area cramped. There's was no telling how long his bunny boxers would last!
