His got down on his hands and knees, and started looking around. His chair and desk both looked more like something a child would use rather than a teenager. It was almost like someone had stuffed him into a playhouse and designed it to look exactly like his own room. Though why someone would go through such a weird and elaborate prank was beyond him. "Why is everything so freaking tiny?! This doesn't make any sense!"

"Yusuke!" His mother shouted, slamming his door open. "Shut the hell up! Do you have any idea how noisy you are?"

"Mom! Get out of here! I'm in my underwear!" Yusuke said, trying to cover himself up. "Wait...why aren't you freaking out about how big I am?"

"You sure you haven't been drinking Yusuke?" She asked wearily, leaning on the door frame. "Trust me, you've always been a big boy. I had to give birth to you after all."

She stumbled out of the room, heading to the living room. Yusuke shook his head slightly and looked over himself again. He looked just like he always did...only he was bigger. A lot bigger! "Is Mom just too hungover to see how huge I am?" He thought. "Whatever...I have to get to school anyway. Maybe I can slip in for class without anyone noticing..."

All memory of the fairy, the fairy circle, and his mission had been wiped out! They were, at best, vague recollections at the back of Yusuke's head, like a long forgotten dream. He scooted over to his closet and pulled open the door, nearly wrenching it out of place. "Dammit...I'm going to have to be careful..." He pulled out the only clothes that seemed to be in there: A green jacket and a pair of pants. They were fit to his size, but they were also the only clothes in there. Yusuke then spent the next few minutes trying to dress himself. He managed to get the jacket on just fine, but when it came time to get the pants on, he had to lay down. He ended up knocking over his dresser with his big bare foot and nearly smashing his head through the ceiling as he sat up. With a grumble, he squeezed out of his room and crawled through the halls of his home, opening the front door. "I'm going to school mom!" He shouted, slamming the door behind him as he pushed his way out the door. Once outside he was able to stretch to his full height, the door only coming up to his knees. "Man! Going to school is going to be a huge pain..."

He glanced over towards the school and shrugged, making his way over there. It was too warm to bother buttoning up the jacket, so he just let it open, his bare chest and abs on display as he casually walked to school. The ground shook slightly with his every step, a fact that did not escape Yusuke's notice. He smiled and started putting more pressure on his steps, his bare feet making cracked footprints in the concrete. He chuckled as he saw this, bending down and picking up a concrete chip. With a little squeeze the chip turned to dust in his fist. "Now that's what I'm talking about!" He dusted his hands off and stood up straight. "Being huge has its advantages! I'll bet those damn teachers wouldn't dare mess with me now!"

He started hurrying towards school, eager to have a little fun. Just as he passed the main gates however...

"Yusuke! Stop right there!"

Yusuke skidded to a halt, overbalancing and landing on his ass, making the whole ground shake violently!

"Yusuke! You have to be more careful!"

Yusuke groaned and looked to the right. Keiko was standing there, looking at him disapprovingly. "Keiko? What's your problem? Shouldn't you be in class? Back at the high school?"

"For your information, I was just out getting lunch with my friends! My problem is you running around like a kid when you're big enough to crush someone underfoot! We talked about this before. You need to be more careful!"

She walked up to him and smacked him on the arm with her satchel. "Wait...You're not weirded out either by how big I am?" Yusuke asked.

"Did you hit your head when you fell Yusuke?" Keiko said, putting her hands on her hips. "You've been this big since we started junior high! I'm kind of used to it by now."

Yusuke rubbed his head, feeling out of sorts. Keiko sighed as she grabbed a corner of Yusuke's jacket. "Still haven't bought a uniform for your size either. You really are a total delinquent."

"Stop hassling me already." Yusuke said, grabbing Keiko by the back of her skirt and lifting her up. She shrieked and tried to cover her bottom with her satchel.

"Yusuke you jerk! Put me down right now or else!"

Yusuke chuckled and set her down again in front of him, right between his legs. "Or else what?" He asked, standing over her with his arms folded across his chest. He looked down at her with a condecending glance.

She took two steps forward and slammed her satchel down as hard as she could between his legs. Yusuke let out a shriek of his own, his hands grabbing the sensitive area as he curled up in a ball. "That's what I'm going to do. Now if you'll excuse me, I have class." With a little huff she turned on her heel and marched back down the street to the high school.

"Damn...Same old Keiko, even when I'm a giant." Yusuke said, wincing slightly as he sat up. "Feh! Forget school! I'm not wasting my time here!"

He got to his feet and walked back through the gate, feeling annoyed.
1553322111.title: Strange Things are Happening

choices: "You're damn right!" Yusuke said, gritting his teeth.
"Heh, actually... How about you make me even BIGGER?" Yusuke asked with a grin!
15533221111.content:
Yusuke went right back into the city, unintentionally stomping with every step he took! He wasn't exactly angry, just annoyed. Then again, hitting any man in his tender areas was a sure way to get him upset! Yusuke slowly trounced his way into town.

As Yusuke was walking through the city, all sorts of people gazed back, looking at him. Yusuke saw them as their eyes met his own, but every citizen just looked away as if Yusuke was nothing new! This really struck Yusuke as odd, but he couldn't quite think of a reason how or why everyone was acting so... Normal to him. The giant teen racked his brain, trying to think of a reason why, but he was getting nowhere fast.

Yusuke was soon broken out of his trance when he felt ball bounce off his back! A bit annoyed, he whipped around and looked down... Only to see a little boy looking back up at him, smiling! It only took half a second, but Yusuke recognized him as the kid he saved from a car accident about a year or so back! Yusuke's expression softened a little, frustration slipping out of his body.

"Hey ki--" Before Yusuke could even finish his sentance, the boy tossed the ball up at him again, letting it bounce off his left pec! The boy caught it again on the rebound, giggling to himself as he did. Yusuke smiled, and set his hands on his hips! "Alright, let's see you do that again!" Yusuke said. The boy did it again, this time at Yusuke's left pectoral! As soon as it hit his chest, Yusuke bounced his pec, giving it a toss right back at the boy! The boy's face seemed to light up, and he tossed it back at Yusuke's right pec! Yusuke would bounce it again, sending the ball right back at the little boy! The two of them had big smiles on their faces as the boy kept tossing the ball, alternating pecs each time! Not only were they having fun, but a few nearby people caught wind of it, all of them impressed, smitten, and enraptured by the sight of such a large and admittably hot teen playing with a cute little boy!

After a moment, the ball hit Yusuke's left pec wrong and went flying off in to the street! The audience cheered happily, finding it quite impressive! The little boy turned, about to get the ball when a large hand clapped on his shoulder.

"How about I go get that for you?" Yusuke asked. The last thing he needed was for the past to be repeated! Yusuke checked the street briefly, before running out into the street to get the ball! Every step he took made large, foot shaped potholes in the road! Yusuke quickly reached the ball, and bent over to pick it up. He didn't even seem to notice the semi truck coming right out him, out of control with a sleeping man at the wheel! The trucker had been driving for days with minimal sleep! Yusuke didn't even hear it until the noisy engine was within earshot! He immediately looked up and his arms rose up to grab the sides! Yusuke was knocked back a few feet as the watching crowd gasped in shock! Yusuke quickly regained his footing, and after a brief skid, halted the truck! The air bag went off inside, catching the man. Yusuke sighed, and managed to make it with little more than a scrape here and there. He smiled, laughing a little. Off to the side, the crowd roared with applause and shouts of excitement! Yusuke chuckled, and turned to them, flexing his massive biceps which seemed to be just a little bigger from the sudden workout! After a moment, Yusuke walked back over and picked up the ball, before returning it back to the little boy.

"Good thing we avoided that this time, huh?" He asked with a grin, ruffling the boy's hair. The boy smiled and nodded back at him. "You be careful, alright?" Yusuke said, before standing back up, and turning to walk off. Yusuke felt great after that, like nothing could dampen his spirits!

Yusuke's legs soon led him to an empty lot. As he looked around, he remembered that his was the place that Kuwabara and his gang used to hang out at back in the day! A little smirk rose to his face as he remembered all the times that Kuwabara's ass was handed to him!

"Well well well! Good with kids AND a good samaritan? You really are the whole package, aren't you?" A voice called out. As Yusuke turned his head, a little glitter flashed past him! It all mustered together and the fairy reappaeared before his very eyes!

"H-Hey! It's you!" Yusuke growled. As soon as he saw the fairy's face, everything came flooding back to him! The woods, the mushrooms, and not to mention the curse! "You're the one who did this to me!"

"Right you are!" He said with a smile, claping his hands in applause. "Oh I'm delighted that such a tall, handsome man like you remembers me!" He flutted onto his back in the air, gazing at Yusuke. "I suppose this is the part where you tell me your life is terrible and you want me to change you back, yes?" He said with smug little smile.
15533221111.title: Nostalgia

choices: Masque retreats to protect the ring...by eating it!
Yusuke slips past Masque and runs deeper into the cave to get the ring!
155332211112.content:
"Heh, actually...How about you make me even BIGGER?" Yusuke asked with a grin.

"See, this is how it always happens~" The fairy said, holding his hands up. "After a few hours of my curse they always come begging for me to remove..." He suddenly stopped and looked up at Yusuke with a confused look on his face. "I'm sorry...I must have misheard. Did you just say...?"

"That I wanted to be bigger?" Yusuke finished for him, a smug smile of his own coming onto his face. "Yeah, that's exactly what I said! Got a problem with that?"

"I...you...and...huh?" For once the smooth talking fairy seemed at a loss for words. "I have to say...in the last century of my work no one has ever found my curses...appealing." He smiled a little and said, "You really are something special~ I keep finding new things about you I like~"

Yusuke put his arms behind his head and said, "Yeah, I have that effect on people." He grinned and crouched down, moving closer to the tiny creature. "So? How about it? Can you make me bigger? And how about giving me some more muscle this time? I mean, I know I'm pretty sexy already, but a little more never hurt, right?"

The fairy looked Yusuke over. True, his chest bulged slightly and he had a six pack to be proud of, not to mention toned arms and legs, but he would look even more impressive with some more...bulk~ He snapped his fingers and said, "Yes, yes, I can do just that for you~ But, since this curse turned into a blessing you still haven't paid the price for trampling all over my mushrooms."

Yusuke groaned and said, "That was an accident! Maybe you shouldn't build those things right in the middle of a forest path."

"H-Heathen! My circles were there FAR before any "path"! Would it kill you great galumphing creatures to look down every one in awhile?"

"I'm doing it right now and all I see is a mouthy little fairy who's asking for a crushing!" Yusuke said, cracking his knuckles.

"Oh please. I'm made of fairy dust. I can't be killed by such barbaric methods." The fairy said, studying his fingernails. "Now, are you going to listen to my request or not?"

"What request? You never said anything about a request!" Yusuke shouted, getting frustrated.

"For stamping on my mushrooms! I am asking you a request as payment! Try. to. keep. up!" With every word he rapped his sharp little knuckles on top of Yusuke's head. "Figures. All beauty and no brains."

Yusuke swatted him with his hand, getting nothing but a handful of dust that quickly surged through his fingers and reformed into the fairy, grinning at Yusuke with infuriating superiority. "You're not going to make me bigger until I accept, are you?"

"Nope~ I won't~" He said, sticking his tongue out at Yusuke.

"Argh...Fine! I'll do your stupid request! What is it?"

"It's simple!" He said, flying closer to Yusuke's face. "My magic ring was stolen from me a few decades ago by a troll demon named Masque. He lives in a cave, not too far out of town. He's a big fellow, about so tall and wearing a bone mask on his face. If you can get my ring back, I promise I will "curse" you again~"

"So I just have to beat down some punk and get back some jewelry?" Yusuke said with a grin. "Yeah...I think I can handle that!"

He stood back up to his full height and walked away, the fairy waving good bye to him. "Oh, I am an absolute genius~! My precious ring will soon be mine again~! And all it took was a little promise and a little persuasion~ Now...how much bigger will he want to be I wonder? I doubled his height last time so perhaps I should triple? Or maybe quadruple? I wonder how he likes the idea of the city being small enough to crush in one step?" The fairy started giggling to himself as he thought of the possibilities~ "Oh...just imagine miles upon miles of that gorgeous body, pumped to enormous proportions~! I'm getting faint just thinking about it~"

The fairy fluttered about the vacant lot, dreaming of what he would do to Yusuke, no longer caring about what Yusuke might want. Such was the danger of dealing with fairies!

Yusuke jogged along the sidewalk, making deeper footprints as he ran, people politely dodging out of his way. Everyone in town knew about Yusuke's towering height and were used to just moving out of his path. It was better than getting stepped on, though a few guys had purposefully stood in his way a few times just to get pressed under those enormous feet. Soon, Yusuke was at the edge of town. He started walking towards a small mountain, figuring that Masque was probably in there somewhere. It didn't take long for Yusuke to reach the mountain. He started moving about them, looking for a cave of any kind. After about ten minutes of searching, he found a rather large cave. Animal bones were littered around the entrance, a few set up in a kind of warning sign net to it. Yusuke walked right into the cave and shouted, "Hey! Mask or whatever your name is! Get out here! We need to talk!"

The ground rumbled as something huge slowly approached Yusuke from the dark reaches of the cave. A shape slowly materialized. It was green skinned and had a gigantic round belly, a strong set of pecs balancing on top of it while a pair of burly arms framed it. His feet were crushing bones and rocks alike as he approached Yusuke, his hair short and spiky, the skull of some horned creature covering his face. He stopped when he was a few feet from Yusuke, the still giant teen barely reaching the top of the demon's stomach! Masque scratched his belly and said, "What do you want?"

"You got a ring back there that doesn't belong to you?" Yusuke asked, looking coldly at the demon.

"Oh for the love of...Did Oberon send you here? Look kid, I won that ring fair and square! Besides, its magic keeps attracting such delicious food. And just having it near me helps me grow bigger and stronger!"

"And fatter?" Yusuke said, indicating the demon's gut.

"S-Shut up! I don't need to take this in my own house!" He growled, lifting up a huge bone club. "Maybe I'll just eat you too!"

"I don't think so!" Yusuke shouted and began to fight! He didn't want to kill the demon. He hadn't really done anything wrong...but Yusuke needed that ring if he wanted to get any bigger!

As the fight dragged on...
155332211112.title: A Quest

choices: Enter Masque's stomach and retrieve the ring!
Eliminate Masque and just fetch the ring out!
1553322111121.content:
As the battle raged on, the two stood apart from each other, with Masque's back to his cave. Both of them were sweating bullets!

"Y-You're not bad... For a human..." Masque said, panting slightly.

"Yeah? Thanks." Yusuke said, half accepting the compliment. "And I can keep going too! So how about you just make this easy and hand over that ring already?"

"N-No!" Masque said almost immediately, "That ring belongs to me now! I told you I got it fair and square!" Yusuke was in a bit of a bind. He wanted to get bigger, but at the cost of robbing someone? ... Then again, it's not like this demon was completely innocent. After all, just gazing around at all the bones was evidence enough! However everyone has to eat... Yusuke just shook his head.

"J-Just give it to me!" Yusuke demanded once more! Masque could see the determination in the teen's eyes. While he carried on with the feeling that he could still beat Yusuke, it was better to be safe than sorry! Without a word, Masque turned and dove right into his cave! "Hey! Where are you going!?" Yusuke said, taking a step forward. Masque didn't reply and kept running, giving Yusuke little choice other than to follow after him!

As Yusuke ran into the dark cave, he nearly tripped over a rib that was littered on the ground! Not far off, Yusuke could hear something moving. There was no question in his mind that it was Masque, but before he could get any deeper, something large, heavy, and just a little bit musky dashed right past him! As Yusuke turned, he could see Masque running back the the entrance of the cave, both of his hands shut tight!

"Hey! Get back here!" Yusuke ordered, turning around and heading back to the light! It didn't take long with someone as big as him! Yusuke was soon bathed in sunlight once more, where he saw Masque standing not too far away!

"Looking for this?" He asked with a smug little grin, holding the ring out in two fingers. Yusuke immediately dashed forward and tried to snatch it, but Masque was fast enough to pull it back! "Ah ah ah!" He said mockingly. He looked at the ring, then back at Yusuke. He got an even bigger smile on his face now! With a flick of his wrist, he tossed the ring right into his mouth! Yusuke's face was shocked! The next thing the teen heard was a noisy "shlurp" as the ring went down the beast's throat! Yusuke could only watch as that tiny bulge seemed to travel so slowly down his throat...

"Heh heh..." Masque pat his belly, which jiggled slightly with each slap! "That was probably the most satisfying meal I've had in months! Tell you what, you can have it now! Once my stomach is done with it! BWAHAHAHAHA!" Masque laughed loudly, scaring off a few nearby birds as he did! He walked closer, and bent down, letting loose a noisy burp right in Yusuke's face! Yusuke, of course, turned his head.

"Gross! It smells like rotting flesh in there!" Yusuke said, falling on his ass. Masque just laughed again, before retreating into the cave for a nap. He figured the ring was safe for the time being, and thusly, thought himself the victor!

"Dammit, now what...?" Yusuke said. "Do I really have to wait until that ring comes out..." Before Yusuke could even finish his sentance, he shuddered. That was the last thing he wanted to do! Instead he took a deep breath and tried to think things through a little more clearly. "Okay... So if he really hasn't done anything wrong, I... Could try to go inside him and find the ring in his stomach... If I do that, I'd better hurry and get out before he digests me!" Yusuke thought, sitting cross-legged as he brainstormed. "Or... I could just kill him and open up his stomach." Yusuke said, thinking of the simpler path. As easy as it might of been, it would be cruel to just kill him when he hadn't done anything wrong. That was against Yusuke's nature!

Yusuke went on to think for about ten minutes before coming to his decision! He saw no other choice than to...
1553322111121.title: Down the Hatch!

choices: Yusuke was growing!
Masque was growing!
15533221111211.content:
"Aaaagh! It would be so easy to just rip that lousy tub of guts open and take the ring...but this guy really didn't even do anything wrong. Guess I'll just have to fish it out myself! No way I'm waiting around for it to come out naturally!" Yusuke said, slowly moving back into the cave. Masque's snores were already filling the cave. He really was confident that there was no way Yusuke could get the ring from him. He was either incredibly trusting...or incredibly stupid. Either way, Yusuke soon made it back into Masque's inner sanctum. It was as littered with bones as the outside, the giant demon reclining on a pile of rocks, his mouth wide open as he slept. In the corner there was a small niche in the rock where a fire was burning, casting the interior of the cave in an eerie orange glow. Yusuke calmly approached the demon and leaned in, holding his nose as he stared into the creature's gaping maw. "Aw man...this is disgusting!"

He took a deep breath and slowly plunged his hand in. His hand fit rather easily down Masque's throat, the demon gagging slightly, his sharp fangs nearly slicing Yusuke's buff arm off before he relaxed again, the snoring resuming. Clearly he had experience swallowing creatures whole. The completely intact skeletons of smaller to mid sized animals laying in the cave were a testament to that. The demon's throat was hot and slimy, contracting and expanding around Yusuke's hand and arm as he dug in deeper and deeper, eventually reaching the monster's stomach. He gently began feeling around inside, nearly gagging himself as he touched what felt like half digested meat and bones, not to mention the various gastric juices. Finally, his finger touched something small, round, and cold. With a grin Yusuke snatched it and tugged his arm out, the appendage covered in a slimy purple liquid of some kind. "Yuck! This is the last time I ever go demon stomach diving!"

He shook his arm off as best he could before holding the ring up to the light. It was an average gold ring with a series of designs that were probably words in the Fairy language. A small blue jewel was ensconced long the band, along with a green jewel, a red jewel, a yellow jewel, and a violet jewel. Yusuke tilted his head and was a bit surprised by how big it was. It would easily slip onto his finger! He shrugged and was about to slip it in his pocket when a particularly loud snore from Masque made him flinch, the ring flying from his hand and onto the floor, rolling over into a pile of bones. Cursing softly, Yusuke reached down and grabbed the ring, the small band accidentally slipping onto his finger as he did so. There was an immediate, intense flash of light, all the jewels glowing brightly, a loud whistle erupting from it as well. Masque jumped as though he had been shocked, his head turning blearily from side to side. Yusuke quickly began to run, trying to tug the ring off which refused to be removed! He had made it only a few steps before Masque realized what had happened. With a mighty bellow of rage he gave chase.

Just as Yusuke burst out of the cave, Masque's arm slammed into his back, sending him flying forward. Yusuke crashed into the ground and skidded a few feet, barely managing to turn over before Masque grabbed him by the wrist and held him up. "You little thief! how dare you try and get away with my ring!"

"Oh get it over it tubby!" Yusuke shouted, kneeing the demon in the gut. "You weren't even doing anything with it anyway!"

"It's still mine! And I'm going to take it back even if I have to rip your arm off to do it!" Masque growled, gripping Yusuke's wrist tighter.

Yusuke made a fist with his other hand, powered it with spirit energy, and slammed it into Masque's gut, making him let out a little "oomph!" of air and drop Yusuke. The demon quickly recovered, however, and grabbed Yusuke's wrist again, his other hand grabbing the ring. A struggle ensued, both demon and teen trying to get the ring. Yusuke had an advantage, thanks to the ring being practically grafted on his finger. Unfortunately, Masque quickly figured out that the ring was not going to come off by normal means. He opened his mouth and brought Yusuke's hand closer to it, his tongue slipping out and licking the hand expectantly. Yusuke, not about to let his hand get bitten off, powered his hand up with spirit energy, intending to launch a spirit gun straight through Masque's mouth. It was no longer a question of stealing, but of self defense. Before he could launch the bullet, however, the ring flashed brightly, the whistling stopping as Yusuke felt his spirit energy meant for the spirit gun drain into the ring, the jewels glowing faintly. Masque had stopped in his tracks, curious what was happening with the ring. Yusuke tried to fire another spirit gun, but once again the energy merely drained into the ring, the jewels glowing even brighter! With a sudden flash, the ring let off a little burst of energy, blasting both human and demon away from each other. Masque slammed into the side of the mountain while Yusuke flipped head over heels and landed hard on his back.

They both groaned, feeling like they had been hit by a train. After they had both gotten to their feet, their eyes opened wide at what they saw.
15533221111211.title: Operation: Stomach Pump

choices: "Take a visit to that tasty looking town!"
"Take back that ring you stole from me!"
155332211112112.content:
"What?!" Both Yusuke and Masque said in unison! While the surprise was mutual, it was Yusuke who felt both shock and worry at the same time! Before his very eyes, the already powerful Masque was growing even more powerful!

Masque looked down, barely able to see his gut past his bulging, shelf-like pecs! His muscles convulsed and pushed out, swelling up like balloons! He was already huge, but now he was getting ridiculous! His biceps pumped up, filling with limitless power, slowly growing bigger, thicker, heavier!

Masque's surprise had slowly turned into joy! He got a sinister grin on his face, as he craned his head back and let out a monstrous roar! Birds fled in fear as Yusuke could feel his body shake a little! The large beast he had worked so hard to defeat was slowly becoming more powerful than he could comprehend! The faint abs on Masque's stomach became slightle more apparant, as his gut pushed out further, shaking slightly as it started to drape over his lap! It let out a dull rumbled, begging to be filled as it's last meal seemed to shrink within! Masque's biceps bulged with new power, invoulentarily flexed with every little bump of pure meat that seemed to course within them! Masque let out a low, lustful groan as his shoulders broaded practically as wide as the entrance to his cave! His traps rose up, threatening to swallow his head, making him look like a wall of pure muscle! Down below, his thighs were already bulking up, so massive that they started to rub up against each other! Masque had to adjust his stance just so he wouldn't look like a roided out penguin! There was a meaty "SLAP!" that echoed through the air, as Masque's dick slapped against his thigh, with two balls the size of Yusuke's giant fist!

Masque continued to grow taller and taller, letting out soft roars that would suddenly grow loud! Birds fled in terror of the growing beast! Yusuke gulped. Before, he only came up to Masque's gut, but now he only came up to his knees! Masque had begun to rise up taller than the trees, his calves pushing and growing just to keep up! His huge feet and sharp toenails grew, inching ever closer to Yusuke's body, forcing the teen to back up slowly! And while Yusuke couldn't quite see it, Masque was getting quite the ass! Two full, round cheeks you could bounce a boulder off of!

Masque laughed triumphantly, his thundering bellows nearly deafening Yusuke! "Good job, you worthless human!" Masque taunted, "You've done a great job... At making me the most powerful demon to ever live!" Masque laughed again, his gut bouncing as it hung over his lap! Yusuke gulped again, looking at the gargantuan demon towering over him.

"Now then... I think I'll..."
155332211112112.title: Trouble, Make it Double!

choices: The kid locks Yusuke in a cage until he's ready to comply!
The kid punishes Yusuke until he's ready to comply!
1553322112.content:
Yusuke blinked and rubbed his eyes again before looking around at his surroundings. "Alright...Just why the HELL is everything so FREAKING HUGE?!"

He got to his feet and looked around wildly, everything in his room super sized! His chair and desk, his bed, his closet, his door everything was stretching high above him. Yusuke ran over to the chair and measured himself against it. He couldn't have been more than five or so inches tall. "Oh man...That stupid fairy has something to do with this!"

He whipped around, intending to run over to his bed to climb up on top of it for a better vantage point, when a shower of gold dust seemed to fall from above. Yusuke looked up but saw nothing out of the ordinary. Just the regular ceiling. He turned around really fast again, this time catching the blur of an object out of the corner of his eye before the dust fell. He slowly reached behind him as he looked over his shoulder, touching a thin, delicate something at the same time he saw a pair of golden wings growing from his back. His jaw dropped as he saw it, touching his back wildly, expecting to find holes in his shirt and these frilly things stuck deep inside his body! Instead, he found nothing but intact clothing. The wings didn't seem to be attached. Rather, they were floating slightly behind him. Yet now that Yusuke was aware of them, he felt a strange connection with them, like they were part of his body. He flexed his back a little, the wings flapping slightly. Yusuke repeated the motion a few times before he was able to flap the wings themselves, his body slowly rising into the air in a shower of golden dust that disappeared the second it touched the floor. "You've got to be kidding me..."

Yusuke fluttered over to the bed and landed softly on top of it, looking around. He put his hands in his pockets and jumped a little as he realized he had something in the right one. He pulled out a small, neatly folded piece of paper that definitely hadn't been in there this morning and opened it up. The words inside were written in a fancy, looping script and said:

"Hey there Mr. Cutie~ Aren't YOU a lucky little devil? Or should I say fairy? It's not every day I grace a mere human with the gift of becoming a fairy! Consider yourself lucky and be grateful, okay?~ Enjoy your new life!"

"That weasel! That little bastard!" Yusuke shouted, ripping the paper to shreds. "When I get my hands on that little punk I'm going to beat his face in!"

Yusuke jumped off the bed, flapping his wings, the dust now red as it fell around him, concealing him from normal human eyes. He flew out the open window and started making his way back to the school, intending to find those mushrooms and teach the fairy a lesson!

"First, I'll beat him until he turns me back to normal! Then I'm going to step on him and grind him into the ground! Then maybe if I feel generous I won't rip his wings off!" Yusuke muttered as he flew along the sidewalk, dodging between various people. His plans were cut short, however, as a hand suddenly reached out and snatched him! Yusuke let out a little yell as the massive fingers surrounded him, pulling him in front of the face of a curious little boy.

The boy looked to be about nine or ten years old with short, somewhat shaggy brown hair. he was wearing shorts and a blazer, a bow tie on his neck. It was the standard uniform for grade school boys. Yusuke began to struggle in the boy's fist, unable to even budge the huge fingers. "Wow...Are you a tiny person?"

"Hey kid! I'm kind of in a rush so how about you let me go already?" Yusuke shouted, glaring up at the boy. "Wait a second...how can you even see me?"

"It's not that hard." The boy said, grinning slightly. "You're leaving a trail of red dust everywhere."

"That's not...never mind." Yusuke said, shaking his head. This kid must have had a high enough spiritual awareness to be able to see demons and other phenomena. "Just let me go, alright? I'm not some toy!"

The boy ignored Yusuke's words completely, pulling on Yusuke's clothes as he examined the tiny teen. "You can't be a real person, can you? Real people aren't this small." He turned Yusuke over and saw Yusuke's wings glittering in the light. "Wow! You have wings! You're a fairy aren't you?"

"Yeah, sure, I'm a fairy." Yusuke said in a deadpan voice, tapping his finger impatiently against the kid's palm. "NOW will you let me go?"

"No way! You're a fairy! You're a fairy and I caught you! That means I get a wish, right?"

"Are you crazy?! I'm not giving you a wish!" Yusuke shouted. It might have been better to say he couldn't give him a wish, since his words brought a frown to the boy's face.

"I caught you fair and square! That means I get a wish!" He squeezed Yusuke harder, making the black haired teen wince.

"I..don't...think so!" Yusuke grunted, gasping as the boy squeezed tighter.

"Fine! If you won't give me a wish then I'll just take you home until you DO grant me a wish!"

He roughly shoved Yusuke into his shirt pocket, pulling the flap down over top of it and buttoning it closed, leaving Yusuke trapped in this giant boy's pocket!

"Great...Just great! Can this day get any worse?" He muttered to himself, upside down in the pocket.
1553322112.title: It's Going to be a Long Day

choices: Yusuke tries to break out of the cage
Before Yusuke can come up with a plan, the boy returns with food and drink
15533221121.content:
Yusuke desperately tried to right himself as he was carried along by the schoolboy, his wings constantly getting in the way of his every move! Since the wings themselves weren't attached to his body he didn't feel any pain, even when he accidentally rammed one wing into the side of the pocket, crumpling it up much like it was made of plastic wire and cloth, like a cheap pair of wings you'd buy in a Halloween shop. Once he had managed to get upright, the wing popped back into shape, unharmed. "Well, that's at least one less thing to worry about..." Yusuke thought, flapping them experimentally.

Though the wings did flap, he couldn't seem to actually fly while in the confines of the pocket, the material close enough around him to prevent him from getting any momentum. Before he could try simply climbing out of the pocket, the kid's fingers reentered the space, closing tightly around his much smaller body, dragging him back out into the light of day. The kid had a mischievous grin on his face as he held Yusuke tightly. The shrunken teen looked around the room he was in. It was average for a kid his age, full of posters of superheroes, clothes strewn about, books and school supplies haphazardly stacked on the desk. "What a dump!" Yusuke said peevishly, looking around in distaste.

"Hey! At least I have a room! You're just a dumb fairy who has to live outside!" The kid said, squeezing Yusuke harder, cutting off the foul mouthed teen's reply. "Anyway, this is MY room not yours. YOU get to stay here!"

He shoved Yusuke into a small cage that he hadn't noticed before, closing and locking the small door as soon as his hand was clear of the entrance. It was a simple bird cage, dusty with disuse, a yellowed newspaper spread along the bottom of it. There was a slight smell of mildew but the cage itself was clean of any "gifts" the previous occupant might have left behind. The perk hanging in the center of the cage had one of its strings cut, the wooden dowel dangling uselessly. "You're going to stay in there until you grant me a wish! And don't think you can escape either! If you even try, I'll pull your wings out!"

"Look kid, I ain't granting you any damn wishes, so you might as well just let me go now before I lose my temper and punch you in the eye!" Yusuke shouted.

The schoolboy merely rattled the cage as a response, throwing Yusuke's tiny body around like a penny in a dryer, leaving him in a crumpled mess on the bottom of the cage. The boy laughed and said, "How long do you think you'll last in there before you need food and water, huh Mr. Fairy? If you're good, I'll give you something tasty! I'll still feed you even if you're bad but it won't be as good. I still want to get my wish after all!"

"Look, kid, fairies don't grant wishes!" Yusuke insisted, getting to his feet with a bit of struggle. "You're thinking of, uh, what the hell are they called, leprechauns! When you catch THEM they grant you wishes! If you run into a fairy you're lucky if you don't end up bitten!"

The kid frowned, tilting his head slightly. "Oh yeah? I've never heard of that before!"

"Yeah, well, you should read some of the old fairy tales." Yusuke said, hands curled around the bars. His mother had always read him the old, gruesome fairy tales, never sparing the details despite his young age. "The stuff kids get these days is sanitized crap."

"Why should I even believe you? You could just be lying to save yourself." The boy said, sitting down in a chair, resting his head on his arms as he stared into the cage at Yusuke.

"If I could DO magic don't you think I would have done something by now to get you to let me go?" Yusuke said, rolling his eyes. "What kind of wish could you get out of me when I can't even break out of this damn cage?"

"Yeah...I guess you're right..." The kid said, sighing slightly, disappointed. "So...what am I supposed to do with you then?"

"How about LETTING ME GO!" Yusuke said, shouting the last part of the sentence. "I've got someone I've got to find and kick the crap out of!"

"But that's no fun at all!" The boy said, pouting a little. "How about you just be my pet instead? We can have all sorts of fun together and I'll take really good care of you! I promise!"

"HEY! You listen to me kid, I ain't ANYONE'S pet!" Yusuke said, taking a deep breath, ready to really let him have it...before the boy got to his feet, dropping a nearby cloth down over the cage, plunging Yusuke into darkness.

"Don't worry about it for now Mr. Fairy." He said, his voice getting farther away. "I'm going to get you something to eat! I'll be right back!"

Yusuke smashed his fist into the bars in frustration as the sound of the boy's footsteps slowly faded away. "NOW what the hell am I supposed to do?!"

1553322121.content:
It was late at night in Sarayashiki as Kazuma Kuwabara was sitting at his desk, hastily scribbling down notes. Several books were open around him, along with notebooks and sheaves of loose paper, most with messy handwriting covering every available inch. The window was wide open to let in the warm spring breeze, the scent of flowers riding in with it. The desk lamp was the only source of light in the room, everything else covered in the darkness of evening. The only sound beyond the scratching of the pencil was the soft mewing of a tiny black cat who was alternately playing with a small bit of fluff on the floor and sleeping up on Kuwabara's bed.

The red haired teen had just finished copying down a paragraph from one of his books when a bright voice suddenly called out, "Hey! Kuwabara! Are you awake in there?"

Kuwabara jumped, startled, his knee slamming into the bottom of his desk. He let out a yelp of pain and scooted his chair back a bit too roughly, overbalancing it and sending himself crashing to the floor. He got to his feet and ran to the window glaring down at his friend and rival Yusuke Urameshi. "Hey! Some of us are trying to study in here!" He shouted down at him.

"And some of us are trying to sleep you damn punks!" A third, more feminine voice yelled from a different window. Kuwabara winced as he heard his sister shout and motioned for Yusuke to come up. Yusuke took a few steps back, ran, and jumped, easily landing on Kuwbara's window sill like a cat.

"Man, your sister gets crabby at night." Yusuke said in a quieter voice, an easy going grin on his face.

"Yeah, well, she's got to work in the morning." Kuwabara said, sitting back down at his desk. "What are you doing here so late at night anyway Urameshi?"

Yusuke hopped down into the room and pulled his right hand out of his pocket, holding a common VHS tape. "Got a new mission from Spirit World! Got a group of demons causing trouble in a bad part of town. Looks like they're kidnapping humans for some reason. As far as anyone can tell, no one is being hurt so Koenma assumes its some kind of ransom deal. If we go in there first thing in the morning we'll be able to take them down before anyone can get hurt. You in?"

Kuwabara sighed and slapped his hand down on top of the papers. "No way! I'm right in the middle of studying! Do you know how much work I have to put in to make it into a decent school? Fighting demons and stuff like that is behind me."

Yusuke grinned and said, "Oh, so you're chicken now, is that it?"

"NO, that's not it!" Kuwabara said, getting to his feet and glaring down at Yusuke. "I could go down there and beat those punk demons to death with my bare hands! No sword needed!"

"Well, these guys aren't your average demons." Yusuke said, poking Kuwabara in the chest. "They're S class. Real mean guys. That's why we're sneaking in and setting up an ambush!"

Kuwabara rubbed the back of his head and said, "Geez! I'm not like you and the others! That's one of the reasons I stopped going on missions! I'm normal compared to you three!"

Yusuke chuckled and pulled his left hand out of his pocket. "Which is why Koenma made this for you~"

He tossed Kuwabara a small black box, about the size of a Rubik's Cube, pulsing with a strange glow. Kuwabara could sense something powerful deep within it. "What the heck is this thing? It feels...weird."

"That's a Spirit Energy Gathering Device." Yusuke said, pulling out a little slip of paper. "Let's see...It stores Spirit Energy..blah blah blah...you press the button and the energy is released in your body...blah blah blah...side effects...whatever." Yusuke crumpled the paper up and tossed it aside. "The point is, Kurama, Hiei, and I all put a portion of our spirit energy in that thing. If you press the button on the side, you'll get a big boost of power which will help put you on the same level as the S class guys we'll be going after."

"Wha..Wait a minute! You're telling me that kid had this thing the whole time and he's just giving it to us NOW?!" Kuwabara shouted, outraged.

"That's what I said! But it turns out they just developed the thing recently. I guess that makes you the guinea pig."

Kuwabara held the box out at arms length and said, "Yeesh! I don't know if I should trust this thing..."

"Don't be such a baby! Press the button and lets see what happens!" Yusuke said, his grin returning.

"Geez! Fine! I'll give it a try!" He carefully held the box closer and pressed the button on top with his thumb. Immediately a jolt of energy passed into his body through his arm, causing it to jerk, launching the box away from him. Yusuke ducked and swore, the box making a loud CLANK as it hit the wall.

"Hey! What's the big idea...Kuwabara?" Yusuke's angry tone changed to one of concern as he saw Kuwabara's body start shaking, sweat standing out on his forehead. Yusuke's eyes widened as he saw his friend slowly start to grow!

It started in his chest. With every breath he took, Kuwbara's chest inflated more and more, pressing tightly up against the fabric of his pajama shirt, the material sticking to his sweaty skin, looking like he had half a basketball stuffed under his skin! His shoulders came next, broadening, the collar on his shirt ripping slowly down the front, revealing the top swelling of his pecs. His arms followed suit, the short sleeves on his shirt being forced up as his biceps grew taller and rounder, going from baseball to softball sized! As his back flared out, each muscle standing out in stark relief against the thin material of his shirt, his height began to increase, his head getting slowly closer and closer to the ceiling! This caused his shirt to rise up, revealing his flat stomach popping out with abs, each brick tight and defined, the crevices between them so deep you could lose a quarter in them! His pants began to grow tight as his thighs expanded, the material of his pants splitting, revealing the slightly shiny skin underneath. His calves bulged out behind him, growing in order to support the new weight on top, the hems of his pants shredding like tissue paper! Even his feet grew longer and wider, slowly inching closer and closer to Yusuke, making the now much smaller teen step back. With a loud RIIIIP, Kuwabara's pants fell off of him, leaving him only in a pair of heart boxers, the front bulging out obscenely in front of him, straining the button as even his dick grew bigger, his ass filling out the material behind him, nearly giving himself a wedgie just by growing! It all came to a stop as his head bumped into the nine foot ceiling, his shirt nothing more than rags clinging to his massive arms, his whole body heaving with heavy, powerful muscle!

Yusuke's mouth dropped open as he gazed up at the behemoth that was his friend. "K-Kuwabara? Are you okay?"

His groaned and looked down at Yusuke before taking stock of his own body. He slowly said

"Woah... I think I like this!" Kuwabara said as he looked down at his hands. He opened and closed them a bit, almost as if he was unable to believe that this was really his body! "I gotta be dreaming... Yeah, I fell asleep while studying!" Kuwabara said. He reached around and gave his ass a pinch! "Ow!" He shouted, his eyes going wide! "Hey... It's not a dream! This is for real!" He said, a smile on his face. He looked at one of his arms and rose it up, flexing it as hard as he could! The muscles coiled together and up they rose, revealing a thick, beefy bicep set perfectly in the center of Kuwabara's arm. "Heh, yeah... Not bad at all! In fact... How about we give that button another push!?" Kuwabara said, walking across his room to retrieve the cube.

"H-Hey! Kuwabara!" Yusuke said, "Koenma said that was only to fight the demons, not pump you up!" Yusuke ran after Kuwabara, pulling on his forearm, but it was a fruitless effort. Kuwabara soon picked up the cube, and his thumb slowly moved for the button. "W-Wait!" Yusuke shouted loudly!

"What is it Urameshi!?" Kuwabara replied. His voice was a bit deeper and more commanding at his new size...

"E-Eh... Hey! Shouldn't we do that outside!? You don't want to wake your sister, right?" Yusuke said, trying to buy a little more time. Kuwabara stood there for a moment with a stupid look on his face, before he looked back down at Yusuke.

"Alright, I guess you've got a good point there." He said, stuffing the cube down into his ultra-tight boxers. "But first..." Kuwabara turned and picked up the instruction paper that Yusuke had carelessly tossed aside. Kuwabara stuffed that too down his boxers. "Alright, let's get out of here." He said. As he walked up to his doorway, he found that he was much too huge to fit in it! Kuwabara just sighed. "Awright, am I gonna have to break this thing down...?" Kuwabara mumbled with a sigh. He opened the doorway, and started to squeeze through! It seemed to work, until about halfway through when his massive muscles got in the way! Kuwabara grunted, jerking his way through until the wood began to splinter and crack, forcing the doorway open bigger for the large teen! Kuwabara soon popped out in the hallway, a proud smile on his face! "Alright, not bad! Getting through the front door is gonna be a breeze!" He said, walking through the tiny hallway. Yusuke quickly followed, desperate to think of a plan, but was getting nowhere fast!

In but a few short minutes, Kuwabara was outside, cube in hand. Yusuke had just arrived out the front door, shutting it politely behind him.

"Heh heh... Okay, hugeness, here I come!" Kuwabara announced, pressing the button! He waited for a moment... But nothing! There was no shock, no growth, nothing at all! "What the...?" Kuwabara mumbled. He then walked forward until he was under the streetlight, snagging the paper out from the side of his boxers. He unfolded it and looked over it, doing his best to read the slightly tiny print in his big hands. "Let's see... Usage... Effects... Aha! Recharging! Aw what!? This thing has to be recharged!?" Kuwabara grumpily looked down the paper until he found the section outlined in bold. "Okay, to recharge, hold cube out in front of you..." Kuwabara read, doing the action at the same time, "And it automatically drains reiki from any living being withing a ten meter radius... Huh! Seems easy enough!" Kuwabara said. He happened to notice that the next section said "Warning!" but the careless young stud chose to ignore it! Kuwabara deposited the paper back in his boxers, and noticed the cube was glowing! "Hey! It's working! Urameshi, check it-- Urameshi!?"

As Kuwabara looked behind him, Yusuke seemed to be in a trance, his eyes glowing as a blue aura was slowly being absorbed from him! "H-Hey! Urameshi! Snap out of it!" Kuwabara ordered, but Yusuke still stood there! "Wait... Oh crap!" Kuwabara immediately lowered his arm. The cube stopped glowing, and Yusuke snapped right out of his trance! A portion of the cube was now lit up, about one half of it! Yusuke sure was an powerful source of energy... Speaking of which, the young raven-haired teen stood there, his hand on his head.

"Aw man... What was that...?" Yusuke said, rubbing his forehead. "I feel kinda... Tired all of a sudden..."

It didn't take long for the little hamster wheel in Kuwabara's head to start turning. After making sure Yusuke wasn't harmed, he got an idea!

His voice was deep and rumbling, intimidating even Yusuke! Though this was partially due to his weakened state. He stumbled back and said, "You think you're stronger than me? Just...Just because you're big? I've beaten down punks bigger than me before!"

You're more like a pet!" Kuwabara grinned as he thought of that. "Yeah...Just my own little pet!"

He snatched Yusuke up again before the tiny teen could protest and started walking down the street. "Hey! What do you need me for?"

"I need a little fan there to cheer me on!" Kuwabara said with a goofy grin on his face.

"Oh brother...." Yusuke said, shaking his head. This was all going from bad, to worse!

Yusuke was taken for the ride against his will, as the gigantic Kuwabara strolled through town. Every step he took made the earth quake beneath him. Kuwabara got a cocky smirk on his face.

It was also at this moment that Kuwabara noticed that these creatures were jacked! Pecs pumped to perfection, biceps the size of Yusuke's head twice over, and long rows of powerful, rippling abs! "Okay... Time to put this thing to use!" Kuwabara mumbled to himself. Looking over one more time, he saw that two of the demons were just in range... He held out the cube, just as instructed, and began to drain the two of them!

It was all going well for a while, until he heard one of them say, "Hey! What's wrong with you guys?"

Kuwabara still held his hand out, but kept perfectly still! He was bound to be caught, but he might as well get as much as he could while he still can! "Hey look! Their aura! It's going... Over there!"

The man nodded, walking over to the crates at what felt like a slow pace. He rose his hand, and it suddenly morphed into a large claw! Kuwabara could feel a bead of sweat running down his forehead, as his heat beat out of his chest, making his pecs vibrate slightly!

In one swoop, the beast crashed his claws into the crates, knocking over and crushing several of them in the process! Kuwabara released the cube's absorption, the divine object now fully glowing! Kuwabara turned with a worried look on his face, and saw that all of the demons were glaring at him.

With the enemies coming right at him, Kuwabara didn't have time to press the button! He brought back his fist and punched one of them square in the face, making a loud crack as he did! He managed to crack it's jaw in just one hit! Kuwabara got a sudden burst of confidence as he heard this. The other one suddenly grabbed his other fist, making Kuwabara drop the cube just a few feet away! A little panicked, and a little more angered, Kuwabara shook him off, slamming him right into the steel walls of the warehouse! Kuwabara then turned back to the leader, a cocky smile on his face. The leader looked quite surprised by all of this!

As soon as Raine was out the front door of the school, Genis waited a few seconds, before then quietly making his way back into the classroom. "Whoa... Explosion element... Forbidden spells... Ancient curses..." Genis said in a soft voice, "No wonder sis was hiding these! She probably wants to learn them all for herself first! ... Huh?" Genis looked a little closer at one chapter. "Human enhancement artes? Page 278..." Genis mumbled. He then held his finger near the page marker, and started flipping until he reached 278. Using a little more energy, he made the photon a little brighter so he could read the whole page. He then began to read once more. "The spells here listed do ensure... A mighty spoil for those it cure... Those once weak and of little weight... Shall find themselves extremely great..."

Genis then flipped the page, where he found a list of several spells, but not a label to be found! He gulped to himself. "W-Well... It said you'd extremely great..." He gulped. Right now, he felt like it was a game of russian roulette. Hopefully he wouldn't die, but there was still no telling what any of these spells would do! 155332222221.title: Ace Attourney Men -- Phoenix Wright

1553322222211.content:
"Niiiiiick!" An excited voice called out from another room. "Niiiiiiick! Where are you?!"

Phoenix Wright sighed as he looked up from his desk. Stacks of paper were piled up on his desk while several loose sheets were spread out in front of him. It was getting late, a lamp the only source of light in the small office at the Wright and Co. Law Offices. He had been working all day on his current case and had specifically sent Maya and Pearl out to a movie in the hopes they would be gone long enough for him to make some headway in the peace and quiet. He set his pen down and leaned back in his chair, rubbing his eyes tiredly. "I'm in here Maya!" He shouted after hearing what sounded suspiciously like a vase shattering.

There was a loud thumping noise as Maya charged up to the office door, throwing it open and rushing into the room. "There you are Nick!"

"Where else would I be?" Phoenix asked, looking at her with a bemused expression on his face.

"Oh, I don't know." Maya said, taking the question to heart. "I guess you could have been out working on the case."

"Maybe he was getting something to eat!" Pearl piped up.

"Oh, I didn't see you there Pearl." Phoenix said, sitting up straighter, the small girl hidden behind a stack of papers.

"Aw, that's so mean!" She said, frowning, her little fists held up. "How could you forget me Mister Nick?"

"I'm sorry Pearl I've just...been really busy today." He said tiredly, smiling down at her. "Anyway, why were you shouting?"

"Oh! Right!" Maya said, her pensive expression changing to one of joy. "Pearly and I got a package in the mail!"

"Oh?" Phoenix said, looking genuinely interested for a moment. "Who sent it?"

"It's something from Kurain Village!" Maya said, lifting a package up and dropping it onto the top of Phoenix's desk, scattering papers everywhere.

Phoenix's eye twitched as he watched the papers fly about. "U-Uh...Right..."

"Isn't it exciting?!" Maya said, practically jumping up and down with excitement. "I wonder what it is! I bet it's a Steel Samurai DVD! The newest one just came out!"

"Maya, I seriously doubt the village would be sending you a Steel Samurai DVD." Phoenix said. "Wait a minute...was there even a video store in the Village?" Phoenix thought to himself.

"Don't be such a party pooper Nick!" Maya said, frowning slightly.

"Open it! Open it!" Pearl said, tugging on Maya's robe. "Prove Mister Nick wrong Master Maya!"

"Alright! Here I go!" Maya said, ripping the paper off the box. Scraps of brown paper flew around them like a brown snow storm. Phoenix sat back and just watched, curious in spit of himself. Soon, a plain white box was sitting on Phoenix's desk. Without stopping for even a moment, Maya opened the box and peered inside. "Hmm...Is that it?"

"What is it?" Phoenix asked, standing up, looking into the box. There didn't seem to be anything inside at first glance. However, after a quick scan, Phoenix noticed a small, purple tear drop shaped stone shoved off in the corner. "Wait...Isn't that a megatama?"

"Yup!" Maya said, picking it up and holding it up to the light. "Oh, but wait..." She studied in silence for a few minutes, turning it over in her hand. "These markings...I've never seen anything like it before!" She handed it over to Pearl and said, "What about you Pearly?"

The small girl held it up to the light like Maya did, closing one eye and tilting her head as she looked. "I feel like I've seen something like this before...My mother showed me pictures once. It was in a book that showed a bunch of different megatama and how they react to spiritual energy. See this symbol right here?"

She pointed to a swirl pattern and continued, "This means infinity! The processes in the megatama are never ending in other words. This symbol, the one that looks like a rock, is for strength. And this arrow pointing up means increasing. So strength increasing forever!" She looked proud as she explained all this.

"So...what does it mean?" Phoenix asked, a little confused by the spiritual explanations.

"It's just a charm." Pearl said with a smile. "The village sells them to tourists in order to make extra money on the side. This one is supposed to help you keep strength in trying times."

"I wonder why someone would send ME this?" Maya said, taking it back and frowning.

"Yeah, you don't...you know...work or anything." Phoenix said.

"Hey!" Maya shouted, looking outraged. "That's...well I guess it's true..." She puffed out her cheeks as she had to admit this. "Well, how about you take it then Nick?"

She pulled a string out of her pocket and tied it through the megatama. "Here! May you have all the strength you need to help you during your cases!"

"Uh..thanks!" He said, hanging the megatama around his neck. It almost felt...warm against his skin. "Probably because everyone's been holding it." He thought to himself.

"Okay! Fun's over!" Maya said authoritatively. "Now it's time for dinner!"

"Yay!" Pearl said, throwing her arms up into the air happily.

"Come on Nick! You've been working all day! Treat us to some food! It'll make you feel better!"

"How is emptying my wallet supposed to make ME feel better?" Phoenix said with a sigh.

"Oh, don't be so stingy!" Maya said, moving towards the door with Pearl. "Let's go!"

Phoenix got to his feet and grabbed his suit jacket, pulling it on and buttoning it. He WAS getting hungry after all. He had a big day ahead of him in court tomorrow. Spending some time off would do him good. The megatama felt a little warmer, a faint glow that no one could see emanating from it.

Phoenix, once out the front door, soon found himself being dragged along to Blue Ox Burger. There was plenty of other places to choose from, but Phoenix always tried forcing Maya to come here instead. They were much cheaper on their prices, and the quality... Well, it was satisfying to say the least. Phoenix would never force Maya to eat anything inedible, but damn it if he could get a good price and good quality he was going to take it! Especially considering how often Maya insisted on eating out...

As soon as they arrived, Maya and Pearl went straight to a booth! Phoenix couldn't help but notice it wasn't too far away from the door to the play area they had. Phoenix just sighed a little on the inside, knowing that the two of them were going to insist on going inside to play once they were done eating.

The magtama in Phoenix's pocket glowed faintly! His shoulders pushed out a little more, his biceps welled up a tiny bit, his pecs became more defined, and his abs tightened as well! In fact, not just his torso, but his entire body grew just a little bit as he felt frustration!

It felt like forever and a half to Maya, who was laying with her head on the table, her stomach grumbling noisily. "I can't even remember a time I was this hungry..." She mumbled to herself. Just then, Phoenix arrived with the tray of food!

"Maya, you really shouldn't put your face on these tables. You don't know what kind of bacteria are on them." Phoenix told Maya. Maya immediately stood up, not because of the germs, but because the food had finally arrived! Maya immediately took one of the bugers and unwrapped it! Pearl, on the other hand, actually waited for Phoenix to set the tray down on the table. Finally, once everyone had gotten their meals, Phoenix took his own and started to dig in himself!

It didn't take long for the three of them to finish. Phoenix was the last one to finish. Maya had practically inhaled her food, and once Pearl was done, she soon followed Maya who seemed insistent on entering the play area despite the height restrictions. Phoenix merely waited at the table, thinking over all the evidence they had found so far. It was another day in the courtroom again tomorrow. Just another murder case, and Phoenix was sure that he had this one pinned! It was going to be a clean sweep, especially since he was going up against Payne again.

About two hours later, Phoenix was tapping his fingers on the table! He soon stood up, and turned to go into the play area! Maya and Pearl were taking way too long, and Phoenix had to get home to go to sleep for tomorrow! The moment he entered the room, there was a raise in temperature. Everything felt a little bit warmer, and Phoenix could smell the subtle stink of the children's body odor. It wasn't enought to knock a guy out, but it would probably make Phoenix feel a little sick after a while...

"Maya! Pearly! Let's go!" Phoenix shouted. Just then, he saw Maya up in the tubes, waving at him from one of the windows! He motioned for Maya to come here, and she nodded! Maya then disappeared back into the tubes, leaving Phoenix to wait down at the bottom.

After about ten minutes, Phoenix was still waiting. He was quickly growing impatient, nearly fed up with waiting!

15533222222121.content:
May 19th, 11:23PM
Criminal Affairs Department


"Gumshoe. Gumshoe!"

Dick Gumshoe. A detective at the local homicide precinct in Los Angeles, and a man known for being strong, yet childish. He wasn't quite the brightest bulb in the box, but his great kindness and loyalty made up for it.

He and his current boss, Miles Edgeworth, had just investigated a crime scene. The two of them had returned to Police Headquarters to go over the facts of the case so far, as well as submitting and validating evidence. Ever since Phoenix had been ejected from his career, Miles had taken the courtroom by storm. There had been talk recently of one young upstart, however, by the name of Apollo, said to be the protege of Phoenix.. That young man would be facing Edgeworth tomorrow in the courtroom, and Edgeworth had no plans to take it easy, setting many different traps for the boy already!

"Gumshoe! Pay attention!" Edgeworth demanded, slamming his fist onto the table. Gumshoe snapped to, looking at Edgeworth.

"Y-Yes, pal? I-I mean sir!" He said, standing up straighter than normal.

Edgeworth sighed, before saying, "You haven't been paying attention to me at all, have you?"

"Uh... Maybe?" Gumshoe replied, chuckling nervously.

"..." Edgeworth just glared into Gumshoe's eyes, getting nothing but a blank, yet cheerful look back. "... As I was saying, I can trust you with this evidence, correct?" He asked, gesturing towards the plastic bag on the table that had a ring inside of it. "It is of the utmost importance for tomorrow's case. We've already had it's substances tested and its fingerprints dusted. You are to keep it locked up here until tomorrow at 9AM when you will meet me in the courtroom lobby. Understood?"

"You got it pal Uh, sir!" Gumshoe said, saluting Edgeworth as he puffed out his chest proudly. "I won't let it out of my sight! I'll sleep here at the office just to make sure it stays safe!"

"That's not necessary, but I don't care what you do." Edgeworth replied, folding his arms over his chest. He didn't mean any rudeness by it, it was just the truth, plain and simple. Gumshoe still had the same, silly smile on his face. "Don't expect any extra pay for this." Edgeworth made sure to add.

"Y-Yeah..." Gumshoe replied, rubbing the back of his head as he did. "I gotcha..."

"Alright. Good night." Edgeworth then took his leave, making his way to the door. His shoes made a distinctive click with every step. Gumshoe listened to them until they faded with a second door shutting; Edgeworth had left the building!

"Alright! I'm gonna guard this thing!" Gumshoe said, doing a little shadow boxing to psych himself up! "No way no how is this ring gonna get taken away!"

Gumshoe had started by taking a seat at the table, and looking at the bag with the ring in it. After a moment, he decided it might be safer if he put it in his desk. He got up and began to carry out his plan, until he realized that just about anyone could get in his desk! And he couldn't just leave it here, someone could easily break in and get the ring!

"I wonder what's so special about this ring...?" Gumshoe thought to himself. They had found it at the scene of the crime, near an opened safe that was in the CEO's office of a local building. The strangest thing was that the safe had been pried open. There were no burn marks, so no it probably wasn't explosives, there were no tools at the scene either. That didn't mean one wasn't used, just that there wasn't one there. The strangest of all was the door of the safe. The metal was mangled and warped, as if it was pulled back. The idea of someone just pulling a safe door open, however, was ridiculous! Gumshoe chuckled to himself at the very idea! After all, the man that they had in holding, Slim Pickitt, was way too thin to have done it! There must have been some special tool, or maybe it was a trick! Thinking that it could be a trick was a stroke of genius for someone like Gumshoe. There's also the possibility of an accomplice, security cameras had caught a glimpse of a gigantic man, even bigger and way stronger than Gumshoe, making his way through the halls of the building! As soon as the CEO's room was broken into, an alarm sounded! A loud noise had some from the room, like a door being slammed, was heard (according to a security officer that was patrolling the halls). The security officer rushed to the scene, and had little issues in apprehending Slim, and for the most part, that was that.

"Heh heh, it IS pretty shiny! I don't think I've ever seen a ring this nice!" Gumshoe said to himself. He held the baggie up, shaking it slightly and enjoying how it sparkled in the florescent lights of the office. "... I wonder if it'd fit me...?" Gumshoe thought. He popped the bag open. "N-No way! I shouldn't!" He said, turning his head away. "But... Then again, we already did all the analysis on it... It couldn't hurt if I slipped it on, right...? Just for a second!"

Feeling edgy, Gumshoe slipped the ring out of the bag and into his palm. He smiled as he held it up to the light. From it's marvelous gold band to it large, shining ruby. Putting it between two fingers, he slipped it onto his right pointer finger...

1553322222222121.content:
It was a cold November, the members of Iwatobi Swim Club unable to swim due to no indoor pool. Team Captain Makoto and his best friend Haruka were heading towards the mall dressed in thick winter clothes. The two were travelling there at Haru's request.

"I'm surprised you went there with no one else Haru." Makoto cheerfully said as he put his gloved hands in his coat, hoping to keep them warm.

"I saw a magazine my dad left out that said the mall was getting larger fishtanks. I was hoping one was big enough to swim in" Haru mumbled.

That explains it. Makoto thought as he gave Haruka a smile. He'd heard Haru's parents had set it up so the bath wouldn't even unlock unless they were there due to him catching a cold a week ago from staying in the cold water too long. ''Makes me wonder what he wants to show me.''

Whatever it was Haru was keeping it to himself, letting out not a peep more as they walked there. Makoto could tell Haru was thinking about it due to the gleam in his eyes. He wouldn't have to wonder for long as the two arrived.

"It's this way" Haru mentions as he guides Makoto to a small shop that recently opened. Makoto noticed all sorts of bizarre antiques that look like they came from around the world. Though some he doubted the validity of the item such as one labeled a magic lamp and a wooden cup call the holy grail.

Haru ignored Makoto looking around the shop and started talking to the clerk, showing a receipt. "I'm here to pick up the statue."

"I'll bring it to the front." the worker said as he went to the back.

"Now I'm wondering what it is you brought me for." Makoto asked puzzled about what seems to have enthralled Haru.

"To help me carry this to your house." Haru replied quietly. "It's your birthday gift."

"Haru!" Makoto said with both joy and surprise. He didn't expect a gift so soon since it's four days until his birthday. Makoto hadn't realized till then that Haruka hadn't complained about being called Haru at all, ikely as a early birthday gift. Both heard grunting as the clerk pushed a very large statue through the doors.

It was the statue of an monstrous Orca with front arm like legs and feet made of unknown materials, maybe some dark colored stones or marble painted black. Intricate green lines that glowed in spots, though Makoto realized the lights ere actually moving across the lines. Two waves are carved at the bottom, swallowing both the lower legs and tail. Makoto didn't know why but he felt a pleasant aura come from it. Like an enthralling desire to touch it.

Breaking out of his trance, Makoto turned to Haru who also seemed to be enjoying its presence. "Haru what is this a statue of?"

Haru stopped looking at the statue to mumble "No idea. I just saw it as I walked by and bought it. It was too heavy on my own though."

"My boss said it's a statue of the god of the abyss, some ancient deity of the sea that ruled all waters and protected them with a gentle hand. Legends say the god was beaten by a godslayer so he bestowed his power to it so that one day it would bless his power on a worthy mortal." The clerk explained to the clueless teens. "He makes sure I know this info to tell customers." Clerk apparently didn't care for such things, explaining his reasons why.

"Thanks for the info." Makoto bowed while Haru looked indifferent before gazing back on the statue. The clerk left them alone and returned to his work. "A god of the sea. I guess it does give off such a feel since you're so into it. Though if you plan on having us carry this to my house it would have been better to ask my dad to drive us here and back." Musing as he touched Haru's shoulder. Knowing Haru probably didn't consider it.

"You're right. I tried to move it by myself but I couldn't get it far so I figured you can help me since it'll be yours anyways." Haruka admitted before he moved to one side of the statue to grab the bottom.

He said all he wanted. Better help Haru before he hurts himself. Makoto moved towards the statue , touching it with one arm. Suddenly an intense and powerful feeling rushed throguh Makoto. He didn't know what this feeling was beyond pure bliss. The intense feelings flowing through him lead Makoto to lift the statue with one hand until it pressed against the ceiling. Haru let go, surprised at Makoto's strength.

"Looks like I need to train more" Haru said aloud, thinking he underestimated Makoto's strength.

"Ahh!" Makoto moaned as the feeling started to fade, leaving him speechless as he returned to normal and saw the statue lifted with ease in one hand. "Yikes! I didn't expect it to be so easy." Makoto didn't know what that feeling had been, but since no one around him mentioned it he figured it was simply his imagination.

"Looks like I can carry this outside by myself Haru so don't worry about it" smiling at Haru turned and blushed nodding as they both left the store and carried it to the Tachibana residence.

The two would soon learn of the power of the abyss that now resided in Makoto.
1553322222222121.title: Deep Abyss

RULES OF THE STORY:

1. Men. Only men. Women may play minimal roles in the plot. Females can NOT be subjects of growth.

2. This story will focus on (but is not limited to) muscle growth and giants. (there are some instances of weight gain and several instances of vore).

3. The story may not pertain to bodily fuctions (i.e. scat, watersports, farting, etc.) or slob.

4. Chapters must be of an acceptable length and be readable in American English. Otherwise they will be deleted without notice.

5. Choice chapters that are not added to withing sufficient time will be deleted without notification. You're just making a waste of space and creating false hopes when you do. There's nothing trashier than a story that's a bunch of choice chapters.

         5a. The excess choice chapters that currently exist were made several years ago when this story was kept private at all times and not open to public eye. These are the only exception to the rule.
